[03]‘‘Mama mayhaṃ me’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Bhikkhave samaṇā tapassino’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Pare ^a^V1.0177^ea^ aññe paṭiviruddhā’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Avaṇṇaṃ akittiṃ ninda’’nti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Bhāseyyuṃ bhaṇeyyuṃ kareyyu’’nti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Dhammassa vinayassa satthusāsanassā’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Saṅghassa samūhassa gaṇassā’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Tatra tattha tesū’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Tumhehi vo bhavantehī’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Āghāto doso byāpādo’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Appaccayo domanassaṃ cetasikadukkha’’nti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Cetaso anabhiraddhi cittassa byāpatti manopadoso’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. ‘‘Na karaṇīyā na uppādetabbā na pavattetabbā’’ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Iti iminā nayena sabbapadesu vevacanaṃ vattabbanti ayaṃ ^b^vevacano hāro.^eb^

[03]Āghāto vatthuvasena dasavidhena ekūnavīsatividhena vā paññatto. Appaccayo upavicāravasena chadhā paññatto. Ānandopītiādivasena navadhā paññatto. Pīti sāmaññato khuddikādivasena pañcadhā paññattā. Somanassaṃ upavicāravasena chadhā paññattaṃ. Sīlaṃ vārittacārittādivasena anekadhā paññattaṃ. Gambhīratādivisesayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ cittuppādavasena catudhā, dvādasavidhena vā, visayabhedato anekadhā ca paññattaṃ. Diṭṭhisassatādivasena ^a^M1.0201^ea^^a^P1.0261^ea^ dvāsaṭṭhiyā bhedehi, tadantogadhavibhāgena anekadhā ca paññattā. Vedanā chadhā aṭṭhasatadhā anekadhā ca paññattā. Tassā samudayo pañcadhā paññatto, tathā atthaṅgamo. Assādo duvidhena paññatto. Ādīnavo tividhena paññatto. Nissaraṇaṃ ekadhā catudhā ca paññattaṃ…pe… anupādāvimutti duvidhena paññattā.

[03]‘‘Ajānataṃ apassata’’nti vuttā avijjā visayabhedena catudhā aṭṭhadhā ca paññattā. ‘‘Taṇhāgatāna’’ntiādinā vuttā taṇhā chadhā aṭṭhasatadhā anekadhā ca paññattā. Phasso nissayavasena chadhā paññatto. Upādānaṃ catudhā paññattaṃ. Bhavo dvidhā anekadhā ca paññatto. Jāti vevacanavasena chadhā paññattā. Tathā jarā sattadhā paññattā. Maraṇaṃ aṭṭhadhā navadhā ca paññattaṃ. Soko pañcadhā paññatto. Paridevo chadhā paññatto. Dukkhaṃ catudhā paññattaṃ, tathā domanassaṃ. Upāyāso catudhā paññatto. ‘‘Samudayo hotī’’ti pabhavapaññatti, ‘‘yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’’ti dukkhassa pariññāpaññatti, samudayassa pahānapaññatti, nirodhassa sacchikiriyāpaññatti, maggassa bhāvanāpaññatti.

[03]‘‘Antojālīkatā’’tiādi ^a^V1.0178^ea^ sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ saṅgahapaññatti. ‘‘Ucchinnabhavanettiko’’tiādi duvidhena parinibbānapaññatti. Evaṃ āghātādīnaṃ akusalakusalādidhammānaṃ yathāpabhavapaññattiādivasena, tathā ‘‘āghāto’’ti byāpādassa vevacanapaññatti, ‘‘appaccayo’’ti domanassassa vevacanapaññattītiādinā nayena paññattibhedo vibhajitabboti ayaṃ ^b^paññattihāro.^eb^

[03]Āghātaggahaṇena saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgaho, tathā anabhiraddhigahaṇena. Appaccayaggahaṇena vedanākkhandhasaṅgahoti idaṃ ^b^khandhamukhena otaraṇaṃ.^eb^ Tathā āghātādiggahaṇena dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātu dukkhasaccaṃ samudayasaccaṃ vā gahitanti idaṃ ^b^āyatanamukhena dhātumukhena saccamukhena^eb^ ca ^b^otaraṇaṃ.^eb^ Tathā āghātādīnaṃ ^a^P1.0262^ea^ sahajātā avijjā hetusahajātāññamaññanissayasampayuttātthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti, asahajātā pana anantarasamanantarānantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanapaccayehi paccayo hoti, anantarā upanissayavaseneva paccayo hoti ^a^M1.0202^ea^. Taṇhāupādānādīnaṃ, phassādīnampi tesaṃ sahajātānaṃ asahajātānañca yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvo vattabbo. Koci panettha adhipativasena, koci kammavasena, koci āhāravasena, koci indriyavasena, koci jhānavasena, koci maggavasenapi paccayo hotīti. Ayampi viseso veditabboti idaṃ ^b^paṭiccasamuppādamukhena otaraṇaṃ.^eb^ Ānandādīnampi imināva nayena khandhādimukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.

[03]Tathā sīlaṃ pāṇātipātādīhi viraticetanā, abyāpādādicetasikadhammā ca, pāṇātipātādayo cetanāva, tesaṃ tadupakārakadhammānañca lajjādayādīnaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanādisaṅgaho, purimanayeneva khandhādimukhena ca otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ. Esa nayo ñāṇadiṭṭhivedanāavijjātaṇhādiggahaṇesu. Nissaraṇānupādāvimuttigahaṇesu asaṅkhatadhātuvasenapi ^b^dhātumukhena otaraṇaṃ^eb^ vibhāvetabbaṃ. Tathā ‘‘vedanānaṃ…pe… anupādāvimutto’’ti etena bhagavato sīlādayo pañca dhammakkhandhā, satipaṭṭhānādayo ca bodhipakkhiyadhammā pakāsitā hontīti taṃ mukhenapi otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Tadapi phassapaccayā’’ti diṭṭhipaññāpanassa paccayādhīnavuttitādīpanena ^b^aniccatāmukhena otaraṇaṃ,^eb^ tathā evaṃdhammatāya ^b^paṭiccasamuppādamukhena otaraṇaṃ,^eb^ aniccassa dukkhānattabhāvato ^b^appaṇihitamukhena suññatāmukhena ^eb^ca^b^ otaraṇaṃ.^eb^ Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti ayaṃ ^b^otaraṇo hāro.^eb^

[03]‘‘Mamaṃ ^a^V1.0179^ea^ vā…pe… bhāseyyu’’nti ^b^ārambho.^eb^ ‘‘Dhammassa…pe… saṅghassa…pe… bhāseyyu’’nti ^b^padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi.^eb^ ‘‘Tatra tumhehi…pe… karaṇīyā’’ti ^b^padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi ca.^eb^ Dutiyanayādīsupi eseva nayo ^a^P1.0263^ea^. Tathā ‘‘appamattakaṃ kho paneta’’ntiādi ^b^ārambho.^eb^ ‘‘Katama’’ntiādi ^b^pucchā.^eb^ ‘‘Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā’’tiādi ^b^padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi, no ca pucchāsuddhi.^eb^ ‘‘Idaṃ kho’’tiādi ^b^pucchāsuddhi ceva padasuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi ca.^eb^

[03]Tathā ‘‘atthi bhikkhave’’tiādi ^b^ārambho.^eb^ ‘‘Katame ca te’’tiādi ^b^pucchā.^eb^ ‘‘Santi bhikkhave’’tiādi ^b^ārambho. ‘‘Ki’’^eb^ntiādi ^b^ārambha pucchā.^eb^ ‘‘Yathāsamāhite’’tiādi ^a^M1.0203^ea^^b^padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi no ca pucchāsuddhi.^eb^ ‘‘Ime kho te’’tiādi ^b^padasuddhi ceva pucchāsuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi ca.^eb^ Iminā nayena sabbattha ārambhādayo veditabbāti. Ayaṃ ^b^sodhano hāro.^eb^
[03]‘‘Avaṇṇa’’nti ^b^sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ taṃ,^eb^ avikappetvā ^b^visesavacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘mamaṃ vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā’’ti. Sukkapakkhepi eseva nayo.
[03]Tathā ‘‘sīla’’nti ^b^sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ taṃ avikappetvā ^b^visesavacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘pāṇātipātā paṭivirato’’tiādi.
[03]‘‘Aññeva dhammā’’tiādi ^b^sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ taṃ avikappetvā ^b^visesavacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘tayidaṃ bhikkhave tathāgato pajānātī’’tiādi.

[03]Tathā ‘‘pubbantakappikā’’tiādi ^b^sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ taṃ avikappetvā ^b^visesavacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sassatavādā’’tiādi. Iminā nayena sabbattha sāmaññaviseso niddhāretabboti ayaṃ ^b^adhiṭṭhāno hāro.^eb^

[03]Āghātādīnaṃ ^a^V1.0180^ea^ ‘‘anatthaṃ me acarī’’tiādīni (dha. sa. 1237; vibha. 909) ca ekūnavīsati āghātavatthūni ^b^hetu.^eb^ Ānandādīnaṃ ārammaṇe abhisineho ^b^hetu.^eb^ Sīlassa hiriottappaṃ appicchatādayo ca ^b^hetu.^eb^ ‘‘Gambhīrā’’tiādinā vuttadhammassa sabbāpi pāramiyo ^b^hetu,^eb^ visesena paññāpāramī. Diṭṭhīnaṃ asappurisūpassayo, asaddhammassavanaṃ, micchābhinivesena ayonisomanasikāro ca avisesena ^a^P1.0264^ea^^b^hetu,^eb^ visesena pana sassatavādādīnaṃ atītajātianussaraṇādi ^b^hetu.^eb^ Vedanānaṃ avijjātaṇhākammāni phasso ca ^b^hetu.^eb^ Anupādāvimuttiyā ariyamaggo ^b^hetu.^eb^ Paññāpanassa ayonisomanasikāro ^b^hetu. ^eb^ Taṇhāya saṃyojaniyesu assādānupassanā ^b^hetu.^eb^ Phassassa chaḷāyatanāni, chaḷāyatanassa nāmarūpaṃ ^b^hetu.^eb^ Bhavanettisamucchedassa visuddhibhāvanā ^b^hetū^eb^ti ayaṃ ^b^parikkhāro hāro.^eb^

[03]Āghātādīnaṃ ^a^M1.0204^ea^ akaraṇīyatāvacanena khantisampadā dassitā hoti. ‘‘Appamattakaṃ kho paneta’’ntiādinā soraccasampadā, ‘‘atthi bhikkhave’’tiādinā ñāṇasampadā, ‘‘aparāmasato cassa paccattaññeva nibbuti viditā’’ti, ‘‘vedanānaṃ…pe… yathābhūtaṃ viditvā anupādāvimutto’’ti etehi samādhisampadāya saddhiṃ vijjāvimuttivasībhāvasampadā dassitā hoti. Tattha khantisampadā paṭisaṅkhānabalasiddhito soraccasampadāya ^b^padaṭṭhānaṃ.^eb^ Soraccasampadā pana atthato sīlameva, tathā pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirativacanaṃ sīlassa pariyāyavibhāgadassanatthaṃ. Tattha sīlaṃ samādhissa ^b^padaṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ samādhi paññāya ^b^padaṭṭhānaṃ.^eb^ Tesu sīlena ^b^vītikkamappahānaṃ duccaritasaṃkilesappahānañca^eb^ sijjhati, samādhinā ^b^pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ, vikkhambhanappahānaṃ, taṇhāsaṃkilesappahānañca^eb^ sijjhati. Paññāya ^b^diṭṭhisaṃkilesappahānaṃ, samucchedappahānaṃ, anusayappahānañca^eb^ sijjhatīti sīlādīhi tīhi dhammakkhandhehi samathavipassanābhāvanāpāripūrī, pahānattayasiddhi cāti ayaṃ ^b^samāropano hāro.^eb^
[06]Soḷasahāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Āghātādīnaṃ ^a^V1.0181^ea^ akaraṇavacanena taṇhāvijjāsaṅkoco dassito hoti. Sati hi attattaniyavatthūsu sinehe sammose ca ‘‘anatthaṃ me acarī’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 1237, vibha. 909) āghāto jāyatīti, tathā ‘‘pāṇātipātā paṭivirato’’tiādivacanehi ^a^P1.0265^ea^, ‘‘paccattaññeva nibbuti viditā, anupādāvimutto, channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ…pe… yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’’tiādīhi vacanehi ca taṇhāvijjānaṃ accantappahānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tāsaṃ pana pubbantakappikādipadehi ‘‘ajānataṃ apassata’’ntiādipadehi ca sarūpato dassitānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ rūpadhammā arūpadhammā ca ^b^adhiṭṭhānaṃ.^eb^ Yathākkamaṃ samatho ca vipassanā ca ^b^paṭipakkho. ^eb^ Tesaṃ cetovimutti paññāvimutti ca ^b^phalaṃ.^eb^ Tattha ^a^M1.0205^ea^ taṇhā, taṇhāvijjā vā samudayasaccaṃ, tadadhiṭṭhānabhūtā rūpārūpadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ, tesaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā samathavipassanā maggasaccanti evaṃ catusaccayojanā veditabbā. Taṇhāggahaṇena cettha māyāsāṭheyyamānātimānamadappamādapāpicchatāpāpamittatāahirikānottappādivasena sabbo akusalapakkho netabbo. Tathā avijjāggahaṇena viparītamanasikārakodhupanāhamakkhapalāsaissāmacchariyasārambhadovacassatā- bhavadiṭṭhivibhavadiṭṭhādivasena akusalapakkho netabbo. Vuttavipariyāyena amāyāasāṭheyyādiaviparītamanasikārādivasena, tathā samathapakkhiyānaṃ saddhindriyādīnaṃ, vipassanāpakkhiyānañca aniccasaññādīnaṃ vasena kusalapakkho netabboti. Ayaṃ ^b^nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmi.^eb^

[03]Āghātādīnaṃ akaraṇavacanena adosasiddhi, tathā pāṇātipātapharusavācāhi paṭivirativacanena. Ānandādīnaṃ akaraṇavacanena alobhasiddhi, tathā abrahmacariyato paṭivirativacanena. Adinnādānādīhi pana paṭivirativacanena ubhayasiddhi. ‘‘Tayidaṃ bhikkhave tathāgato pajānātī’’tiādinā amohasiddhi. Iti tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi tappaṭipakkhato, āghātādiakaraṇavacanena ca tīṇi kusalamūlāni siddhāniyeva honti. Tattha tīhi akusalamūlehi ^a^P1.0266^ea^ tividhaduccaritasaṃkilesamalavisamākusalasaññāvitakkāsaddhammādivasena sabbo akusalapakkho vitthāretabbo. Tathā tīhi kusalamūlehi tividhasucaritavodānasamakusalasaññāvitakkapaññāsaddhammasamādhi- vimokkhamukhavimokkhādivasena ^a^V1.0182^ea^ sabbo kusalapakkho vibhāvetabbo. Etthāpi ca saccayojanā veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Lobho sabbāni vā kusalākusalamūlāni samudayasaccaṃ, tehi pana nibbattā tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā upādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccantiādinā nayena saccayojanā veditabbāti ayaṃ ^b^tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi.^eb^

[03]Āghātānandanādīnaṃ akaraṇavacanena satisiddhi. Satiyā hi sāvajjānavajje, tattha ca ādīnavānisaṃse sallakkhetvā sāvajjaṃ pahāya anavajjaṃ ^a^M1.0206^ea^ samādāya vattatīti. Tathā micchājīvā paṭivirativacanena vīriyasiddhi. Vīriyena hi kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakke vinodeti, vīriyasādhanañca ājīvapārisuddhisīlanti. Pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirativacanena satisiddhi. Satiyā hi sāvajjānavajje, tattha ca ādīnavānisaṃse sallakkhetvā sāvajjaṃ pahāya anavajjaṃ samādāya vattati. Tathā hi sā ‘‘visayābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā’’ti ca vuccati. ‘‘Tayidaṃ bhikkhave tathāgato pajānātī’’tiādinā samādhipaññāsiddhi. Paññāya hi yathābhūtāvabodho, samāhito ca yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti. Tathā ‘‘nicco dhuvo’’tiādinā anicce ‘‘nicca’’nti vipallāso, ‘‘arogo paraṃ maraṇā, ekantasukhī attā diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto’’ti ca evamādīhi asukhe ‘‘sukha’’nti vipallāso, ‘‘pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito’’tiādinā asubhe ‘‘subha’’nti vipallāso, sabbeheva ca diṭṭhidīpakapadehi anattani ‘‘attā’’ti vipallāsoti evamettha cattāro vipallāsā siddhā honti, tesaṃ paṭipakkhato cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni siddhāneva honti. Tattha catūhi indriyehi cattāro puggalā niddisitabbā.

[03]Kathaṃ? Duvidho hi taṇhācarito mudindriyo ca tikkhindriyo cāti, tathā diṭṭhicarito. Tesu paṭhamo asubhe ‘‘subha’’nti vipallattadiṭṭhi satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati. Dutiyo asukhe ‘‘sukha’’nti vipallattadiṭṭhi ‘‘uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī’’tiādinā ^a^P1.0267^ea^ (ma. ni. 1.26; a. ni. 4.14; 6.58) vuttena vīriyasaṃvarasaṅkhātena vīriyabalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ vidhamati. Tatiyo anicce ‘‘nicca’’nti ayāthāvagāhī samathabalena samāhitabhāvato saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhati. Catuttho santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanavicittattā phassādidhammapuñjamatte anattani ‘‘attā’’ti ^a^V1.0183^ea^ micchābhinivesī catukoṭikasuññatāmanasikārena taṃ micchābhinivesaṃ viddhaṃseti. Catūhi cettha vipallāsehi caturāsavoghayogakāyaganthāgatitaṇhuppādupādānasattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiapariññādivasena sabbo akusalapakkho netabbo. Tathā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi catubbidhajhānavihārādhiṭṭhānasukhabhāgiyadhammāppamaññāsammappadhānaiddhipādādivasena sabbo vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ ^b^sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi.^eb^ Idhāpi subhasaññāsukhasaññāhi, catūhipi vā vipallāsehi samudayasaccaṃ ^a^M1.0207^ea^, tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānārammaṇabhūtā pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccantiādinā saccayojanā veditabbā.
[03]Iti tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayampi siddhameva hoti. Tathā hi atthanayadisābhūtadhammānaṃ samālocanaṃ ^b^disālocanaṃ,^eb^ tesaṃ samānayanaṃ ^b^aṅkuso^eb^ti niyuttā pañca nayā.
[06]Pañcavidhanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Idaṃ suttaṃ soḷasavidhe suttantapaṭṭhāne saṃkilesavāsanāsekkhabhāgiyaṃ, saṃkilesanibbedhāsekkhabhāgiyameva vā. Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana suttantapaṭṭhāne lokiyalokuttaraṃ sattadhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇañeyyadassanabhāvanaṃ sakavacanaparavacanaṃ vissajjanīyāvissajjanīyaṃ kusalākusalaṃ anuññātapaṭikkhittañcāti veditabbaṃ.
[06]Pakaraṇanayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rājagahe^eb^ti ^a^V1.0184^ea^^a^M1.0208^ea^^a^P1.0268^ea^ ettha duggajanapadaṭṭhānavisesasampadādiyogato padhānabhāvena rājūhi gahitanti ^b^rājagaha^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘mandhātu…pe…^eb^ vuccatī’’ti. Tattha mahāgovindena mahāsattena pariggahitaṃ reṇuādīhi rājūhi pariggahitameva hotīti mahāgovindaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Mahāgovindo^eb^ti mahānubhāvo eko purātano rājāti keci. ^b^Pariggahitattā^eb^ti rājadhānībhāvena pariggahitattā. ^b^Pakāre^eb^ti nagaramāpanena raññā kāritasabbagehattā ^b^rājagahaṃ,^eb^ gijjhakūṭādīhi parikkhittattā pabbatarājehi parikkhittagehasadisantipi ^b^rājagahaṃ,^eb^ sampannabhavanatāya rājamānaṃ gehanti pi ^b^rājagahaṃ,^eb^ saṃvihitārakkhatāya anatthāvahabhāvena upagatānaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi ^b^rājagahaṃ,^eb^ rājūhi disvā sammā patiṭṭhāpitattā tesaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi ^b^rājagahaṃ,^eb^ ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādīhi rājate, nivāsasukhatādinā sattehi mamattavasena gayhati, pariggayhatīti vā ^b^rājagaha^eb^nti edise pakāre so padeso ṭhānavisesabhāvena uḷārasattaparibhogoti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ paneta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti yakkhānaṃ. ^b^Vasanavana^eb^nti āpānabhūmibhūtaṃ upavanaṃ.

[03]^b^Avisesenā^eb^ti ‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati’’ (ma. ni. 1.69; 3.75; vibha. 508), ‘‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, (dī. ni. 1.226; saṃ. ni. 2.152; a. ni. 4.123; pārā. 11) ‘‘mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati’’, (dī. ni. 1.556; 3.308; ma. ni. 1.77, 459, 509; 2.309, 315, 451, 471; 3.230; vibha. 642) ‘‘sabbanimittānaṃ ^a^P1.0269^ea^ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ samāpajjitvā viharatī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.459) viya saddantarasannidhānasiddhena visesaparāmasanena vinā. Iriyāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattanūpāyabhāvato ^a^V1.0185^ea^ pathoti ^b^iriyāpatho.^eb^ Ṭhānādīnañhi gatinivatti ādiavatthāhi vinā na kañci kāyikakiriyaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkā. Viharati pavattati etena, viharaṇañcāti vihāro, dibbabhāvāvaho vihāro ^b^dibbavihāro,^eb^ mahaggatajjhānāni. ^b^Nettiyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘catasso āruppasamāpattiyo āneñjā vihārā’’ti vuttaṃ ^a^M1.0209^ea^. Taṃ tāsaṃ mettājhānādīnaṃ brahmavihāratā viya bhāvanāvisesabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ pana dibbabhāvāvahasāmaññato tāpi ‘‘dibbavihārā’’ tveva vuttā. Hitūpasaṃhārādivasena pavattiyā brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā vihārāti ^b^brahmavihārā,^eb^ mettājhānādikā. Anaññasādhāraṇattā ariyānaṃ vihārāti ^b^ariyavihārā,^eb^ catassopi phalasamāpattiyo. ^b^Samaṅgīparidīpana^eb^nti samaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^Iriyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ^eb^ itaravihārasamāyogaparidīpanassa visesavacanassa abhāvato, iriyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanassa ca atthasiddhattā. ^b^Viharatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^vi^eb^-saddo vicchedatthajotano, ^b^haratī^eb^ti neti, pavattetīti attho. Tattha kassa kena vicchindanaṃ, kathaṃ kassa pavattananti antolīnaṃ codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘so hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Gocaragāmadassanatthaṃ ‘‘rājagahe’’ti vatvā buddhānaṃ anurūpanivāsanaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ ‘‘ambavane’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘idamassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Eta^eb^nti etaṃ ‘‘rājagahe’’ti ^b^bhummavacanaṃ samīpatthe^eb^ ‘‘gaṅgāya gāvo caranti, kūpe gaggakula’’nti ca yathā. Kumārena ^a^P1.0270^ea^ bhatoti kumārabhato, so eva ^b^komārabhacco^eb^ yathā bhisaggameva bhesajjaṃ. ^b^Dosābhisanna^eb^nti vātapittādivasena ussannadosaṃ. ^b^Virecetvā^eb^ti dosapakopato vivecetvā.
[03]^b^Aḍḍhateḷasahī^eb^ti aḍḍhena terasahi aḍḍhaterasahi bhikkhusatehi. Tāni pana paññāsāya ūnāni terasabhikkhusatāni hontīti āha ^b^‘‘aḍḍhasatenā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Rājatī^eb^ti dibbati, sobhatīti attho. ^b^Rañjetī^eb^ti rameti. ^b^Rañño^eb^ti pitu bimbisārarañño. Sāsanaṭṭhena hiṃsanaṭṭhena ^b^sattu.^eb^

[03]^b^Bhāriye^eb^ti garuke aññesaṃ asakkuṇeyye vā. ^b^Suvaṇṇasatthakenā^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayena satthakena. Ayomayañhi rañño sarīraṃ upanetuṃ ayuttanti vadati. ^b^Suvaṇṇasatthakenā^eb^ti vā suvaṇṇaparikkhatena satthakena ^b^bāhuṃ phālāpetvā^eb^ti sirāvedhavasena bāhuṃ phalāpetvā ^b^udakena sambhinditvā pāyesi^eb^ kevalassa lohitassa gabbhinitthiyā dujjīrabhāvato. ^b^Dhurā^eb^ti dhurabhūtā, gaṇassa ^a^V1.0186^ea^, dhorayhāti attho. ^b^Dhuraṃ nīharāmī^eb^ti gaṇadhuraṃ gaṇabandhiyaṃ nibbattemi. ^b^‘‘Pubbe kho’’^eb^tiādi khandhakapāḷi eva.

[03]^b^Potthaniya^eb^nti ^a^M1.0210^ea^ churikaṃ, yaṃ ‘‘nakhara’’ntipi [pothanikanti churikaṃ, yaṃ kharantipi (sārattha. ṭī. 3.339) pothanikanti churikaṃ, kharantipi (vi. vi. ṭī. 2.cūḷavaggavaṇṇanā 339)] vuccati. ^b^Divā divassā^eb^ti divassapi divā, majjhanhikavelāyanti attho.

[03]^b^Tassā sarīraṃ lehitvā yāpeti^eb^ attūpakkamena maraṇaṃ na yuttanti. Na hi ariyasāvakā attānaṃ vinipātentīti. ^b^Maggaphalasukhenā^eb^ti maggaphalasukhāvahena sotāpattimaggaphalasukhūpasañhitena ^b^caṅkamena yāpeti.^eb^^b^Cetiyaṅgaṇe^eb^ti gandhapupphādīhi pūjanaṭṭhānabhūte cetiyaṅgaṇe ^a^P1.0271^ea^. ^b^Nisajjanatthāyā^eb^ti bhikkhusaṅghanisīdanatthāya. ^b^Cātumahārājikadevaloke…pe… yakkho hutvā nibbatti^eb^ tattha bahulaṃ nibbattapubbatāya ciraparicitanikantivasena.

[03]^b^Khobhetvā^eb^ti puttasinehassa balavabhāvato, sahajātapītivegassa ca savipphāratāya taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpadhammehi pharaṇavasena sakalasarīraṃ āloḷetvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pituguṇa^eb^nti pitu attani sinehaguṇaṃ. ^b^Muñcāpetvā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo pakārattho, tena ‘‘abhimārakapurisapesanādippakārenā’’ti vutte eva pakāre paccāmasati. ^b^Vitthārakathānayo^eb^ti ajātasattupasādanādivasena vitthārato vattabbāya kathāya nayamattaṃ. Kasmā panettha vitthāranayā kathā na vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘āgatattā pana sabbaṃ na vutta’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^Kosalarañño^eb^ti mahākosalarañño. ^b^Paṇḍitādhivacana^eb^nti paṇḍitavevacanaṃ. ^b^Vidantī^eb^ti jānanti. ^b^Vedena^eb^ ñāṇena karaṇabhūtena ^b^īhati^eb^ pavattatīti ^b^vedehi. ^eb^

[03]^b^Etthāti^eb^ etasmiṃ divase. ^b^Anasanena vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo aniyamattho, tena ekaccamanoduccaritadussīlyādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā hi gopālakūposatho abhijjhāsahagatacittassa vasena vutto, nigaṇṭhuposatho mosavajjādivasena. Yathāha ‘‘so tena abhijjhāsahagatena cetasā divasaṃ atināmetī’’ti (a. ni. 1.71), ‘‘iti yasmiṃ samaye sacce samādapetabbā, musāvāde tasmiṃ samaye samādapentī’’ti (a. ni. 1.71) ca ādi. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti uposathasadde. ^b^Atthuddhāro^eb^ti vattabbātthānaṃ uddhāraṇaṃ.

[03]Nanu ^a^V1.0187^ea^^a^M1.0211^ea^ ca atthamattaṃ pati ^a^P1.0272^ea^ saddā abhinivisantīti na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyantīti? Saccametaṃ saddavisese apekkhite, tesaṃ pana atthānaṃ uposathasaddavacanīyatā sāmaññaṃ upādāya vuccamāno ayaṃ vicāro uposathasaddassa atthuddhāroti vutto. Heṭṭhā ‘‘evaṃ me suta’’ntiādīsu āgate atthuddhārepi eseva nayo. Kāmañca pātimokkhuddesādivisayopi uposathasaddo sāmaññarūpo eva visesasaddassa avācakabhāvato, tādisaṃ pana sāmaññaṃ anādiyitvā ayamattho vuttoti veditabbaṃ. Sīlasuddhivasena upetehi samaggehi vasīyati anuṭṭhīyatīti ^b^uposatho,^eb^ pātimokkhuddeso. Samādānavasena adhiṭṭhānavasena vā upecca ariyavāsādiatthaṃ vasitabbato ^b^uposatho,^eb^ sīlaṃ. Anasanādivasena upecca vasitabbato anuvasitabbato ^b^uposatho. Upavāso^eb^ti samādānaṃ. Uposathakulabhūtatāya navamahatthinikāyapariyāpanne hatthināge kiñci kiriyaṃ anapekkhitvā rūḷhivasena samaññāmattaṃ uposathoti āha ^b^‘‘uposatho nāgarājātiādīsu paññattī’’^eb^ti. Divase pana uposathasaddappavatti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā eva. ^b^Suddhassa ve sadā phaggū^eb^ti ettha pana ^b^suddhassā^eb^ti sabbaso kilesamalābhāvena suddhassa. ^b^Ve^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Ve^eb^ti vā byattanti attho. ^b^Sadā phaggū^eb^ti niccakālampi phagguṇanakkhattameva. Yassa hi phagguṇamāse uttaraphagguṇadivase titthanhānaṃ karontassa saṃvaccharikapāpapavāhanaṃ hotīti laddhi, taṃ tato vivecetuṃ idaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ. ^b^Suddhassuposatho sadā^eb^ti yathāvuttasuddhiyā suddhassa uposathaṅgāni vatasamādānāni ca asamādiyatopi niccaṃ uposatho, uposathavāso evāti attho. Pañcadasannaṃ tithīnaṃ pūraṇavasena ^b^pannaraso.^eb^

[03]Bahuso ^a^P1.0273^ea^, atisayato vā kumudāni ettha santīti kumudavatī, tissaṃ ^b^kumudavatiyā.^eb^ Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ pāripūribhūtāti ^b^cātumāsī.^eb^ Sā eva pāḷiyaṃ cātumāsinīti vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘idha pana cātumāsinīti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Tadā kattikamāsassa puṇṇatāya ^b^māsapuṇṇatā.^eb^ Vassānassa utuno puṇṇatāya ^b^utupuṇṇatā.^eb^ Kattikamāsalakkhitassa saṃvaccharassa puṇṇatāya ^b^saṃvaccharapuṇṇatā. ‘‘Mā’’ iti cando vuccati^eb^ tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato. ^b^Ettha puṇṇo^eb^ti etissā rattiyā sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇo. Tadā hi cando sabbaso paripuṇṇo hutvā dissati. Ettha ca ‘‘tadahuposathe ^a^M1.0212^ea^ pannarase’’ti padāni divasavasena vuttāni, ‘‘komudiyā’’tiādīni rattivasena.

[03]^b^Rājāmaccaparivuto^eb^ti rājakulasamudāgatehi amaccehi parivuto. Atha vā anuyuttakarājūhi ^a^V1.0188^ea^ ceva amaccehi ca parivuto. ^b^Caturupakkilesā^eb^ti abbhā mahikā dhūmarajo rāhūti imehi catūhi upakkilesehi. ^b^Sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ.

[03]^b^Pītivacana^eb^nti pītisamuṭṭhānaṃ vacanaṃ. Yañhi vacanaṃ paṭiggāhakanirapekkhaṃ kevalaṃ uḷārāya pītiyā vasena sarasato sahasāva mukhato niccharati, taṃ idha ‘‘udāna’’nti adhippetaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkotī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Dosehi itā gatā apagatāti ^b^dosinā^eb^ ta-kārassa na-kāraṃ katvā yathā ‘‘kilese jito vijitāvīti jino’’ti. ^b^Anīya^eb^-saddo kattuatthe veditabboti āha ^b^‘‘manaṃ ramayatī’’ti ‘‘ramaṇīyā’’^eb^ti yathā ‘‘niyyānikā dhammā’’ti. Juṇhavasena rattiyā surūpatāti āha ^b^‘‘vuttadosavimuttāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^a^P1.0274^ea^ abbhādayo vuttadosā, tabbigameneva cassā ^b^dassanīyatā,^eb^ tena, utusampattiyā ca ^b^pāsādikatā^eb^ veditabbā. ^b^Lakkhaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttā^eb^ti etissā rattiyā yutto divaso māso utu saṃvaccharoti evaṃ divasamāsautusaṃvaccharānaṃ sallakkhaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttā ^b^lakkhaññā,^eb^ lakkhaṇīyāti attho.

[03]‘‘Yaṃ no payirupāsato cittaṃ pasīdeyyā’’ti vuttattā ‘‘samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā’’ti ettha paramatthasamaṇo ca paramatthabrāhmaṇo ca adhippeto, na pabbajjāmattasamaṇo, na jātimattabrāhmaṇo cāti āha ^b^‘‘samitapāpatāya samaṇaṃ. Bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇa’’^eb^nti. Bahuvacane vattabbe ekavacanaṃ, ekavacane vā vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ ^b^vacanabyatayo.^eb^ Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ekavacanavaseneva byatayo dassito. Attani, garuṭṭhāniye ca ekasmimpi bahuvacanappayogo nirūḷhoti. ^b^Sabbenapī^eb^ti ‘‘ramaṇīyā vatā’’tiādinā sabbena vacanena. ^b^Obhāsanimittakamma^eb^nti obhāsabhūtanimittakammaṃ paribyattaṃ nimittakaraṇanti attho. ^b^Devadatto cā^eb^ti. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo attūpanayane, tena yathā rājā ajātasattu attano pitu ariyasāvakassa satthūpaṭṭhākassa ghātanena mahāparādho ^a^M1.0213^ea^, evaṃ bhagavato mahāanatthakarassa devadattassa avassayabhāvena pīti imamatthaṃ upaneti. ^b^Tassa piṭṭhichāyāyā^eb^ti tassa jīvakassa piṭṭhiapassayena, taṃ pamukhaṃ katvā taṃ apassāyāti attho. ^b^Vikkhepapacchedanattha^eb^nti bhāviniyā attano kathāya uppajjanakavikkhepanassa pacchindanatthaṃ, anuppattiatthanti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tassaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^151^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘So kirā’’^eb^tiādi porāṇaṭṭhakathāya āgatanayo. Eseva nayo parato makkhalipadanibbacanepi ^a^V1.0189^ea^. ^b^Upasaṅkamantī^eb^ti upagatā. ^b^Tadeva pabbajjaṃ aggahesī^eb^ti tadeva naggarūpaṃ pabbajjaṃ katvā gaṇhi.

[03]^b^Pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto^eb^^a^P1.0275^ea^^b^saṅgho^eb^ti pabbajitasamūhatāmattena saṅgho, na niyyānikadiṭṭhisuvisuddhasīlasāmaññavasena saṃhatattāti adhippāyo. ^b^Assa atthī^eb^ti assa satthupaṭiññassa parivārabhūto atthi. ^b^Svevā^eb^ti pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhātova. Keci pana ‘‘pabbajitasamūhavasena ^b^saṅghī,^eb^ gahaṭṭhasamūhavasena ^b^gaṇī’’^eb^ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ gaṇe eva loke saṅgha-saddassa nirūḷhattā. ^b^Ācārasikkhāpanavasenā^eb^ti acelaka vatacariyādiācārasikkhāpanavasena. ^b^Pākaṭo^eb^ti saṅghīādibhāvena pakāsito. ‘‘Appiccho’’ti vatvā tattha labbhamānaṃ appicchattaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na hi tasmiṃ sāsanike viya santaguṇanigūhaṇalakkhaṇā appicchatā labbhatīti. ^b^Yaso^eb^ti kittisaddo. ‘‘Taranti etena saṃsārogha’’nti evaṃ sammatattā ^b^titthaṃ^eb^ vuccati laddhīti āha ^b^‘‘titthakaroti laddhikaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sādhusammato^eb^ti ‘‘sādhū’’ti sammato, na sādhūhi sammatoti āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ sādhū’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Imāni me vatasamādānāni ettakaṃ kālaṃ suciṇānī’’ti ^b^pabbajitato paṭṭhāya atikkantā bahū rattiyo jānātī^eb^ti ^b^rattaññū.^eb^ Tā panassa rattiyo cirakālabhūtāti katvā ^b^ciraṃ pabbajitassa assāti cirapabbajito.^eb^ Tattha cirapabbajitatāgahaṇena buddhisīlataṃ dasseti, rattaññutāgahaṇena tattha sampajānataṃ. ^b^Addhāna^eb^nti dīghakālaṃ. Kittako pana soti āha ^b^‘‘dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe’’^eb^ti, dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rājūnaṃ rajjaṃ anusāsanapaṭipāṭiyoti attho. ^b^‘‘Addhagato’’^eb^ti vatvā kataṃ vayogahaṇaṃ osānavayāpekkhanti āha ^b^‘‘pacchimavayaṃ anuppatto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhaya^eb^nti ‘‘addhagato, vayoanuppatto’’ti padadvayaṃ.

[03]Pubbe ^a^M1.0214^ea^^a^P1.0276^ea^ pitarā saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā desanāya sutapubbataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘jhānābhiññādi…pe… sotukāmo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dassanenā^eb^ti na dassanamattaṃ, disvā pana tena saddhiṃ ālāpasallāpaṃ katvā tato akiriyavādaṃ sutvā tesaṃ anattamano ahosi. ^b^Guṇakathāyā^eb^ti abhūtaguṇakathāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhutaraṃ anattamano hutvā’’^eb^ti. Yadi anattamano, kasmā tuṇhī ahosīti āha ^b^‘‘anattamano samānopī’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^152^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gosālāyā^eb^ti evaṃ nāmake gāme. Vassānakāle gunnaṃ tiṭṭhanasālāti eke.
[03]^b^153^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭikiṭṭhatara^eb^nti ^a^V1.0190^ea^ nihīnataraṃ. ^b^Tantāvutānī^eb^ti tante pasāretvā vītāni. ^b^‘‘Sīte sīto’’^eb^tiādinā chahākārehi tassa nihīnassa nihīnatarataṃ dasseti.
[03]^b^154^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vaccaṃ katvāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvāpi kenaci asucinā makkhito pīti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍeti. ^b^Vālikathūpaṃ katvā^eb^ti vattavasena vālikāya thūpaṃ katvā.
[03]^b^156^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Palibuddhanakileso^eb^ti saṃsāre palibuddhanakicco rāgādikileso khettavatthuputtadārādivisayo.

[03]^b^157^eb^^b^.^eb^ Na yathādhippāyaṃ vattatīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anattho vata me’’^eb^ti. Jīvakassa tuṇhībhāvo mama adhippāyassa maddanasadiso, tasmā taṃ pucchitvā kathāpanena mama adhippāyo pūretabboti ayamettha rañño ajjhāsayoti dassento ^b^‘‘hatthimhi nu kho panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kiṃ tuṇhī^eb^ti kiṃ kāraṇā tuṇhī, kiṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ, yena tuvaṃ tuṇhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kena kāraṇena tuṇhī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Kāmaṃ sabbāpi tathāgatassa paṭipatti anaññasādhāraṇā acchariyābbhutarūpā ca, tathāpi gabbhokkanti- ^a^P1.0277^ea^ abhijātiabhinikkhamanābhisambodhidhammacakkappavattana- yamakapāṭihāriyadevorohaṇāni sadevake loke ativiya ^a^M1.0215^ea^ supākaṭāni, na sakkā kenaci paṭibāhitunti tāniyevettha uddhaṭāni. ^b^Itthambhūtākhyānatthe^eb^ti itthaṃ evaṃ pakāro bhūto jātoti evaṃ kathanatthe. ^b^Upayogavacana^eb^nti. ‘‘Abbhuggato’’ti ettha abhīti upasaggo itthambhūtākhyānatthajotako, tena yogato ‘‘taṃ kho pana bhagavanta’’nti idaṃ sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘tassa kho pana bhagavatoti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato^eb^ti kalyāṇehi guṇehi yutto, taṃ nissito tabbisayatāyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Seṭṭho^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kittetabbato kitti, sā eva saddanīyato ^b^saddo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘kittisaddoti kittiyevā’’^eb^ti. Abhitthavanavasena pavatto saddo ^b^thutighoso.^eb^ Anaññasādhāraṇaguṇe ārabbha pavattattā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ^b^ajjhottharitvā^eb^ abhibhavitvā ^b^uggato.^eb^

[03]^b^So bhagavā^eb^ti yo so samatiṃ sapāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ ^a^V1.0191^ea^ abhisambuddho devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi sadevake loke ‘‘bhagavā’’ti sabbattha patthaṭakittisaddo, so bhagavā. ^b^‘‘Bhagavā’’^eb^ti ca idaṃ satthu nāmakittanaṃ. Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati ‘‘bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata’’ntiādi (mahāni. 84). Parato pana ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti guṇakittanaṃ.

[03]Yathā kammaṭṭhānikena ‘‘araha’’ntiādīsu navaṭṭhānesu paccekaṃ iti-saddaṃ yojetvā buddhaguṇā anussarīyanti, evaṃ buddhaguṇasaṅkittakenāpīti dassento ^b^‘‘itipi arahaṃ, itipi sammāsambuddho…pe… itipi bhagavā’’^eb^ti āha. ‘‘Itipetaṃ ^a^P1.0278^ea^ abhūtaṃ, itipetaṃ ataccha’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.5) viya idha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo āsannapaccakkhakaraṇattho, ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena ca tesaṃ guṇānaṃ bahubhāvo dīpito. Tāni ca saṅkittentena viññunā cittassa sammukhībhūtāneva katvā saṅkittetabbānīti dassento ^b^‘‘iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti āha. Evañhi nirūpetvā kittente yassa saṅkitteti, tassa bhagavati ativiya abhippasādo hoti. ^b^Ārakattā^eb^ti suvidūrattā. ^b^Arīna^eb^nti kilesārīnaṃ. ^b^Arāna^eb^nti saṃsāracakkassa arānaṃ. ^b^Hatattā^eb^ti vihatattā. ^b^Paccayādīna^eb^nti cīvarādipaccayānañceva ^a^M1.0216^ea^ pūjāvisesānañca. ^b^Tato^eb^ti visuddhimaggato. Yathā ca visuddhimaggato, evaṃ taṃsaṃvaṇṇanatopi nesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.

[03]Yasmā jīvako bahuso satthusantike buddhaguṇe sutvā ṭhito, diṭṭhasaccatāya ca satthusāsane vigatakathaṃkatho vesārajjappatto, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘jīvako panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pañcavaṇṇāyā^eb^ti khuddikādivasena pañcappakārāya. ^b^Nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi^eb^ katādhikārabhāvato. Kammantarāyavasena hissa rañño guṇasarīraṃ khatupahataṃ ahosi.

[03]^b^158^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Uttama’’nti vatvā na kevalaṃ seṭṭhabhāvo evettha kāraṇaṃ, atha kho appasaddatāpi kāraṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘assayānarathayānānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Hatthiyānesu nibbisevanameva gaṇhanto hatthiniyova kappāpesi. Rañño āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ āsannacārībhāvena tattha itthiyova nisajjāpitā. Rañño paresaṃ durupasaṅkamanabhāvadassanatthaṃ ^a^P1.0279^ea^ tā ^b^purisavesaṃ gāhāpetvā^eb^ āvudhahatthā kāritā. ^b^Paṭivedesī^eb^ti ñāpesi. ^b^Tadevā^eb^ti gamanaṃ, agamanameva vā.

[03]^b^159^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahañcā^eb^ti karaṇatthe paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘mahatā^eb^cā’’ti. ^b^Mahaccā^eb^ti mahatiyā ^a^V1.0192^ea^, liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttaṃ, mahantenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rājānubhāvenā’’^eb^ti ^b^‘‘dvinnaṃ mahāraṭṭhānaṃ issariyasirī’’^eb^ti aṅgamagadharaṭṭhānaṃ ādhipaccamāha. ^b^Āsattakhaggānī^eb^ti aṃse olambanavasena sannaddhāsīni. Kulabhogaissariyādivasena mahatī mattā etesanti ^b^mahāmattā,^eb^ mahānubhāvā rājapurisā. ^b^Vijjādharataruṇā viyā^eb^ti vijjādharakumārā viya. ^b^Raṭṭhiyaputtā^eb^ti bhojaputtā. ^b^Hatthighaṭā^eb^ti hatthisamūhā. ^b^Aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanā^eb^ti avicchedavasena gamanena aññamaññasambandhā.

[03]^b^Cittutrāso^eb^ sayaṃ bhāyanaṭṭhena ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^ yathā tathā bhāyatīti katvā. ^b^Ñāṇaṃ^eb^ bhāyitabbe eva vatthusmiṃ bhayato upaṭṭhite ‘‘bhāyitabbamida’’nti bhayato tīraṇato ^b^bhayaṃ.^eb^ Tenevāha ‘‘bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ pana bhāyati nabhāyatīti? Na bhāyati. Tañhi atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti, anāgatā nirujjhissantīti tīraṇamattameva hotī’’ti (visuddhi. 2.751). ^b^Ārammaṇaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0217^ea^ bhāyati etasmāti ^b^bhayaṃ. Otappaṃ^eb^ pāpato bhāyati etenāti ^b^bhayaṃ. Bhayānaka^eb^nti bhāyanākāro. ^b^Bhaya^eb^nti ñāṇabhayaṃ. ^b^Saṃvega^eb^nti sahottappañāṇaṃ ^b^santāsa^eb^nti sabbaso ubbijjanaṃ. Bhāyitabbaṭṭhena bhayaṃ bhīmabhāvena bheravanti ^b^bhayabheravaṃ,^eb^ bhītabbavatthu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āgacchatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Bhīruṃ^eb^^a^P1.0280^ea^^b^pasaṃsantī^eb^ti pāpato bhāyanato uttasanato bhīruṃ pasaṃsanti paṇḍitā. ^b^Na hi tattha sūra^eb^nti tasmiṃ pāpakaraṇe sūraṃ pagabbhadhaṃsinaṃ na hi pasaṃsanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhayā hi santo na karonti pāpa’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^bhayā^eb^ti pāputrāsato, ottappahetūti attho. ^b^Sarīracalana^eb^nti bhayavasenasarīrasaṃkampo. ^b^Eke^eb^ti uttaravihāravāsino. ^b^‘‘Rājagahe’’^eb^tiādi tesaṃ adhippāyavivaraṇaṃ. Kāmaṃ vayatulyo ‘‘vayasso’’ti vuccati, rūḷhireso, yo koci pana sahāyo vayasso, tasmā ^b^vayassābhilāpo^eb^ti sahāyābhilāpo. ^b^Na vippalambhesī^eb^ti na visaṃvādesi. ^b^Vinasseyyā^eb^ti cittavighātena vihaññeyya.

[03]^b^160^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhagavato tejo^eb^ti buddhānubhāvo. ^b^Rañño sarīraṃ phari^eb^ yathā taṃ soṇadaṇḍassa brāhmaṇassa bhagavato santikaṃ gacchantassa antovanasaṇḍagatassa. ^b^Eke^eb^ti uttaravihāravāsino.

[03]^b^161^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yena, tenā^eb^ti ca bhummatthe karaṇavacananti āha ^b^‘‘yattha bhagavā, tattha gato’’^eb^ti. Tadā ^a^V1.0193^ea^ tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe tuṇhībhāvassa anavasesato byāpibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūta’’nti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘yato yato…pe… mevāti attho’’^eb^ti. Hatthassa kukatattā asaṃyamo asampajaññakiriyā ^b^hatthakukkucca^eb^nti veditabbo. ^b^Vā^eb^-saddo avuttavikappattho, tena tadañño asaṃyamabhāvo vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha pana cakkhuasaṃyamo sabbapaṭhamo, dunnivāro cāti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^a^P1.0281^ea^^b^‘‘sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍita’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Kāyikavācasikena upasamena laddhena itaropi anumānato laddho eva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘mānasikena cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upasama^eb^nti saṃyamaṃ, ācārasampattinti attho. ^b^Pañcaparivaṭṭe^eb^ti pañcapurisaparivaṭṭe. ^b^Pañcahākārehī^eb^ti ‘‘iṭṭhāniṭṭhe ^a^M1.0218^ea^ tādī’’ti (mahāni. 38, 192) evaṃ ādinā āgatehi, pañcavidhāriyiddhisiddhehi ca pañcahi pakārehi. ^b^Tādilakkhaṇe^eb^ti tādibhāve.

[03]^b^162^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na me pañhavissajjane bhāro atthī^eb^ti satthu sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratādassanaṃ. ^b^Yadākaṅkhasīti na vadanti,^eb^ kathaṃ pana vadantīti āha ^b^‘‘sutvā vedissāmā’’^eb^ti padesañāṇe ṭhitattā. Buddhā pana sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavārentīti sambandho. ^b^‘‘Yakkhanarindadevasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakāna’’^eb^nti idaṃ ‘‘pucchāvuso yadākaṅkhasī’’tiādīni (saṃ. ni. 1.237, 246; su. ni. āḷavakasutte) suttapadāni pucchantānaṃ yesaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena āgatāni, taṃ dassanatthaṃ. ^b^‘‘Pucchāvuso yadākaṅkhasī’’^eb^ti idaṃ āḷavakassa yakkhassa okāsakaraṇaṃ, sesāni narindādīnaṃ. ^b^Manasicchasī^eb^ti manasā icchasi. ^b^Pucchavho, yaṃ kiñci manasicchathā^eb^ti bāvarissa saṃsayaṃ manasā pucchavho. Tumhākaṃ pana sabbesaṃ yaṃ kiñci sabbasaṃsayaṃ manasā, aññathā ca, yathā icchatha, tathā pucchavhoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Sādhurūpā^eb^ti sādhusabhāvā. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti paveṇīdhammo. ^b^Vuddha^eb^nti sīlādīhi buddhippattaṃ, garunti attho. ^b^Esa bhāro^eb^ti esa saṃsayūpacchedanasaṅkhāto bhāro, āgato bhāro avassaṃ āvahitabboti adhippāyo. ^b^Ñatvā saya^eb^nti parūpadesena vinā sayameva ñatvā.

[03]^b^Suciratenā^eb^ti evaṃ nāmakena brāhmaṇena. ^b^Tagghā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0282^ea^ ekaṃsena. ^b^Yathāpi kusalo tathā^eb^ti yathā sabbadhammakusalo sabbavidū jānāti katheti, tathā ahamakkhissaṃ. ^b^Rājā ca kho taṃ yadi kāhati vā na vā^eb^ti yo taṃ idha pucchituṃ pesesi, so rājānaṃ tayā pucchitaṃ karotu vā mā vā, ahaṃ pana te akkhissaṃ akkhissāmi, ācikkhissāmīti attho.

[03]^b^163^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sippanaṭṭhena sikkhitabbatāya ca sippameva ^b^sippāyatanaṃ^eb^ jīvikāya kāraṇabhāvato ^a^V1.0194^ea^. ^b^Seyyathida^eb^nti nipāto, tassa te katameti attho. Puthu sippāyatanānīti hi sādhāraṇato sippāni uddisitvā upari taṃtaṃsippūpajīvino niddiṭṭhā puggalādhiṭṭhānakathāya papañcaṃ pariharituṃ. Aññathā yathādhippetāni tāva sippāyatanāni dassetvā puna taṃtaṃsippūpajīvīsu dassiyamānesu papañco siyāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘hatthārohā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Hatthiṃ ^a^M1.0219^ea^ ārohanti, ārohāpayanti cāti ^b^hatthārohā.^eb^ Yehi payogehi puriso hatthino ārohanayoggo hoti, hatthissa taṃ payogaṃ vidhāyataṃ sabbesaṃ petesaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbepī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^hatthācariyā^eb^ nāma ye hatthino hatthārohakānañca sikkhapakā. ^b^Hatthivejjā^eb^ nāma hatthibhisakkā. ^b^Hatthimeṇḍā^eb^ nāma hatthīnaṃ pādarakkhakā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena hatthīnaṃ yavasadāyakādike saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Assārohā rathikā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Rathe niyuttā ^b^rathikā. Ratharakkhā^eb^ nāma rathassa āṇirakkhakā. Dhanuṃ gaṇhanti, gaṇhāpenti cāti ^b^dhanuggahā,^eb^ issāsā ^a^P1.0283^ea^ dhanusippassa sikkhāpakā ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhanuācariyā issāsā’’^eb^ti. Celena celapaṭākāya yuddhe akanti gacchantīti ^b^celakā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘ye yuddhe jayadhajaṃ gahetvā purato gacchantī’’^eb^ti. Yathā tathā ṭhite senike byūhakaraṇavasena tato calayanti uccālentīti ^b^calakā.^eb^ Sakuṇagghiādayo viya maṃsapiṇḍaṃ parasenāsamūhaṃ sāhasikamahāyodhatāya chetvā chetvā dayanti uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchantīti ^b^piṇḍadāyakā.^eb^ Dutiyavikappe piṇḍe dayanti janasammadde uppatantā viya gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakāti attho veditabbo. ^b^Uggatuggatā^eb^ti thāmajavaparakkamādivasena ativiya uggatā uggāti attho. ^b^Pakkhandantī^eb^ti attano vīrasūrabhāvena asajjamānā parasenaṃ anupavisantīti attho. Thāmajavabalaparakkamādisampattiyā ^b^mahānāgā viya mahānāgā. Ekantasūrā^eb^ti ekākisūrā attano sūrabhāveneva ekākino hutvā yujjhanakā. ^b^Sajālikā^eb^ti savammikā. ^b^Saraparittāṇacamma^eb^nti cammaparisibbitaṃ kheṭakaṃ, cammamayaṃ vā phalakaṃ. ^b^Gharadāsayodhā^eb^ti antojātayodhā.

[03]Āḷāraṃ vuccati mahānasaṃ, tattha niyuttāti ^b^āḷārikā,^eb^ bhattakārā. ^b^Pūvikā^eb^ti pūvasampādakā, ye pūvameva nānappakārato sampādetvā vikkiṇantā jīvanti. Kesanakhalikhanādivasena manussānaṃ alaṅkāravidhiṃ kappenti saṃvidahantīti ^b^kappakā. Nhāpakā^eb^ti cuṇṇavilepanādīhi ^a^P1.0284^ea^ malaharaṇavaṇṇasampādanavidhinā nhāpentīti nhāpakā. Navantādividhinā pavatto gaṇanagantho antarā chiddābhāvena acchiddakoti vuccati, taṃ gaṇanaṃ upanissāya jīvantā ^b^acchiddakapāṭhakā.^eb^ Hatthena adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ hatthamuddā ^a^M1.0220^ea^^b^hattha^eb^-saddo cettha tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo. ‘‘Na bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmī’’tiādīsu viya, tasmā aṅgulisaṅkocanādinā ^a^V1.0195^ea^ gaṇanā ^b^hatthamuddāya gaṇanā. Cittakārādīnī^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena bhamakārakoṭṭakalekhaka vilīvakārādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. ^b^Sandiṭṭhikamevā^eb^ti asamparāyikatāya sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sayaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ diṭṭhadhammikanti attho. ^b^Sukhita^eb^nti sukhappattaṃ. ^b^Uparī^eb^ti devaloke. So hi manussalokato uparimo. Kammassa katattā nibbattanato tassa phalaṃ tassa aggisikhā viya hoti, tañca uddhaṃ devaloketi āha ^b^‘‘uddhaṃ aggaṃ assā atthīti uddhaggikā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saggaṃ arahatī^eb^ti attano phalabhūtaṃ saggaṃ arahati, tattha sā nibbattanārahoti attho. ^b^Sukhavipākā^eb^ti iṭṭhavipākavipaccanīkā. ^b^Suṭṭhu agge^eb^ti ativiya uttame uḷāre. Dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti etāyāti ^b^dakkhiṇā,^eb^ pariccāgamayaṃ puññanti āha ^b^‘‘dakkhiṇaṃ dāna’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Maggo^eb^^a^P1.0285^ea^^b^sāmaññaṃ^eb^ samitapāpasamaṇabhāvoti katvā. Yasmā ayaṃ rājā pabbajitānaṃ dāsakassakādīnaṃ lokato abhivādanādilābho sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalanti cintetvā ‘‘atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā īdisamatthaṃ jānanto’’ti vīmaṃsanto pūraṇādike pucchitvā tesaṃ kathāya anārādhitacitto bhagavantampi tamatthaṃ pucchi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘upari āgataṃ pana dāsakassakopamaṃ sandhāya pucchatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kaṇhapakkha^eb^nti yathāpucchite atthe labbhamānaṃ diṭṭhigatūpasañhitaṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ. ^b^Sukkapakkha^eb^nti tabbidhuraṃ uparisuttāgataṃ vodānapakkhaṃ. ^b^Samaṇakolāhala^eb^nti samaṇakotūhalaṃ taṃtaṃsamaṇavādānaṃ aññamaññavirodhaṃ. ^b^Samaṇabhaṇḍana^eb^nti teneva virodhena ‘‘evaṃvādīnaṃ tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ayaṃ doso, evaṃvādīnaṃ ayaṃ doso’’ti evaṃ taṃtaṃvādassa paribhāsanaṃ. ^b^Rañño bhāraṃ karonto^eb^ attano desanākosallenāti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^164^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṇḍitapatirūpakāna^eb^nti āmaṃ viya pakkānaṃ paṇḍitābhāsānaṃ.
[03]^b^165^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0221^ea^^b^idāha^eb^nti ekāhaṃ. ^b^Idha^eb^-saddo cettha nipātamattaṃ, ekāhaṃ samayaṃ ticceva attho. ^b^Saritabbayutta^eb^nti anussaraṇānucchavikaṃ.

[03]^b^166^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sahatthā karontassā^eb^ti sahattheneva karontassa. Nissaggiyathāvarādayopi idha sahatthakaraṇeneva ^a^V1.0196^ea^ saṅgahitā. ^b^Hatthādīnī^eb^ti hatthapādakaṇṇanāsādīni. ^b^Pacanaṃ^eb^ dahanaṃ vibādhananti āha ^b^‘‘daṇḍena uppīḷentassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Papañcasūdaniyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘tajjentassa vā’’ti attho vutto, idha pana tajjanaṃ paribhāsanaṃ daṇḍeneva saṅgahetvā ‘‘daṇḍena uppīḷentassa’’ icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Sokaṃ sayaṃ^eb^^a^P1.0286^ea^^b^karontassā^eb^ti parassa sokakāraṇaṃ sayaṃ karontassa, sokaṃ vā uppādentassa. ^b^Parehī^eb^ti attano vacanakarehi. ^b^Sayampi phandato^eb^ti parassa vibādhanapayogena sayampi phandato. ^b^‘‘Atipātāpayato’’^eb^ti padaṃ suddhakattuatthe hetukattuatthe ca vattatīti āha ^b^‘‘hanantassāpi hanāpentassāpī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāraṇavasenā^eb^ti kārāpanavasena.

[03]Gharassa bhitti anto bahi ca sandhitā hutvā ṭhitā ^b^gharasandhi.^eb^ Kiñcipi asesetvā niravaseso lopo ^b^nillopo. ^eb^ Ekāgāre niyutto vilopo ^b^ekāgāriko.^eb^ Parito sabbaso panthe hananaṃ ^b^paripantho. Pāpaṃ na karīyati^eb^ pubbe asaññato uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā, tasmā ^b^natthi pāpaṃ.^eb^ Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sattā pāpe paṭipajjantīti āha ^b^‘‘sattā pana pāpaṃ karomāti evaṃ saññino hontī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ kirassa hoti – imesañhi sattānaṃ hiṃsādikiriyā na attānaṃ phusati tassa niccatāya nibbikārattā sarīraṃ pana acetanaṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamaṃ, tasmiṃ vikopitepi na kiñci pāpanti. ^b^Khuraneminā^eb^ti nisitakhuramayaneminā.

[03]Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇā disā appatirūpadeso, uttarā disā patirūpadesoti adhippāyena‘‘dakkhiṇañca’’tiādi vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘dakkhiṇatīre manussā kakkhaḷā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Mahāyāga^eb^nti mahāvijitayaññasadisaṃ mahāyāgaṃ. ^b^Uposathakammena vā^eb^ti uposathakammena ca. ^b^Dama^eb^-saddo hi indriyasaṃvarassa uposathasīlassa ca vācako idhādhippeto. Keci pana ^b^‘‘uposathakammenā^eb^ti idaṃ indriyadamanassa visesanaṃ, tasmā ‘uposathakammabhūtena indriyadamanenā’’ti atthaṃ vadanti ^a^P1.0287^ea^. ^b^Sīlasaṃyamenā^eb^ti kāyikavācasikasaṃvarena ^a^M1.0222^ea^. ^b^Saccavajjenā^eb^ti saccavācāya, tassā visuṃ vacanaṃ loke garutarapuññasammatabhāvato. Yathā hi pāpadhammesu musāvādo garu, evaṃ puññadhammesu saccavācā. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘ekaṃ dhammaṃ atītassā’’tiādi. ^b^Pavattī^eb^ti yo ‘‘karotī’’ti vuccati, tassa santāne phaluppattipaccayabhāvena uppatti. ^b^Sabbathā^eb^ti ‘‘karoto’’tiādinā vuttena sabbappakārena. ^b^Kiriyameva paṭikkhipati,^eb^ na raññā puṭṭhaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ byākarotīti adhippāyo. Idaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ vipākapaṭikkhepanivattanatthaṃ. Yo hi kammaṃ paṭikkhipati, tena atthato vipākopi paṭikkhitto eva nāma hoti. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘kammaṃ paṭibāhantenāpī’’tiādi (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.170-172).

[03]Paṭirājūhi ^a^V1.0197^ea^ anabhibhavanīyabhāvena visesato jitanti ^b^vijitaṃ,^eb^ āṇāpavattideso. ‘‘Mā mayhaṃ vijite vasathā’’ti apasādanā pabbajitassa viheṭhanā pabbājanāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘apasādetabbanti viheṭhetabba’’^eb^nti. Uggaṇhanaṃ tena vuttassa atthassa ‘‘evameta’’nti upadhāraṇaṃ sallakkhaṇaṃ, nikujjanaṃ tassa addhaniyabhāvāpādanavasena cittena sandhāraṇaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ paṭikkhipanto āha ^b^‘‘anuggaṇhanto anikujjanto’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sāravasena aggaṇhanto’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^168^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ubhayenā^eb^ti hetupaccayapaṭisedhanavacanena. ^b^Saṃkilesapaccaya^eb^nti saṃkilissanassa malīnabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Visuddhipaccaya^eb^nti saṅkikilesato visuddhiyā vodānassa kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Attakāro^eb^ti ^a^P1.0288^ea^ tena tena sattena attanā kātabbakammaṃ attanā nipphādetabbapayogo. ^b^Parakāra^eb^nti parassa vāhasā ijjhanakapayojanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Mahāsatta^eb^nti antimabhavikaṃ mahābodhisattaṃ, paccekabodhisattassapi ettheva saṅgaho veditabbo. ^b^Manussasobhagyata^eb^nti manussesu subhagabhāvaṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena. Kammavādassa kiriyavādassa paṭikkhipanena ‘‘atthi bhikkhave kammaṃ kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipāka’’ntiādi (a. ni. 4.232) nayappavatte ^b^jinacakke pahāraṃ deti nāma. Natthi purisakāre^eb^ti yathāvuttāttakāraparakārābhāvato eva sattānaṃ paccattapurisakāro nāma koci natthīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Natthi bala^eb^nti sattānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikanibbānasampattiāvahaṃ balaṃ nāma kiñci natthi. Tenāha ^a^M1.0223^ea^^b^‘‘yamhī’’^eb^tiādi. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ, saṃkilesikampi cāyaṃ balaṃ paṭikkhipateva. Yadi vīriyādīni purisakāravevacanāni, kasmā visuṃ gahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘idaṃ no vīriyenā’’^eb^tiādi. Saddatthato pana tassā tassā kiriyāya ussannaṭṭhena ^b^balaṃ.^eb^ Sūravīrabhāvāvahaṭṭhena ^b^vīriyaṃ. ^eb^ Tadeva daḷhabhāvato, porisadhuraṃ vahantena pavattetabbato ca ^b^purisathāmo.^eb^ Paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanappavattiyā ^b^purisaparakkamo^eb^ti vuttoti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Sattayogato rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya ^b^sattā.^eb^ Pāṇanato assasanapassasanavasena pavattiyā ^b^pāṇā.^eb^ Te pana so ekindriyādivasena vibhajitvā vadatīti āha ^b^‘‘ekindriyo’’^eb^tiādi. Aṇḍakosādīsu bhavanato ^b^‘‘bhūtā’’^eb^ti vuccantīti āha ^b^‘‘aṇḍakosa…pe… vadatī’’^eb^ti ^a^P1.0289^ea^. Jīvanato pāṇaṃ dhārentā viya vaḍḍhanato ^b^jīvā. ^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘sāliyavā’’^eb^tiādi. Natthi etesaṃ saṃkilesavisuddhīsu vasoti ^b^avasā.^eb^ Natthi nesaṃ balaṃ vīriyaṃ ^a^V1.0198^ea^ cāti ^b^abalā avīriyā. Niyatā^eb^ti acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇino viya niyatappavattitāya gatijātibandhāpavaggavasena niyāmo. ^b^Tattha tattha gamana^eb^nti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ tāsu tāsu gatīsu upagamanaṃ samavāyena samāgamo. ^b^Sabhāvoyevā^eb^ti yathā kaṇṭakassa tikhiṇatā, kapitthaphalānaṃ parimaṇḍalatā, migapakkhīnaṃ vicittākāratā, evaṃ sabbassāpi lokassa hetupaccayena vinā tathā tathā pariṇāmo ayaṃ sabhāvo eva akittimoyeva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yena hī’’^eb^tiādi. Chaḷābhijātiyo parato vitthārīyanti. ^b^‘‘Sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedentī’’^eb^ti vadanto adukkhamasukhabhūmiṃ sabbena sabbaṃ na jānātīti ulliṅganto ^b^‘‘aññā adukkhamasukhabhūmi natthīti dassetī’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Pamukhayonīna^eb^nti manussatiracchānādīsu khattiyabrāhmaṇādisīhabyagghādivasena padhānayonīnaṃ. ^b^Saṭṭhisatānī^eb^ti chasahassāni. ‘‘Pañca ca kammuno satānī’’ti padassa atthadassanaṃ ^b^‘‘pañcakammasatāni cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā ‘‘kevalaṃ takkamattakena niratthakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ dīpetī’’ti imamevatthaṃ atidisati. Ettha ca ^b^‘‘takkamattakenā’’^eb^ti iminā yasmā takkikā niraṅkusatāya parikappanassa yaṃ kiñci attano parikappitaṃ sārato ^a^M1.0224^ea^ maññamānā tatheva abhinivissa takkadiṭṭhigāhaṃ gaṇhanti, tasmā na tesaṃ diṭṭhivatthusmiṃ viññūhi vicāraṇā kātabbāti dasseti. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti uttaravihāravāsino. Te hi ‘‘pañca kammānīti cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyā imāni pañcindriyāni ‘pañca kammānī’ti paññāpentī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Kammanti laddhī^eb^ti oḷārikabhāvato paripuṇṇakammanti laddhi. ^b^Manokammaṃ^eb^^a^P1.0290^ea^ anoḷārikattā ^b^upaḍḍhakamma^eb^nti laddhīti yojanā. ^b^Dvaṭṭhipaṭipadā^eb^ti ‘‘dvāsaṭṭhi paṭipadā’’ti vattabbe sabhāvaniruttiṃ ajānanto ‘‘dvaṭṭhipaṭipadā’’ti vadati. ^b^Ekasmiṃ kappe^eb^ti ekasmiṃ mahākappe, tatthāpi ca vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīsaññite ekasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyyekappe.

[03]Urabbhe hanantīti ^b^orabbhikā.^eb^ Evaṃ ^b^sūkarikā^eb^dayo veditabbā. ^b^Luddā^eb^ti aññepi ye keci māgavikanesādā. Te pāpakammapasutatāya ^b^‘‘kaṇhābhijātīti vadati. Bhikkhū’’^eb^ti buddhasāsane bhikkhū. ^b^Te kira^eb^ ‘‘sachandarāgā paribhuñjantī’’ti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādantī’’^eb^ti vadati. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā ‘‘te paṇītapaṇīte paccaye paṭisevantī’’ti tassa micchāgāho, tasmā ñāyaladdhepi paccaye bhuñjamānā ājīvakasamayassa vilomagāhitāya paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti nāmāti vadatīti apare. ^b^Eke pabbajitā,^eb^ ye savisesaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ anuyuttā. Tathā hi te kaṇṭake vattantā viya hontīti ^b^‘‘kaṇṭakavuttikā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Ṭhatvā bhuñjananahānapaṭikkhepādivatasamāyogena ^b^paṇḍaratarā^eb^^a^V1.0199^ea^. ^b^‘‘Acelakasāvakā’’^eb^ti ājīvakasāvake vadati. ^b^Te kira^eb^ ājīvakaladdhiyā visuddhacittatāya nigaṇṭhehipi ^b^paṇḍaratarā.^eb^ Nandādayo hi tathārūpaṃ ājīvakapaṭipattiṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitā. Tasmā nigaṇṭhehi ājīvakasāvakehi ca paṇḍaratarā paramasukkābhijātīti ayaṃ tassa laddhi.

[03]^b^Purisabhūmiyo^eb^ti padhānapuggalena niddeso. Itthīnampi tā bhūmiyo icchanteva. ^b^‘‘Bhikkhu ca pannako’’^eb^tiādi tesaṃ pāḷiyeva. Tattha ^b^pannako^eb^ti bhikkhāya vicaraṇako, tesaṃ vā paṭipattiyā paṭipannako. ^b^Jino^eb^ti jiṇṇo jarāvasena hīnadhātuko, attano ^a^P1.0291^ea^ vā paṭipattiyā paṭipakkhaṃ jinitvā ṭhito. So kira tathābhūto dhammampi kassaci na kathesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na kiñci āhā’’^eb^ti. Oṭṭhavadanādivippakāre katepi khamanavasena na kiñci vadatītipi vadanti. ^b^Alābhi^eb^nti ‘‘so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhātī’’tiādinā ^a^M1.0225^ea^ (dī. ni. 1.394) nayena vuttālābhahetusamāyogena alābhiṃ, tatoyeva jighacchādubbalaparetatāya sayanaparāyanaṃ ^b^‘‘samaṇaṃ pannabhūmī’’^eb^ti vadati.

[03]^b^Ājīvavuttisatānī^eb^ti sattānaṃ ājīvabhūtāni jīvikāvuttisatāni. ^b^Pasu^eb^ggahaṇena eḷakajāti gahitā, migaggahaṇena rurugavayādisabbamigajāti. ^b^Bahū devā^eb^ti cātumahārājikādibrahmakāyikādivasena, tesaṃ antarabhedavasena bahū devā. Tattha cātumahārājikānaṃ ekaccabhedo mahāsamayasuttavasena (dī. ni. 2.331) dīpetabbo. ^b^Manussāpi anantā^eb^ti dīpadesakulavaṃsājīvādivibhāgavasena manussāpi anantabhedā. Pisācā eva ^b^pesācā.^eb^ Te aparapetādayo ^b^mahantamahantā.^eb^ Chaddantadahamandākiniyo kuvāḷiyamucalindanāmena vadati.

[03]^b^Pavuṭā^eb^ti pabbagaṇṭhikā. ^b^Paṇḍitopi^eb^^a^P1.0292^ea^^b^…pe… uddhaṃ na gacchati,^eb^ kasmā? Sattānaṃ saṃsaraṇakālassa niyatabhāvato. ^b^Aparipakkaṃ^eb^ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ sīlādinā ^b^paripāceti nāma^eb^ sīghaṃyeva visuddhippattiyā. ^b^Paripakkaṃ^eb^ kammaṃ ^b^phussa phussa^eb^ patvā patvā kālena paripakkabhāvānāpādanena ^b^byantiṃ karoti nāma.^eb^
[03]^b^Suttaguḷe^eb^ti suttavaṭṭiyaṃ. ^b^‘‘Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletī’’^eb^ti upamāya sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena khīyateva, na tassa vaḍḍhatīti dasseti paricchinnarūpattā.

[03]^b^171^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dinna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0200^ea^ deyyadhammasīsena dānaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ vadatī’’^eb^ti, dinnaṃ pana annādivatthuṃ kathaṃ paṭikkhipati. Eseva nayo ^b^yiṭṭhaṃ huta^eb^nti etthāpi. ^b^Mahāyāgo^eb^ti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ mahādānaṃ. ^b^Pāhunakasakkāro^eb^ti pāhunabhāvena kātabbasakkāro. ^b^Phala^eb^nti ānisaṃsaphalaṃ, nissandaphalañca. ^b^Vipāko^eb^ti sadisaphalaṃ. ^b^Paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthī^eb^ti paraloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo ayaṃ loko na hoti. ^b^Idhaloke ṭhitassāpi paraloko natthī^eb^ti idhaloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo paraloko na hoti. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘sabbe^eb^^a^M1.0226^ea^^b^tattha tattheva ucchijjantī’’^eb^ti. Ime sattā yattha yattha bhave, yoniādīsu ca ṭhitā tattha tattheva ucchijjanti nirudayavināsavasena vinassanti. ^b^Phalābhāvavasenā^eb^ti mātāpitūsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalassa abhāvavasena ‘‘natthi mātā, natthi pitā’’ti vadati, na mātāpitūnaṃ, nāpi tesu idāni kayiramānasakkārāsakkārānaṃ abhāvavasena tesaṃ lokapaccakkhattā. Pubbuḷakassa viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppādo nāma kevalo, na cavitvā āgamanapubbakoti dassanatthaṃ ‘‘natthi sattā opapātikā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘cavitvā upapajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadatī’’^eb^ti. Samaṇena nāma yāthāvato ^a^P1.0293^ea^ jānantena kassaci kiñci akathetvā saññatena bhavitabbaṃ, aññathā āhopurisikā nāma siyā. Kiñhi paro parassa karissati? Tathā ca attano sampādanassa kassaci avassayo eva na siyā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti āha ^b^‘‘ye imañca…pe… pavedentī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Catūsu mahābhūtesu niyuttoti ^b^cātumahābhūtiko.^eb^ Yathā pana mattikāya nibbattaṃ bhājanaṃ mattikāmayaṃ, evaṃ ayaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbattoti āha ^b^‘‘catumahābhūtamayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ajjhattikapathavīdhātū^eb^ti sattasantānagatā pathavīdhātu. ^b^Bāhirapathavīdhātu^eb^nti bahiddhā mahāpathaviṃ. ^b^Upagacchatī^eb^ti bāhirapathavikāyato tadekadesabhūtā pathavī āgantvā ajjhattikabhāvappattiyā sattabhāvena saṇṭhitā idāni ghaṭādigatapathavī viya tameva bāhirapathavikāyaṃ upeti upagacchati sabbaso tena nibbisesataṃ ekībhāvameva gacchati. ^b^Āpādīsupi eseva nayo^eb^ti ettha pajjunnena mahāsamuddato gahitāapo viya vassodakabhāvena punapi mahāsamuddameva, sūriyarasmito gahitaṃ indaggisaṅkhātatejo viya puna sūriyarasmiṃ, mahāvāyukhandhato niggatamahāvāto viya tameva vāyukhandhaṃ upeti upagacchatīti diṭṭhigatikassa adhippāyo. ^b^Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni ākāsaṃ pakkhandanti^eb^ tesaṃ visayābhāvāti vadanti. Visayigahaṇena hi visayāpi gahitā eva hontīti. ^b^Guṇāguṇapadānī^eb^ti guṇadosakoṭṭhāsā. ^b^Sarīrameva padānīti adhippetaṃ^eb^ sarīrena taṃtaṃkiriyāya ^a^V1.0201^ea^ pajjitabbato. Dabbanti muyhantīti dattū, mūḷhapuggalā. Tehi ^b^dattūhi^eb^^a^P1.0294^ea^ bālamanussehi. ‘‘Paraloko atthī’’ti mati yesaṃ, te atthikā, tesaṃ vādoti atthikavādo, taṃ ^b^atthikavādaṃ. ^eb^

[03]^b^Kammaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0227^ea^^b^paṭibāhati^eb^ akiriyavādibhāvato. ^b^Vipākaṃ paṭibāhati^eb^ sabbena sabbaṃ āyatiṃ upapattiyā paṭikkhipanato. ^b^Ubhayaṃ paṭibāhati^eb^ sabbaso hetupaṭibāhaneneva phalassapi paṭikkhittattā. Ubhayanti hi kammaṃ vipākañcāti ubhayaṃ. So hi ‘‘ahetū appaccayā sattā saṃkilissanti, visujjhanti cā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.168; ma. ni. 2.100, 227; saṃ. ni. 3.212) vadanto kammassa viya vipākassāpi saṃkilesavisuddhīnaṃ paccayattābhāvavacanato tadubhayaṃ paṭibāhati nāma. ^b^Vipāko paṭibāhito hoti^eb^ asati kamme vipākābhāvato. ^b^Kammaṃ paṭibāhitaṃ hoti^eb^ asati vipāke kammassa niratthakabhāvāpattito. ^b^Atthato^eb^ti sarūpena. ^b^Ubhayappaṭibāhakā^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ taṃtaṃdiṭṭhidīpakabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ āgatāpi paccekaṃ tividhadiṭṭhikā eva ubhayapaṭibāhakattā. Ubhayappaṭibāhakāti hi hetuvacanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Ahetukavādā cevā’’^eb^tiādi paṭiññāvacanaṃ. Yo hi vipākapaṭibāhanena natthikadiṭṭhiko ucchedavādī, so atthato kammapaṭibāhanena akiriyadiṭṭhiko, ubhayapaṭibāhanena ahetukadiṭṭhiko ca hoti. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Sajjhāyantī^eb^ti taṃ diṭṭhidīpakaṃ ganthaṃ uggahetvā paṭhanti. ^b^Vīmaṃsantī^eb^ti tassa atthaṃ vicārenti. ^b^‘‘Tesa’’^eb^ntiādi vīmaṃsanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Tasmiṃ ārammaṇe^eb^ti yathāparikappitakammaphalābhāvādike ‘‘karoto na karīyati pāpa’’nti ādinayappavattāya laddhiyā ārammaṇe. ^b^Micchāsati santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti ‘‘karoto na karīyati pāpa’’ntiādivasena anussavūpaladdhe atthe tadākāraparivitakkanehi saviggahe viya sarūpato cittassa paccupaṭṭhite cirakālaparicayena evametanti nijjhānakkhamabhāvūpagamanena nijjhānakkhantiyā ^a^P1.0295^ea^ tathāgahite punappunaṃ tatheva āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa micchāvitakkena samādiyamānā micchāvāyāmūpatthambhitā ataṃsabhāvaṃ ‘‘taṃsabhāva’’nti gaṇhantī micchāsatīti laddhanāmā taṃladdhisahagatā taṇhā santiṭṭhati. ^b^Cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hotī^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ vitakkādipaccayalābhena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe avaṭṭhitatāya anekaggataṃ pahāya ekaggaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti. Cittasīsena micchāsamādhi eva vutto. Sopi hi paccayavisesehi laddhabhāvanābalo īdise ṭhāne samādhānapatirūpakiccakaroyeva, vāḷavijjhanādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Javanāni javantī^eb^ti anekakkhattuṃ tenākārena pubbabhāgiyesu javanavāresu pavattesu ^a^M1.0228^ea^ sabbapacchime javanavāre satta javanāni ^a^V1.0202^ea^ javanti. ^b^Paṭhame javane satekicchā honti. Tathā dutiyādīsū^eb^ti dhammasabhāvadassanamattametaṃ, na pana tasmiṃ khaṇe tesaṃ tikicchā kenaci sakkā kātuṃ.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tesu tīsu micchādassanesu. ^b^Koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamatī^eb^ti yassa ekasmiṃyeva abhiniveso āsevanā ca pavattā, so ekameva dassanaṃ okkamati. Yassa pana dvīsu tīsupi vā abhiniveso āsevanā ca pavattā, so dve tīṇipi okkamati, etena yā pubbe ubhayapaṭibāhakatāmukhena dīpitā atthasiddhā sabbadiṭṭhikatā, sā pubbabhāgiyā. Yā pana micchattaniyāmokkantibhūtā, sā yathāsakaṃ paccayasamudāgamasiddhito bhinnārammaṇānaṃ viya visesādhigamānaṃ ekajjhaṃ anuppattiyā asaṅkiṇṇā evāti dasseti. ^b^‘‘Ekasmiṃ okkantepī’’^eb^tiādinā tissannampi diṭṭhīnaṃ samānabalataṃ samānaphalatañca dasseti. Tasmā tissopi cetā ekassa uppannā abbokiṇṇā eva, ekāya vipāke dinne ^a^P1.0296^ea^ itarā anubalappadāyikāyo honti. ^b^‘‘Vaṭṭakhāṇu nāmesā’’^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ neyyatthaṃ, na nītatthaṃ. Tathā hi ^b^papañcasūdaniyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘kiṃ panesa ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve niyato hoti, udāhu aññasmiṃ pīti? Ekasmiṃyeva niyato, āsevanavasena pana bhavantarepi taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ roceti yevā’’ti (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3.129) vuttaṃ. Akusalañhi nāmetaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ, na kusalaṃ viya sabalaṃ mahābalaṃ. Tasmā ‘‘ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve niyato’’ti vuttaṃ. Aññathā sammattaniyāmo viya micchattaniyāmopi accantiko siyā, na ca accantiko. Yadi evaṃ vaṭṭakhāṇujotanā kathanti āha ‘‘āsevanavasena panā’’tiādi. Tasmā yathā ‘‘sakiṃ nimuggopi nimuggo eva bālo’’ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vaṭṭakhāṇujotanā. Yādise hi paccaye paṭicca ayaṃ taṃ taṃ dassanaṃ okkanto puna kadāci tappaṭipakkhe paccaye paṭicca tato sīsukkhipanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ, tasmā ^b^‘‘yebhuyyena hi evarūpassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā evaṃ saṃsārakhāṇubhāvassapi paccayo apaṇṇakajāto, tasmā. ^b^Bhūtikāmo^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ vasena attano guṇehi vaḍḍhikāmo.

[03]^b^174^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Akatā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0229^ea^ samena visamena vā kenaci hetunā na katā na vihitā. Katavidho karaṇavidhi natthi etesanti ^b^akatavidhānā^eb^^a^P1.0297^ea^. Padadvayenāpi loke kenaci hetupaccayena nesaṃ anibbattanabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Iddhiyāpi na nimmitā^eb^ti kassaci iddhimato cetovasippattassa devassa ^a^V1.0203^ea^, issarādino vā iddhiyāpi na nimmitā. ^b^Animmāpitā^eb^ kassaci animmāpitā. ^b^Vuttatthamevā^eb^ti brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.30) vuttatthameva. ^b^Vañjhā^eb^ti vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalā, kassaci ajanakāti attho, etena pathavikāyādīnaṃ rūpādijanakabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Rūpasaddādayo hi pathavikāyādīhi appaṭibaddhavuttikāti tassa laddhi. Pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ṭhitāti ^b^kūṭaṭṭhā,^eb^ yathā pabbatakūṭaṃ kenaci anibbattitaṃ, kassaci ca anibbattakaṃ, evamete pīti adhippāyo. Yamidaṃ ‘‘bījato aṅkurādi jāyatī’’ti vuccati, taṃ vijjamānameva tato nikkhamati, na avijjamānaṃ, aññathā aññatopi aññassa upaladdhi siyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Ṭhitattā^eb^ti nibbikārābhāvena ṭhitattā. ^b^Na calantī^eb^ti vikāraṃ nāpajjanti. Vikārābhāvato hi tesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitatā. Aniñjanañca attano pakatiyā avaṭṭhānameva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na vipariṇamantī’’^eb^ti. Avipariṇāmadhammattā eva hi te aññamaññaṃ na byābādhenti. Sati hi vikāraṃ āpādetabbatāya byābādhakatāpi siyā, tathā anuggahetabbatāya anuggāhakatāti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ^b^nāla^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pathavī eva^eb^ kāyekadesattā ^b^pathavikāyo.^eb^ Jīvasattamānaṃ kāyānaṃ niccatāya nibbikārabhāvato na ^a^P1.0298^ea^ hantabbatā, na ghātetabbatā cāti neva koci hantā vā ghātetā vā, tenevāha ^b^‘‘sattannaṃ tveva kāyāna’’^eb^ntiādi. Yadi koci hantā natthi, kathaṃ satthappahāroti āha ^b^‘‘yathā muggarāsi ādīsū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kevalaṃ saññāmattameva hoti.^eb^ Hananaghātanādi pana paramatthato nattheva kāyānaṃ avikopanīyabhāvatoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^177^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattāro yāmā bhāgā catuyāmā, catuyāmā eva cātuyāmā, bhāgattho hi idha yāma-saddo yathā ‘‘rattiyā paṭhamo yāmo’’ti ^a^M1.0230^ea^. So panettha bhāgo saṃvaralakkhaṇoti āha ^b^‘‘cātuyāmasaṃvutoti catukoṭṭhāsena saṃvarena saṃvuto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭikkhittasabbasītodako^eb^ti paṭikkhittasabbasītodakaparibhogo. ^b^Sabbena pāpavāraṇena yutto^eb^ti sabbappakārena saṃvaralakkhaṇena samannāgato. ^b^Dhutapāpo^eb^ti sabbena nijjaralakkhaṇena pāpavāraṇena vidhutapāpo. ^b^Phuṭṭho^eb^ti aṭṭhannampi kammānaṃ khepanena mokkhappattiyā kammakkhayalakkhaṇena sabbena pāpavāraṇena phuṭṭho taṃ patvā ṭhito. ^b^Koṭippattacitto^eb^ti mokkhādhigameneva uttamamariyādappattacitto. ^b^Yatatto^eb^ti kāyādīsu indriyesu saṃyametabbassa abhāvato ^b^saṃyatacitto. Suppatiṭṭhitacitto^eb^ti nissesato suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitacitto. ^b^Sāsanānulomaṃ^eb^ nāma pāpavāraṇena yuttatā. Tenāha ‘‘dhutapāpo’’tiādi. ^b^Asuddhaladdhitāyā^eb^ti ‘‘atthi jīvo, so ca siyā nicco, siyā anicco’’ti evamādiasuddhaladdhitāya ^a^V1.0204^ea^. ^b^Sabbā^eb^ti kammapakativibhāgādivisayā sabbā nijjhānakkhantiyo. ^b^Diṭṭhiye vā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhiyo eva jātā.

[03]^b^179-181^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Amarāvikkhepe^eb^^a^P1.0299^ea^^b^vuttanayo evā^eb^ti brahmajāle amarāvikkhepavādasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.61-63) vuttanayo eva vikkhepabyākaraṇabhāvato, tatheva cettha vikkhepavādassa āgatattā.

[03]^b^183^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yathā te rucceyyā^eb^ti idāni mayā pucchiyamāno attho yathā tava citte roceyya. Gharadāsiyā kucchismiṃ jāto ^b^antojāto.^eb^ Dhanena kīto ^b^dhanakkīto.^eb^ Bandhaggāhagahito ^b^karamarānīto. Sāma^eb^nti sayameva. ^b^Dāsabya^eb^nti dāsabhāvaṃ. Koci dāsopi samāno alaso kammaṃ akaronto ‘‘kammakāro’’ti na vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘analaso kammakaraṇasīloyevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhamamevā^eb^ti āsannataraṭṭhānūpasaṅkamanato pageva puretarameva. ^b^Pacchā^eb^ti sāmikassa nipajjāya pacchā. ^b^Sayanato avuṭṭhite^eb^ti rattiyā vibhāyanavelāya seyyato avuṭṭhite. ^b^Paccūsakālato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti atītāya ^a^M1.0231^ea^ rattiyā paccūsakālato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Yāva sāmino rattiṃ niddokkamana^eb^nti aparāya padosavelāyaṃ yāva niddokkamanaṃ. ^b^Kiṃ kāra^eb^nti kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ, kiṃkārabhāvato pucchitvā kātabbaveyyāvaccanti attho.

[03]^b^Devo viyā^eb^ti ādhipaccaparivārādisampattisamannāgato padhānadevo viya. ^b^So vatassāha^eb^nti so vata assaṃ ahaṃ. So rājā viya ahampi bhaveyyaṃ, kathaṃ puññāni kareyyaṃ, yadi puññāni uḷārāni kareyyanti yojanā. ^b^‘‘So vatassa’ssa’’^eb^nti pāṭhe so rājā assa ahaṃ assaṃ vata, yadi puññāni kareyyanti yojanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayamevattho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assa^eb^nti uttamapurisappayoge ^b^ahaṃ^eb^-saddo appayuttopi payutto eva hoti. ^b^Yāvajīvaṃ na sakkhissāmi dātu^eb^nti yāvajīvaṃ dānatthāya ussāhaṃ karontopi yaṃ rājā ekaṃ divasaṃ deti ^a^P1.0300^ea^, tato satabhāgampi dātuṃ na sakkhissāmi. Tasmā pabbajissāmīti pabbajjāyaṃ ussāhaṃ katvāti yojanā.

[03]^b^Kāyena^eb^^a^V1.0205^ea^^b^saṃvuto^eb^ti kāyena saṃvaritabbaṃ kāyadvārena pavattanakaṃ pāpadhammaṃ saṃvaritvā vihareyyāti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘kāyena pihito hutvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ghāsacchādanena paramatāyā^eb^ti ghāsacchādanapariyesane sallekhavasena paramatāya, ukkaṭṭhabhāve saṇṭhito ghāsacchādanameva vā paramaṃ parā koṭi etassa, na tato paraṃ kiñci āmisajātaṃ pariyesati paccāsisati cāti ghāsacchādanaparamo, tabbhāvo ghāsacchādanaparamatā, tassā ^b^ghāsacchādanaparamatāya. Vivekaṭṭhakāyāna^eb^nti gaṇasaṅgaṇikato pavivitte ṭhitakāyānaṃ. ^b^Nekkhammābhiratāna^eb^nti jhānābhiratānaṃ. Tāya eva jhānābhiratiyā paramaṃ uttamaṃ vodānaṃ visuddhiṃ pattatāya ^b^paramavodānappattānaṃ.^eb^ Kilesūpadhiabhisaṅkhārūpadhīnaṃ accantavigamena ^b^nirupadhīnaṃ. Visaṅkhāragatāna^eb^nti adhigatanibbānānaṃ. Ettha ca paṭhamo viveko itarehi dvīhi vivekehi sahāpi pattabbo vināpi, tathā dutiyo. Tatiyo pana itarehi dvīhi saheva pattabbo, na vināti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gaṇe janasamāgame sannipatanaṃ ^b^gaṇasaṅgaṇikā,^eb^ taṃ ^b^pahāya eko viharati^eb^ carati puggalavasena asahāyattā. Citte kilesānaṃ sannipatanaṃ ^b^cittakilesasaṅgaṇikā,^eb^ taṃ ^b^pahāya eko viharati^eb^ kilesavasena asahāyattā. Maggassa ^a^M1.0232^ea^ ekacittakkhaṇikattā, gotrabhuādīnañca ārammaṇamattattā na tesaṃ vasena sātisayā nibbutisukhasamphusanā, phalasamāpattinirodhasamāpattivasena sātisayāti āha ^b^‘‘phalasamāpattiṃ vā nirodhasamāpattiṃ vā pavisitvā’’^eb^ti. Phalapariyosāno hi nirodhoti.

[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiharitvā^eb^ti abhimukhībhāvena netvā. ‘‘Ahaṃ cīvarādīhi payojanaṃ sādhessāmī’’ti vacanaseso. ^b^Sappāya^eb^nti ^a^P1.0301^ea^ sabbagelaññapaharaṇavasena upakārāvahaṃ. Bhāvinā anatthato paripālanavasena gopanā ^b^rakkhāgutti.^eb^ Paccuppannassa nisedhavasena ^b^āvaraṇagutti.^eb^

[03]^b^186^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kasatīti^eb^ kasiṃ karoti. ^b^Gahapatiko^eb^ti ettha ka-saddo appatthoti āha ^b^‘‘ekagehamatte jeṭṭhako’’^eb^ti, tena anekakulajeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. ^b^Karaṃ karotī^eb^ti karaṃ sampādeti. ^b^Vaḍḍhetī^eb^ti uparūpari sampādanena vaḍḍheti. Evaṃ appampi pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkaranti ayamattho laṭukikopamasuttena (ma. ni. 2.151, 152) dīpetabbo. Tenāha ‘‘seyyathāpi, udāyi, puriso daliddo assako anāḷhiyo, tassassa ekaṃ agārakaṃ oluggaviluggaṃ kākātidāyiṃ naparamarūpa’’nti vitthāro. Yadi appampi bhogaṃ pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkaraṃ, kasmā dāsavāre bhogaggahaṇaṃ na katanti āha ^b^‘‘dāsavāre panā’’^eb^tiādi. Yathā ^a^V1.0206^ea^ ca dāsassa bhogāpi abhogā parāyattabhāvato, evaṃ ñātayo pīti dāsavāre ñātiparivaṭṭaggahaṇampi na katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evarūpāhī^eb^ti yathāvuttadāsakassakūpamāsadisāhi upamāhi sāmaññaphalaṃ dīpetuṃ pahoti bhagavā sakalampi rattindivaṃ tato bhiyyopi anantapaṭibhānatāya vicittanayadesanabhāvato. ^b^Tathāpī^eb^ti satipi desanāya uttaruttarādhikanānānayavicittabhāve.

[03]^b^Ekatthametaṃ^eb^ padaṃ sādhusaddasseva ka-kārena vaḍḍhitvā vuttattā, teneva ^b^sādhuka^eb^-saddassa atthaṃ vadantena atthuddhāravasena ^b^sādhu^eb^-saddo udāhaṭo. ^b^Āyācane^eb^ti abhimukhayācane, abhipatthanāyanti attho ^a^P1.0302^ea^. ^b^Sampaṭicchane^eb^ti paṭiggaṇhane ^a^M1.0233^ea^. ^b^Sampahaṃsane^eb^ti saṃvijjamānaguṇavasena haṃsane tosane, udaggatākaraṇeti attho. ^b^Dhammarucī^eb^ti puññakāmo. ^b^Paññāṇavā^eb^ti paññavā. ^b^Addubbho^eb^ti adūsako, anupaghātakoti attho. ^b^Idhāpī^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāmaññaphalepi. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^ sādhu-saddo. ^b^Daḷhīkamme^eb^ti sakkacca kiriyāyaṃ. ^b^Āṇattiya^eb^nti āṇāpane. ‘‘Suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohī’’ti hi vutte sādhuka-saddena savanamanasikārānaṃ sakkaccakiriyā viya tadāṇāpanampi jotitaṃ hoti, āyācanatthatā viya cassa āṇāpanatthatā veditabbā. ^b^Sundarepī^eb^ti sundaratthepi. Idāni yathāvuttena sādhuka-saddassa atthattayena pakāsitaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘daḷhīkammatthena hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Manasi karohī^eb^ti ettha manasikāro na ārammaṇapaṭipādanalakkhaṇo, atha kho vīthipaṭipādanajavanapaṭipādanamanasikārapubbakaṃ citte ṭhapanalakkhaṇoti dassento ^b^‘‘āvajjā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Sotindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ^eb^ savane niyojanavasena kiriyantarapaṭisedhanabhāvato, sotaṃ odahāti attho. ^b^Manindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ^eb^ aññacintāpaṭisedhanato. ^b^Byañjanavipallāsaggāhavāraṇaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sādhuka’’nti visesetvā vuttattā. Pacchimassa atthavipallāsaggāhavāraṇepi eseva nayo. ^b^Dhāraṇūpaparikkhādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tulanatīraṇādike, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividhe ca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Sabyañjano^eb^ti ettha yathādhippetamatthaṃ byañjayatīti byañjanaṃ, sabhāvanirutti. Saha byañjanenāti sabyañjano, byañjanasampannoti attho. ^b^Sāttho^eb^ti araṇīyato upagantabbato anudhātabbato attho, catupārisuddhisīlādiko ^a^P1.0303^ea^. Tena saha atthenāti sāttho, atthasampannoti attho. ^b^Dhammagambhīro^eb^tiādīsu ^b^dhammo^eb^ nāma tanti. ^b^Desanā^eb^^a^V1.0207^ea^ nāma tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā. ^b^Attho^eb^ nāma tantiyā attho. ^b^Paṭivedho^eb^ nāma tantiyā, tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Yasmā cete dhammadesanā atthappaṭivedhā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yasmā ayaṃ dhammo…pe… sādhukaṃ manasi karohī’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato dhammatthānaṃ, desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya dukkhogāhatā, paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya, ñāṇuppattiyā ca dukkarabhāvato dukkhogāhatā veditabbā. ^b^Desanaṃ^eb^ nāma ^a^M1.0234^ea^ uddisanaṃ, tassa niddisanaṃ ^b^bhāsana^eb^nti idhādhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘vitthārato bhāsissāmī’’^eb^ti. Paribyattaṃ kathanañhi bhāsanaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘desessāmīti…pe… vitthāradīpana’’^eb^nti.

[03]Yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttapadena samatthetuṃ ^b^‘‘tenāhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sāḷikāyiva nigghoso^eb^ti sāḷikāya ālāpo viya madhuro kaṇṇasukho pemanīyo. ^b^Paṭibhāna^eb^nti saddo. ^b^Udīrayī^eb^ti uccārīyati, vuccati vā.
[03]^b^Evaṃ vutte ussāhajāto^eb^ti evaṃ ‘‘suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohi bhāsissāmī’’ti vutte ‘‘na kira bhagavā saṅkhepeneva desessati, vitthārenapi bhāsissatī’’ti sañjātussāho haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā.

[03]^b^190^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Idhā’’^eb^ti iminā vuccamānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tathāgatassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘desāpadese nipāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Svāya’’^eb^nti sāmaññato idhasaddamattaṃ gaṇhāti, na yathāvisesitabbaṃ idha-saddaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘katthaci padapūraṇamattamevā’’ti (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.190). ^b^Lokaṃ upādāya vuccati^eb^ loka-saddena samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttattā ^a^P1.0304^ea^. Sesapadadvaye pana padantarasannidhānamattena taṃ taṃ upādāya vuttatā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Idha tathāgato loke^eb^ti hi jātikhettaṃ, tatthāpi ayaṃ cakkavāḷo ‘‘loko’’ti adhippeto. ^b^Samaṇo^eb^ti sotāpanno. ^b^Dutiyo samaṇo^eb^ti sakadāgāmī. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘katamo ca bhikkhave samaṇo? Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī’’tiādi (a. ni. 4.241). ‘‘Katamo ca bhikkhave dutiyo samaṇo? Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā’’tiādi (a. ni. 4.241). ^b^Okāsa^eb^nti kañci padesaṃ. ^b^Idheva tiṭṭhamānassā^eb^ti imissā eva indasālaguhāyaṃ tiṭṭhamānassa.

[03]^b^Padapūraṇamattameva^eb^^a^V1.0208^ea^ okāsāpadisanassāpi asambhavato atthantarassa abodhanato. Arahanti ādayo saddā vitthāritāti yojanā. Atthato vitthāraṇaṃ saddamukheneva hotīti saddaggahaṇaṃ. Yasmā. ‘‘Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato’’tiādinā udānaṭṭhakathādīsu, (udā. aṭṭha. 18; itivu. aṭṭha. 38) arahanti ādayo visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ aparehi pakārehi vitthāritā ^a^M1.0235^ea^, tasmātesu vuttānayenapi so (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.129, 130) attho veditabbo. Tathāgatassa sattanikāyantogadhatāya ‘‘idha pana sattaloko adhippeto’’ti vatvā tatthāyaṃ yasmiṃ sattanikāye yasmiñca okāse uppajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sattaloke uppajjamānopi cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Tathāgato na devaloke uppajjatī’’^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āgamissati. ^b^Sārappattā^eb^ti kulabhogissariyādivasena sārabhūtā. ^b^Brāhmaṇagahapatikā^eb^ti brahmāyupokkharasātiādibrāhmaṇā ^a^P1.0305^ea^ ceva anāthapiṇḍikādigahapatikā ca.

[03]^b^‘‘Sujātāyā’’^eb^tiādinā vuttesu catūsu vikappesu paṭhamo vikappo buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattidassanavasena vutto. Āsannatarāya hi paṭipattiyā ṭhito ‘‘uppajjatīti’’ vuccati uppādassa ekantikattā, pageva paṭipattiyā matthake ṭhito. Dutiyo buddhabhāvāvahapabbajjato paṭṭhāya āsannapaṭipattidassanavasena, tatiyo buddhakaradhamma pāripūrito paṭṭhāya buddhabhāvāya paṭipattidassanavasena. Na hi mahāsattānaṃ uppatibhavūpapattito paṭṭhāya bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ nāma atthi. Catuttho buddhakaradhammasamārambhato paṭṭhāya. Bodhiyā niyatabhāvappattito pabhuti hi viññūhi ‘‘buddho uppajjatī’’ti vattuṃ sakkā uppādassa ekantikattā. Yathā pana sandanti nadiyoti sandanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya vattamānappayogo, evaṃ uppādatthāya paṭipajjanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya catūsu vikappesu ‘‘uppajjati nāmā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāva^eb^nti catūsu vikappesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ tathāgatassa uppannatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthibhāvaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^So bhagavā^eb^ti yo ‘‘tathāgato araha’’ntiādinā kittitaguṇo, so bhagavā. ‘‘Imaṃ loka’’nti nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti dassetuṃ ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādi vuttaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘idāni vattabbaṃ nidassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pajātattā^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ kammakilesehi nibbattattā. ^b^Pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ^eb^ pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā. Sadevakanti ca avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho. ^b^Chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ^eb^ paccāsattiñāyena. Tattha hi so jāto, taṃnivāsī ca. ^b^Brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇa^eb^nti etthāpi eseva ^a^P1.0306^ea^ nayo. ^b^Paccatthika^eb^^a^M1.0236^ea^^b^…pe… samaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇa^eb^nti nidassanamattametaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ, asamitābāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇīvacanena gahitattā. Kāmaṃ ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādi ^a^V1.0209^ea^ visesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ, ‘‘salomako sapakkhako’’tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa’’^eb^nti.

[03]Arūpino sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā dibbantīti devāti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ labhantīti āha ^b^‘‘sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaraloko gahito’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ‘‘ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyata’’nti (a. ni. 3.117). ^b^Samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko gahito^eb^ tassa savisesaṃ mārassa vase vattanato. ^b^Rūpī brahmaloko gahito^eb^ arūpībrahmalokassa visuṃ gahitattā. ^b^Catuparisavasenā^eb^ti khattiyādicatuparisavasena, itarā pana catasso parisā samārakādiggahaṇena gahitā evāti. ^b^Avasesasabbasattaloko^eb^ nāgagaruḷādibhedo.

[03]Ettāvatā ca bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tena tena visesena abhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘api cetthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato^eb^ti ukkaṃsagativijānanena. Pañcasu hi gatīsu devagatipariyāpannāva seṭṭhā, tatthāpi arūpino dūrasamussāritakilesadukkhatāya, santapaṇītāaneñjavihārasamaṅgitāya, atidīghāyukatāyāti evamādīhi visesehi ativiya ukkaṭṭhā. ^b^‘‘Brahmā mahānubhāvo’’^eb^tiādi dasasahassiyaṃ mahābrahmuno vasena vadati. ‘‘Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato’’ti ^a^P1.0307^ea^ hi vuttaṃ. ^b^Anuttara^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ nava lokuttaraṃ. ^b^Bhāvānukkamo^eb^ti bhāvavasena paresaṃ ajjhāsayavasena ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ anukkamo.

[03]^b^Tīhākārehī^eb^ti devamārabrahmasahitatāsaṅkhātehi tīhi pakārehi. ^b^Tīsu padesū^eb^ti ‘‘sadevaka’’ntiādīsu tīsu padesu. ^b^Tena tenākārenā^eb^ti sadevakattādinā tena tena pakārena. Tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti porāṇā panāhūti yojanā.

[03]^b^Abhiññā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0237^ea^ ya-kāralopenāyaṃ niddeso, abhijānitvāti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘abhiññāya adhikena ñāṇena ñatvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anumānādipaṭikkhepo^eb^ti anumānaupamānātthāpattiādipaṭikkhepo ekappamāṇattā. Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya hi sabbapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto.

[03]^b^Anuttaraṃ^eb^^a^V1.0210^ea^^b^vivekasukha^eb^nti phalasamāpattisukhaṃ, tena ṭhitimissāpi [vīthimissāpi (sārattha. ṭī. 1.verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ) dhitimissāpi (ka)] kadāci bhagavato dhammadesanā hotīti ^b^hitvāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddaggahaṇaṃ. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti, yathāsutaṃ vā dhammaṃ paccavekkhati, taṃ khaṇaṃ pubbabhāgena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, yathāparicchedañca samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti. Ugghaṭitaññussa vasena ^b^appaṃ vā^eb^ vipañcitaññussa, neyyassa vā vasena ^b^bahuṃ vā desento.^eb^ Dhammassa kalyāṇatā niyyānikatāya, niyyānikatā ca sabbaso anavajjabhāvenevāti āha ^b^‘‘anavajjameva katvā’’^eb^ti. Desakāyattena āṇādividhinā abhisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanāti sā pariyattidhammavasena veditabbāti āha ^b^‘‘desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Nidānanigamanānipi satthuno desanāya anuvidhānato tadantogadhāni evāti āha ^b^‘‘nidānamādi, idaṃ evocāti pariyosāna’’^eb^nti.

[03]Sāsitabbapuggalagatena yathāparādhādisāsitabbabhāvena ^a^P1.0308^ea^ anusāsanaṃ tadaṅgavinayādivasena vinayanaṃ sāsananti taṃ paṭipattidhammavasena veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘sīlasamādhivipassanā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kusalānaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti anavajjadhammānaṃ sīlassa, samathavipassanānañca sīladiṭṭhīnaṃ ādibhāvo taṃ mūlakattā uttarimanussadhammānaṃ. Ariyamaggassa antadvayavigamena majjhimapaṭipadābhāvo viya, sammāpaṭipattiyā ārabbhanipphattīnaṃ vemajjhattāpi majjhabhāvoti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Atthi bhikkhave…pe… majjhaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Phalaṃ pariyosānaṃ nāma^eb^ saupādisesatāvasena, ^b^nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṃ nāma^eb^ anupādisesatāvasena. Idāni tesaṃ dvinnampi sāsanassa pariyosānataṃ āgamena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘etadatthamida’’^eb^ntiādi āha. ^b^Idha desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ adhippetaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sabyañjana’’ntiādi vacanato. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe katāvadhisaddappabandho gāthāvasena, suttavasena ca vavatthito pariyattidhammo, yo ^a^M1.0238^ea^ idha ‘‘desanā’’ti vutto, tassa pana attho visesato sīlādi evāti āha ^b^‘‘bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento…pe… dassetī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^sīlaṃ dassetvā^eb^ti ^b^sīla^eb^ggahaṇena sasambhāraṃ sīlaṃ gahitaṃ, tathā ^b^magga^eb^ggahaṇena sasambhāro maggoti tadubhayavasena anavasesato pariyatti atthaṃ pariyādiyati. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti sīlādidassanena. Atthavasena hi idha desanāya ādikalyāṇādibhāvo adhippeto. ^b^Kathikasaṇṭhitī^eb^ti kathikassa saṇṭhānaṃ kathanavasena samavaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Na so sātthaṃ deseti^eb^ niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya. ^b^Ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā^eb^ti sithilādibhedesu byañjanesu ekappakāremeva, dvipakāremeva vā byañjanena yuttā vā damiḷabhāsā viya ^a^V1.0211^ea^. Vivaṭakaraṇatāya oṭṭhe aphusāpetvā uccāretabbato ^b^sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā^eb^ kirātabhāsā ^a^P1.0309^ea^ viya. Sabbasseva [sabbattheva (sārattha. ṭī. 1.verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ 1)] vissajjanīyayuttatāya ^b^sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā^eb^ savarabhāsā [yavanabhāsā (sārattha. ṭī. 1.verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ)] viya. Sabbasseva [sabbattheva (sārattha. ṭī. 1.verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ)] sānusāratāya ^b^sabbaniggahitabyañjanā vā^eb^ pārasikādimilakkhubhāsā viya. Sabbāpesā byañjanekadesavasena pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti katvā ^b^‘‘abyañjanā’’^eb^ti vuttā.

[03]Ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyanti evamādi ^b^sithilaṃ.^eb^ Tāni asithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ vaggesu dutiyacatutthanti evamādi ^b^dhanitaṃ.^eb^ Dvimattakālaṃ ^b^dīghaṃ.^eb^ Ekamattakālaṃ ^b^rassaṃ^eb^ tadeva ^b^lahukaṃ.^eb^ Lahukameva saṃyogaparaṃ, dīghañca ^b^garukaṃ.^eb^ Ṭhānakaraṇāni niggahetvā uccāretabbaṃ ^b^niggahitaṃ.^eb^ Parena sambandhaṃ katvā uccāretabbaṃ ^b^sambandhaṃ.^eb^ Tathā nasambandhaṃ ^b^vavatthitaṃ.^eb^ Ṭhānakaraṇāni nissaṭṭhāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ ^b^vimuttaṃ. Dasadhā^eb^ti evaṃ sithilādivasena byañjanabuddhiyā akkharuppādakacittassa sabbākārena ^b^pabhedo.^eb^ Sabbāni hi akkharāni cittasamuṭṭhānāni yathādhippetatthaṃ byañjanato byañjanāni cāti.

[03]^b^Amakkhetvā^eb^ti amilecchetvā, avināsetvā, ahāpetvāti vā attho. Bhagavā yamatthaṃ ñāpetuṃ ekaṃ gāthaṃ, ekaṃ vākyaṃ vā deseti, tamatthaṃ tāya desanāya parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya eva desetīti āha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ desetī’’^eb^ti. Idha ^b^kevala^eb^saddo anavasesavācako, na avomissakādivācakoti āha ^b^‘‘sakalādhivacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paripuṇṇa^eb^nti sabbaso puṇṇaṃ, taṃ pana kenaci ūnaṃ, adhikaṃ vā na hotīti ^a^M1.0239^ea^^b^‘‘anūnādhikavacana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tattha yadatthaṃ ^a^P1.0310^ea^ desito, tassa sādhakattā anūnatā veditabbā, tabbidhurassa pana asādhakattā anadhikatā. Sakalanti sabbabhāgavantaṃ. Paripuṇṇanti sabbaso paripuṇṇameva, tenāha ^b^‘‘ekadesanāpi aparipuṇṇā natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aparisuddhā desanā hoti^eb^ taṇhāya saṃkiliṭṭhattā. Lokāmisaṃ cīvarādayo paccayā tattha agadhitacittatāya ^b^lokāmisanirapekkho. Hitapharaṇenā^eb^ti hitūpasaṃhārena. ^b^Mettābhāvanāya^eb^ karaṇabhūtāya ^b^muduhadayo. Ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitenā^eb^ti sakalasaṃkilesato, vaṭṭadukkhato ca uddharaṇākārāvaṭṭhitena cittena, kāruṇādhippāyenāti attho.

[03]‘‘Ito paṭṭhāya dassāmeva, evañca dassāmī’’ti samādātabbaṭṭhena ^b^vataṃ.^eb^ Paṇḍitapaññattatāya ^a^V1.0212^ea^ seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmaṃ brahmānaṃ vā cariyanti ^b^brahmacariyaṃ^eb^ dānaṃ. Macchariyalobhādiniggaṇhanena ^b^suciṇṇassa. Iddhī^eb^ti deviddhi. ^b^Jutī^eb^ti pabhā, ānubhāvo vā. ^b^Balavīriyūpapattī^eb^ti evaṃ mahatā balena ca vīriyena ca samannāgamo. ^b^Puñña^eb^nti puññaphalaṃ. ^b^Veyyāvaccaṃ brahmacariyaṃ^eb^ seṭṭhā cariyāti katvā. Esa nayo sesepi.

[03]^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ idha ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti adhippetaṃ tasmā. ‘‘Brahmacariya’’nti iminā samānādhikaraṇāni sabbapadāni yojetvā atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘so dhammaṃ deseti…pe… pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^191^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vuttappakārasampada^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ ādikalyāṇatādiguṇasampadaṃ, dūrasamussāritamānasseva sāsane sammāpaṭipatti sambhavati, na mānajātikassāti āha ^b^‘‘nihatamānattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ussannattā^eb^ti bahulabhāvato. Bhogārogyādivatthukā madā suppaheyyā honti nimittassa anavatthānato, na tathā kulavijjāmadā, tasmā khattiyabrāhmaṇakulānaṃ pabbajitānampi ^a^P1.0311^ea^ jātivijjā nissāya mānajappanaṃ duppajahanti āha ^b^‘‘yebhuyyena hi…pe… mānaṃ karontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vijātitāyā^eb^ti nihīnajātitāya. ^b^Patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkontī^eb^ti suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkonti. Sīlavasena hi sāsane patiṭṭhā, ^b^patiṭṭhātu^eb^nti vā saccapaṭivedhena lokuttarāya patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhātuṃ. Sā hi nippariyāyato sāsane patiṭṭhā nāma, yebhuyyena ca upanissayasampannā sujātā eva honti, na dujjātā.

[03]^b^Parisuddha^eb^nti ^a^M1.0240^ea^ rāgādīnaṃ accantameva pahānadīpanato nirupakkilesatāya sabbaso parisuddhaṃ. ^b^Saddhaṃ paṭilabhatī^eb^ti pothujjanikasaddhāvasena saddahati. Viññūjātikānañhi dhammasampattiggahaṇapubbikā saddhā siddhi dhammappamāṇadhammappasannabhāvato. ‘‘Sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā, yo evaṃ svākkhātadhammo’’ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^Jāyampatikā^eb^ti gharaṇīpatikā.
