Kāmaṃ ‘‘jāyampatikā’’ti vutte gharasāmikagharasāminīvasena dvinnaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ viññāyati. Yassa pana purisassa anekā pajāpatiyo, tattha kiṃ vattabbaṃ, ekāyāpi saṃvāso sambādhoti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘dve’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Rāgādinā sakiñcanaṭṭhena, khettavatthu ādinā sapalibodhaṭṭhena rāgarajādīnaṃ āgamanapathatāpi uṭṭhānaṭṭhānatā evāti dvepi vaṇṇanā ekatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ. ^b^Alagganaṭṭhenā^eb^ti assajjanaṭṭhena appaṭibaddhabhāvena. Evaṃ akusalakusalappavattīnaṃ ṭhānabhāvena gharāvāsapabbajjānaṃ sambādhabbhokāsataṃ dassetvā idāni kusalappavattiyā eva aṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvena tesaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṅkhepakathā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0213^ea^ visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāraṃ akatvā samāsato atthavaṇṇanā. ^b^Ekampi divasa^eb^nti ekadivasamattampi. ^b^Akhaṇḍaṃ katvā^eb^ti dukkaṭamattassapi anāpajjanena akhaṇḍitaṃ katvā. ^b^Kilesamalena amalīna^eb^nti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ katvā. Pariyodātaṭṭhena nimmalabhāvena saṅkhaṃ viya likhitaṃ dhotanti ^b^saṅkhalikhita^eb^nti ^a^P1.0312^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāga’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Ajjhāvasatā’’ti padappayogena ‘‘agāra’’nti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘agāramajjhe’’^eb^ti. Kasāyena rattāni vatthāni ^b^kāsāyānī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘kasāyarasapītatāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paridahitvā^eb^ti nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca. Agāravāso agāraṃ uttarapadalopena, tassa vaḍḍhiāvahaṃ ^b^agārassa hitaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^192^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhogakkhandho^eb^ti bhogasamudāyo. ^b^Ābandhanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ‘‘putto nattā’’tiādinā pemavasena saparicchedaṃ bandhanaṭṭhena. ‘‘Amhākamete’’ti ñāyantīti ^b^ñātī.^eb^ Pitāmahapituputtādivasena parivattanaṭṭhena ^b^parivaṭṭo.^eb^

[03]^b^193^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^ti pātimokkhasaṃvarena pihitakāyavacīdvāro, tathābhūto ca yasmā tena saṃvarena upeto nāma hoti ^a^M1.0241^ea^, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarena samannāgato’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Ācāragocarasampanno’’^eb^tiādi tasseva pātimokkhasaṃvarasamannāgamassa paccayadassanaṃ. ^b^Appamattakesū^eb^ti asañcicca āpannānukhuddakesu ceva sahasā uppannākusalacittuppādesu ca. ^b^Bhayadassāvī^eb^ti bhayadassanasīlo. ^b^Sammā ādiyitvā^eb^ti sakkaccaṃ yāvajīvaṃ avītikkamavasena ādiyitvā. ^b^Taṃ taṃ sikkhāpada^eb^nti taṃ taṃ sikkhākoṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ ‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto’’ti pāṭhe. ^b^Saṅkhepo^eb^ti saṅkhepavaṇṇanā. ^b^Vitthāro visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.14) ^b^vutto,^eb^ tasmā so tattha, taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.14) ca vuttanayena veditabbo.

[03]^b^Ācāragocaraggahaṇenevā^eb^ti ‘‘ācāragocarasampanno’’ti vacaneneva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kusale kāyakammavacīkamme gahitepī’’^eb^ti. Adhikavacanaṃ aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti katvā ^b^tassa^eb^ ājīvapārisuddhisīlassa ^b^uppattidvāradassanatthaṃ…pe… kusalenāti vuttaṃ,^eb^ sabbaso anesanappahānena anavajjenāti attho. Yasmā ‘‘katame ^a^P1.0313^ea^ ca thapati kusalā sīlā kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ kusalaṃ vacīkamma’’nti (ma. ni. 2.265) sīlassa kusalakāyavacībhāvaṃ dassetvā ‘‘ājīvaparisuddhampi kho ahaṃ thapati sīlasmiṃ vadāmī’’ti (ma. ni. 2.265) evaṃ pavattāya muṇḍikasuttadesanāya ‘‘kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgato kusalena, parisuddhājīvo’’ti ^a^V1.0214^ea^ ayaṃ desanā ekasaṅgahā aññadatthu saṃsandati sametīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘muṇḍikasuttavasena vā evaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sīlasmiṃ vadāmī^eb^ti ‘‘sīla’’nti vadāmi, ‘‘sīlasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpanna’’nti vadāmīti vā attho. ^b^Pariyādānattha^eb^nti pariggahatthaṃ.

[03]^b^ Tividhena sīlenā^eb^ti cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlanti evaṃ tividhena sīlena. ^b^Manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu,^eb^ na kāyapañcamesu. Yathālābhayathābalayathāsāruppappakāravasena ^b^tividhena santosena.^eb^

[03]^b^194-211^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Sīlasmi’’nti idaṃ niddhāraṇe bhummanti āha ^b^‘‘ekaṃ sīlaṃ hotīti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayameva attho^eb^ti paccattavacanattho eva. ^b^Brahmajāle^eb^ti brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.7).

[03]^b^212^eb^^b^.^eb^ Attānuvādaparānuvādadaṇḍabhayādīni ^a^M1.0242^ea^^b^asaṃvaramūlakāni. Sīlassāsaṃvarato^eb^ti sīlassa asaṃvaraṇato, sīlasaṃvarābhāvatoti attho. ^b^Bhaveyyā^eb^ti uppajjeyya. ^b^Yathāvidhānavihitenā^eb^ti yathāvidhānasampāditena. Avippaṭisārādinimittaṃ ^a^P1.0314^ea^ uppannacetasikasukhasamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi phuṭṭhasarīrassa uḷāraṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ bhavatīti āha ^b^‘‘avippaṭisāra…pe… paṭisaṃvedetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^213^eb^^b^.^eb^ Viseso kammatthāpekkhatāya sāmaññassa na tehi paricattoti āha ^b^‘‘cakkhu-saddo katthaci buddhacakkhumhi vattatī’’^eb^ti. Vijjamānameva hi abhidheyye visesatthaṃ visesantaranivattanavasena visesasaddo vibhāveti, na avijjamānaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānaṃyeva cakkhudassananti ^b^buddhacakkhu,^eb^ āsayānusayañāṇaṃ, indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca. Samantato sabbaso dassanaṭṭhena ^b^samantacakkhu,^eb^ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. ^b^Ariyamaggattayapaññā^eb^ti heṭṭhime ariyamaggattaye paññā. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti ‘‘cakkhunā rūpa’’nti imasmiṃ pāṭhe. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^ cakkhu-saddo ^b^pasāda…pe… vattati^eb^ nissayavohāre nissitassa vattabbato yathā. ‘‘Mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī’’ti. ^b^Asammissa^eb^nti kilesadukkhena avomissaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parisuddha’’^eb^nti ^a^V1.0215^ea^. Sati hi suvisuddhe indriyasaṃvare, padhānabhūtapāpadhammavigamena adhicittānuyogo hatthagato evaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘adhicittasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^214^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samantato, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti sampajāno, sampajānassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ, tathāpavattañāṇaṃ. Tassa vibhajanaṃ sampajaññabhājanīyaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^sampajaññabhājanīyamhi.^eb^ Abhikkamanaṃ ^b^abhikkanta^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamana’’^eb^nti. Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ ^a^P1.0315^ea^^b^paṭikkanta^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘paṭikkantaṃ nivattana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nivattana^eb^nti ca nivattimattaṃ. Nivattitvā pana gamanaṃ gamanameva. ^b^Abhiharanto^eb^ti gamanavasena kāyaṃ upanento. Ṭhānanisajjāsayanesu yo gamanavidhuro kāyassa purato abhihāro, so ^b^abhikkamo,^eb^ pacchato apaharaṇaṃ ^b^paṭikkamo^eb^ti dassento ^b^‘‘ṭhānepī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Āsanassā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0243^ea^ pīṭhakādiāsanassa. ^b^Purimāṅgābhimukho^eb^ti aṭanikādipurimāvayavābhimukho. ^b^Saṃsaranto^eb^ti saṃsappanto. ^b^Paccāsaṃsaranto^eb^ti paṭiāsappanto. ^b^‘‘Eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā nipannasseva abhimukhasaṃsappanapaṭiāsappanāni nidasseti.

[03]Sammā pajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ, tena attanā kātabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo ^b^sampajānakārī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī’’^eb^ti. Sampajānasaddassa sampajaññapariyāyatā pubbe vuttā eva. ^b^Sampajaññaṃ karotevā^eb^ti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti eva. Sampajaññassa vā kāro etassa atthīti ^b^sampajānakārī.^eb^ Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena saha atthena vattatīti sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādi. Sātthakassa sampajānanaṃ ^b^sātthakasampajaññaṃ.^eb^ Sappāyassa attano hitassa sampajānanaṃ ^b^sappāyasampajaññaṃ.^eb^ Abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare, aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ ^b^gocarasampajaññaṃ.^eb^ Abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanameva sampajaññaṃ ^b^asammohasampajaññaṃ. Pariggahetvā^eb^ti tūletvā tīretvā paṭisaṅkhāyāti, attho. Saṅghadassaneneva uposathapavāraṇādiatthaṃ gamanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. ^b^Asubhadassanādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kasiṇaparikammādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo ^a^P1.0316^ea^. Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā disvāpi hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Arahattaṃ pāpuṇātī^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso eso. Samathavipassanuppādanampi hi bhikkhuno vaḍḍhiyeva. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino.

[03]^b^Tasmiṃ panā^eb^ti sātthakasampajaññavasena pariggahitātthe. ‘‘Atthoti dhammato vaḍḍhī’’ti yaṃ sātthakanti ^a^V1.0216^ea^ adhippetaṃ, taṃ sappāyaṃ evāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Cittakammarūpakāni viyā^eb^ti cittakammakatā paṭimāyo viya, yantapayogena vā vicittakammā paṭimāyo viya. ^b^Asamapekkhanaṃ^eb^ gehassita aññāṇupekkhāvasena ārammaṇassa ayoniso gahaṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā’’tiādi (ma. ni. 3.308). Hatthiādisammaddena ^b^jīvitantarāyo.^eb^ Visabhāgarūpadassanādinā ^b^brahmacariyantarāyo.^eb^

[03]^b^Pabbajitadivasato^eb^^a^M1.0244^ea^^b^paṭṭhāya^eb^ bhikkhūnaṃ anuvattanakathā āciṇṇā, ananuvattanakathā pana tassā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘sace panā’’tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttākāraṃ paccāmasati, na ‘‘purisassa mātugāmāsubha’’ntiādikaṃ vuccamānaṃ.

[03]Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ ‘‘kammaṭṭhāna’’nti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uggahetvā^eb^ti yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ uggahakosallassa sampādanavasena uggahetvā ^a^P1.0317^ea^.

[03]^b^Haratī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pavatteti, yāva piṇḍapātapaṭikkamā anuyuñjatīti attho. ^b^Na paccāharatī^eb^ti āhārūpayogato yāva divāṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti. ^b^Sarīraparikamma^eb^nti mukhadhovanādisarīrapaṭijagganaṃ. ^b^Dve tayo pallaṅke^eb^ti dve tayo nisajjāvāre dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘usumaṃ gāhāpento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānamukheneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto eva, tena ‘‘pattopi acetano’’tiādinā (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.214) vakkhamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāparihariyamānaṃ vā avijahitvāti dasseti. ^b^Tathevā^eb^ti tikkhattumeva. Paribhogacetiyato sārīrikacetiyaṃ garutaranti katvā ^b^‘‘cetiyaṃ vanditvā’’^eb^ti pubbakālakiriyāya vasena vuttaṃ. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā’’ti vuttā. Buddhaguṇānussaraṇavaseneva bodhiyaṃ paṇipātakaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gāmasamīpe^eb^ti gāmassa upacāraṭṭhāne. ^b^Janasaṅgahattha^eb^nti ‘‘mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī’’ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahatthaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ‘‘dhammakathā nāma kathetabbā evā’’ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti, yasmā ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā^eb^ti attanā parihariyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto ^a^V1.0217^ea^ tadanuguṇaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā. ^b^Anumodanaṃ vatvā^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā’’ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Sampattaparicchedenevā^eb^ti ‘‘paricito aparicito’’tiādi vibhāgaṃ akatvā sampattakoṭiyā eva, samāgamamattenevāti attho. ^b^Bhaye^eb^ti paracakkādibhaye.

[03]^b^‘‘Kammajatejo’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0245^ea^^a^P1.0318^ea^ gahaṇiṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānaṃ vīthiṃ nārohati^eb^ khudāparissamena kilantakāyattā samādhānābhāvato. ^b^Avasesaṭṭhāne^eb^ti yāguyā aggahitaṭṭhāne. ^b^Poṅkhānupoṅkha^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassa avicchedadassanametaṃ, yathā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ pavattāya sarapaṭipātiyā anavicchedo, evametassapīti.

[03]^b^Nikkhittadhuro^eb^ bhāvanānuyoge. Vattapaṭipattiyā apūraṇena ^b^sabbavattāni bhinditvā.^eb^ ‘‘Kāmesu avītarāgo hoti, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo, yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.320; ma. ni. 1.186) evaṃ vutta^b^pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhacitto. Caritvā^eb^ti pavattitvā.

[03]^b^Gatapaccāgatikavattavasenā^eb^ti bhāvanāsahitaṃyeva bhikkhāya gatapaccāgataṃ gamanapaccāgamanaṃ etassa atthīti gatapaccāgatikaṃ, tadeva vattaṃ, tassa vasena. ^b^Attakāmā^eb^ti attano hitasukhaṃ icchantā, dhammacchandavantoti attho. Dhammo hi hitaṃ tannimittakañca sukhanti. Atha vā viññūnaṃ nibbisesattā, attabhāvapariyāpannattā ca attā nāma dhammo, taṃ kāmenti icchantīti ^b^attakāmā.^eb^

[03]^b^Usabhaṃ^eb^ nāma vīsati yaṭṭhiyo. ^b^Tāya saññāyā^eb^ti tāya pāsāṇasaññāya, ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgatāti jānantāti adhippāyo. ^b^Soyeva nayo^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ bhikkhū’’tiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto, so eva nisajjāyapi nayo. Pacchato āgacchantānaṃ chinnabhattabhāvabhayenapi yonisomanasikāraṃ paribrūheti. ^b^Maddantā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0319^ea^ dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāne sālisīsāni maddantā.

[03]^b^Mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī^eb^ti amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena chavassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyamevāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti. Paṭipattipūjā hi satthupūjā, na āmisapūjāti. ^b^‘‘Ṭhānacaṅkamamevā’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0218^ea^ adhiṭṭhātabbairiyāpathavasena vuttaṃ, na bhojanādikālesu avassaṃ kattabbanisajjāya paṭikkhepavasena.

[03]Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito ca anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha ^b^‘‘vīthiyo sallakkhetvā’’^eb^ti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuccati ^a^M1.0246^ea^ ‘‘pāsādikena abhikkantenā’’ti, taṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘tattha cā’’tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Āhāre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā’’^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āgamissati. ^b^Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgata^eb^nti ‘‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23; a. ni. 6.58; mahāni. 206) vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ katvā. ^b^‘‘Neva davāyā’’^eb^tiādi paṭikkhepadassanaṃ.

[03]^b^Paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti,^eb^ yadi upanissayasampanno hotīti sambandho. Evaṃ sabbattha ito paresupi. Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni, satasahassañca tajjāpuññañāṇasambharaṇaṃ. Sāvakabodhiyā aggasāvakānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ, kappasatasahassañca, mahāsāvakānaṃ (theragā. aṭṭha. 2.1288) satasahassameva tajjāpuññañāṇasambharaṇaṃ. Itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭasannissayavasena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ. ^b^Bāhiyo dārucīriyo^eb^ti bāhiyavisaye sañjātasaṃvaḍḍhatāya bāhiyo, dārucīrapariharaṇena dārucīriyoti ca samaññāto. So hi āyasmā ‘‘tasmātiha ^a^P1.0320^ea^ te, bāhiya, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute, mute, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissatī’ti, evañhi te bāhiya sikkhitabbaṃ. Yato kho te bāhiya diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute, mute, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena. Yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha. Yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena. Esevanto dukkhassā’’ti (udā. 10) ettakāya desanāya arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Evaṃ sāriputtattherādīnaṃ mahāpaññatādidīpanāni suttapadāni vitthārato veditabbāni.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti asammuyhanaṃ ^b^eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānamākāreneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Attā abhikkamatī’’^eb^ti iminā andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhigāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti, ^b^‘‘ahaṃ abhikkamāmī’’^eb^ti pana iminā mānagāhavasena. Tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhagāhavasenapi sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti. ‘‘Tathā asammuyhanto’’ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ yena ghanavinibbhogena hoti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘abhikkamāmī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^a^M1.0247^ea^ yasmā ^a^V1.0219^ea^ vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo. Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātūti. Uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento ^b^‘‘ekekapāduddharaṇe…pe… balavatiyo^eb^ti āha. Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo. Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti. Tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento ^a^P1.0321^ea^^b^‘‘tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū’’^eb^ti āha. Satipi anugamakānugantabbatāvisese tejodhātuvāyodhātubhāvamattaṃ sandhāya ^b^tathā^eb^-saddaggahaṇaṃ,. Tattha akkantaṭṭhānato pādassa ukkhipanaṃ ^b^uddharaṇaṃ.^eb^ Ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā purato haraṇaṃ ^b^atiharaṇaṃ,^eb^ khāṇuādipariharaṇatthaṃ, patiṭṭhitapādaghaṭṭanapariharaṇatthaṃ vā passena haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇaṃ.^eb^ Yāva patiṭṭhitapādo, tāva āharaṇaṃ ^b^atiharaṇaṃ,^eb^ tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇa^eb^nti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso.

[03]Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjanassa paccayo. Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti. Vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā tāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘vossajjane…pe… balavatiyo’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo, patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirujjhanassa sijjhanato tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tathā sannikkhepanasannirujjhanesū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ abhikkamane, tesu vā vuttesu uddaraṇādīsu koṭṭhāsesu. ^b^Uddharaṇe^eb^ti uddharaṇakkhaṇe. ^b^Rūpārūpadhammā^eb^ti uddharaṇākārena pavattā rūpadhammā, taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā arūpadhammā ca. ^b^Atiharaṇaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0248^ea^^b^na pāpuṇanti^eb^ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato. ^b^Tattha tatthevā^eb^ti yattha yattha uppannā, tattha tattheva. Na hi dhammānaṃ desantarasaṅkamanaṃ atthi. ^b^‘‘Pabbaṃ pabba’’^eb^tiādi uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse sandhāya sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atīttaro hi rūpadhammānampi ^a^P1.0322^ea^ pavattikkhaṇo, gamanassādīnaṃ, devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca bandhakhuradhārā samāgamatopi sīghataro. Yathā tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ paṭapaṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati, evaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ uppādenāti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭapaṭāyantā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Uppannā hi ekantato bhijjantīti. ^b^‘‘Saddhiṃ rūpenā’’^eb^ti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, yaṃ tato sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ. Aññathā yadi ^a^V1.0220^ea^ rūpārūpadhammā samānakkhaṇā siyuṃ, ‘‘rūpaṃ garupariṇāmaṃ dandhanirodha’’ntiādivacanehi virodho siyā, tathā ‘‘nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, yathayidaṃ citta’’nti (a. ni. 1.48) evaṃ ādipāḷiyā. Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāvento eva uppajjantīti tesaṃ taṃsabhāvanipphattianantaraṃ nirodho. Rūpadhammā pana anārammaṇā pakāsetabbā, evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanipphatti soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā, lahuviññāṇavisayasaṅgatimattappaccayatāya tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, visayasaṅgatimattatāya ca viññāṇassa lahuparivattitā, dandhamahābhūtappaccayatāya rūpadhammānaṃ dandhaparivattitā. Nānādhātuyā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ kho pana tathāgatasseva, tena ca purejātapaccayo rūpadhammova vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tathevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva. Tasmā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Aññaṃ^eb^^a^P1.0323^ea^^b^uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatī^eb^ti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ aññaṃ, taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayabhāveneva nirujjhatīti tathāladdhapaccayaṃ aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ. Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ antaro labbheyyāti? Noti āha ^b^‘‘avīci manuppabandho’’^eb^ti, yathā vīci antaro na labbhati, ‘‘tadeveta’’nti avisesavidū maññanti, evaṃ anu anu pabandho cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca ^b^nadīsotova^eb^ nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya ^b^vattati.^eb^

[03]Abhimukhaṃ ^a^M1.0249^ea^ lokitaṃ ālokitanti āha ^b^‘‘purato pekkhana’’^eb^nti. Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati, tiṭṭhati, nisīdati vā tadabhimukhaṃ pekkhanaṃ ālokitaṃ, tasmā tadanugatavidisālokanaṃ vilokitanti āha ^b^‘‘vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhana’’^eb^nti. Sammajjanaparibhaṇḍādikaraṇe olokitassa, ullokaharaṇādīsu ullokitassa, pacchato āgacchantaparissayassa parivajjanādīsu apalokitassa siyā sambhavoti āha ^b^‘‘iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kāyasakkhi^eb^nti kāyena sacchikatavantaṃ, paccakkhakārinanti attho. So hi āyasmā vipassanākāle ‘‘yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto, tameva suṭṭhu niggahessāmī’’ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo, tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramippatto, teneva naṃ satthā ‘‘etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ, yadidaṃ nando’’ti (a. ni. 1.235) etadagge ṭhapesi.

[03]Sātthakatā ^a^V1.0221^ea^ ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānāvijahanasseva gocarasampajaññabhāvatoti vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati. ^b^Attano^eb^^a^P1.0324^ea^^b^kammaṭṭhānavaseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ,^eb^ khandhādikammaṭṭhānā añño upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo. Ālokitādisamaññāpi yasmā dhammamattasseva pavattiviseso, tasmā tassa yāthāvato pajānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abbhantare’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasenā^eb^ti kiriyamayacittasamuṭṭhānāya vāyodhātuyā calanākārappavattivasena. ^b^Adho sīdatī^eb^ti adho gacchati. ^b^Uddhaṃ laṅghetī^eb^ti laṅghaṃ viya upari gacchati.

[03]^b^Aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamāna^eb^nti padhānabhūtāṅgakiccaṃ nipphādentaṃ hutvāti attho. ^b^‘‘Paṭhamajavanepi…pe… na hotī’’^eb^ti idaṃ pañcadvāravīthiyaṃ ‘‘itthī puriso’’ti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjana voṭṭhabbapanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhamattaṃ, aniṭṭhe ^a^M1.0250^ea^ ca paṭighamattaṃ uppajjati, manodvāre pana ‘‘itthī puriso’’ti rajjanādi hoti. Tassa pañcadvārajavanaṃ mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbaṃ bhavaṅgādi. Evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlavasena mūlapariññā vuttā. Āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena, ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā. ^b^‘‘Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesū’’^eb^ti heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha.
[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti javanaṃ, tassa ayuttanti sambandho. ^b^Āgantuko^eb^ abbhāgato.
[03]Udayabbayaparicchinno tāvatako kālo etesanti ^b^tāvakālikāni.^eb^
[03]^b^Etaṃ^eb^ asammohasampajaññaṃ. ^b^Samavāye^eb^ti sāmaggiyaṃ ^a^P1.0325^ea^. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokane paññāyamāne tabbinimutto ^b^ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi.^eb^
[03]^b^‘‘Upanissayapaccayo’’^eb^ti idaṃ suttantanayena pariyāyato vuttaṃ. ^b^Sahajātapaccayo^eb^ti nidassanamattametaṃ aññamaññasampayuttātthiavigatādipaccayānampi labbhanato.
[03]^b^Kāle^eb^ samañchituṃ yuttakāle ^b^samañchantassa.^eb^ Tathā ^b^pasārentassā^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^Maṇisappo^eb^ nāma ekā sappajātīti vadanti. ^b^Laḷana^eb^nti kampanaṃ, līḷākaraṇaṃ vā.

[03]^b^Uṇhapakatiko^eb^^a^V1.0222^ea^ pariḷāhabahulakāyo. Sīlavidūsanena ahitāvahattā ^b^micchājīvavasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ. ‘‘Cīvarampi acetana’’^eb^ntiādinā cīvarassa viya kāyopi acetanoti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena ‘‘abbhantare’’tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ paridīpento itarītarasantosassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti, tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato^eb^ti āhatacatupañcagaṇṭhiko, catupañcagaṇṭhikāhi vā āhato tathā.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhavidhopi^eb^^a^M1.0251^ea^^b^attho^eb^ti aṭṭhavidhopi payojanaviseso mahāsivattheravādavasena ‘‘imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23, 422; ma. ni. 2.387; a. ni. 2.341; 8.9; dha. sa. 1355; vibha. 518; mahāni. 206) nayena vutto daṭṭhabbo. Imasmiṃ pakkhe ^b^‘‘neva davāyātiādinā^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.23, 422; ma. ni. 2.387; a. ni. 8.9; dha. sa. 1355; vibha. 518; mahāni. 206) ^b^nayenā’’^eb^ti pana paṭikkhepaṅgadassanamukhena desanāya āgatattā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Pathavisandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātuyāva āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atiharatī^eb^ti yāva mukhā abhiharati. ^b^Vītiharatī^eb^ti tato kucchiyaṃ vīmissaṃ karonto ^a^P1.0326^ea^ harati. ^b^Atiharatī^eb^ti vā mukhadvāraṃ atikkāmento harati. ^b^Vītiharatī^eb^ti kucchigataṃ passato harati, ^b^parivattetī^eb^ti aparāparaṃ cāreti. Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasañcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu karoti, na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyāpi kiccabhāvena vuttāni. ^b^Allattañca anupāletī^eb^ti yathā vāyodhātu ādīhi aññehi visosanaṃ na hoti, tathā allattañca anupāleti. ^b^Tejodhātū^eb^ti gahaṇīsaṅkhātā tejodhātu. Sā hi antopaviṭṭhaṃ āhāraṃ paripāceti. ^b^Añjaso hotī^eb^ti āhārassa pavesanādīnaṃ maggo hoti. ^b^Ābhujatī^eb^ti pariyesanavasena, ajjhoharaṇajiṇṇājiṇṇatādipaṭisaṃvedanavasena ca āvajjeti, vijānātīti attho. Taṃtaṃvijānanassa paccayabhūtoyeva hi payogo ‘‘sammāpayogo’’ti vutto. Yena hi payogena pariyesanādi nipphajjati, so tabbisayavijānanampi nipphādeti nāma tadavinābhāvato. Atha vā ^b^sammāpayogaṃ^eb^ sammāpaṭipatti ^b^manvāya^eb^ āgamma ^b^ābhujati^eb^ samannāharati. Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Gamanato^eb^ti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. ^b^Pariyesanato^eb^ti gocaragāme bhikkhatthaṃ ^a^V1.0223^ea^ āhiṇḍanato. ^b^Paribhogato^eb^ti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. ^b^Āsayato^eb^ti pittādiāsayato. Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammaphalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti ^b^āsayo^eb^^a^M1.0252^ea^, āmāsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pittādiko. Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro. ^b^Nidhāna^eb^nti yathābhutto āhāro ^a^P1.0327^ea^ nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo. Tato ^b^nidhānato. Aparipakkato^eb^ti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena kammajatejena avipakkato. ^b^Paripakkato^eb^ti yathābhuttassa āhārasa vipakkabhāvato. ^b^Phalato^eb^ti nipphattito. ^b^Nissandato^eb^ti ito cito ca nissandanato. ^b^Sammakkhanato^eb^ti sabbaso makkhanato. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.294) gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Sarīrato sedā muccantī^eb^ti vegasaṃdhāraṇena uppannapariḷāhato sarīrato sedā muccanti. ^b^Aññe ca rogā^eb^ kaṇṇasūlabhagandarādayo. ^b^Aṭṭhāne^eb^ti manussāmanussapariggahite ayuttaṭṭhāne khettadevāyatanādike. Kuddhā hi amanussā, manussāpi vā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti. Nissaṭṭhattā ^b^neva attano,^eb^ kassaci anissajjitattā, jigucchanīyattā ca ^b^na parassa. Udakatumbato^eb^ti veḷunāḷiādiudakabhājanato. ^b^Ta^eb^nti chaḍḍitaudakaṃ.

[03]^b^Addhānairiyāpathā^eb^ ciratarappavattikā dīghakālikā iriyāpathā. ^b^Majjhimā^eb^ bhikkhācaraṇādivasena pavattā. ^b^Cuṇṇiyairiyāpathā^eb^ vihāre, aññatthāpi ito cito ca parivattanādivasena pavattāti vadanti. ‘‘Gateti gamane’’ti pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamaggahaṇena gamanenapi purato pacchato ca kāyassa abhiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahitanti keci.

[03]Yasmā mahāsivattheravāde anantare anantare iriyāpathe pavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitāti taṃ sampajaññavipassanācāravasena veditabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tayidaṃ mahāsivattherena vuttaṃ asammohadhuraṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte adhippeta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Imasmiṃ pana sāmaññaphale sabbampi ^a^P1.0328^ea^ catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati^eb^ yāvadeva sāmaññaphalavisesadassanaparattā imissā desanāya. ^b^‘‘Satisampayuttassevā’’^eb^ti idaṃ yathā sampajaññassa kiccato padhānatā gahitā, evaṃ satiyā pīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na satiyā sabbhāvamattadassanatthaṃ. Na hi kadāci satirahitā ñāṇappavatti atthi. ^b^‘‘Etassa hi padassa ayaṃ vitthāro’’^eb^ti iminā satiyā ñāṇena samadhurataṃyeva vibhāveti. ^b^Etāni^eb^^a^M1.0253^ea^^b^padānī^eb^ti ‘‘abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī’’tiādīni ^a^V1.0224^ea^ padāni. ^b^Vibhattānevā^eb^ti visuṃ katvā vibhattāniyeva, imināpi sampajaññassa viya satiyāpettha padhānatameva vibhāveti.

[03]Majjhimabhāṇakā pana bhaṇanti – eko bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva gacchati. Tathā eko tiṭṭhanto…pe… nisīdanto…pe… sayanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva sayati, ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti. Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamaṃ otaritvā ca caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti ‘‘pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā’’ti evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Uṭṭhahanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva uṭṭhahati, ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hotīti ^a^P1.0329^ea^. Evampi na sotte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti, tasmā bhikkhu yāva sakkoti, tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati ‘‘kāyo acetano, mañco acetano, kāyo na jānāti ‘ahaṃ mañce sayito’ti, mañco na jānāti ‘mayi kāyo sayito’ti, acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito’’ti evaṃ pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅge otāreti. Pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhati, ayaṃ sotte sampajānakārī nāma hoti. Kāyādīkiriyānibbattanena tammayattā, āvajjanakiriyā samuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ sabbampi vā chadvārappavattaṃ kiriyamayapavattaṃ nāma. Tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma. Api ca rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti. Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṃ desentopi battiṃsatiracchānakathaṃ pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitasappāyakathaṃ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma. Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannopi ^a^M1.0254^ea^ tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma. Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhāravirahato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāmāti. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena, sattasupi ṭhānesu catudhāti attho.

[03]^b^215^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yassa ^a^V1.0225^ea^ santosassa attani atthitāya bhikkhu ‘‘santuṭṭho’’ti vuccati, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato’’^eb^ti āha. Cīvarādi yattha katthaci paccaye ^a^P1.0330^ea^ santussanena samaṅgībhūtoti attho. Atha vā ^b^itaraṃ^eb^ vuccati hīnaṃ paṇītato aññattā, tathā paṇītaṃ ^b^itaraṃ^eb^ hīnato aññattā. Apekkhāsiddhā hi itaratāti. Iti yena dhammena hīnena vā paṇītena vā cīvarādipaccayena santussati, so tathā pavatto alobho ^b^itarītarapaccayasantoso,^eb^ tena ^b^samannāgato.^eb^ Yathālābhaṃ attano lābhānurūpaṃ santoso ^b^yathālābhasantoso.^eb^ Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Labbhatīti vā lābho, yo yo lābho yathālābhaṃ, tena santoso ^b^yathālābhasantoso.^eb^^b^Bala^eb^nti kāyabalaṃ. ^b^Sāruppa^eb^nti pakatidubbalādīnaṃ anucchavikatā.

[03]Yathāladdhato aññassa apatthanā nāma siyā appicchatāyapi pavattiākāroti tato vinivattitameva santosassa sarūpaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘labhantopi na gaṇhātī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Taṃ parivattetvā^eb^ti pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvaraṃ na phāsubhāvāvahaṃ, sarīrakhedāvahañca hotīti payojanavasena, na atricchatādivasena taṃ parivattetvā. Lahukacīvaraparibhogo na santosavirodhīti āha ^b^‘‘lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī’’^eb^ti. Mahagghaṃ cīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvāpi tāni vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti āha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ…pe… dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hotī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ sesapaccayepi yathābalayathāsāruppaniddesesu api-saddaggahaṇe adhippāyo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Muttaharītaka^eb^nti gomuttaparibhāvitaṃ, pūtibhāvena vā chaḍḍitaṃ harītakaṃ. ^b^Buddhādīhi vaṇṇita^eb^nti ‘‘pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ nissāya pabbajjā’’tiādinā (mahāva. 73, 128) sammāsambuddhādīhi ^a^M1.0255^ea^ pasatthaṃ. Appicchatāsantuṭṭhīsu ^a^P1.0331^ea^ bhikkhū niyojento ^b^paramasantuṭṭhova hoti^eb^ paramena ukkaṃsagatena santosena samannāgatattā.

[03]Kāyaṃ pariharanti posentīti ^b^kāyaparihārikā.^eb^ Tathā ^b^kucchiparihārikā^eb^ veditabbā. Kucchiparihārikatā ca ajjhoharaṇena sarīrassa ṭhitiyā upakārakatāvasena icchitāti bahiddhāva kāyassa upakārakatāvasena kāyaparihārikatā daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^Parikkhāramattā^eb^ti parikkhāraggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇa^eb^nti attanā anadhiṭṭhahitvā tattheva tiṭṭhanakapaccattharaṇaṃ ^a^V1.0226^ea^. Paccattharaṇādīnañcettha navamādibhāvo yathāvuttapaṭipāṭiyā daṭṭhabbo, na tesaṃ tathā patiniyatabhāvato. Kasmā? Tathā nadhāraṇato. Dupposabhāvena mahāgajā viyāti ^b^mahāgajā. ^eb^ Yadi itarepi appicchatādisabhāvā, kiṃ tesampi vasena ayaṃ desanā icchitāti? Noti āha ^b^‘‘bhagavā panā’’^eb^tiādi. Kāyaparihāro payojanaṃ etenāti kāyaparihārikaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāyaṃ pariharaṇamattakenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Catūsu disāsu sukhavihāratāya sukhavihāraṭṭhānabhūtā catasso disā etassāti catuddiso catuddiso eva ^b^cātuddiso.^eb^ Tāsu eva katthaci satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihanati, sayaṃ vā tena na paṭihaññatīti ^b^appaṭigho. Santussamāno itarītarenā^eb^ti uccāvacena paccayena sakena, santena, samameva ca tussanako. Paricca sayanti, kāyacittāni parisayanti abhibhavantīti ^b^parissayā,^eb^ sīhabyagghādayo, kāmacchandādayo ca, te parissaye adhivāsanakhantiyā vinayādīhi ca ^b^sahitā^eb^ khantā, abhibhavitā ca. Thaddhabhāvakarabhayābhāvena ^b^achambhī. Eko care^eb^ti ekākī hutvā carituṃ sakkuṇeyya. ^b^Khaggavisāṇakappo^eb^ti tāya eva ekavihāritāya khaggamigasiṅgasamo.
[03]Asañjātavātābhighātehi ^a^P1.0332^ea^ siyā sakuṇo apakkhakoti ^b^‘‘pakkhī sakuṇo’’^eb^ti visesetvā vutto.

[03]^b^216^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vattabbataṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti ‘‘asukassa bhikkhuno araññe tiracchānagatānaṃ viya, vanacarakānaṃ viya ca nivāsamattameva, na pana araññavāsānucchavikā ^a^M1.0256^ea^ kāci sammāpaṭipattī’’ti apavādavasena vattabbataṃ, āraññakehi vā tiracchānagatehi, vanacaravisabhāgajanehi vā saddhiṃ vippaṭipattivasena vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Kāḷakasadisattā ^b^kāḷakaṃ,^eb^ thullavajjaṃ. Tilakasadisattā ^b^tilakaṃ,^eb^ aṇumattavajjaṃ.

[03]^b^Vivitta^eb^nti janavivittaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suñña’’^eb^nti. Taṃ pana janasaddaghosābhāveneva veditabbaṃ saddakaṇṭakattā jhānassāti āha ^b^‘‘appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etadevā^eb^ti nissaddataṃyeva. ^b^Vihāro^eb^ pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso. ^b^Aḍḍhayogo^eb^ti dīghapāsādo, ‘‘garuḷasaṇṭhānapāsādo’’tipi vadanti. ^b^Pāsādo^eb^ti caturassapāsādo. ^b^Hammiyaṃ^eb^ muṇḍacchadanapāsādo ^a^V1.0227^ea^. ^b^Aṭṭo^eb^ paṭirājūnaṃ paṭibāhanayoggo catupañcabhūmako patissayaviseso. ^b^Māḷo^eb^ ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇavanto patissayaviseso. Aparo nayo ^b^vihāro^eb^ nāma dīghamukhapāsādo. ^b^Aḍḍhayogo^eb^ ekapassacchadanakasenāsanaṃ. Tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti, itarapasse nīcā, tena taṃ ekapassachadanakaṃ hoti. ^b^Pāsādo^eb^ nāma āyatacaturassapāsādo. ^b^Hammiyaṃ^eb^ muṇḍacchadanakaṃ candikaṅgaṇayuttaṃ. ^b^Guhā^eb^ nāma kevalā pabbataguhā. ^b^Leṇaṃ^eb^ dvārabaddhaṃ pabbhāraṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. ^b^Maṇḍapo^eb^ti sākhāmaṇḍapo.

[03]^b^Vihārasenāsana^eb^nti patissayabhūtaṃ senāsanaṃ. ^b^Mañcapīṭhasenāsana^eb^nti mañcapīṭhañceva mañcapīṭhasambandhasenāsanañca. Cimilikādi santharitabbato ^b^santhatasenāsanaṃ.^eb^ Abhisaṅkharaṇābhāvato ^a^P1.0333^ea^ sayanassa nisajjāya ca kevalaṃ okāsabhūtaṃ senāsanaṃ. ‘‘Vivittaṃ senāsana’’nti iminā ^b^senāsanaggahaṇena saṅgahitameva^eb^ sāmaññajotanābhāvato.

[03]Yadi evaṃ kasmā ‘‘arañña’’ntiādi vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘ima panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgata’’^eb^nti idaṃ vinaye tathā āgatataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, abhidhammepi pana ‘‘araññanti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṃ arañña’’nti (vibha. 529) āgatameva. Tattha hi yaṃ na gāmapadesantogadhaṃ, taṃ ‘‘arañña’’nti nippariyāyavasena tathā vuttaṃ. Dhutaṅganiddese (visuddhi. 1.31) yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ,tasmā tattha vuttanayena gahetabbanti adhippāyo. ^b^Rukkhamūla^eb^nti rukkhasamīpaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘yāvatā ^a^M1.0257^ea^ majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni nipatanti, ettāvatā rukkhamūla’’nti. ^b^Sela^eb^-saddo avisesato pabbatapariyāyoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pabbatanti sela’’^eb^nti, na silāmayameva, paṃsumayādiko tividhopi pabbato evāti. ^b^Vivara^eb^nti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ mitho āsannatare ṭhitānaṃ ovarakādisadisaṃ vivaraṃ, ekasmiṃyeva vā pabbate. ^b^Umaṅgasadisa^eb^nti suduṅgāsadisaṃ. ^b^Manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhāna^eb^nti pakatisañcāravasena manussehi na sañcaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘vanapatthanti ^a^P1.0334^ea^ vanasaṇṭhānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, vanapatthanti bhīsanakānametaṃ, vanapatthanti salomahaṃsānametaṃ, vanapatthanti pariyantānametaṃ, vanapatthanti na manussūpacārānametaṃ, vanapatthanti durabhisambhavānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana’’nti (vibha. 531) imaṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Acchanna^eb^nti kenaci chadanena antamaso rukkhasākhāyapi na chāditaṃ. ^b^Nikkaḍḍhitvā^eb^ti nīharitvā. ^b^Pabbhāraleṇasadise^eb^ti pabbhārasadise leṇasadise ca.

[03]Piṇḍapātapariyesanaṃ piṇḍapāto uttarapadalopenāti āha ^b^‘‘piṇḍapātapariyesanato paṭikkanto’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0228^ea^. ^b^Pallaṅka^eb^nti ettha ^b^pari^eb^saddo ‘‘samantato’’ti etassa atthe, tasmā vāmoruñca dakkhiṇoruñca samaṃ ṭhapetvā ubho pāde aññamaññaṃ sambandhitvā nisajjā pallaṅkanti āha ^b^‘‘samantato ūrubaddhāsana’’^eb^nti. Ūrūnaṃ bandhanavasena nisajjā ^b^pallaṅkaṃ. Ābhujitvā^eb^ti ca yathā pallaṅkavasena nisajjā hoti, evaṃ ubho pāde ābhugge bhañjite katvā, taṃ pana ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ tathā sambandhatākaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘bandhitvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Heṭṭhimakāyassa ca anujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ nisajjāvacaneneva bodhitanti ‘‘ujuṃ kāya’’nti ettha kāya-saddo uparimakāyavisayoti āha ^b^‘‘uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. Taṃ pana ujukaṭhapanaṃ sarūpato, payojanato ca dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭhārasā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na paṇamantī^eb^ti na onamanti. ^b^Na paripatatī^eb^ti na vigacchati vīthiṃ na laṅgheti. Tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesappattiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^vuḍḍhiṃ phātiṃ vepullaṃ upagacchati^eb^. ^b^Parimukha^eb^nti ettha ^b^pari^eb^saddo abhi-saddena samānatthoti ^a^P1.0335^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānābhimukha’’^eb^nti, bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho. Samīpattho vā ^b^pari^eb^saddoti dassento ^b^‘‘mukhasamīpe vā katvā’’^eb^ti āha. Ettha ca yathā ‘‘vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatī’’tiādinā ^a^M1.0258^ea^ bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ ‘‘nisīdatī’’ti iminā alīnānuddhaccapakkhiyo santo iriyāpatho dassito. ‘‘Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā’’ti iminā nisajjāya daḷhabhāvo, ‘‘parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā’’ti iminā ārammaṇapariggahūpāyo. ^b^Parīti pariggahaṭṭho^eb^ ‘‘pariṇāyikā’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho^eb^ ‘‘suññatavimokkhamukha’’ntiādīsu viya. Paṭipakkhato niggamanaṭṭho hi niyyānaṭṭho, tasmā pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ paricattasammosaṃ ^b^satiṃ katvā,^eb^ paramaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho.

[03]^b^217^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhijjhāyati gijjhati abhikaṅkhati etāyāti ^b^abhijjhā,^eb^ lobho. ^b^Lujjanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti bhijjanaṭṭhena, khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^Vikkhambhanavasenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vikkhambhanaṃ^eb^ anuppādanaṃ appavattanaṃ, na paṭipakkhānaṃ suppahīnatā. ^b^‘‘Pahīnattā’’^eb^ti ca pahīnasadisataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ jhānassa anadhigatattā. Tathāpi nayidaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya sabhāvato vigatābhijjhaṃ, atha kho bhāvanāvasena, tenāha ^b^‘‘na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti yathā imassa cittassa bhāvanāya paribhāvitattā vigatābhijjhatā, evaṃ abyāpannaṃ vigatathinamiddhaṃ anuddhataṃ nibbicikicchañcāti attho. ^b^Purimapakati^eb^nti parisuddhapaṇḍarasabhāvaṃ. ‘‘Yā ^a^P1.0336^ea^ cittassa akalyatāti’’ādinā (dha. sa. 1162; vibha. 546) thinassa, ‘‘yā kāyassa akalyatā’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 1163; vibha. 546) ca middhassa abhidhamme niddiṭṭhattā ^a^V1.0229^ea^ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ, middhaṃ cetasikagelañña’’^eb^nti. Satipi aññamaññaṃ avippayoge cittakāyalahutādīnaṃ viya cittacetasikānaṃ yathākammaṃ taṃ taṃ visesassa yā tesaṃ akalyatādīnaṃ visesappaccayatā, ayametesaṃ sabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ālokasaññī^eb^ti ettha atisayatthavisiṭṭhātthi atthāvabodhako ayamīkāroti dassento āha ^b^‘‘rattimpi…pe… samannāgato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Idaṃ ubhaya^eb^nti satisampajaññamāha. ^b^Atikkamitvā^eb^ vikkhambhanavasena pajahitvā. ‘‘Kathamida’’nti pavattiyā kathaṅkathā, vicikicchā. Sā etassa atthīti kathaṅkathī, na kathaṅkathīti ^b^akathaṃkathī,^eb^ nibbicikiccho. ^b^Lakkhaṇādibhedato^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paccayapahānapahāyakādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tepi hi bhedato vattabbāti.

[03]^b^218^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tesa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0259^ea^ iṇavasena gahitadhanānaṃ. ^b^Pariyanto^eb^ti dātabbaseso. ^b^So balavapāmojjaṃ labhati^eb^ ‘‘iṇapalibodhato muttomhī’’ti. ^b^Somanassaṃ adhigacchati^eb^ ‘‘jīvikānimittaṃ atthī’’ti.

[03]^b^219^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Visabhāgavedanuppattiyā^eb^ti dukkhavedanuppattiyā. Dukkhavedanā hi sukhavedanāya kusalavipākasantānassa virodhitāya visabhāgā. ^b^Catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto^eb^ti ^a^P1.0337^ea^ catubbidhampi iriyāpathappavattiṃ pacchindanto. Byādhiko hi yathā ṭhānagamanesu asamattho, evaṃ nisajjādīsupi asamattho hoti. ^b^Ābādhetī^eb^ti pīḷeti. Vātādīnaṃ vikāro visamāvatthā byādhīti āha ^b^‘‘taṃsamuṭṭhānena dukkhena dukkhito’’^eb^ti. Dukkhavedanāya pana byādhibhāve mūlabyādhinā ^b^ābādhiko^eb^ ādito bādhatīti katvā. Anubandhabyādhinā ^b^dukkhito^eb^ aparāparaṃ sañjātadukkhoti katvā. ^b^Gilāno^eb^ti dhātusaṅkhayena parikkhīṇasarīro. Appamattakaṃ vā balaṃ ^b^balamattā. Tadubhaya^eb^nti pāmojjaṃ, somanassañca. Tattha ^b^labhetha pāmojjaṃ^eb^ ‘‘rogato muttomhī’’ti. ^b^Adhigaccheyya somanassaṃ^eb^ ‘‘atthi me kāye bala’’nti.

[03]^b^220^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sesa^eb^nti ‘‘tassa hi ‘bandhanā muttomhī’ti āvajjayato tadubhayaṃ hoti. Tena vutta’’nti evamādi. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti paṭhamadutiyapadesu vuttanayeneva. ^b^Sabbapadesū^eb^ti avasiṭṭhapadesu tatiyādīsu koṭṭhāsesu.

[03]^b^221-222^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na attani adhīno^eb^ti na attāyatto. ^b^Parādhīno^eb^ti parāyatto. Aparādhīnatāya bhujo viya attano kicce esitabboti ^b^bhujisso.^eb^ Savasoti āha ^b^‘‘attano santako’’^eb^ti. Anudakatāya kaṃ pānīyaṃ tārenti etthāti ^b^kantāro^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘nirudakaṃ dīghamagga’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^223^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatrā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0230^ea^ tasmiṃ dassane. ^b^Aya^eb^nti idāni vuccamānā ^b^sadisatā.^eb^ Yena iṇādīnaṃ upamābhāvo, kāmacchandādīnañca upameyyabhāvo hoti, so nesaṃ upamopameyyasambandho ^a^P1.0338^ea^ sadisatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Yo yamhi kāmacchandena rajjatī^eb^ti yo puggalo yamhi kāmarāgassa vatthubhūte puggale kāmacchandavasena ratto hoti. ^b^Taṃ vatthuṃ gaṇhātī^eb^ti taṃ taṇhāvatthuṃ ‘‘mameta’’nti gaṇhāti.
[03]^b^Upaddavethā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0260^ea^ upaddavaṃ karotha.
[03]^b^Nakkhattassā^eb^ti mahassa. ^b^Mutto^eb^ti bandhanato mutto.
[03]^b^Vinaye apakataññunā^eb^ti vinayakkame akusalena. So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ yāthāvato na jānāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kismiñcidevā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Gacchatipī^eb^ti thokaṃ thokaṃ gacchatipi. Gacchanto pana tāya eva ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitatāya tattha tattha ^b^tiṭṭhatipi.^eb^ Īdise kantāre gato ‘‘ko jānāti kiṃ bhavissatī’’ti ^b^nivattatipi,^eb^ tasmā ^b^gataṭṭhānato agataṭṭhānameva bahutaraṃ hoti. Saddhāya gaṇhituṃ^eb^ saddheyyaṃ vatthuṃ ‘‘idameva’’nti saddahituṃ ^b^na sakkoti. Atthi natthī^eb^ti ‘‘atthi nu kho, natthi nu kho’’ti. Araññaṃ paviṭṭhassa ādimhi eva sappanaṃ ^b^āsappanaṃ.^eb^ Pari parito, uparūpari vā sappanaṃ ^b^parisappanaṃ.^eb^ Ubhayenapi tattheva paribbhamanaṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apariyogāhana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Chambhitatta^eb^nti araññasaññāya uppannaṃ chambhitabhāvaṃ, utrāsanti attho.

[03]^b^224^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatrāyaṃ sadisatā^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayānusārena sadisatā veditabbā. Yadaggena hi kāmacchandādayo iṇādisadisā, tadaggena tesaṃ pahānaṃ āṇaṇyādisadisaṃ abhāvoti katvā. ^b^Cha dhamme^eb^ti asubhanimittassa uggaho, asubhabhāvanānuyogo, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme. ^b^Bhāvetvā^eb^ti brūhetvā. ^b^Mahāsatipaṭṭhāne^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.372-374) ^b^vaṇṇayissāma^eb^ tatthassa anuppannānuppādanauppannapahānādivibhāvanavasena savisesaṃ pāḷiyā āgatattā. Esa nayo ^a^P1.0339^ea^ byāpādādippahānakabhāvepi. ^b^Paravatthumhī^eb^ti ārammaṇabhūte parasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.

[03]^b^Anatthakaro^eb^ti attano parassa ca anatthāvaho. ^b^Cha dhamme^eb^ti mettānimittassa uggaho, mettābhāvanānuyogo ^a^V1.0231^ea^, kammassakatā, paṭisaṅkhānabahulatā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti mahāsatipaṭṭhāneyeva (dī. ni. 2.372-374). Cārittasīlaṃ uddissa paññattasikkhāpadaṃ ^b^ācārapaṇṇatti.^eb^

[03]Bandhanāgāraṃ ^a^M1.0261^ea^ pavesitattā aladdhanakkhattānubhavo puriso ^b^‘‘nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso’’^eb^ti vutto, nakkhattadivase eva vā tadananubhavanatthaṃ tathā kato. ^b^Mahāanatthakara^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikādiatthahāpanamukhena mahato anatthassa kārakaṃ. ^b^Cha dhamme^eb^ti atibhojane nanimittaggāho, iriyāpathasamparivattanatā, ālokasaññāmanasikāro, abbhokāsavāso, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme.

[03]Uddhaccakukkucce ^b^mahāanatthakara^eb^nti parāyattatāpādanato vuttanayena mahato anatthassa kārakanti. Attho ^b^cha dhamme^eb^ti bahussutatā, paripucchakatā, vinaye pakataññutā, vuḍḍhasevitā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme.

[03]^b^Balavā^eb^ti paccatthikavidhamanasamatthena balena balavā. ^b^Sajjāvudho^eb^ti sannaddhadhanuādiāvudho. Sūravīrasevakajanavasena ^b^saparivāro. Ta^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ purisaṃ. Balavantatāya, sajjāvudhatāya, saparivāratāya ca ^b^corā dūratova disvā palāyeyyuṃ. Anatthakārikā^eb^ti sammāpaṭipattiyā vibandhakaraṇato vuttanayena anatthakārikā. ^b^Cha dhamme^eb^ti bahussutatā, paripucchakatā, vinaye pakataññutā, adhimokkhabahulatā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ^a^P1.0340^ea^ ime cha dhamme. Yathā bāhusaccādīni uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti, evaṃ vicikicchāya pīti idhāpi bahussutatādayo gahitā. Kalyāṇamittatā sappāyakathā viya pañcannaṃ, tasmā tassa tassa anucchavikasevanatā veditabbā. Sammāpaṭipattiyā appaṭipattinimittatāmukhena vicikicchā micchāpaṭipattimeva paribrūhetīti tassā pahānaṃ duccaritavidhūnanūpāyoti āha ^b^‘‘duccaritakantāraṃ nittharitvā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^225^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāmojjaṃ^eb^ nāma taruṇapīti, sā kathañcipi tuṭṭhāvatthāti āha ^b^‘‘pāmojjaṃ jāyatīti tuṭṭhākāro jāyatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tuṭṭhassā^eb^ti okkantikabhāvappattāya pītiyā vasena tuṭṭhassa. Attano savipphārikatāya, attasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpuppattiyā ca ^b^sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā^eb^ pharaṇalakkhaṇā ^b^pīti jāyati.^eb^ Pītisahitaṃ pīti uttarapadalopena, kiṃ pana taṃ ^a^M1.0262^ea^? Mano. Pīti mano etassāti pītimano, tassa ^b^pītimanassa.^eb^ Tayidaṃ atthamattameva dassento ^b^‘‘pītisampayuttacittassā’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0232^ea^ āha. ^b^Kāyo^eb^ti idha arūpakalāpo adhippeto, na vedanādikkhandhattayamevāti āha ^b^‘‘nāmakāyo passambhatī’’^eb^ti, passaddhidvayassa pītivasenettha passambhanaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^Vigatadaratho^eb^ti pahīnauddhaccādikilesadaratho. Vuttappakārāya pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vasena cetasikasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentoyeva taṃsamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhasarīratāya kāyikampi sukhaṃ vedetīti āha ^b^‘‘kāyikampi cetasikampi sukhaṃ vedayatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī’’ti evaṃ vuttena. Saṃkilesapakkhato nikkhantattā, paṭhamajjhānapakkhikattā ca ^b^nekkhammasukhena. Sukhitassā^eb^ti sukhino.

[03]^b^226^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Cittaṃ ^a^P1.0341^ea^ samādhiyatī’’ti etena upacāravasenapi appanāvasenapi cittassa samādhānaṃ kathitaṃ. Evaṃ sante ‘‘so vivicceva kāmehī’’tiādikā desanā kimatthiyāti āha ^b^‘‘so vivicceva kāmehi…pe… vutta’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^uparivisesadassanattha^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānādiuparivattabbavisesadassanatthaṃ. Na hi upacārasamādhisamadhigamena vinā paṭhamajjhānādiviseso samadhigantuṃ sakkā. Pāmojjuppādādīhi kāraṇaparamparā dutiyajjhānādisamadhigamepi icchitabbāva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi viya dutiyamaggādisamadhigameti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Tassa samādhino^eb^ti ‘‘sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī’’ti evaṃ sādhāraṇavasena vutto yo appanālakkhaṇo, tassa samādhino. ^b^Pabhedadassanattha^eb^nti dutiyajjhānādivibhāgassa ceva abhiññādivibhāgassa ca pabhedadassanatthaṃ. Karo vuccati pupphasambhavaṃ gabbhāsaye karīyatīti katvā, karato jāto kāyo karajakāyo, tadupasanissayo catusantatirūpasamudāyo. Kāmaṃ nāmakāyopi vivekajena pītisukhena tathāladdhupakāro, ‘‘abhisandetī’’tiādivacanato pana rūpakāyo idhādhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘imaṃ karajakāya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Abhisandetī^eb^ti abhisandanaṃ karoti. Taṃ pana jhānamayena pītisukhena karajakāyassa tintabhāvāpādanaṃ, sabbatthakameva lūkhabhāvāpanayananti āha ^b^‘‘temetī’’^eb^tiādi, tayidaṃ abhisandanaṃ atthato yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi kāyassa parippharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Parisandetī’’^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sabbaṃ etassa atthīti sabbavā, tassa ^b^sabbāvato.^eb^ Avayavāvayavisambandhe avayavini sāmivacananti ^a^M1.0263^ea^ avayavīvisayo ^b^sabba^eb^-saddo, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbakoṭṭhāsavato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aphuṭaṃ^eb^^a^P1.0342^ea^^b^nāma na hoti^eb^ yattha yattha kammajarūpaṃ, tattha tattha cittajarūpassa abhibyāpanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘upādinnakasantatī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^227^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cheko^eb^ti ^a^V1.0233^ea^ kusalo. Taṃ panassa kosallaṃ nhāniyacuṇṇānaṃ sannane piṇḍīkaraṇe ca samatthatāvasena veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘paṭibalo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kaṃsa^eb^-saddo ‘‘mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā’’tiādīsu suvaṇṇe āgato.

[03]‘‘Kaṃso upahato yathā’’tiādīsu (dha. pa. 134) kittimalohe, katthaci paṇṇattimatte ‘‘upakaṃso nāma rājāpi mahākaṃsassa atrajo’’tiādi, [jā. aṭṭha. 4.10 ghaṭapaṇḍitajātakavaṇṇanāyaṃ (atthato samānaṃ)] idha pana yattha katthaci loheti āha ^b^‘‘yena kenaci lohena katabhājane’’^eb^ti. ^b^Snehānugatā^eb^ti ^b^udakasinehena^eb^ anupavisanavasena gatā upagatā. ^b^Snehaparetā^eb^ti udakasinehena parito gatā samantato phuṭṭhā, tato eva ^b^santarabāhirā^eb^ phuṭṭhā sinehena, etena sabbaso udakena temitabhāvamāha. ^b^‘‘Na ca paggharaṇī’’^eb^ti etena tintassapi tassa ghanathaddhabhāvaṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na ca binduṃ bindu’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^229^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tāhi tāhi udakasirāhi ubbhijjatīti ubbhidaṃ, ubbhidaṃ udakaṃ etassāti ^b^ubbhidodako. Ubbhinnaudako^eb^ti nadītīre khatakūpako viya ubbhijjanakaudako. ^b^Uggacchanakaudako^eb^ti dhārāvasena uṭṭhahanaudako. Kasmā panettha ubbhidodakova rahado gahito, na itaroti āha ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā uggacchanaudakañhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dhārānipātapubbuḷakehī^eb^ti ^a^P1.0343^ea^ dhārānipātehi udakapubbuḷakehi ca, ‘‘pheṇapaṭalehi cā’’ti vattabbaṃ. ^b^Sannisinnamevā^eb^ti aparikkhobhatāya niccalameva, suppasannamevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti ‘‘abhisandetī’’tiādikaṃ.

[03]^b^231^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uppalānī^eb^ti uppalagacchāni. ^b^Setarattanīlesū^eb^ti uppalesu, setuppalarattuppalanīluppalesūti attho. ^b^Yaṃ kiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva^eb^ sāmaññagahaṇato ^a^M1.0264^ea^. ^b^Satapatta^eb^nti ettha ^b^sata^eb^-saddo bahupariyāyo ‘‘satagghī’’tiādīsu viya, tena anekasatapattassapi saṅgaho siddho hoti. Loke pana ‘‘rattaṃ padumaṃ, setaṃ puṇḍarīka’’ntipi vuccati. Yāva aggā, yāva ca mūlā udakena abhisandanādisambhavadassanatthaṃ ^b^udakānuggataggahaṇaṃ.^eb^ Idha uppalādīni viya karajakāyo, udakaṃ viya tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ.

[03]^b^233^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā ^a^V1.0234^ea^ ‘‘parisuddhena cetasā’’ti catutthajjhānacittamāha, tañca rāgādiupakkilesāpagamanato nirupakkilesaṃ nimmalaṃ, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘nirupakkilesaṭṭhena parisuddha’’^eb^nti. Yasmā pana pārisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā suvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena pabhassaratā viya, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘pabhassaraṭṭhena pariyodātanti veditabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ida^eb^nti odātavacanaṃ. ^b^Utupharaṇattha^eb^nti uṇhautuno pharaṇadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Utupharaṇaṃ na hoti^eb^ savisesanti adhippāyo, tenāha ^b^‘‘taṅkhaṇa…pe… balavaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo^eb^ti yogino karajakāyo vatthaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo utupharaṇasadisena catutthajjhānasukhena pharitabbattā. Purisassa sarīraṃ viya catutthajjhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ utupharaṇaṭṭhāniyassa sukhassa nissayabhāvato, tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. Ettha ca ‘‘parisuddhena cetasā’’ti ceto gahaṇena jhānasukhaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘utupharaṇaṃ viya catutthajjhānasukha’’^eb^nti. Nanu ca catutthajjhāne sukhameva natthīti? Saccaṃ natthi sātalakkhaṇasantasabhāvattā panettha ^a^P1.0344^ea^ upekkhā ‘‘sukha’’nti adhippetā. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva bhāsitā’’ti. (Vibha. aṭṭha. 232; visuddhi. 2.644; paṭi. ma. 105, mahāni. aṭṭha. 27)

[03]^b^Na arūpajjhānalābhīti na veditabbo^eb^ avinābhāvato, tenāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^cuddasahākārehī^eb^ti kasiṇānulomato, kasiṇapaṭilomato, kasiṇānulomapaṭilomato, jhānānulomato, jhānapaṭilomato, jhānānulomapaṭilomato, jhānukkantikato, kasiṇukkantikato, jhānakasiṇukkantikato, aṅgasaṅkantito, ārammaṇasaṅkantito, aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantito, aṅgavavatthānato ^a^M1.0265^ea^, ārammaṇavavatthānatoti imehi cuddasahākārehi. Satipi jhānesu āvajjanādivasībhāve ayaṃ vasībhāvo abhiññānibbattane ekantena icchitabboti dassento āha ^b^‘‘na hi…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti. Svāyaṃ nayo arūpasamāpattīhi vinā na ijjhatīti tāyapettha avinābhāvo veditabbo. Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāḷiyaṃ na āruppajjhānāni āgatānīti? Visesato ca rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānapādakattā sabbābhiññānaṃ tadantogadhā katvā tāya desitā, na arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ idha anupayogato, tenāha ^b^‘‘arūpajjhānāni āharitvā kathetabbānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^234^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sesa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0235^ea^ ‘‘evaṃ samāhite citte’’tiādīsu vattabbaṃ. Ñeyyaṃ jānātīti ñāṇaṃ, taṃ pana ñeyyaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā passatīti dassanaṃ, ñāṇameva dassananti ñāṇadassanaṃ. Tayidaṃ ñāṇadassanapadaṃ sāsane aññattha ñāṇavisese nirūḷhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ atthuddhāravasena dassento ^b^‘‘ñāṇadassananti maggañāṇampi vuccatī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yasmā vipassanāñāṇaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhāre aniccādito jānāti, bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya paccakkhato ca te passati tasmā āha ^b^‘‘idha pana…pe… ñāṇadassananti vutta’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Abhinīharatī^eb^ti ^a^P1.0345^ea^ vuttanayena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgate tasmiṃ citte vipassanākkamena jāte vipassanābhimukhaṃ peseti, tenāha ^b^‘‘vipassanā…pe… karotī’’^eb^ti. Tadabhimukhabhāvo eva hissa tanninnatādikaratā. ^b^Vuttoyeva^eb^ brahmajāle. Odanakummāsehi upacīyatīti ^b^odanakummāsūpacayo. Aniccadhammo^eb^ti pabhaṅgutāya addhuvasabhāvo. ^b^Duggandhavighātatthāyā^eb^ti sarīre duggandhassa vigamāya. ^b^Ucchādanadhammo^eb^ti ucchādetabbatāsabhāvo. Ucchādanena hi sarīre sedagūthapittasemhādidhātukkhobhagarubhāvaduggandhānaṃ apagamo hoti. Mahāsambāhanaṃ mallādīnaṃ bāhuvaḍḍhanādiatthaṃ hotīti ^b^‘‘khuddakasambāhanenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Parimaddanadhammo^eb^ti parimadditabbatāsabhāvo. ^b^Bhijjati ceva vikirati cā^eb^ti aniccatāvasena bhijjati ca bhinnañca kiñci payojanaṃ asādhentaṃ vippakiṇṇañca hoti. ^b^Rūpī^eb^ti attano paccayabhūtena utuāhāralakkhaṇena rūpavāti ayamettha attho icchitoti āha ^b^‘‘chahi padehi samudayo kathito’’^eb^ti. Saṃsagge hi ayamīkāro. ^b^Saṇṭhānasampādanampi^eb^ tathārūparūpuppādaneneva hotīti ucchādanaparimaddanapadehipi ^a^M1.0266^ea^ samudayo kathitoti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ navahi yathārahaṃ kāye samudayavayadhammānupassitā dassitā. ^b^Nissitañca^eb^ chaṭṭhavatthunissitattā vipassanāñāṇassa. ^b^Paṭibaddhañca^eb^ tena vinā appavattanato, kāyasaññitānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato ca.

[03]^b^235^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suṭṭhu bhāti obhāsatīti ^b^subho,^eb^ pabhāsampattiyāpi maṇino bhaddatāti āha ^b^‘‘subhoti sundaro’’^eb^ti. Kuruvindajāti ādijātivisesopi maṇino ākaraparisuddhimūlako evāti āha ^b^‘‘parisuddhākarasamuṭṭhito’’^eb^ti dosanīharaṇavasena parikammanipphattīti āha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhu kataparikammo apanītapāsāṇasakkharo’’^eb^ti. Chaviyā saṇhabhāvenassa acchatā, na saṅghātassāti āha ^b^‘‘acchoti tanucchavī’’^eb^ti, tenāha ^a^P1.0346^ea^^b^‘‘vippasanno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhovanavedhanādīhī^eb^ti catūsu pāsāṇesu dhovanena ceva kāḷakādiapaharaṇatthāya suttena āvunanatthāya ca vijjhanena. Tāpasaṇhakaraṇādīnaṃ ^a^V1.0236^ea^ saṅgaho ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena. ^b^Vaṇṇasampatti^eb^nti suttassa vaṇṇasampattiṃ. ^b^Maṇi viya karajakāyo^eb^ paccavekkhitabbato. ^b^Āvutasuttaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ^eb^ anupavisitvā ṭhitattā. ^b^Cakkhumā puriso viya vipassanālābhī bhikkhu^eb^ sammadeva dassanato. ^b^Tadārammaṇāna^eb^nti rūpadhammārammaṇānaṃ. Phassapañcamakacittacetasikaggahaṇena gahitadhammāpi vipassanācittuppādapariyāpannā evāti veditabbaṃ. Evañhi tesaṃ vipassanāñāṇagatikattā ‘‘āvutasuttaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇa’’nti vacanaṃ avirodhitaṃ hoti. Kiṃ panete ñāṇassa āvi bhavanti, udāhu puggalassāti? Ñāṇassa. Tassa pana āvibhāvattā puggalassa āvibhūtā nāma honti. ^b^Ñāṇassā^eb^ti ca paccavekkhaṇāñāṇassa.

[03]Maggañāṇassa anantaraṃ, tasmā lokiyābhiññānaṃ parato chaṭṭhābhiññāya purato vattabbaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ santepī^eb^ti yadipāyaṃ ñāṇānupubbī, evaṃ santepi. ^b^Etassa antarāvāro natthī^eb^ti pañcasu lokiyābhiññāsu kathitāsu ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu (ma. ni. 1.65) viya chaṭṭhābhiññā kathetabbāti etassa anabhiññālakkhaṇassa vipassanāñāṇassa tāsaṃ antarāvāro na hoti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ tattha avasarābhāvato ^b^idheva^eb^ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānānantarameva ^a^M1.0267^ea^^b^dassitaṃ^eb^ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. ^b^Yasmā cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddo samuccayattho, tena na kevalaṃ tadeva, atha kho idampi kāraṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa idheva dassaneti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. ^b^Dibbena cakkhunā bheravampi rūpaṃ passato^eb^ti ettha ‘‘iddhividhañāṇena bheravaṃ rūpaṃ nimminitvā cakkhunā passato’’tipi vattabbaṃ, evampi abhiññālābhino apariññātavatthukassa bhayaṃ santāso uppajjati. Uccāvālikavāsi mahānāgattherassa viya. ^b^Pāṭiyekkaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha bhagavā –
[21]‘‘Yato ^a^P1.0347^ea^ yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ;
[22]Labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata’’ntiādi. (dha. pa. 374);

[03]^b^236-7^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Manena nibbattita^eb^nti abhiññāmanena nibbattitaṃ. Hatthapādādi ^b^aṅgehi ca^eb^ kapparajaṇṇuādi ^b^paccaṅgehi ca. Saṇṭhānavasenā^eb^ti kamaladalādisadisasaṇṭhānamattavasena, na rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādīndriyavasena. ^b^Sabbākārehī^eb^ti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānāvayavavisesādisabbākārehi. ^b^Tena^eb^ iddhimatā. ^b^Sadisabhāvadassanatthamevā^eb^ti saṇṭhānatopi vaṇṇatopi avayavavisesatopi sadisabhāvadassanatthameva. ^b^Sajātiyaṃ ṭhito,^eb^ na nāgiddhiyā aññajātirūpo.
[03]^b^239^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suparikammakatamattikādayo^eb^^a^V1.0237^ea^^b^viya iddhividhañāṇaṃ^eb^ vikubbanakiriyāya nissayabhāvato.
[03]^b^241^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sukha^eb^nti akicchena, akasirenāti attho.

[03]^b^243^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mando uttānaseyyakadārakopi ‘‘daharo’’ti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘yuvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yuvāpi koci anicchanako amaṇḍanajātiko hotīti tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘maṇḍanakajātiko’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘yuvāpīti’’^eb^ādi. Kāḷatilappamāṇā bindavo ^b^kāḷatilakāni kāḷā^eb^ vā kammāsā, tilappamāṇā bindavo ^b^tilakāni. Vaṅgaṃ^eb^ nāma viyaṅgaṃ. Yobbanapīḷakādayo ^b^mukhadūsipīḷakā^eb^. Mukhagato ^a^M1.0268^ea^ doso ^b^mukhadoso,^eb^ lakkhaṇavacanañcetaṃ mukhe adosassāpi pākaṭabhāvassa adhippetattā. Yathā vā mukhe doso, evaṃ mukhe adosopi mukhadoso saralopena. Mukhadoso ca mukhadoso ca ^b^mukhadoso^eb^ti ekasesanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi ‘‘paresaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī’’ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^245^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbenivāsañāṇūpamāya^eb^nti ^a^P1.0348^ea^ pubbenivāsañāṇassa dassitaupamāyaṃ. Taṃ divasaṃ katakiriyā nāma pākatikasattassapi yebhuyyena pākaṭā hotīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^taṃdivasa^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Taṃdivasagatagāmattaya^eb^-ggahaṇeneva mahābhinīhārehi aññesampi pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṃ tīsu bhavesu katakiriyā yebhuyyena pākaṭā hotīti dīpitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^247^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aparāparaṃ sañcarante^eb^ti taṃtaṃkiccavasena ito cito ca sañcarante. Yathāvutta^b^pāsādoviya bhikkhuno karajakāyo daṭṭhabbo^eb^ tattha patiṭṭhitassa daṭṭhabbadassanasiddhito. Cakkhumato hi dibbacakkhusamadhigamo. Yathāha ‘‘maṃsacakkhussa uppādo, maggo dibbassa cakkhuno’’ti (itivu. 61). ^b^Cakkhumā puriso viya ayameva dibbacakkhuṃ patvā ṭhito bhikkhu^eb^ daṭṭhabbassa dassanato. ^b^Gehaṃ pavisantā viya^eb^ etaṃ attabhāvagehaṃ okkamantā, upapajjantāti attho. ^b^Gehā nikkhamantā viya^eb^ etasmā attabhāvagehato pakkantā, cavantāti attho. Evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakasattā^eb^ti pana punappunaṃ saṃsāre paribbhamantā sattā. ^b^‘‘Tattha tattha nibbattasattā’’^eb^ti pana iminā tasmiṃ bhave jātasaṃvaddhe satte vadati. Nanu cāyaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇakathā, ettha kasmā ‘‘tīsu bhavesū’’ti catuvokārabhavassāpi saṅgaho katoti āha ^a^V1.0238^ea^^b^‘‘idañcā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^ida^eb^nti ‘‘tīsu bhavesu nibbattasattāna’’nti idaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Desanāsukhatthamevā^eb^ti kevalaṃ desanāsukhatthaṃ, na catuvokārabhave nibbattasattānaṃ dibbacakkhuno āvibhāvasabbhāvato. Na hi ‘‘ṭhapetvā arūpabhava’’nti vā ‘‘dvīsu ^a^P1.0349^ea^ bhavesū’’ti vā vuccamāne desanā sukhāvabodhā ca hotīti.

[03]^b^248^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vipassanāpādaka^eb^nti ^a^M1.0269^ea^ vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Vipassanā ca tividhā vipassakapuggalabhedena. Mahābodhisattānañhi paccekabodhisattānañca vipassanā cintāmayañāṇasaṃvaddhitā sayambhuñāṇabhūtā, itaresaṃ sutamayañāṇasaṃvaddhitā paropadesasambhūtā nāma. Sā ‘‘ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesarūpārūpajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā’’tiādinā anekadhā, arūpamukhavasena catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānañca aññataramukhavasena anekadhā ca visuddhimagge nānānayato vibhāvitā. Mahābodhisattānaṃ pana catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena pabhedagamanato nānānayaṃ sabbaññutañāṇasannissayassa ariyamaggañāṇassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pubbabhāgañāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentaṃ pariṇataṃ gacchantaṃ paramagambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumataraṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ hoti, yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ‘‘mahāvajirañāṇa’’nti vuccati. Yassa ca pavattivibhāgena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassappabhedassa pādakabhāvena samāpajjiyamānā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā devasikaṃ satthu vaḷañjanakasamāpattiyo vuccanti, svāyaṃ buddhānaṃ vipassanācāro ^b^paramatthamañjusāyaṃ^eb^ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.216) uddesato dassito. Atthikehi tato gahetabbo, idha pana sāvakānaṃ vipassanā adhippetā.

[03]^b^Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā^eb^ti āsavānaṃ khepanato samucchindanato āsavakkhayo, ariyamaggo, tattha ñāṇaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇaṃ, tadatthaṃ tenāha ^b^‘‘āsavānaṃ khayañāṇanibbattanatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Āsavā ettha khīyantīti ^b^āsavānaṃ khayo^eb^ nibbānaṃ. Khepeti pāpadhammeti ^b^khayo,^eb^ maggo. So pana pāpakkhayo āsavakkhayena vinā natthīti ‘‘khaye ñāṇa’’nti ettha khayaggahaṇena ^a^P1.0350^ea^ āsavakkhayo vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘khaye ñāṇa’’^eb^ntiādi. Samitapāpo samaṇoti katvā āsavānaṃ khīṇattā samaṇo nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotīti ettha phala’’^eb^nti. Āsavavaḍḍhiyā saṅkhāre vaḍḍhento visaṅkhārato suvidūravidūroti ‘‘ārā so āsavakkhayā’’ti ettha āsavakkhayapadaṃ visaṅkhārādhivacananti āha ^a^V1.0239^ea^^b^‘‘āsavakkhayāti ettha nibbānaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhaṅgo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0270^ea^ āsavānaṃ khaṇanirodho ‘‘āsavānaṃ khayo’’ti vuttoti yojanā.

[03]^b^‘‘Idaṃ dukkha’’^eb^nti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa tadā bhikkhuno paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Ettakaṃ dukkha’’^eb^nti tassa paricchijjaggahitabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Na ito bhiyyo’’^eb^ti tassa anavasesetvā gahitabhāvadassanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbampi dukkhasacca’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhenā^eb^ti sabhāvasaṅkhātassa lakkhaṇassa asammohato paṭivijjhanena, asammohapaṭivedhoti ca. Yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhasaccassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavatti, tenāha ^b^‘‘yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’’^eb^ti. Dukkhaṃ samudeti etasmāti dukkhasamudayo, taṇhāti āha ^b^‘‘tassa cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā^eb^ti yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma, ‘‘patvā’’ti ca tadubhayavato puggalassa patti tadubhayassa patti viyāti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Patvā^eb^ti vā pāpuṇanahetu. ^b^Appavattī^eb^ti appavattinimittaṃ, te vā nappavattanti etthāti ^b^appavatti,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti dukkhanirodhassa. ^b^Sampāpaka^eb^nti sacchikaraṇavasena sammadeva pāpakaṃ.

[03]^b^Kilesavasenā^eb^ti āsavasaṅkhātakilesavasena. Yasmā āsavānaṃ dukkhasaccapariyāyo tappariyāpannattā, sesasaccānañca taṃsamudayādipariyāyo atthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pariyāyato’’^eb^ti. Dassento saccānīti yojanā. Āsavānaṃyeva cettha gahaṇaṃ ‘‘āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā’’ti āraddhattā. Tathā hi ‘‘kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī’’tiādinā ^a^P1.0351^ea^ (dī. ni. 1.248; ma. ni. 1.433; ma. ni. 3.19) āsavavimuttisīseneva sabbakilesavimutti vuttā. ‘‘Idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajanātī’’tiādinā missakamaggo idha kathitoti ^b^‘‘saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathesī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Jānato passato’’^eb^ti iminā pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayā vuttā. ‘‘Vimuccatī’’ti iminā pahānābhisamayo vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘iminā maggakkhaṇaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Jānato passato’’^eb^ti vā hetuniddesoyaṃ. Jānanahetu dassanahetu kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatīti yojanā. Dhammānañhi samānakālikānampi paccayappaccayuppannatā sahajātakoṭiyā labbhatīti. Bhavāsavaggahaṇena cettha bhavarāgassa viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassāpi ^a^M1.0271^ea^ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Khīṇā jātītiādīhi^eb^ padehi. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇāñāṇassa. ^b^Bhūmi^eb^nti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]Yenādhippāyena ‘‘katamā panassā’’tiādinā codanā katā, taṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘na tāvassā’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^V1.0240^ea^. Tattha ^b^na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā^eb^ maggabhāvanāyāti adhippāyo. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘pubbeva khīṇattā’’^eb^ti. Na anāgatā assa jāti khīṇāti yojanā. ^b^Na anāgatā^eb^ti ca anāgatabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā lesena codeti, tenāha ^b^‘‘anāgate vāyāmābhāvato’’^eb^ti. Anāgataviseso panettha adhippeto, tassa ca khepane vāyāmopi labbhateva, tenāha ^b^‘‘yā pana maggassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekacatupañcavokārabhavesū^eb^ti bhavattayaggahaṇaṃ vuttanayena anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ jātiṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti khīṇāsavo bhikkhu.

[03]Brahmacariyavāso nāma ukkaṭṭhaniddesena maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanaṃ evāti āha ^b^‘‘parivuttha’’^eb^nti. Sammādiṭṭhiyā catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattamānāya sammāsaṅkappādīnampi dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇā pavatti, itarasaccesu ca ^a^P1.0352^ea^ nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādipavatti pākaṭā eva, tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasenā’’^eb^ti. Dukkhanirodhamaggesu pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanā yāvadeva samudayappahānatthāyāti āha ^b^‘‘tena tena maggena pahātabbakilesā pahīnā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itthattāyā^eb^ti ime pakārā itthaṃ, tabbhāvo itthattaṃ, tadatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo idhādhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāyā’’^eb^ti. Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, pariññādīsu ca pahānameva padhānaṃ tadatthattā itaresanti āha ^b^‘‘kilesakkhayabhāvāya vā’’^eb^ti. Pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Dutiyavikappe ^b^itthattāyā^eb^ti nissakke sampadānavacananti āha ^b^‘‘itthabhāvato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Apara^eb^nti anāgataṃ. ^b^Ime pana^eb^ carimakattabhāvasaṅkhātā ^b^pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti,^eb^ etena tesaṃ appatiṭṭhataṃ dasseti. Apariññāmūlikā hi patiṭṭhā. Yathāha ‘‘kabaḷīkāre ce bhikkhave āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi ^a^M1.0272^ea^ taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷha’’ntiādi. (Saṃ. ni. 2.64; kathā. 296; mahāni. 7) tenevāha ^b^‘‘chinnamūlakā rukkhā viyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^249^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pabbatamatthake^eb^ti pabbatasikhare. Tañhi yebhuyyena saṅkhittaṃ saṅkucitaṃ hotīti pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘pabbatasaṅkhepe’’ti vuttaṃ. Pabbatapariyāpanno vā padeso ^b^pabbatasaṅkhepo^eb^^a^P1.0353^ea^. ^b^Anāvilo^eb^ti akālusiyo, sā cassa anāvilatā kaddamābhāvena hotīti āha ^b^‘‘nikkaddamo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sippiyo^eb^ti suttiyo. ^b^Sambukā^eb^ti saṅkhalikā. ^b^Ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi^eb^ gāvīsu. ^b^Vijjamānāsū^eb^ti labbhamānāsu, itarā ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi ‘‘carantī’’ti vuccanti sahacaraṇanayena. ^b^Tiṭṭhantameva,^eb^ na pana kadācipi carantaṃ. ^b^Dvaya^eb^nti sippisambukaṃ, macchagumbanti idaṃ ubhayaṃ. ^b^Tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ^eb^ carantaṃ ^a^V1.0241^ea^ pīti adhippāyo. ^b^‘‘Itarañca dvaya’’^eb^nti ca yathāvuttameva sippisambukādidvayaṃ vadati. Tañhi caratīti. Kiṃ vā imāya sahacariyāya, yathālābhaggahaṇaṃ panettha daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakkharakathalassa hi vasena tiṭṭhantanti. Sippisambukassa macchagumbassa ca vasena tiṭṭhantampi carantaṃ pīti yojanā kātabbā.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ dasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇavibhāge, tesu vā ñāṇesu. Bhūmibhedato, kālabhedato, santānabhedato cāti ^b^sattavidhārammaṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. ‘‘Rūpāyatanamattamevā’’^eb^ti idaṃ tassa ñāṇassa abhinimmiyamāne manomaye kāye rūpāyatanamevārabbha pavattanato vuttaṃ, na tattha gandhāyataṃ ādīnaṃ abhāvato. Na hi rūpakalāpo gandhāyataṃ ādirahito atthi. Parinipphannameva nimmitarūpaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘parittapaccuppannabahiddhārammaṇa’’^eb^nti. Āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ nibbānārammaṇameva samānaṃ parittattikavasena appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, ajjhattattikavasena bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, atītattikavasena navattabbārammaṇañca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘appamāṇabahiddhānavattabbārammaṇa’’^eb^nti. Kūṭo ^a^P1.0354^ea^ viya kūṭāgārassa bhagavato desanāya arahattaṃ uttamaṅgabhūtanti āha ^b^‘‘arahattanikūṭenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesī^eb^ti titthakaramataharavibhāviniṃ nānāvidhakuhanalapanādimicchājīvaviddhaṃsiniṃ tividhasīlālaṅkataṃ paramasallekhapaṭipattidīpaniṃ jhānābhiññādiuttarimanussadhammavibhūsitaṃ cuddasavidhamahāsāmaññaphalapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
[03]^b^250^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ādimajjhapariyosāna^eb^nti ^a^M1.0273^ea^ ādiñca majjhañca pariyosānañca. ^b^Sakkaccaṃ^eb^ sagāravaṃ. ^b^Āraddhaṃ^eb^ dhammasaṅgāhakehi.

[03]^b^Abhikkantā^eb^ vigatāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘khaye dissatī’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi ‘‘nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo’’ti upari vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhikkantataro^eb^ti ativiya kantataro manoramo, tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sundare dissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ko^eb^ti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko katamo. ^b^Me^eb^ti mama. ^b^Pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^Iddhiyā^eb^ti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. ^b^Yasasā^eb^ti iminā edisena parivārena, parijanena ca. ^b^Jala^eb^nti vijjotamāno. ^b^Abhikkantenā^eb^ti ativiya kantena kamanīyena abhirūpena. ^b^Vaṇṇenā^eb^ti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya ^a^V1.0242^ea^. ^b^Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā^eb^ti dasapi disā pabhāsento cando viya, sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho. ^b^Abhirūpe^eb^ti uḷārarūpe sampannarūpe.

[03]‘‘Coro coro, sappo sappo’’tiādīsu ^b^bhaye āmeḍitaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘vijjha vijjha, pahara paharā’’tiādīsu ^b^kodhe,^eb^ ‘‘sādhu sādhūtiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.327; saṃ. ni. 2.127; 3.35; 5.1005) ^b^pasaṃsāyaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘gaccha gaccha, lunāhi lunāhī’’tiādīsu ^b^turite,^eb^ ‘‘āgaccha āgacchā’’tiādīsu ^b^kotūhale,^eb^ ‘‘buddho buddhoti cintento’’tiādīsu (bu. vaṃ. 44) ^b^acchare^eb^^a^P1.0355^ea^, ‘‘abhikkamathāyasmanto abhikkamathāyasmanto’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 3.20; a. ni. 9.11) ^b^hāse,^eb^ ‘‘kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtakā’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 2.63) ^b^soke,^eb^ ‘‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’’ntiādīsu (udā. 20; dī. ni. 3.305; cūḷava. 332) ^b^pasāde. Ca^eb^-saddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena garahāasammānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha ‘‘pāpo pāpo’’tiādīsu ^b^garahāyaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘abhirūpaka abhirūpakā’’tiādīsu ^b^asammāne^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Nayidaṃ āmeḍitavasena dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho atthadvayavasenāti dassento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha ‘‘abhikkanta’’nti vacanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammassa desanāti katvā ^a^M1.0274^ea^ tathā vuttaṃ. Atthamattadassanaṃ vā etaṃ, tasmā atthavasenettha liṅgavibhattipariṇāmo veditabbo. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^Dosanāsanato^eb^ti rāgādikilesavidhamanato. ^b^Guṇādhigamanato^eb^ti sīlādiguṇānaṃ sampādanato. Ye guṇe desanā adhigameti, tesu padhānabhūtā dassetabbāti te padhānabhūte tāva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘saddhājananato paññājananato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Saddhāpamukhā hi lokiyā guṇā paññāpamukhā lokuttarā. Sīlādiatthasampattiyā ^b^sātthato.^eb^ Sabhāvaniruttisampattiyā ^b^sabyañjanato.^eb^ Suviññeyyasaddapayogatāya ^b^uttānapadato.^eb^ Saṇhasukhumabhāvena dubbiññeyyatthatāya ^b^gambhīratthato.^eb^ Siniddhamudumadhurasaddapayogatāya ^b^kaṇṇasukhato.^eb^ Vipulavisuddhapemanīyatthatāya ^b^hadayaṅgamato. ^eb^ Mānātimānavidhamanena ^b^anattukkaṃsanato.^eb^ Thambhasārambhanimmaddanena ^b^aparavambhanato.^eb^ Hitādhippāyappavattiyā, paresaṃ rāgapariḷāhādivūpagamanena ^a^P1.0356^ea^ ca ^b^karuṇāsītalato.^eb^ Kilesandhakāravidhamanena ^b^paññāvadātato.^eb^ Karavīkarutamañjutāya ^b^āpātharamaṇīyato.^eb^ Pubbāparāviruddhasuvisuddhatāya ^b^vimaddakkhamato.^eb^ Āpātharamaṇīyatāya eva ^b^suyyamānasukhato. ^eb^ Vimaddakkhamatāya, hitajjhāsayappavattitāya ca ^b^vīmaṃsiyamānahitato. Evamādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṃsāracakkanivattanato saddhammacakkappavattanato, micchāvādaviddhaṃsanato sammāvādapatiṭṭhāpanato, akusalamūlasamuddharaṇato ^a^V1.0243^ea^ kusalamūlasaṃropanato, apāyadvārapidhānato saggamaggadvāravivaraṇato, pariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanato anusayasamugghāṭanatoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Adhomukhaṭṭhapita^eb^nti kenaci adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhāmukhajāta^eb^nti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^Ugghāṭeyyā^eb^ti vivaṭaṃ kareyya. ^b^Hatthe gahetvā^eb^ ‘‘puratthābhimukho, uttarābhimukho vā gacchā’’tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā nissandehaṃ katvā. ‘‘Esa maggo, evaṃ gacchā’’ti dasseyya. ^b^Kāḷapakkhacātuddasī^eb^ti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī. ^b^Nikkujjitaṃ^eb^ ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ^b^ukkujjeyya. ^eb^ Aññāṇassa abhimukhattā heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya ^b^saddhammavimukhaṃ^eb^ adhomukhaṭṭhapitatāya ^b^asaddhamme patita^eb^nti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. Kāmaṃ kāmacchandādayo paṭicchādakā nīvaraṇabhāvato, micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā satte micchābhinivesanavasenāti āha ^a^M1.0275^ea^^b^‘‘micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna’’^eb^nti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ ^a^P1.0357^ea^ bhikkhave vajjaṃ vadāmī’’ti. Sabbo apāyagāmimaggo ^b^kummaggo^eb^ kucchito maggoti katvā. Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggā. Teneva hi tadubhayapaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sappiādisannissayo padīpo na tathā ujjalo, yathā telasannissayoti ^b^telapajjota^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Etehi pariyāyehī^eb^ti etehi nikkujjitukkujjanapaṭicchannavivaraṇādiupamopamitabbappakārehi, etehi vā yathāvuttehi nānāvidhakuhanalapanādimicchājīvavividhamanādivibhāvanapariyāyehi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pasannakāra^eb^nti pasannehi kātabbaṃ sakkāraṃ. ^b^Saraṇa^eb^nti paṭisaraṇaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘parāyaṇa’’^eb^nti. Parāyaṇabhāvo ca anatthanisedhanena, atthasampaṭipādanena ca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘aghassa tātā, hitassa ca vidhātā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aghassā^eb^ti dukkhatoti vadanti, pāpatoti pana attho yutto, nissakke cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Ettha ca nāyaṃ ^b^gamu^eb^-saddo nī-saddādayo viya dvikammako, tasmā yathā ‘‘ajaṃ gāmaṃ netī’’ti vuccati, evaṃ ‘‘bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī’’ti vattuṃ na sakkā, ‘‘saraṇanti gacchāmī’’ti pana vattabbaṃ. Iti-saddo cettha luttaniddiṭṭho. Tassa cāyamattho. Gamanañca tadadhippāyena bhajanaṃ jānanaṃ vāti dassento ^b^‘‘iminā adhippāyenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^‘‘bhajāmī’’^eb^tiādīsu purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ atthavacanaṃ, ^b^bhajanaṃ^eb^ vā saraṇādhippāyena upasaṅkamanaṃ, ^b^sevanaṃ^eb^ santikāvacaratā, ^b^payirupāsanaṃ^eb^ vattapaṭivattakaraṇena upaṭṭhānanti ^a^V1.0244^ea^ evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasaraṇataṃyeva dīpeti. ^b^‘‘Gacchāmī’’^eb^ti ^a^P1.0358^ea^ padassa bujjhāmīti ayamattho kathaṃ labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘yesañhī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^‘‘Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe’’^eb^ti padadvayenāpi phalaṭṭhā eva dassitā, na maggaṭṭhāti te dassento ^b^‘‘yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nanu ca kalyāṇaputhujjanopi ‘‘yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjatī’’ti vuccatīti? Kiñcāpi vuccati, nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā eva tathā vattabbā, na itaro niyāmokkamanābhāvato. Tathā hi te eva vuttā ^b^‘‘apāyesu apatamāne dhāretī’’^eb^ti. Sammattaniyāmokkamanena hi apāyavinimuttasambhavo ^a^M1.0276^ea^. ^b^Akkhāyatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, tena ‘‘yāvatā bhikkhave dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggaṃ akkhāyatī’’ti (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34) suttapadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, ^b^‘‘vitthāro’’^eb^ti vā iminā. Ettha ca ^b^ariyamaggo^eb^ niyyānikatāya, ^b^nibbānaṃ^eb^ tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti ubhayameva nippariyāyena ‘‘dhammo’’ti vutto. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ labhitvā ariyamaggassa tadatthasiddhi. Tathāpi yasmā ariyaphalānaṃ ‘‘tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā’’tiādi vacanato maggena samucchinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭipassaddhippahānakiccatāya, niyyānānuguṇatāya, niyyānapariyosānatāya ca, pariyattidhammassa pana ‘‘niyyānadhammassa samadhigamanahetutāyā’’ti iminā pariyāyena vuttanayena dhammabhāvo labbhati eva. Svāyamattho pāṭhārūḷho evāti dassento ^b^‘‘na kevala’’^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03]‘‘Kāmarāgo bhavarāgo’’ti evamādi bhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati etenāti ^b^rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito.^eb^ Ejāsaṅkhātāya ^a^P1.0359^ea^ taṇhāya, antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa sokassa ca taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā ^b^anejaṃ asokanti phalaṃ kathitaṃ. Appaṭikūla^eb^nti avirodhadīpanato kenaci aviruddhaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ paṇītanti vā attho. Paguṇarūpena pavattitattā, pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato vā ^b^paguṇaṃ.^eb^ Yathāha ‘‘vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ, dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme’’ti. (Ma. ni. 1.283; ma. ni. 2.339; mahāva. 9) sabbadhammakkhandhā kathitāti yojanā.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenā^eb^ti ‘‘yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.324; ma. ni. 4.92; 3.54) evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā, ‘‘yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni ^a^V1.0245^ea^, tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.323; ma. ni. 1.492; 3.54; a. ni. 6.11; pari. 274) evaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññenāti attho. ^b^Saṃhato^eb^ti ghaṭito, sametoti attho. Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatā eva ^a^M1.0277^ea^. ^b^Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te^eb^ti te purisayugavasena cattāropi puggalavasena aṭṭheva ariyadhammassa paccakkhadassāvitāya dhammadasā. Tīṇi vatthūni ‘‘saraṇa’’nti gamanena, tikkhattuṃ gamanena ca ^b^tīṇi saraṇagamanāni. Paṭivedesī^eb^ti attano hadayagataṃ vācāya pavedesi.

[03]Saraṇagamanassa visayappabhedaphalasaṃkilesabhedānaṃ ^a^P1.0360^ea^ viya kattu ca vibhāvanā tattha kosallāya hotīti ^b^‘‘saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ…pe… veditabbo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ tena vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato. Kasmā panettha vodānaṃ na gahitaṃ, nanu vodānavibhāvanāpi tattha kosallāvahāti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇeneva atthato dīpitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ. Yāni hi nesaṃ saṃkilesakāraṇāni aññāṇādīni, tesaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ anuppannānaṃ anuppādanena, uppannānañca pahānena vodānaṃ hotīti. Hiṃsatthassa sara-saddassa vasenetaṃ padaṃ daṭṭhabbanti ‘‘hiṃsatīti saraṇa’’nti vatvā taṃ pana hiṃsanaṃ kesaṃ kathaṃ kassa vāti codanaṃ sodhento ^b^‘‘saraṇagatāna’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^bhaya^eb^nti vaṭṭabhayaṃ. ^b^Santāsa^eb^nti cittutrāsaṃ teneva cetasikadukkhassa gahitattā. ^b^Dukkha^eb^nti kāyikadukkhaṃ. ^b^Duggatiparikilesa^eb^nti duggatipariyāpannaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ, tayidaṃ sabbaṃ parato phalakathāyaṃ āvibhavissati. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘saraṇa’’nti padaṃ.

[03]Evaṃ avisesato saraṇa-saddassa atthaṃ dassetvā idāni visesato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Hite pavattanenā^eb^ti ‘‘sampannasīlā bhikkhave viharathā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.64, 69) atthe niyojanena. ^b^Ahitā ca nivattanenā^eb^ti. ‘‘Pāṇātipātassa kho pāpako vipāko, pāpakaṃ abhisamparāya’’ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena anatthato nivattanena. ^b^Bhayaṃ hiṃsatī^eb^ti hitāhitesu appavattipavattihetukaṃ byasanaṃ appavattikaraṇena vināseti. Bhavakantārā uttāraṇena maggasaṅkhāto dhammo, itaro assāsadānena sattānaṃ ^a^P1.0361^ea^ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti yojanā. ^b^Kārāna^eb^nti dānavasena pūjāvasena ca upanītānaṃ sakkārānaṃ. Vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti yojanā, anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvatoti ^a^M1.0278^ea^ adhippāyo. ^b^Imināpi pariyāyenā^eb^ti imināpi vibhajitvā vuttena kāraṇena.

[03]‘‘Sammāsambuddho ^a^V1.0246^ea^ bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti evaṃ pavatto tattha ratanattaye pasādo tappasādo, tadeva ratanattayaṃ garu etassāti taggaru tabbhāvo taggarutā, tappasādo ca taggarutā ca tappasādataggarutā, tāhi ^b^tappasādataggarutāhi.^eb^ Vidhūtadiṭṭhivicikicchāsammohāssaddhiyāditāya ^b^vihatakileso.^eb^ Tadeva ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ parāgati tāṇaṃ leṇanti evaṃ pavattiyā ^b^tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṃ^eb^ saraṇaṃ gacchati etenāti. ^b^Taṃsamaṅgī^eb^ti tena yathāvuttacittuppādena samannāgato. ^b^Evaṃ upetī^eb^ti bhajati sevati payirupāsati, evaṃ vā jānāti bujjhatīti evamattho veditabbo. Ettha ca ^b^pasāda^eb^-ggahaṇena lokiyasaraṇagamanamāha. Tañhi pasādappadhānaṃ. ^b^Garutā^eb^gahaṇena lokuttaraṃ. Ariyā hi ratanattayaṃ guṇābhiññatāya pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ katvā passanti. Tasmā tappasādena vikkhambhanavasena vigatakileso, taggarutāya samucchedavasenāti yojetabbaṃ agāravakaraṇahetūnaṃ samucchindanato. Tapparāyaṇatā panettha taggatikatāti tāya catubbidhampi vakkhamānaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avisesena ^a^P1.0362^ea^ vā pasādagarutā jotitāti ^b^pasāda^eb^ggahaṇena aveccappasādassa itarassa ca gahaṇaṃ, tathā ^b^garutā^eb^gahaṇenāti ubhayenāpi ubhayaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ yojetabbaṃ.

[03]Maggakkhaṇe ijjhatīti yojanā. ^b^‘‘Nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā’’^eb^ti etena atthato catusaccādhigamo eva lokuttarasaraṇagamananti dasseti. Tattha hi nibbānadhammo sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena, maggadhammo bhāvanābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhiyamānoyeva saraṇagamanatthaṃ sādheti. Buddhaguṇā pana sāvakagocarabhūtā pariññābhisamayavasena, tathā ariyasaṅghaguṇā, tenāha ^b^‘‘kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatī’’^eb^ti. Ijjhantañca saheva ijjhati, na lokiyaṃ viya patipāṭiyā asammohapaṭivedhena paṭividdhattāti adhippāyo. Ye pana vadanti ‘‘na saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā pavattati. Maggassa adhigatattā pana adhigatameva hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ lokiyavijjādayo viyā’’ti, tesaṃ lokiyameva saraṇagamanaṃ siyā, na lokuttaraṃ, tañca ayuttaṃ duvidhassāpi icchitabbattā.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti ^a^M1.0279^ea^ lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ. ^b^Saddhāpaṭilābho^eb^ ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā’’tiādinā. ^b^Saddhāmūlikā^eb^ti yathāvuttasaddhāpubbaṅgamā sammādiṭṭhiti buddhasubuddhataṃ, dhammasudhammataṃ, saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca lokiyāvabodhavaseneva sammā ñāyena dassanato. ^b^‘‘Saddhāmūlikā sammādiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti etena saddhūpanissayā yathāvuttalakkhaṇā paññā lokiyasaraṇagamananti dasseti, tenāha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhijukammanti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Diṭṭhi eva attano paccayehi uju karīyatīti katvā diṭṭhi vā uju karīyati etenāti ^b^diṭṭhijukammaṃ,^eb^ tathā pavatto cittuppādo.
