Evañca katvā ‘‘tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto ^a^V1.0247^ea^ cittuppādo’’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Saddhāpubbaṅgamasammādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ pana cittuppādassa ^a^P1.0363^ea^ tappadhānatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Saddhāpaṭilābho’’^eb^ti iminā mātādīhi ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ viya ñāṇavippayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ dasseti, ^b^‘‘sammādiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti iminā ñāṇasampayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ. ^b^Tayidaṃ^eb^ lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ. Attā sanniyyātīyati appīyati pariccajīyati etenāti ^b^attasanniyyātanaṃ,^eb^ yathāvuttaṃ diṭṭhijukammaṃ. Taṃ ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ etassāti tapparāyaṇo, puggalo, cittuppādo vā. Tassa bhāvo ^b^tapparāyaṇatā,^eb^ yathāvuttaṃ diṭṭhijukammameva. ‘‘Saraṇa’’nti adhippāyena sissabhāvaṃ antevāsikabhāvaṃ upagacchati etenāti ^b^sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ.^eb^ Saraṇagamanādhippāyeneva paṇipatati etenāti ^b^paṇipāto.^eb^ Sabbattha yathāvuttadiṭṭhijukammavaseneva attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Attapariccajana^eb^nti saṃsāradukkhanittharaṇatthaṃ attano attabhāvassa pariccajanaṃ. Eseva nayo sesesupi. ^b^Buddhādīnaṃ yevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ attasanniyyātanādīsupi tattha tattha vattabbaṃ. Evañhi tadaññanivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.

[03]Evaṃ attasanniyyātanādīni ekena pakārena dassetvā idāni aparehipi pakārehi dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ, tena pariyāyantarehipi attasanniyyātanādi katameva hoti atthassa abhinnattāti dasseti. ^b^Āḷavakādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sātāgirahemavatādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nanu cete āḷavakādayo maggeneva āgatasaraṇagamanā, kathaṃ tesaṃ tapparāyaṇatāsaraṇagamanaṃ vuttanti? Maggenāgatasaraṇagamanehipi. ‘‘So ahaṃ vicarissāmi…pe… sudhammataṃ’’ (saṃ. ni. 1.246; su. ni. 194) ‘‘te mayaṃ vicarissāma ^a^M1.0280^ea^, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ…pe… sudhammata’’nti, (su. ni. 182) tehi ^a^P1.0364^ea^ tapparāyaṇatākārassa paveditattā tathā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^So panesa ñāti…pe… vasenā^eb^ti ettha ñātivasena, bhayavasena, ācariyavasena, dakkhiṇeyyavasenāti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tattha ^b^ñātivasenā^eb^ti ñātibhāvavasena. Evaṃ sesesupi. ^b^Dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātenā^eb^ti dakkhiṇeyyatāhetukena paṇipātena. ^b^Itarehī^eb^ti ñātibhāvādivasappavattehi tīhi paṇipātehi. ‘‘Itarehī’’tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vandatī^eb^ti paṇipātassa lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikaṃ sandhāya vadati. Samparāyikañhi niyyānikaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ paccāsisanto dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva karotīti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^Saraṇagamanappabhedo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0248^ea^ saraṇagamanavibhāgo.

[03]Ariyamaggo eva lokuttaraṃ saraṇagamananti ^b^‘‘cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphala’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbadukkhakkhayo^eb^ti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa anuppādanirodho. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘cattāri ariyasaccāni, sammappaññāya passatī’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ariyasaccassa dassanaṃ.

[03]^b^Niccādito anupagamanādivasenā^eb^ti ‘‘nicca’’nti aggahaṇādivasena. ^b^Aṭṭhāna^eb^nti hetupaṭikkhepo. ^b^Anavakāso^eb^ti paccayapaṭikkhepo. Ubhayenāpi kāraṇameva paṭikkhipati. ^b^Ya^eb^nti yena kāraṇena. ^b^Diṭṭhisampanno^eb^ti maggadiṭṭhiyā samannāgato sotāpanno. ^b^Kañci saṅkhāra^eb^nti catubhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārampi. ^b^Niccato upagaccheyyā^eb^ti ‘‘nicco’’ti gaṇheyya. ^b^‘‘Sukhato upagaccheyyā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.76) evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena sukhato gāhaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ^a^P1.0365^ea^. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako pariḷāhavūpasamanatthaṃ mattahatthiparittāsito viya cokkhabrāhmaṇo ukkārabhūmiṃ ^b^kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagacchati.^eb^ Attavāre kasiṇādipaññattisaṅgahatthaṃ ‘‘saṅkhāra’’nti avatvā ^b^‘‘kañci dhamma’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Imesupi vāresu catubhūmakavaseneva paricchedo veditabbo, tebhūmakavaseneva vā. Yaṃ yañhi puthujjano gāhavasena gaṇhāti, tato tato ariyasāvako gāhaṃ viniveṭheti.

[03]^b^‘‘Mātara’’^eb^ntiādīsu ^a^M1.0281^ea^ janikā ^b^mātā,^eb^ janako ^b^pitā,^eb^ manussabhūto khīṇāsavo ^b^arahā^eb^ti adhippeto. Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti? Etampi aṭṭhānaṃ, puthujjanabhāvassa pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ, ariyasāvakassa ca phaladassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Duṭṭhacitto^eb^ti vadhakacittena paduṭṭhacitto. ^b^Lohitaṃ uppādeyyā^eb^ti jīvamānakasarīre khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya. ^b^Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyā^eb^ti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ saṅghaṃ. ‘‘Kammena, uddesena, voharanto, anussāvanena, salākaggāhenā’’ti (pari. 458) evaṃ vuttehi pañcahi kāraṇehi bhindeyya. ^b^Aññaṃ satthāra^eb^nti aññaṃ titthakaraṃ ‘‘ayaṃ me satthā’’ti evaṃ gaṇheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti attho. ^b^Na te gamissanti apāyabhūmi^eb^nti te buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā taṃnimittaṃ apāyaṃ na gamissanti, devakāyaṃ pana paripūressantīti attho.

[03]^b^Dasahi ṭhānehī^eb^ti dasahi kāraṇehi. ^b^Adhigaṇhantī^eb^ti abhibhavanti. ^b^Velāmasuttādivasenāpī^eb^ti ettha karīsassa catutthabhāgappamāṇānaṃ caturāsītisahassasaṅkhyānaṃ suvaṇṇapātirūpiyapātikaṃsapātīnaṃ ^a^V1.0249^ea^ yathākkamaṃ rūpiyasuvaṇṇahiraññapūrānaṃ, sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ caturāsītiyā ^a^P1.0366^ea^ hatthisahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā dhenusahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā kaññāsahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṃ, aparimāṇassa ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa āhārassa pariccajanavasena sattamāsādhikāni sattasaṃvaccharāni nirantaraṃ pavattavelāmamahādānato ekassa sotāpannassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ, tato sataṃ sotāpannānaṃ dinnadānato ekassa sakadāgāmino, tato ekassa anāgāmino, tato ekassa arahato, tato ekassa paccekabuddhassa, tato sammāsambuddhassa, tato buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ, tato cātuddisasaṅghaṃ uddissa vihārakaraṇaṃ, tato saraṇagamanaṃ mahapphalataranti imamatthaṃ pakāsentassa velāmasuttassa (a. ni. 9.20) vasena. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘yaṃ gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ, yo cekaṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ bhojeyya, idaṃ tato mahapphalatara’’ntiādi ^a^M1.0282^ea^ (a. ni. 9.20). ^b^Velāmasuttādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^saddena aggappasādasuttādīnaṃ (a. ni. 4.34; itivu. 90) saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Aññāṇaṃ^eb^ vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ ajānanaṃ, tattha sammoho. ‘‘Buddho nu kho, na nu kho’’tiādinā vicikicchā ^b^saṃsayo. Micchāñāṇaṃ^eb^ tassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena viparītaggāho. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena anādarāgāravādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Na mahājutika^eb^nti na ujjalaṃ, aparisuddhaṃ apariyodātanti attho. ^b^Na mahāvipphāra^eb^nti anuḷāraṃ. ^b^Sāvajjo^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhādivasena sadoso, lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ viya aggahitakālaparicchedaṃ jīvitapariyantameva hoti, tasmā tassa khandhabhedena bhedoti āha ^b^‘‘anavajjo kālakiriyāyā’’^eb^ti. Soti anavajjo saraṇagamanabhedo. Satipi anavajjatte iṭṭhaphalopi na ^a^P1.0367^ea^ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘aphalo’’^eb^ti. Kasmā? ^b^Avipākattā.^eb^ Na hi taṃ akusalanti.

[03]^b^Ko upāsako^eb^ti sarūpapucchā, kiṃlakkhaṇo upāsakoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Kasmā^eb^ti hetupucchā, tena kena pavattinimittena upāsaka-saddo tasmiṃ puggale nirūḷhoti dasseti, tenāha ^b^‘‘kasmā upāsakoti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Saddassa abhidheyye pavattinimittaṃ tadatthassa tabbhāvakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Kimassa sīla^eb^nti kīdisaṃ assa upāsakassa sīlaṃ, kittakena sīlenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma hotīti attho. ^b^Ko ājīvo^eb^ti ko assa sammāājīvo, so pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena hotīti sopi vibhajīyati. ^b^Kā vipattī^eb^ti kā assa sīlassa, ājīvassa ^a^V1.0250^ea^ vā vipatti. Anantarassa hi vidhi vā paṭisedho vā. ^b^Sampattī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
[03]^b^Yo kocī^eb^ti khattiyādīsu yo koci, tena saraṇagamanaṃ evaṃ kāraṇaṃ, na jāti ādivisesoti dasseti.
[03]^b^Upāsanato^eb^ti teneva saraṇagamanena, tattha ca sakkaccakiriyāya ādara gāravabahumānādiyogena payirupāsanato.

[03]^b^Veramaṇiyo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0283^ea^ veraṃ vuccati pāṇātipātādidussīlyaṃ, tassa maṇanato hananato vināsanato veramaṇiyo, pañca viratiyo viratipadhānattā tassa sīlassa, tenevāha ^b^‘‘paṭivirato hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Micchāvaṇijjā^eb^ti na sammāvaṇijjā ayuttavaṇijjā asāruppavaṇijjā. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti akaraṇeneva pajahitvā. ^b^Dhammenā^eb^ti dhammato anapetena, tena aññampi adhammikaṃ jīvikaṃ paṭikkhipati. ^b^Samenā^eb^ti avisamena, tena kāyavisaṃ ādiduccaritaṃ vajjetvā kāyasamādinā sucaritena jīvikaṃ dasseti. ^b^Satthavaṇijjā^eb^ti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā ^a^P1.0368^ea^ vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ vā paṭilabhitvā tassa vikkayo. ^b^Sattavaṇijjā^eb^ti manussavikkayo. ^b^Maṃsavaṇijjā^eb^ti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo. ^b^Majjavaṇijjā^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa vikkayo. ^b^Visavaṇijjā^eb^ti visaṃ yojetvā vā visaṃ gahetvā vā tassa vikkayo. Tattha satthavaṇijjā paroparodhanimittatāya akaraṇīyā vuttā sattavaṇijjā abhujissabhāvakaraṇato, maṃsavaṇijjā vadhahetuto, majjavaṇijjā pamādaṭṭhānato.

[03]^b^Tassevā^eb^ti pañcaveramaṇilakkhaṇassa ^b^sīlassa ceva^eb^ pañcamicchāvaṇijjālakkhaṇassa ^b^ājīvassa ca. Vipattī^eb^ti bhedo, pakopo ca. ^b^Yāyā^eb^ti yāya paṭipattiyā. ^b^Caṇḍālo^eb^ti upāsakacaṇḍālo. ^b^Mala^eb^nti upāsakamalaṃ. ^b^Paṭikiṭṭho^eb^ti upāsakanihīno. Buddhādīsu kammakammaphalesu ca saddhāvipariyāyo assaddhiyaṃ micchādhimokkho, yathāvuttena assaddhiyena samannāgato ^b^assaddho.^eb^ Yathāvuttasīlavipattiājīvavipattivasena ^b^dussīlo.^eb^ ‘‘Iminā diṭṭhādinā idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ hotī’’ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato ^b^kotūhalamaṅgaliko. Maṅgalaṃ paccetī^eb^ti diṭṭhamaṅgalādibhedaṃ maṅgalameva pattiyāyati. ^b^No kamma^eb^nti ^a^V1.0251^ea^ kammassakataṃ no pattiyāyati. ^b^Ito ca bahiddhā^eb^ti ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye. ^b^Dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesatī^eb^ti duppaṭipannaṃ dakkhiṇārahasaññī gavesati. ^b^Pubbakāraṃ karotī^eb^ti dānamānaṃ ādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ paṭhamataraṃ karoti. Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapariyesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.

[03]Vipattiyaṃ vuttavipariyāyena ^b^sampatti^eb^ veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana viseso – catunnampi parisānaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena upāsakova ratanaṃ ^b^upāsakaratanaṃ.^eb^ Guṇasobhākittisaddasugandhatāya ^a^M1.0284^ea^^a^P1.0369^ea^ upāsakova padumaṃ ^b^upāsakapadumaṃ.^eb^ Tathā ^b^upāsakapuṇḍarīkaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Ādimhī^eb^tiādiatthe. ^b^Koṭiya^eb^nti pariyantakoṭiyaṃ. ^b^Vihāraggenā^eb^ti ovarakakoṭṭhāsena, ‘‘imasmiṃ gabbhe vasantānamidaṃ nāma panasaphalaṃ pāpuṇātī’’tiādinā taṃ taṃvasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti attho. Ajjatagganti vā ajjadagganti vā ajja icceva attho.

[03]‘‘Pāṇehi upeta’’nti iminā tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ dassento ‘‘yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattatī’’tiādīni vatvā puna jīvitenāpi taṃ vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento ‘‘saraṇagamanaṃ rakkhāmī’’ti uppannaṃ tassa rañño adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘ahañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pāṇehi upeta^eb^nti hi yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ upetaṃ, upento ca na vācāmattena, na ekavāraṃ cittuppādamattena, atha kho pāṇānaṃ pariccajanavasena yāvajīvaṃ upetanti evamettha attho veditabbo.

[03]Accayanaṃ sādhumariyādaṃ madditvā vītikkamanaṃ ^b^accayo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘aparādho’’^eb^ti. Acceti atikkamati etenāti vā ^b^accayo,^eb^ vītikkamassa pavattanako akusaladhammo. So eva aparajjhati etenāti ^b^aparādho.^eb^ So hi aparajjhantaṃ purisaṃ abhibhavitvā pavattati, tenāha ^b^‘‘atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Caratī^eb^ti ācarati karoti. ^b^Dhammenevā^eb^ti dhammato anapetena payogena. ^b^Paṭiggaṇhātū^eb^ti adhivāsanavasena sampaṭicchatūti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘khamatū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^251^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sadevakena lokena ‘‘saraṇa’’nti araṇīyato ^b^ariyo,^eb^ tathāgatoti āha ^b^‘‘ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane’’^eb^ti. ^b^Puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto^eb^ti kāmaṃ ‘‘vuddhi hesā’’ti ^a^V1.0252^ea^ dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena vākyaṃ āraddhaṃ, tathāpi desanaṃ ^a^P1.0370^ea^ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto saṃvaraṃ āpajjatīti āhāti yojanā.

[03]^b^253^eb^^b^.^eb^ Imasmiṃyeva attabhāve nippajjanakānaṃ attano kusalamūlānaṃ khaṇanena ^b^khato,^eb^ tesaṃyeva upahananena ^b^upahato. ^eb^ Ubhayenāpi tassa kammāparādhameva vadati. Patiṭṭhāti sammattaniyāmokkamanaṃ etāyāti ^a^M1.0285^ea^ patiṭṭhā, tassa upanissayasampadā. Sā kiriyāparādhena bhinnā vināsitā etenāti ^b^bhinnapatiṭṭho,^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘tathā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dhammesu cakkhu^eb^nti catusaccadhammesu tesaṃ dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu. ^b^Aññesu ṭhānesū^eb^ti aññesu suttapadesu. ^b^Muccissatī^eb^ti saṭṭhi vassasahassāni paccitvā lohakumbhī narakato muccissati.

[03]Yadi anantare attabhāve narake paccati, imaṃ pana suttaṃ sutvā rañño ko ānisaṃso laddhoti āha ^b^‘‘mahānisaṃso’’^eb^tiādi. So pana ānisaṃso niddālābhasīsena vutto tadā kāyikacetasikadukkhāpagamo, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ mahāsakkārakiriyā, sātisayo pothujjanikasaddhāpaṭilābhoti evaṃpakāro diṭṭhadhammiko, samparāyiko pana aparāparesupi bhavesu aparimāṇo yevāti veditabbo.

[03]Etthāha – yadi rañño kammantarāyābhāve tasmiṃyeva āsane dhammacakkhu uppajjissati, kathaṃ anāgate paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissati. Atha ^a^P1.0371^ea^ paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissati, kathaṃ tadā dhammacakkhuṃ uppajjissati, nanu ime sāvakabodhipaccekabodhiupanissayā bhinnanissayāti? Nāyaṃ virodho ito parato evassa paccekabodhisambhārānaṃ sambharaṇīyato. Sāvakabodhiyā bujjhanakasattāpi hi asati tassā samavāye kālantare paccekabodhiyā bujjhissanti katābhinīhārasambhavato. Apare pana bhaṇanti ‘‘paccekabodhiyā yevāyaṃ katābhinīhāro. Katābhinīhārāpi hi tattha niyatiṃ appattā tassa ñāṇassa paripākaṃ anupagatattā satthu sammukhībhāve sāvakabodhiṃ pāpuṇissantīti bhagavā ‘sacāyaṃ bhikkhave rājā’tiādimāha. Mahābodhisattānameva ca ānantariyaparimutti, na itarabodhisattānaṃ. Tathā hi paccekabodhiyaṃ niyato samāno devadatto cirakālasambhūtena lokanāthe āghātena garutarāni ānantariyāni pasavi, tasmā kammantarāyenāyaṃ idāni asamavetadassanābhisamayo rājā paccekabodhiniyāmena anāgate paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissatī’’ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Sāmaññaphalasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^254^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Apubbapadavaṇṇanā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0253^ea^^a^M1.0286^ea^^a^P1.0372^ea^ atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena heṭṭhā aggahitatāya apubbassa padassa vaṇṇanā atthavibhajanā. ‘‘Hitvā punappunāgatamattha’’nti (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^Janapadino^eb^ti janapadavanto, janapadassa vā issarā ^b^rājakumārā gottavasena kosalā nāma.^eb^ Yadi eko janapado, kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘rūḷhisaddenā’’^eb^ti. Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya īdisaliṅgavacanāni icchanti, ayamettha rūḷhi yathā aññatthapi ‘‘kurūsu viharati, aṅgesu viharatī’’ti ca. Tabbisesanepi ^b^janapada^eb^-sadde jāti-sadde ekavacanameva. ^b^Porāṇā panā^eb^ti ^b^pana^eb^-saddo visesatthajotano, tena puthuatthavisayatāya evañcetaṃ puthuvacananti vakkhamānavisesaṃ joteti. Bahuppabhedo hi so padeso tiyojanasataparimāṇatāya. ^b^Naṅgalānipi chaḍḍetvā^eb^ti kammappahānavasena naṅgalānipi pahāya, nidassanamattañcetaṃ. Na kevalaṃ kassakā eva, atha kho aññepi manussā attano attano kiccaṃ pahāya tattha sannipatiṃsu. ^b^‘‘So padeso’’^eb^ti padesasāmaññato vuttaṃ, vacanavipallāsena vā, te padesāti attho. ^b^Kosalāti vuccati^eb^ kusalā eva kosalāti katvā.

[03]^b^Cārika^eb^nti caraṇaṃ, caraṇaṃ vā cāro, so eva cārikā. Tayidaṃ maggagamanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, na cuṇṇikagamanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘addhānagamanaṃ gacchanto’’^eb^ti. Taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cārikā ca nāmesā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^dūrepī^eb^ti nātidūrepi. ^b^Sahasā gamana^eb^nti ^a^P1.0373^ea^ sīghagamanaṃ. Mahākassapapaccuggamanādiṃ ekadesena vatvā vanavāsītissasāmaṇerassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā janapadacārikaṃ kathetuṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavā hī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Ākāsagāmīhi eva saddhiṃ gantukāmo ^b^‘‘chaḷabhiññānaṃ ārocehī’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Saṅghakammavasena ^a^V1.0254^ea^^a^M1.0287^ea^ sijjhamānāpi upasampadā satthu āṇāvaseneva sijjhanato ^b^‘‘buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī’’^eb^ti vuttanti vadanti. Apare pana aparipuṇṇavīsativassasseva tassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto ^b^‘‘dassāmī’’^eb^ti avocāti vadanti. ^b^Upasampādetvā^eb^ti dhammasenāpatinā upajjhāyena upasampādetvā.

[03]Navayojanasatikampi ṭhānaṃ majjhimadesapariyāpannameva, tato paraṃ nādhippetaṃ turitacārikāvasena agamanato. ^b^Samantā^eb^ti gatagataṭṭhānassa catūsu passesu samantato. ^b^Aññenapi kāraṇenā^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanātaruṇabhāvato aññenapi ^b^majjhimamaṇḍale ^eb^veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākādikāraṇena majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ ^b^osarati.^eb^^b^‘‘Sattahi vā’’^eb^tiādi ‘‘ekamāsaṃ vā’’tiādinā vuttānukkamena yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sarīraphāsukatthāyā^eb^ti ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nibaddhavāsavasena ussannadhātukassa sarīrassa vicaraṇena phāsukatthāya. ^b^Aṭṭhuppattikālābhikaṅkhanatthāyā^eb^ti ^b^aggikkhandhopamasutta^eb^ (a. ni. 7.72) ^b^maghadevajātakā^eb^di (jā. 1.1.9) desanānaṃ viya dhammadesanāya aṭṭhuppattikālaṃ ākaṅkhamānena. Surāpānasikkhāpadapaññāpane (pāci. 328) viya ^b^sikkhāpadapaññāpanatthāya. Bodhaneyyasatte^eb^ aṅgulimālādike (ma. ni. 2.347) ^b^bodhanatthāya.^eb^ Kañci, katipaye vā puggale uddissa cārikā ^b^nibaddhacārikā.^eb^ Tadaññā ^b^anibaddhacārikā.^eb^

[03]^b^Dasasahassi lokadhātuyā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0374^ea^ jātikhettabhūte dasasahassacakkavāḷe. Tattha hi satte paripakkindriye passituṃ buddhañāṇaṃ abhinīharitvā ṭhito bhagavā ñāṇajālaṃ pattharatīti vuccati. ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭho^eb^ti tassa ñāṇassa gocarabhāvaṃ upagato. Bhagavā kira mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya ‘‘ye sattā bhabbā paripākañāṇā ajja mayā vinetabbā, te mayhaṃ ñāṇassa upaṭṭhahantū’’ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samannāharati. Tassa saha samannāhārā eko vā dve vā bahū vā tadā vinayūpagā veneyyā ñāṇassa āpāthamāgacchanti ayamettha buddhānubhāvo. Evampi āpāthamāgatānaṃ pana nesaṃ upanissayaṃ pubbacariyaṃ pubbahetuṃ sampati vattamānañca paṭipattiṃ ^a^M1.0288^ea^ oloketi, tenāha ^b^‘‘atha bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vādapaṭivādaṃ katvā^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ nu te ambaṭṭhā’’tiādinā mayā vuttavacanassa ‘‘ye ca kho te bho gotama muṇḍakā samaṇakā’’tiādinā paṭivacanaṃ katvā tikkhattuṃ ibbhavādanipātanavasena ^b^nānappakāraṃ asambhivākyaṃ^eb^ sādhusabhāvāya vācāya vattuṃ ayuttavacanaṃ ^b^vakkhati. Nibbisevana^eb^nti vigatatudanaṃ, mānadabbavasena apagataparipphandananti attho.

[03]^b^Avasaritabba^eb^nti ^a^V1.0255^ea^ upagantabbaṃ. ^b^Icchānaṅgale^eb^ti idaṃ tadā bhagavato gocaragāmanidassanaṃ samīpatthe bhummanti katvā. ^b^‘‘Icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe’’^eb^ti nivāsanaṭṭhānadassanaṃ adhikaraṇe bhummanti. Tadubhayaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘icchānaṅgalaṃ upanissāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Dhammarājassa bhagavato sabbaso adhammaniggaṇhanaparā paṭipatti, sā ca sīlasamādhipaññāvasenāti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sīlakhandhāvāra’’^eb^ntiādi ^a^P1.0375^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Yathābhirucitenā^eb^ti dibbavihārādīsu yena yena attano abhirucitena vihārena.

[03]^b^255^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mante^eb^ti irubbedādimantasatthe. Pokkhare kamale sayamāno nisīdīti ^b^pokkharasātī.^eb^ Sāti vuccati samasaṇṭhānaṃ, pokkhare saṇṭhānāvayave jātoti ^b^‘‘pokkharasātī’’^eb^tipi vuccati. ^b^Setapokkharasadiso^eb^ti setapadumavaṇṇo. ^b^Suvaṭṭitā^eb^ti vaṭṭabhāvassa yuttaṭṭhāne suṭṭhu vaṭṭulā. Kāḷavaṅgatilakādīnaṃ abhāvena ^b^suparisuddhā.^eb^

[03]Imassa brāhmaṇassa kīdiso pubbayogo, yena naṃ bhagavā anuggaṇhituṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatoti āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Padumagabbhe nibbatti^eb^ tenāyaṃ saṃsedajo jāto. ^b^Na pupphatī^eb^ti na vikasati. ^b^Rajatabimbaka^eb^nti rūpiyamayaṃ rūpakaṃ.

[03]^b^Ajjhāvasatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^adhi^eb^-saddo issariyatthadīpano, ^b^ā^eb^saddo mariyādatthoti dassento ^b^‘‘abhibhavitvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tehi yuttattā hi ^b^ukkaṭṭha^eb^nti upayogavacanaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘upasaggavasenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yāya mariyādāyā^eb^ti ^b^yāya avatthāya.^eb^^b^Nagarassa vatthu^eb^nti ‘‘ayaṃ khaṇo, sumuhuttaṃ mā atikkamī’’ti rattivibhāyanaṃ anurakkhantā rattiyaṃ ukkā ^a^M1.0289^ea^ ṭhapetvā ukkāsu jalamānāsu nagarassa vatthuṃ aggahesuṃ, tasmā ukkāsu ṭhitāti ^b^ukkaṭṭhā,^eb^ ukkāsu vijjotayantīsu ṭhitā patiṭṭhitāti mūlavibhujādipakkhepena saddasiddhi veditabbā, niruttinayena vā ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitā āsīti ^b^ukkaṭṭhā.^eb^ Apare pana bhaṇanti ‘‘bhūmibhāgasampattiyā, upakaraṇasampattiyā, manussasampattiyā ca taṃ nagaraṃ ukkaṭṭhaguṇayogato ^b^ukkaṭṭhā^eb^ti nāmaṃ labhī’’ti ^a^P1.0376^ea^. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti ‘‘ukkaṭṭha’’nti upayogavasena vuttapadassa. ^b^Anupayogattā^eb^ti visesanabhāvena anupayuttattā. ^b^Sesapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘sattussada’’ntiādipadesu. Yathāvidhi hi anupayogo purimasmiṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ‘‘upasaggavasenā’’tiādinā vuttavidhāne. ^b^‘‘Saddasatthato pariyesitabba’’^eb^nti etena saddalakkhaṇānugato ^a^V1.0256^ea^ vāyaṃ saddappayogoti dasseti. Upānuadhiāitievaṃpubbake vasanakiriyāṭhāne upayogavacanameva pāpuṇātīti saddavidū icchanti.
[03]Ussadatā nāmettha bahulatāti, taṃ bahulataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bahujana’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Gahetvā posetabbaṃ ^b^posāvaniyaṃ. Āvijjhitvā^eb^ti parikkhipitvā.

[03]Raññā viya bhuñjitabbanti vā ^b^rājabhoggaṃ. Rañño dāyabhūta^eb^nti kulaparamparāya yogyabhāvena rājato laddhadāyabhūtaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dāyajjanti attho’’^eb^ti. Rājanīhārena paribhuñjitabbato uddhaṃ paribhogalābhassa seṭṭhadeyyatā nāma natthīti āha ^b^‘‘chattaṃ ussāpetvā rājasaṅkhepena bhuñjitabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Sabbaṃ chejjabhejja’’^eb^nti sarīradaṇḍadhanadaṇḍādi bhedaṃ sabbaṃ daṇḍamāha. ^b^Nadītitthapabbatādīsū^eb^ti nadītitthapabbatapādagāmadvārāṭavimukhādīsu. ‘‘Rājadāya’’nti imināva rañño dinnabhāve siddhe ^b^‘‘raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinna’’^eb^nti vacanaṃ kimatthiyanti āha ^b^‘‘dāyakarājadīpanattha’’^eb^ntiādi ^a^P1.0377^ea^. ^b^Nissaṭṭhapariccatta^eb^nti muttacāgavasena pariccattaṃ katvā. Evañhi taṃ seṭṭhadeyyaṃ uttamadeyyaṃ jātaṃ.

[03]^b^Upalabhī^eb^ti savanavasena upalabhīti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sotadvāra…pe… aññāsī’’^eb^ti āha. Avadhāraṇaphalattā sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘padapūraṇamatte nipāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Avadhāraṇatthe’’^eb^ti pana iminā iṭṭhatovadhāraṇatthaṃ ^b^kho^eb^-saddaggahaṇanti dasseti ^a^M1.0290^ea^. ^b^‘‘Assosī’’^eb^ti padaṃ kho-sadde gahite tena phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti, tena ca purimapacchimapadāni siliṭṭhāni honti, na tasmiṃ aggahiteti āha ^b^‘‘padapūraṇena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Matta^eb^-saddo visesanivattiattho, tenassa anatthantaradīpanatā dassitā hoti, ^b^eva^eb^-saddena pana byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya ekantikatā.

[03]^b^Samitapāpattā^eb^ti accantaṃ anavasesato savāsanaṃ samitapāpattā. Evañhi bāhirakavirāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamanato bhagavato pāpasamanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti, tenāha ^b^vuttañheta^eb^ntiādi. Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ idha anussavattho adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘khalūti anussavatthe nipāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ālapanamatta^eb^nti piyālāpavacanamattaṃ. Piyasamudāhāro hete ‘‘bho’’ti vā ‘‘āvuso’’ti vā ‘‘devānaṃ piyā’’ti vā. ^b^Gottavasenā^eb^ti ettha gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. Gotamoti hi pavattamānaṃ vacanaṃ, buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena ^a^P1.0378^ea^ atthena vinā na vattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā ^a^V1.0257^ea^ so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. Ko pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca ^b^‘‘samaṇo’’^eb^ti iminā sarikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito samitapāpatākittanato. ^b^‘‘Gotamo’’^eb^ti iminā lokiyajanehi uḷārakulasambhūtatādīpanato.

[03]^b^Uccākulaparidīpanaṃ^eb^ uditoditavipulakhattiyakulavibhāvanato. Sabbakhattiyānañhi ādibhūtamahāsammatamahārājato paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ. ^b^Kenaci pārijuññenā^eb^ti ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenaci pārijuññena pārihāniyā. ^b^Anabhibhūto^eb^ anajjhotthato. Tathā hi tassa kulassa na kiñci pārijuññaṃ lokanāthassa abhijātiyaṃ, atha kho vaḍḍhiyeva. Abhinikkhamane ca tatopi samiddhatamabhāvo loke pākaṭo paññāto. Iti ^b^‘‘sakyakulā pabbajito’’^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato saddhāpabbajitabhāvadīpanaṃ vuttaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ, mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitabhāvasiddhito. ^b^Sundara^eb^nti bhaddakaṃ. Bhaddakatā ca passantassa hitasukhāvahabhāvena veditabbāti āha ^a^M1.0291^ea^^b^atthāvahaṃ sukhāvaha^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^atthāvaha^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthasaṃhitahitāvahaṃ. ^b^Sukhāvaha^eb^nti yathāvuttatividhasukhāvahaṃ. ^b^Tathārūpāna^eb^nti tādisānaṃ. Yādisehi pana guṇehi bhagavā samannāgato, tehi catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbathāpi accantāya saddhāya pasādanīyo tesaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvattāti dassento ^b^yathārūpo^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^yathābhūtaṃ…pe…^eb^^a^P1.0379^ea^^b^arahata^eb^nti iminā dhammappamāṇānaṃ, lūkhappamāṇānañca sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahataṃ dasseti. Taṃ dassaneneva ca itaresampi atthato pasādāvahatā dassitā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ tadavinābhāvato. ^b^Dassanamattampi sādhu hotī^eb^ti ettha kosiyasakuṇavatthuṃ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.144; khu. pā. aṭṭha. 10) kathetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^256^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mante parivattetī^eb^ti vede sajjhāyati, pariyāpuṇātīti attho. ^b^Mante dhāretī^eb^ti yathāadhīte mante asammuṭṭhe katvā hadaye ṭhapeti oṭṭhapahatakaraṇavasena, na atthavibhāvanavasena.

[03]^b^Sanighaṇḍukeṭubhāna^eb^nti ettha vacanīyavācakabhāvena atthaṃ saddañca nikhaḍati bhindati vibhajja dassetīti nikhaṇḍu, sā eva idha kha-kārassa gha-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘nighaṇḍū’’ti vutto. Kiṭayati ^a^V1.0258^ea^ gameti ñāpeti kiriyādivibhāgaṃ, taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato gamento pūretīti keṭubhaṃ. ^b^Vevacanappakāsaka^eb^nti pariyāyasaddadīpakaṃ, ekekassa atthassa anekapariyāyavacanavibhāvakanti attho. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ anekesampi atthānaṃ ekasaddavacanīyatāvibhāvanavasenapi tassa ganthassa pavattattā. Vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati etenāti ^b^kiriyākappo,^eb^ so pana vaṇṇapadasambandhapadatthādivibhāgato bahuvikappoti āha ^b^‘‘kiriyākappavikappo’’^eb^ti. Idañca mūlakiriyākappaganthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi satasahassaparimāṇo nayacariyādipakaraṇaṃ. Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato ^a^P1.0380^ea^, nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etehīti ^b^akkharappabhedā,^eb^ sikkhāniruttiyo. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti vedānaṃ.

[03]Te ^a^M1.0292^ea^ eva vede padaso kāyatīti ^b^padako.^eb^ Taṃ taṃ saddaṃ tadatthañca byākaroti byācikkhati etenāti ^b^byākaraṇaṃ,^eb^ saddasatthaṃ. Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti ^b^lokāyataṃ.^eb^ Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.

[03]Vayatīti ^b^vayo,^eb^ ādimajjhapariyosānesu katthaci aparikilamanto avitthāyanto te ganthe sandhāreti pūretīti attho. Dve paṭisedhā pakatiṃ gamentīti dassento ‘‘avayo na hotī’’ti vatvā tattha avayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘avayo nāma…pe… na sakkotī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Anuññāto’’^eb^ti padassa kammasādhanavasena, ‘‘paṭiññāto’’ti pana padassa kattusādhanavasena attho veditabboti dassento ^b^‘‘ācariyenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ācariyaparamparābhataṃ ^b^ācariyakaṃ. Garū^eb^ti bhāriyaṃ attānaṃ tato mocetvā gamanaṃ dukkaraṃ hoti. ^b^Anatthopi uppajjati^eb^ nindābyārosaupārambhādi.
[03]^b^257^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Abbhuggato’’ti ettha abhisaddayogena ^b^itthambhūtākhyānatthavaseneva upayogavacanaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^258^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lakkhaṇānī^eb^ti lakkhaṇadīpanāni mantapadāni. ^b^Antaradhāyantī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ lakkhaṇamantāniyeva, atha kho aññānipi brāhmaṇānaṃ ñāṇabalābhāvena anukkamena antaradhāyanti. Tathā hi vadanti ‘‘ekasataṃ addhariyaṃ sākhā sahassavattako sāmā’’tiādi. ^b^Paṇidhi^eb^^a^P1.0381^ea^^b^…pe… mahato^eb^ti ettha paṇidhimahato samādānamahatoti ādinā paccekaṃ mahanta-saddo yojetabbo. Paṇidhimahantatādi cassa buddhavaṃsacariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanādivasena veditabbo. ^b^Niṭṭhā^eb^ti nipphattiyo. ^b^Bhavabhede^eb^ti bhavavisese. Ito ca etto ca byāpetvā ṭhitatā ^b^visaṭabhāvo.^eb^

[03]^b^Jātisāmaññato^eb^ti lakkhaṇajātiyā lakkhaṇabhāvamattena samānabhāvato. Yathā hi buddhānaṃ lakkhaṇāni ^a^V1.0259^ea^ suvisadāni, suparibyattāni, paripuṇṇāni ca honti, na evaṃ cakkavattīnaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘na teheva buddho hotī’’^eb^ti. Abhirūpatā, dīghāyukatā, appātaṅkatā, brāhmaṇādīnaṃ piyamanāpatāti imehi ^b^catūhi^eb^ acchariyasabhāvehi. Dānaṃ, piyavacanaṃ, atthacariyā, samānattatāti ^a^M1.0293^ea^ imehi ^b^catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi. Rañjanato^eb^ti pītijananato. Cakkaṃ cakkaratanaṃ vatteti pavattetīti ^b^cakkavattī.^eb^ Sampatticakkehi sayaṃ vattati, tehi ca paraṃ sattanikāyaṃ vatteti pavattetīti ^b^cakkavattī.^eb^ Parahitāvaho iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto vattanaṃ etassa, etthāti vā ^b^cakkavattī.^eb^ Appaṭihataṃ vā āṇāsaṅkhātaṃ cakkaṃ vattetīti ^b^cakkavattī.^eb^ Khattiyamaṇḍalādisaññitaṃ cakkaṃ samūhaṃ attano vase vattetīti ^b^cakkavattī^eb^ cakkavattivattasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ carati, cakkavattivattasaṅkhāto dhammo etasmiṃ atthīti vā ^b^dhammiko.^eb^ Dhammato anapetattā dhammo rañjanaṭṭhena rājāti ^b^dhammarājā.^eb^ ‘‘Rājā hoti cakkavattī’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘cāturanto’’^eb^ti padaṃ catudīpissarataṃ vibhāvetīti āha ^b^‘‘catusamuddāntāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ‘‘catuddīpavibhūsitāyā’’ti avatvā ‘‘catubbidhā’’ti ^b^vidha^eb^ggahaṇaṃ taṃtaṃparittadīpānampi saṅgahatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Kopādī^eb^ti ^a^P1.0382^ea^^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kāmamohamānamadādike saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Vijitāvī^eb^ti vijitavā. Kenaci akampiyaṭṭhena janapade thāvariyappatto, daḷhabhattibhāvato vā, janapado thāvariyaṃ patto etthāti ^b^janapadatthāvariyappatto.^eb^

[03]Cittīkatabhāvādināpi (khu. pā. aṭṭha. 3; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.33; su. ni. aṭṭha. 1.226; mahāni. aṭṭha. 50) cakkassa ratanaṭṭho veditabbo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Ratinimittatāya vā cittīkatādibhāvassa ratijananaṭṭhena ekasaṅgahatāya visuṃ aggahaṇaṃ. Imehi pana ratanehi rājā cakkavattī yaṃ yamatthaṃ paccanubhoti, taṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imesu panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ajitaṃ jināti ^eb^mahesakkhatāsaṃvattaniyakammanissandabhāvato. ^b^Vijite yathāsukhaṃ anuvicarati^eb^ hatthiratanaṃ assaratanañca abhiruhitvā tesaṃ ānubhāvena antopātarāseyeva samuddapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ anusaṃyāyitvā rājadhānimeva paccāgamanato. ^b^Pariṇāyakaratanena vijitamanurakkhati^eb^ tena tattha tattha kātabbakiccassa saṃvidhānato. ^b^Avasesehī^eb^ti maṇiratanaitthiratanagahapatiratanehi. Tattha maṇiratanena yojanappamāṇe padese andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokadassanādinā sukhamanubhavati, itthiratanena atikkantamānusakarūpasampattidassanādivasena, gahapatiratanena icchiticchitamaṇikanakarajatādidhanapaṭilābhavasena.

[03]^b^Ussāhasattiyogo^eb^^a^M1.0294^ea^ tena kenaci appaṭihatāṇācakkabhāvasiddhito ^b^pacchimenā^eb^ti pariṇāyakaratanena. Tañhi sabbarājakiccesu kusalaṃ avirajjhanayogaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘mantasattiyogo’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0260^ea^. Hatthiassaratanānaṃ mahānubhāvatāya kosasampattiyāpi pabhāvasampattisiddhito ^a^P1.0383^ea^^b^‘‘hatthi…pe… yogo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. (Koso hi nāma sati ussāhasampattiyaṃ duggaṃ tejaṃ kusumoraṃ parakkamaṃ pabbatomukhaṃ amosapaharaṇaṃ) tividhasattiyogaphalaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hotīti sambandho. ^b^Sesehī^eb^ti sesehi pañcahi ratanehi.

[03]^b^Adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvenā^eb^ti adosasaṅkhātena kusalamūlena sahajātādipaccayavasena uppāditakammassa ānubhāvena ^b^sampajjanti^eb^ sommatararatanajātikattā. ^b^Majjhimāni^eb^ maṇītthigahapatiratanāni. ^b^Alobha…pe… kammānubhāvena^eb^ sampajjanti ^b^uḷārassa dhanassa,^eb^ uḷāradhanapaṭilābhakāraṇassa ca pariccāgasampadāhetukattā. ^b^Pacchima^eb^nti pariṇāyakaratanaṃ. Tañhi ^b^amoha…pe… kammānubhāvena sampajjati^eb^ mahāpaññeneva cakkavattirājakiccassa pariṇetabbattā. ^b^Upadeso^eb^ nāma savisesaṃ sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ vicāraṇavasena pavatto kathābandho.

[03]Saraṇato paṭipakkhavidhamanato ^b^sūrā,^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘abhīrukajātikā’’^eb^ti. Asure vijinitvā ṭhitattā vīro, sakko devānaṃ indo. Tassa aṅgaṃ devaputto senaṅgabhāvatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vīraṅgarūpāti devaputtasadisakāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Eke’’^eb^ti sārasamāsācariyamāha. ^b^Sabhāvo^eb^ti sabhāvabhūto attho. ^b^Vīrakāraṇa^eb^nti vīrabhāvakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Vīriyamayasarīrā viyā^eb^ti saviggahavīriyasadisā, saviggahaṃ ce vīriyaṃ siyā taṃsadisāti attho. Nanu rañño cakkavattissa paṭisenā nāma natthi, ya’massa puttā pamaddeyyuṃ, atha kasmā parasenappamaddanāti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^sace^eb^tiādi, tena parasenā hotu vā mā vā te pana evaṃ mahānubhāvāti dasseti. ^b^Dhammenā^eb^ti katupacitena attano puññadhammena. Tena ^a^P1.0384^ea^ hi sañcoditā pathaviyaṃ sabbarājāno paccuggantvā ‘‘svāgataṃ te mahārājā’’ti ādiṃ vatvā attano rajjaṃ rañño cakkavattissa niyyātenti, tena vuttaṃ ‘‘so imaṃ…pe… ajjhāvasatī’’ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^M1.0295^ea^ pana tassa yathāvuttassa dhammassa cirataraṃ vipaccituṃ paccayabhūtaṃ cakkavattivattasamudāgataṃ payogasampattisaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pāṇo na hantabbotiādinā pañcasīladhammenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Evañhi ‘‘adaṇḍena asatthenā’’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ samatthitaṃ hotīti. Yasmā rāgādayo pāpadhammā uppajjamānā sattasantānaṃ chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhanti kusalappavattiṃ nivārenti, tasmā te ‘‘chadanā, chadā’’ti ca vuttā. ^b^Vivaṭetvā^eb^ti vigametvā. ^b^Pūjārahatā vuttā^eb^ ‘‘arahatīti araha’’nti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ pūjārahatāya. ^b^Yasmā sammāsambuddho,^eb^ tasmā arahanti. ^b^Buddhattahetubhūtā vivaṭṭacchadatā vuttā^eb^ savāsanasabbakilesappahānapubbakattā buddhabhāvassa.

[03]^b^Arahaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0261^ea^^b^vaṭṭābhāvenā^eb^ti phalena hetuanumānadassanaṃ. ^b^Sammāsambuddho chadanābhāvenā^eb^ti hetunā phalānumānadassanaṃ. ^b^Hetudvayaṃ vuttaṃ^eb^ ‘‘vivaṭṭo vicchado cā’’ti. ^b^Dutiyena vesārajjenā^eb^ti ‘‘khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato’’tiādinā vuttena vesārajjena. ^b^Purimasiddhī^eb^ti purimassa padassa atthasiddhīti attho. ^b^Paṭhamenā^eb^ti ‘‘sammāsambuddhassa ^a^P1.0385^ea^ te paṭijānato’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.150; a. ni. 4.8) vuttena vesārajjena. ^b^Dutiyasiddhī^eb^ti dutiyassa padassa atthasiddhi, buddhatthasiddhīti attho. ^b^Tatiyacatutthehī^eb^ti ‘‘ye kho pana te antarāyikā dhammā’’tiādinā, (ma. ni. 1.150; a. ni. 4.8) ‘‘yassa kho pana te atthāyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.150; a. ni. 4.8) ca vuttehi tatiyacatutthehi vesārajjehi. ^b^Tatiyasiddhī^eb^ti vivaṭṭacchadanatāsiddhi yāthāvato antarāyikaniyyānikadhammāpadesena hi satthu vivaṭṭacchadanabhāvo loke pākaṭo ahosi. ^b^Purimaṃ dhammacakkhu^eb^nti purimapadaṃ bhagavato dhammacakkhuṃ ^b^sādheti^eb^ kilesārīnaṃ, saṃsāracakkassa ca arānaṃ hatabhāvadīpanato. ^b^Dutiyaṃ padaṃ buddhacakkhuṃ sādheti^eb^ sammāsambuddhasseva taṃsabbhāvato. ^b^Tatiyaṃ padaṃ samantacakkhuṃ sādheti^eb^ savāsanasabbakilesappahānadīpanato. ‘‘Sammāsambuddho’’ti hi vatvā ‘‘vivaṭṭacchado’’ti vacanaṃ buddhabhāvāvahameva sabbakilesappahānaṃ vibhāveti. ^b^‘‘Sūrabhāva’’^eb^nti lakkhaṇavibhāvane visadañāṇataṃ.

[03]^b^259^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0296^ea^^b^bho^eb^ti ettha ^b^eva^eb^nti vacanasampaṭicchane nipāto. Vacanasampaṭicchanañcettha ‘‘tathā mayaṃ taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ vedissāma, tvaṃ mantānaṃ paṭiggahetā’’ti ca evaṃ pavattassa pokkharasātino vacanassa sampaṭiggahoti āha. ^b^‘‘Sopi tāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^tāyā^eb^ti tāya yathāvuttāya samuttejanāya. ^b^Ayānabhūmi^eb^nti ^a^P1.0386^ea^ yānassa abhūmiṃ. ^b^Divāpadhānikā^eb^ti divāpadhānānuyuñjanakā.
[03]^b^260^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yadipi pubbe ambaṭṭhakulaṃ appaññātaṃ, tadā pana paññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘tadā kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aturito^eb^ti avegāyanto.

[03]^b^261^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto^eb^ti yathā bhagavā ‘‘kacci vo māṇavā khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya’’ntiādinā khamanīyādīni pucchanto tehi māṇavehi saddhiṃ paṭhamaṃ pavattamodo ahosi pubbabhāsitāya tadanukaraṇena evaṃ tepi māṇavā bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodā ahesunti yojanā. Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sītodakaṃ viyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sammodita^eb^nti saṃsanditaṃ. ^b^Ekībhāva^eb^nti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ ^a^V1.0262^ea^. ^b^Khamanīya^eb^nti ‘‘idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyya’’nti pucchanti, ^b^yāpanīya^eb^nti āhārādipaccayapaṭibaddhavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena ^b^kacci appābādhaṃ,^eb^ dukkhajīvikābhāvena ^b^kacci appātaṅkaṃ,^eb^ taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya ^b^kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ tadanurūpabalayogato ^b^kacci balaṃ,^eb^ sukhavihārasabbhāvena ^b^kacci phāsuvihāro^eb^ atthīti sabbattha kacci-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Balappattā pīti ^b^pīti^eb^yeva. Taruṇapīti ^b^pāmojjaṃ.^eb^ Sammodanaṃ janeti karotīti sammodanikaṃ tadeva ^b^sammodanīyaṃ.^eb^ Sammoditabbato ^b^sammodanīya^eb^nti idaṃ pana atthaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato’’^eb^ti. Saritabbabhāvato anussaritabbabhāvato ‘‘saraṇīya’’nti vattabbe ^b^‘‘sāraṇīya’’^eb^nti dīghaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Suyyamānasukhato’’^eb^ti āpāthamadhuratamāha, ^b^‘‘anussariyamānasukhato’’^eb^ti vimaddaramaṇīyataṃ. ^b^‘‘Byañjanaparisuddhatāyā’’^eb^ti sabhāvaniruttibhāvena ^a^P1.0387^ea^ tassā kathāya vacanacāturiyamāha, ^b^‘‘atthaparisuddhatāyā’’^eb^ti atthassa nirupakkilesataṃ. ^b^Anekehi pariyāyehī^eb^ti anekehi kāraṇehi.

[03]^b^Apasādessāmī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0297^ea^ maṅkuṃ karissāmi. ^b^Kaṇṭhe olambetvā^eb^ti ubhosu khandhesu sāṭakaṃ āsajjetvā kaṇṭhe olambitvā. ^b^Dussakaṇṇaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti nivatthasāṭakassa dasākoṭiṃ ekena hatthena gahetvā. ^b^Caṅkamaṃ abhiruhitvā^eb^ti caṅkamituṃ ārabhitvā. ^b^Dhātusamatā^eb^ti rasādidhātūnaṃ samāvatthatā, arogatāti attho. ^b^Anācārabhāvasāraṇīya^eb^nti anācārabhāvena saraṇīyaṃ. ‘‘Anācāro vatāya’’nti saritabbakaṃ.

[03]^b^262^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Bhavaggaṃ gahetukāmo viyā’’^eb^tiādi asakkuṇeyyattā dukkaraṃ kiccaṃ ārabhatīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Asakkuṇeyyañhetaṃ sadevakenāpi lokena, yadidaṃ bhagavato apasādanaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhāne vāyamatī’’^eb^ti. Ayaṃ bālo ‘‘mayi kiñci akathente mayā saddhiṃ kathetumpi na visahatī’’ti mānameva paggaṇhissati, kathente pana kathāpasaṅgenassa jātigotte vibhāvite mānaniggaho bhavissatīti bhagavā ‘‘evaṃ nu te’’tiādimāha. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘atha kho bhagavā’’tiādi. Ācārasamācārasikkhāpanena ācariyā, tesaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ pakaṭṭhā ācariyāti pācariyā yathā papitāmahoti, tenāha ^b^‘‘ācariyehi ca tesaṃ pācariyehi cā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^263^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tīsu iriyāpathesū^eb^ti ṭhānagamananisajjāsu. ^b^Kathāpaḷāsa^eb^nti ^a^P1.0388^ea^ kathāvasena yugaggāhaṃ. Sayānena ^a^V1.0263^ea^ ācariyena saddhiṃ sayānassa kathā nāma ācāro na hoti, taṃ itarehi sadisaṃ katvā kathanaṃ idha kathāpaḷāso.

[03]Tassa pana yaṃ anācārabhāvavibhāvanaṃ satthārā ambaṭṭhena saddhiṃ kathentena kataṃ, taṃ saṅgītianāruḷhaṃ paramparābhatanti upari pāḷiyā sambandhabhāvena dassento ^b^‘‘tato kirā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Muṇḍakā samaṇakā^eb^ti ca garahāyaṃ ^b^ka^eb^-saddo, tenāha ^b^‘‘hīḷento’’^eb^ti. Ibhassa payogo ibho uttarapadalopena, taṃ ibhaṃ arahantīti ^b^ibbhā.^eb^ Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā ibho hatthivāhanabhūto parassa vasena vattati, na attano, evaṃ etepi brāhmaṇānaṃ sussusakā suddā parassa vasena ^a^M1.0298^ea^ vattanti, na attano, tasmā ibhasadisapayogatāya ibbhāti. Te pana kuṭumbikatāya gharavāsino gharassāmikā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘gahapatikā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kaṇhā^eb^ti kaṇhajātikā. Dijā eva hi suddhajātikā, na itareti tassa adhippāyo, tenāha ^b^‘‘kāḷakā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mukhato nikkhantā^eb^ti brāhmaṇānaṃ pubbapurisā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā, ayaṃ tesaṃ paṭhamuppattīti adhippāyo. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^‘‘Samaṇā piṭṭhipādato’’^eb^ti idaṃ panassa ‘‘mukhato nikkhantā’’tiādivacanatopi ativiya asamavekkhitavacanaṃ catuvaṇṇapariyāpannasseva samaṇabhāvasambhavato. ^b^Aniyametvā^eb^ti avisesetvā, anuddesikabhāvenāti attho.

[03]^b^Mānussayavasena kathetī^eb^ti mānussayaṃ avassāya attānaṃ ukkaṃsento, pare ca vambhento ‘‘muṇḍakā’’ti ādiṃ katheti. ^b^Jānāpemī^eb^ti jātigottassa pamāṇaṃ ^a^P1.0389^ea^ yāthāvato vibhāvanena pamāṇaṃ jānāpemīti. ^b^Attho etassa atthīti atthikaṃ^eb^ daṇḍikañāyena.

[03]^b^‘‘Yāyeva kho panatthāyā’’^eb^ti itthiliṅgavasena vuttanti vadanti, taṃ parato ‘‘purisaliṅgavasenevā’’ti vakkhamānattā yuttaṃ. ^b^Yāya atthāyā^eb^ti vā pulliṅgavaseneva tadatthe sampadānavacanaṃ, yassa atthassa atthāyāti attho. ^b^Assā^eb^ti ambaṭṭhassa dassetvāti sambandho. ^b^Aññesa^eb^nti aññesaṃ sādhurūpānaṃ. ^b^Santikaṃ āgatāna^eb^nti guruṭṭhāniyānaṃ santikaṃ upagatānaṃ. ^b^Vatta^eb^nti tehi caritabbāacāraṃ. ^b^Asikkhito^eb^ti ācāraṃ asikkhito. Tato eva ^b^appassuto.^eb^ Bāhusaccañhi nāma yāvadeva upasamatthaṃ icchitabbaṃ, tadabhāvato ambaṭṭho appassuto asikkhito ‘‘avusito’’ti viññāyati, tenāha ^b^‘‘etassa hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^264^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kodhavasacittatāya ^b^asakamano. Mānanimmadanattha^eb^nti mānassa nimmadanatthaṃ. ^b^Uggiletvā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0264^ea^ sinehapānena kilinnaṃ ubbamanaṃ katvā. ^b^Gottena gotta^eb^nti tena vuttena purātanagottena idāni taṃ taṃ anavajjasaññitaṃ gottaṃ sāvajjato uṭṭhāpetvā uddharitvā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Tattha ^b^gottaṃ^eb^ ādipurisavasena, ^b^kulāpadoso,^eb^ tadanvaye uppannābhiññātapurisavasena veditabbo yathā ‘‘ādicco, maghadevo’’ti. Gottamūlassa gārayhatāya amānavatthubhāvapavedanato ^b^‘‘mānaddhajaṃ mūle chetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ghaṭṭento^eb^ti ^a^P1.0390^ea^ omasanto.

[03]Yasmiṃ ^a^M1.0299^ea^ mānussayakodhussayā aññamaññūpatthaddhā, so ‘‘caṇḍo’’ti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘caṇḍāti mānanissitakodhayuttā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kharā^eb^ti cittena, vācāya ca kakkhaḷā. ^b^Lahukā^eb^ti taruṇā. ^b^Bhassā^eb^ti ‘‘sāhasikā’’ti keci vadanti, ‘‘sārambhakā’’ti apare. ^b^Samānā^eb^ti hontā, bhavamānāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘santāti purimapadasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Na sakkarontī^eb^ti sakkāraṃ na karonti. ^b^Apacitikamma^eb^nti paṇipātakamma ^b^nānuloma^eb^nti attano jātiyā na anucchavikanti attho.

[03]^b^265^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmaṃ sakyarājakule yo sabbesaṃ buddhataro samattho ca, so eva abhisekaṃ labhati, ekacco pana abhisitto samāno ‘‘idaṃ rajjaṃ nāma bahukiccaṃ bahubyāpāra’’nti tato nibbijja rajjaṃ vayasā anantarassa niyyāteti, kadāci sopi aññassāti tādise sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘sakyāti abhisittarājāno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kulavaṃsaṃ jānantī^eb^ti kaṇhāyanato paṭṭhāya paramparāgataṃ anussavavasena jānanti. Kulābhimānino hi yebhuyyena paresaṃ uccāvacaṃ kulaṃ tathā tathā udāharanti, attano ca kulavaṃsaṃ jānanti, evaṃ ambaṭṭhopi. Tathā hi so parato bhagavatā pucchito vajirapāṇibhayena yāthāvato kathesi.

[03]^b^266^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Khettaleḍḍūna^eb^nti khette kasanavasena naṅgalena uṭṭhāpitaleḍḍūnaṃ. ‘‘Laṭukikā’’ icceva paññātā ^b^khuddakasakuṇikā laṭukikopamavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘cātakasakuṇikā’’ti (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3.150) vuttā. ^b^Kodhavasena laggitu^eb^nti upanayhituṃ, āghātaṃ bandhitunti ^a^P1.0391^ea^ attho. ^b^‘‘Amhe haṃsakoñcamorasame karotī’’^eb^ti iminā ‘‘na taṃ koci haṃso vā’’tiādivacanaṃ saṅgītiṃ anāruḷhaṃ tadā bhagavatā vuttamevāti dasseti. ‘‘Evaṃ nu te’’tiādivacanaṃ, ‘‘avusitavāyevā’’tiādivacanañca ^a^V1.0265^ea^ mānavasena samaṇena gotamena vuttanti maññatīti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘nimmāno dāni jātoti maññamāno’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^267^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nimmādetī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0300^ea^ a-kārassa ā-kāraṃ katvā niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘nimmadetī’’^eb^ti. Kāmaṃ gottaṃ nāmetaṃ pitito laddhabbaṃ, na mātito na hi brāhmaṇānaṃ sagottāya āvāhavivāho icchito, gottanāmaṃ pana yasmā jātisiddhaṃ, na kittimaṃ, jāti ca ubhayasambandhinī, tasmā ^b^‘‘mātāpettikanti mātāpitūnaṃ santaka’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nāmagotta^eb^nti gottanāmaṃ, na kittimanāmaṃ, na guṇanāmaṃ vā. Tattha ‘‘kaṇhāyano’’ti niruḷhā yā nāmapaṇṇatti, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘paṇṇattivasena nāma^eb^nti. Taṃ pana kaṇhaisito paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ kulaparamparāvasena āgataṃ, na etasmiṃyeva niruḷhaṃ, tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paveṇīvasena gotta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Gotta^eb^-padassa pana attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. ^b^Anussarato^eb^ti ettha na kevalaṃ anussaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, atha kho kulasuddhivīmaṃsanavasenāti āha ^b^‘‘kulakoṭiṃ sodhentassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayyaputtā^eb^ti ayyikaputtāti āha ^b^‘‘sāmino puttā’’^eb^ti. Disā okkākarañño antojātā dāsīti āha ^b^‘‘gharadāsiyā putto’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca yasmā ambaṭṭho jātiṃ nissāya mānatthaddho, na cassa yāthāvato jātiyā avibhāvitāya mānaniggaho hoti, mānaniggahe ca kate aparabhāge ratanattaye pasīdissati ^a^P1.0392^ea^, na ‘‘dāsī’’ti vācā pharusavācā nāma hoti cittassa saṇhabhāvato. ^b^Abhayasutta^eb^ñcettha (ma. ni. 2.83; a. ni. 4.184) nidassanaṃ. Keci ca sattā agginā viya lohādayo kakkhaḷāya vācāya mudubhāvaṃ gacchanti, tasmā bhagavā ambaṭṭhaṃ nibbisevanaṃ kātukāmo ‘‘ayyaputtā sakyā bhavanti, dāsiputto tvamasi sakyāna’’nti avoca.
[03]^b^Ṭhapentī^eb^ti paññapenti, tenāha ^b^‘‘okkāko’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pabhā niccharati^eb^ dantānaṃ ativiya pabhassarabhāvato.

[03]^b^Paṭhamakappikāna^eb^nti paṭhamakappassa ādikāle nibbattānaṃ. ^b^Kira^eb^-saddo anussavatthe, tena yo vuccamānāya rājaparamparāya kesañci matibhedo, taṃ ulliṅgeti. ^b^Mahāsammatassāti^eb^ ‘‘ayaṃ no rājā’’ti mahājanena sammannitvā ṭhapitattā ‘‘mahāsammato’’ti evaṃ sammatassa. Yaṃ sandhāya vadanti –
[21]‘‘Ādiccakulasambhūto ^a^V1.0266^ea^^a^M1.0301^ea^, suvisuddhaguṇākaro;
[22]Mahānubhāvo rājāsi, mahāsammatanāmako.
[21]Yo cakkhubhūto lokassa, guṇaraṃsisamujjalo;
[22]Tamonudo virocittha, dutiyo viya bhāṇumā.
[21]Ṭhapitā yena mariyādā, loke lokahitesinā;
[22]Vavatthitā sakkuṇanti, na vilaṅghayituṃ janā.
[21]Yasassinaṃ tejassinaṃ, lokasīmānurakkhakaṃ;
[22]Ādibhūtaṃ mahāvīraṃ, kathayanti ‘manū’ti ya’’nti.
[03]Tassa ca puttapaputtaparamparaṃ sandhāya –
[21]‘‘Tassa putto mahātejo, rojo nāma mahīpati;
[22]Tassa putto vararojo, pavaro rājamaṇḍale.
[21]Tassāsi ^a^P1.0393^ea^ kalyāṇaguṇo, kalyāṇo nāma atrajo;
[22]Rājā tassāsi tanayo, varakalyāṇanāmako.
[21]Tassa putto mahāvīro, mandhātā kāmabhoginaṃ;
[22]Aggabhūto mahindena, aḍḍharajjena pūjito.
[21]Tassa sūnu mahātejo, varamandhātunāmako;
[22]‘Uposatho’ti nāmena, tassa putto mahāyaso.
[21]Varo nāma mahātejo, tassa putto mahāvaro;
[22]Tassāsi upavaroti, putto rājā mahābalo.
[21]Tassa ^a^V1.0267^ea^ putto maghadevo, devatulyo mahīpati;
[22]Caturāsītisahassāni, tassa puttaparamparā.
[21]Tesaṃ pacchimako rājā, ‘okkāko’ iti vissuto;
[22]Mahāyaso mahātejo, akhuddo rājamaṇḍale’’ti.

[07]Ādi ^b^tesaṃ pacchato^eb^ti tesaṃ maghadeva paramparabhūtānaṃ kaḷārajanakapariyosānānaṃ anekasatasahassānaṃ rājūnaṃ aparabhāge okkāko nāma ^a^M1.0302^ea^ rājā ahosi, tassa paramparābhūtānaṃ anekasatasahassānaṃ rājūnaṃ aparabhāge aparo okkāko nāma rājā ahosi, tassa paramparabhūtānaṃ anekasatasahassānaṃ rājūnaṃ aparabhāge punāparo okkāko nāma rājā ahosi, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tayo okkākavaṃsā ahesuṃ. Tesu tatiyaokkākassā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Sahasā varaṃ adāsi^eb^nti puttadassanena somanassappatto sahasā avīmaṃsitvā tuṭṭhiyā vasena varaṃ adāsiṃ, ‘‘yaṃ icchasi, taṃ gaṇhā’’ti. ^b^Rajjaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ icchatī^eb^ti sā jantukumārassa mātā mama taṃ varadānaṃ antaraṃ katvā imaṃ rajjaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ icchatīti.
[03]^b^Nappasaheyyā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0394^ea^ na pariyatto bhaveyya.

[03]^b^Nikkhammā^eb^ti gharāvāsato, kāmehi ca nikkhamitvā. ^b^Heṭṭhā cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddena ‘‘asītihatthe’’ti idaṃ anukaḍḍhati. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti migasūkarehi, maṇḍūkamūsikehi ca. ^b^Te^eb^ti sīhabyagghādayo, sappabiḷārā ca.
[03]^b^Avasesāhi^eb^ attano attano kaniṭṭhāhi.
[03]^b^Vaḍḍhamānāna^eb^nti anādare sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Kuṭṭharogo^eb^ nāma sāsamasūrīrogā viya yebhuyyena saṅkamanasabhāvoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ rogo saṅkamatīti cintetvā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Migasūkarādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vanacarasoṇādike saṅgaṇhāti.
[03]Tasmiṃ nisinneti sambandho. Khattiyamāyārocanena ^b^attano khattiyabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā.^eb^
[03]^b^Nagaraṃ^eb^^a^V1.0268^ea^^b^māpehī^eb^ti sāhāraṃ nagaraṃ māpehīti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^Kesaggahaṇa^eb^nti kesaveṇibandhanaṃ. ^b^Dussaggahaṇa^eb^nti vatthassa nivāsanākāro.

[03]^b^268^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Attano upārambhamocanatthāyā^eb^ti ācariyena ambaṭṭhena ca attano attano upari pāpetabbaupavādassa apanayanatthaṃ. ^b^Asmiṃ vacane^eb^ti ‘‘cattārome bho gotama vaṇṇā’’tiādinā attanā vutte, bhotā ca gotamena vutte ‘‘jātivāde’’ti imasmiṃ yathādhikate vacane. Tattha pana yasmā vede vuttavidhināva tena paṭimantetabbaṃ hoti ^a^M1.0303^ea^, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vedattayavacane’’^eb^ti, ^b^‘‘etasmiṃ vā dāsiputtavacane’’^eb^ti ca.

[03]^b^270^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhammo^eb^ nāma kāraṇaṃ ‘‘dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu (vibha. 718) viya, saha dhammenāti sahadhammo, sahadhammo ^a^P1.0395^ea^ eva ^b^sahadhammiko^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sahetuko’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^271^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmā^eb^ tadā paṭiññātattā. ^b^Tāsetvā pañhaṃ vissajjāpessāmīti āgato^eb^ yathā taṃ saccakasamāgame. ‘‘Bhagavā ceva passati ambaṭṭho cā’’ti ettha itaresaṃ adassane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yadi hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Āvāhetvā^eb^ti mantabalena ānetvā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti ambaṭṭhassa. ^b^Vādasaṅghaṭṭe^eb^ti vācāsaṅghaṭṭe.

[03]^b^272^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tāṇanti gavesamāno^eb^ti, ‘‘ayameva samaṇo gotamo ito bhayato mama tāyako’’ti bhagavantaṃyeva ‘‘tāṇa’’nti pariyesanto upagacchanto. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Tāyatī^eb^ti yathāupaṭṭhitabhayato pāleti, tenāha ^b^‘‘rakkhatī’’^eb^ti, etena tāṇa-saddassa kattusādhanatamāha. Yathupaṭṭhitena bhayena upadduto nilīyati etthāti ^b^leṇaṃ,^eb^ upalayanaṃ, etena leṇa-saddassa adhikaraṇasādhanatamāha. ^b^‘‘Saratī’’^eb^ti etena saraṇa-saddassa kattusādhanatamāha.

[03]^b^274^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇato^eb^ti gaṅgāya nadiyā dakkhiṇadisāya. ^b^Āvudhaṃ na parivattatī^eb^ti saraṃ vāsattiādiṃ vā parassa upari khipitukāmassa hatthaṃ na parivattati, hatthe pana aparivattente kuto āvudhaparivattananti āha ^b^‘‘āvudhaṃ na parivattatī’’^eb^ti. So kira ‘‘kathaṃ nāmāhaṃ disāya dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbatto’’ti taṃ hīnaṃ jātiṃ jigucchanto ‘‘handāhaṃ yathā tathā ^a^V1.0269^ea^ imaṃ jātiṃ sodhessāmī’’ti niggato, tenāha ^b^‘‘idāni me manorathaṃ pūressāmī’’^eb^tiādi. Vijjābalena rājānaṃ tāsetvā tassa dhītuyā laddhakālato paṭṭhāya myāyaṃ jātisodhitā ^a^M1.0304^ea^ bhavissatīti tassa adhippāyo. ^b^Ambaṭṭhaṃ nāma vijja^eb^nti sattānaṃ sarīre abbhaṅgaṃ ṭhapetīti ambaṭṭhāti evaṃ ^a^P1.0396^ea^ laddhanāmaṃ vijjaṃ, mantanti attho. Yato ambaṭṭhā etasmiṃ atthīti ambaṭṭhoti kaṇho isi paññāyittha, taṃbaṃsajātatāya ayaṃ māṇavo ‘‘ambaṭṭho’’ti voharīyati.

[03]Seṭṭhamante vedamanteti adhippāyo. Mantānubhāvena rañño bāhukkhambhamattaṃ jātaṃ tena panassa bāhukkhambhena rājā, ‘‘ko jānāti, kiṃ bhavissatī’’ti bhīto ussaṅkī utrāso ahosi, tenāha ^b^‘‘bhayena vedhamāno aṭṭhāsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sotthi bhaddanteti ādivacanaṃ avocuṃ.^eb^ ‘‘Ayaṃ mahānubhāvo isī’’ti maññamānā.

[03]^b^Undriyissatī^eb^ti vippakiriyissati, tenāha ^b^‘‘bhijjissatī’’^eb^ti. Mante parivattiteti bāhukkhambhakamantassa paṭippassambhakavijjāsaṅkhāte mante ^b^‘‘saro otaratū’’^eb^ti parivattite. Evarūpānañhi mantānaṃ ekaṃseneva paṭippassambhakavijjā hontiyeva yathā taṃ kusumārakavijjānaṃ. Attano dhītu apavādamocanatthaṃ tassa bhujissakaraṇaṃ. Tassānurūpe issariye ṭhapanatthaṃ^b^ uḷāre ca naṃ ṭhāne ṭhapesi.^eb^

[03]^b^275^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samassāsanatthamāha karuṇāyanto, na kulīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘atha kho bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Brāhmaṇesū^eb^ti brāhmaṇānaṃ samīpe, tato brāhmaṇehi laddhabbaṃ āsanādiṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘brāhmaṇānaṃ antare’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kevalaṃ ^a^P1.0397^ea^ saddhāya kātabbaṃ ^b^saddhaṃ,^eb^ paralokagate sandhāya na tato kiñci apatthentena kātabbanti attho, tenāha ^b^‘‘matake uddissa katabhatte’’^eb^ti. ^b^Maṅgalādibhatte^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ussavadevatārādhanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Yaññabhatte^eb^ti pāpasaññamādivasena katabhatte. ^b^Pāhunakāna^eb^nti atithīnaṃ. ^b^Khattiyabhāvaṃ appatto^eb^ ubhato sujātatābhāvato, tenāha ^b^‘‘aparisuddhoti attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^276^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Itthiṃ karitvā^eb^ti ettha karaṇaṃ kiriyāsāmaññavisayanti āha ^b^‘‘itthiṃ pariyesitvā’’^eb^ti. Brāhmaṇakaññaṃ itthiṃ khattiyakumārassa bhariyābhūtaṃ ^a^M1.0305^ea^ gahetvāpi khattiyāva seṭṭhā, hīnā brāhmaṇāti yojanā. ^b^Purisena vā purisaṃ karitvā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Pakaraṇe^eb^ti rāgādivasena ^a^V1.0270^ea^ paduṭṭhe pakkhalite kāraṇe, tenāha ^b^‘‘dose’’^eb^ti. Bhassati niratthakabhāvena khipīyatīti ^b^bhassaṃ,^eb^ chārikā.

[03]^b^277^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Janitasmi^eb^nti kammakilesehi nibbatte. Jane etasminti vā ^b^janetasmiṃ,^eb^ manussesūti attho, tenāha ^b^‘‘gottapaṭisārino’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saṃsanditvā^eb^ti ghaṭetvā, aviruddhaṃ katvāti attho.
[06]Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^278^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Idaṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti idaṃ ajjhenādi kattuṃ labbhati. ^b^Jātivādavinibaddhā^eb^ti jātisannissitavāde vinibaddhā. Brāhmaṇasseva ajjhenajjhāpanayajanayājanādayoti ^a^P1.0398^ea^ evaṃ ye attukkaṃsanaparavambhanavasena pavattā, tato eva te ^b^mānavādapaṭibaddhā^eb^ ca honti. Ye pana ^b^āvāhavivāhavinibaddhā,^eb^ te eva sambandhattayavasena ‘‘arahasi vā maṃ tvaṃ, na vā maṃ tvaṃ arahasī’’ti evaṃ pavattanakā.

[03]^b^Yatthā^eb^ti yassaṃ vijjācaraṇasampattiyaṃ. ^b^Laggissāmā^eb^ti olaggā antogadhā bhavissāmāti ^b^cintayimha.^eb^ Paramatthato avijjācaraṇāniyeva ‘‘vijjācaraṇānī’’ti gahetvā ṭhito paramatthato vijjācaraṇesu vibhajiyamānesu so tato dūrato apanīto nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dūrameva avakkhipī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samudāgamato pabhutī^eb^tiādisamuṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya.

[03]^b^279^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^ Tividhaṃ sīla^eb^nti khuddakādibhedaṃ tividhaṃ sīlaṃ. ^b^Sīlavasenevā^eb^ti sīlapariyāyeneva. ^b^Kiñci kiñcī^eb^ti ahiṃsanādiyamaniyamalakkhaṇaṃ kiñci kiñci ^b^sīlaṃ atthi. Tattha tattheva laggeyyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva brāhmaṇasamayasiddhe sīlamatte ‘‘caraṇa’’nti laggeyya. ^b^Aṭṭhapi samāpattiyo caraṇanti niyyātitā honti^eb^ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaniddeseneva arūpajjhānānampi niddiṭṭhabhāvāpattito niyyātitā nidassitā.

[03]^b^280^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Asampāpuṇanto^eb^ti ^a^V1.0271^ea^^a^M1.0306^ea^ ārabhitvā sampattuṃ asakkonto. ^b^Avisahamāno^eb^ti ārabhitumeva asakkonto. ^b^Khāri^eb^nti parikkhāraṃ. Taṃ pana vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘araṇī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^araṇī^eb^ti aggidhamanakaṃ araṇīdvayaṃ. ^b^Sujā^eb^ti dabbi. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena tidaṇḍatighaṭikādiṃ ^a^P1.0399^ea^ saṅgaṇhāti ^b^khāribharita^eb^nti khārīhi puṇṇaṃ. Nanu upasampannassa bhikkhuno sāsanikopi yo koci anupasampanno atthato paricārakova, kiṃ aṅgaṃ pana bāhirakapabbajiteti tattha visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kāmañcā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘kappiyakaraṇa…pe… vattakaraṇavasenā’’ti evaṃ vuttena nayena. ^b^Paricārako hoti^eb^ upasampannabhāvassa visiṭṭhabhāvato. ‘‘Navakoṭisahassānī’’tiādinā (visuddhi. 1.20; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 37) vuttappabhedānaṃ anekasahassānaṃ saṃvaravinayānaṃ samādiyitvā vattanena uparibhūtā aggabhūtā sampadāti hi ‘‘upasampadā’’ti vuccatīti. ^b^Guṇādhikopī^eb^ti guṇehi ukkaṭṭhopi. ^b^Ayaṃ panā^eb^ti vuttalakkhaṇo tāpaso.

[03]Tāpasā nāma kammavādikiriyāvādino, na sāsanassa paṭāṇībhūtā, yato nesaṃ pabbajituṃ āgatānaṃ titthiyaparivāsena vināva pabbajjā anuññātāti katvā ^b^‘‘kasmā panā’’^eb^ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhapeti codako. Ācariyo ^b^‘‘yasmā’’^eb^tiādinā codanaṃ pariharati. ‘‘Osakkissatī’’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘imasmiñhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Khuradhārūpama^eb^nti khuradhārānaṃ matthakeneva akkamitvā gamanūpamaṃ. ^b^Aññe^eb^ti aññe bhikkhū. ^b^Aggisāla^eb^nti aggihuttasālaṃ. ^b^Nānādārūhī^eb^ti palāsadaṇḍādinānāvidhasamidhādārūhi.

[03]^b^Ida^eb^nti ‘‘catudvāraṃ āgāraṃ katvā’’tiādinā vuttaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti assa catutthassa puggalassa. ^b^Paṭipattimukha^eb^nti kohaññapaṭipattiyā mukhamattaṃ. So hi nānāvidhena kohaññena lokaṃ vimhāpento tattha acchati, tenāha ^b^‘‘iminā hi mukhena so evaṃ paṭipajjatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Khalādīsu ^a^P1.0400^ea^ manussānaṃ santike upatiṭṭhitvā vīhimuggatilamāsādīni bhikkhācariyāniyāmena saṅkaḍḍhitvā uñchanaṃ uñchā, sā eva cariyā vutti etesanti ^b^uñchācariyā.^eb^ Aggipakkena jīvantīti aggipakkikā, na aggipakkikā ^b^anaggipakkikā^eb^^a^M1.0307^ea^. Uñchācariyā hi khalesu gantvā khalaggaṃ nāma manussehi diyyamānaṃ dhaññaṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ ime na gaṇhantīti anaggipakkikā nāma jātā. ^b^Asāmapākā^eb^ti asayaṃpācakā. Asmamuṭṭhinā muṭṭhipāsāṇena ^a^V1.0272^ea^ vattantīti ^b^asmamuṭṭhikā.^eb^ Dantena uppāṭitaṃ vakkalaṃ rukkhattaco dantavakkalaṃ, tena vattantīti ^b^dantavakkalikā.^eb^ Pavattaṃ rukkhādito pātitaṃ phalaṃ bhuñjantīti ^b^pavattaphalabhojino.^eb^ Jiṇṇapakkatāya paṇḍubhūtaṃ palāsaṃ, taṃsadisañca paṇḍupalāsaṃ, tena vattantīti ^b^paṇḍupalāsikā,^eb^ sayaṃpatitapupphaphalapattabhojino.
[03]Idāni te aṭṭhavidhepi sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṅkaḍḍhitvā^eb^ti bhikkhācariyāvasena laddhadhaññaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā.
[03]^b^Pariyeṭṭhi nāma dukkhā^eb^ti paresaṃ gehato gehaṃ gantvā pariyeṭṭhi nāma dīnavuttibhāvena dukkhā. Pāsāṇassa pariggaho dukkho pabbajitassāti vā danteheva uppāṭetvā khādanti.
[03]^b^Imāhi catūhiyevā^eb^ti ‘‘khārividhaṃ ādāyā’’tiādinā vuttāhi catūhi eva tāpasapabbajjāhīti.

[03]^b^282^eb^^b^.^eb^ Apāye vināse niyutto ^b^āpāyiko.^eb^ Tabbhāvaṃ paripūretuṃ asakkonto tena aparipuṇṇo ^b^aparipūramāno^eb^^a^P1.0401^ea^, karaṇe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘āpāyikenāpi aparipūramānenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^283^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dīyatīti datti, dattiyeva ^b^dattika^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘dinnaka’’^eb^nti. Yadi brāhmaṇassa sammukhībhāvo rañño na dātabbo, kasmāssa upasaṅkamanaṃ na paṭikkhittanti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Khettavijjāyā^eb^ti nītisatthe. ^b^Payāta^eb^nti saddhaṃ, sassatikaṃ vā, tenāha ^b^‘‘abhiharitvā dinna’’^eb^nti. Kasmā bhagavā ‘‘rañño pasenadissa kosalassa dattikaṃ bhuñjatī’’tiādinā brāhmaṇassa mammavacanaṃ avocāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘idaṃ pana kāraṇa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^284^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rathūpatthare^eb^ti ^a^M1.0308^ea^ rathassa upari attharitapadese. ^b^Pākaṭamantana^eb^nti pakāsabhūtaṃ mantanaṃ. Tañhi suddādīhi ñāyatīti na rahassamantanaṃ. ^b^Bhaṇatī^eb^ti api nu bhaṇati.

[03]^b^285^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pavattāro^eb^ti ^a^V1.0273^ea^ pāvacanabhāvena vattāro, yasmā te tesaṃ mantānaṃ pavattakā, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘pavattayitāro’’^eb^ti. Sudde bahi katvā raho bhāsitabbaṭṭhena mantā eva, taṃtaṃatthapaṭipattihetutāya padanti ^b^mantapadaṃ,^eb^ anupanītāsādhāraṇatāya vā rahassabhāvena vattabbaṃ hitakiriyāya adhigamupāyaṃ. ^b^Sajjhāyita^eb^nti gāyanavasena sajjhāyitaṃ, taṃ pana udattānudattādīnaṃ sarānaṃ sampādanavaseneva icchitanti āha ^b^‘‘sarasampattivasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññesaṃ vutta^eb^nti pāvacanabhāvena aññesaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Samupabyūḷha^eb^nti saṅgahetvā uparūpari saññūḷhaṃ. ^b^Rāsikata^eb^nti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedādivasena ^a^P1.0402^ea^, tatthāpi paccekaṃ mantabrahmādivasena, ajjhāyānuvākādivasena ca rāsikataṃ.

[03]^b^Tesa^eb^nti mantānaṃ kattūnaṃ. ^b^Dibbena cakkhunā oloketvā^eb^ti dibbacakkhuparibhaṇḍena yathākammūpagañāṇena sattānaṃ kammassakatādiṃ paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena dibbacakkhusadisena pubbenivāsañāṇena atītakappe brāhmaṇānaṃ mantajjhenavidhiñca oloketvā. ^b^Pāvacanena saha saṃsanditvā^eb^ti kassapasammāsambuddhassa yaṃ vacanaṃ vaṭṭasannissitaṃ, tena saha aviruddhaṃ katvā. Na hi tesaṃ vivaṭṭasannissito attho paccakkho hoti. ^b^Aparāpare panā^eb^ti aṭṭhakādīhi aparā pare pacchimā okkākarājakālādīsu uppannā. ^b^Pakkhipitvā^eb^ti aṭṭhakādīhi ganthitamantapadesu kilesasannissitapadānaṃ tattha tattha pade pakkhipanaṃ katvā. ^b^Viruddhe akaṃsū^eb^ti brāhmaṇadhammikasuttādīsu āgatanayena saṃkilesikatthadīpanato paccanīkabhūte akaṃsu. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti ‘‘tyāhaṃ mante adhīyāmī’’ti etasmiṃ ṭhāne. ^b^Paṭiññaṃ aggahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘taṃ kiṃ maññasī’’ti evaṃ paṭiññaṃ aggahetvāva.

[03]^b^286^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nirāmagandhā^eb^ti kilesāsucivasena vissagandharahitā. ^b^Anitthigandhā^eb^ti itthīnaṃ gandhamattassapi avisahanena itthigandharahitā. Ettha ca ^b^‘‘nirāmagandhā’’^eb^ti ^a^M1.0309^ea^ etena tesaṃ porāṇānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vikkhambhitakilesataṃ dasseti, ^b^‘‘anitthigandhā brahmacārino’’^eb^ti etena ekavihāritaṃ, ^b^‘‘rajojalladharā’’^eb^ti etena maṇḍanavibhūsanānuyogābhāvaṃ, ^b^‘‘araññāyatane pabbatapādesu vasiṃsū’’^eb^ti etena manussūpacāraṃ ^a^P1.0403^ea^ pahāya vivittavāsaṃ, ^b^‘‘vanamūlaphalāhārā vasiṃsū’’^eb^ti etena sālimaṃsodanādipaṇītāhārapaṭikkhepaṃ, ^b^‘‘yadā’’^eb^tiādinā yānavāhanapaṭikkhepaṃ, ^b^‘‘sabbadisāsū’’^eb^tiādinā rakkhāvaraṇapaṭikkhepaṃ, evañca vadanto micchāpaṭipadāpakkhikaṃ sācariyassa ambaṭṭhassa vuttiṃ upādāya sammāpaṭipadāpakkhikāpi tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vutti ariyavinaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ upādāya micchāpaṭipadāyeva. Kutassa sallekhapaṭipattiyuttatāti. ‘‘Evaṃ sute’’tiādinā bhagavā ambaṭṭhaṃ santajjento niggaṇhātīti dasseti.
[03]^b^Veṭhakehī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0274^ea^ veṭhakapaṭṭakāhi. ^b^Samantānagara^eb^nti nagarassa samantato. ^b^Katasudhākammaṃ^eb^ pākārassa adhobhāge ṭhānaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^287^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na sakkoti^eb^saṅkucite iriyāpathe anavasesato tesaṃ dubbibhāvanato. ^b^Gavesī^eb^ti ñāṇena pariyesanamakāsi. ^b^Samānayī^eb^ti ñāṇena saṅkalento sammā ānayi samāhari. ^b^‘‘Kaṅkhatī’’^eb^ti padassa ākaṅkhatīti ayamatthoti āha ^b^‘‘aho vata passeyyanti patthanaṃ uppādetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kicchatī^eb^ti kilamati. ^b^‘‘Kaṅkhatī’’^eb^ti padassa pubbe āsisanatthataṃ vatvā idānissa saṃsayatthatameva vikappantaravasena dassento ^b^‘‘kaṅkhāya vā dubbalā vimati vuttā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tīhi dhammehī^eb^ti tippakārehi saṃsayadhammehi. ^b^Kālusiyabhāvo^eb^ti appasannatāya hetubhūto āvilabhāvo.

[03]Yasmā bhagavato kosohitaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ āveṇikaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ suvisuddhakañcanamaṇḍalasannikāsaṃ, attano saṇṭhānasannivesasundaratāya ^a^P1.0404^ea^ ājāneyyagandhahatthino varaṅgaparamacārubhāvaṃ, vikasamānatapaniyāravindasamujjalakesarāvattavilāsaṃ, sañjhāpabhānurañjitajalavanantarābhilakkhitasampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalasobhañca attano siriyā abhibhuyya virājati, yaṃ bāhirabbhantaramalehi anupakkiliṭṭhatāya, cirakālaṃ suparicitabrahmacariyādhikāratāya, susaṇṭhitasaṇṭhānasampattiyā ca ^a^M1.0310^ea^, kopīnampi santaṃ akopīnameva, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavato hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pahūtabhāva^eb^nti puthulabhāvaṃ. Ettheva hi tassa saṃsayo, tanumudusukumāratādīsu panassa guṇesu vicāraṇā eva nāhosi.

[03]^b^288^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Hirikaraṇokāsa^eb^nti hiriyitabbaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Chāya^eb^nti paṭibimbaṃ. Kathaṃ kīdisanti āha ^b^‘‘iddhiyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Chāyārūpakamatta^eb^nti bhagavato paṭibimbarūpaṃ. Tañca kho buddhasantānato vinimuttattā rūpakamattaṃ bhagavato sarīravaṇṇasaṇṭhānāvayavaṃ iddhimayaṃ bimbakamattaṃ. Taṃ pana rūpakamattaṃ dassento bhagavā yathā attano buddharūpaṃ na dissati, tathā katvā dasseti. ^b^Ninnetvā^eb^ti nīharitvā. ^b^Kallosī^eb^ti pucchāvissajjane kusalo cheko asi. ^b^Tathākaraṇenā^eb^ti kathinasūciṃ viya karaṇena. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti pahūtajivhāya. ^b^Mudubhāvo pakāsito^eb^ amuduno ghanasukhumabhāvāpādanatthaṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ^b^dīghabhāvo, tanubhāvo^eb^ cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^291^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Atthacarakenā’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0275^ea^ iminā byatirekamukhena anatthacarakataṃyeva vibhāveti. ^b^Na aññatrā^eb^ti na aññasmiṃ sugatiyanti attho. ^b^Upanetvā^eb^^a^P1.0405^ea^^b^upanetvā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ upanetvā upanetvā, tenāha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhudāsādibhāvaṃ āropetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pātesī^eb^ti pavaṭṭanavasena pātesi.

[03]^b^293-6^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āgamā nū^eb^ti āgato nu. ^b^Kho^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti ettha, tumhākaṃ santikanti attho. ^b^Adhivāsetū^eb^ti sādiyatu, taṃ pana sādiyanaṃ manasā sampaṭiggaho hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sampaṭicchatū’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^297^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yāvadattha^eb^nti yāva attho, tāva bhojanena tadā katanti attho. ^b^Oṇitta^eb^nti āmisāpanayanena sucikataṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^298^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anupubbiṃ katha^eb^nti anupubbaṃ kathetabbakathaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘anupaṭipāṭikatha’’^eb^nti. Kā pana sā? Dānādikathāti āha ^b^‘‘dānānantaraṃ sīla’’^eb^ntiādi. Tena dānakathā tāva pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasādhāraṇattā, sukarattā, sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito ^a^M1.0311^ea^ kathetabbā. Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahitavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati, tattha ca suppatiṭṭhito hoti. Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakasuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato, kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato, bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca ^b^dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā^eb^ kathetabbā, tañce dānasīlaṃ vaṭṭanissitaṃ, ayaṃ bhavasampatti tassa phalanti dassanatthaṃ imehi ca dānasīlamayehi paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnehi puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnā ^a^P1.0406^ea^ aparimeyyā dibbabhogasampattiyo laddhabbāti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saggakathā. Svāyaṃ saggo rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭho, sabbathānupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggoti dassanatthaṃ ^b^saggānantaraṃ maggo^eb^ kathetabbo. Maggañca kathentena tadadhigamupāyasandassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi, pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti ^b^kāmānaṃ ādīnavo,^eb^ hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasañhitāti tesaṃ ^b^okāro^eb^ lāmakabhāvo, sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti ^b^tattha saṃkileso,^eb^ sabbasaṃkilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti ^b^nekkhamme ānisaṃso^eb^ ca kathetabboti ayamattho bodhitoti veditabbo. ^b^Maggo^eb^ti cettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddena ādiatthadīpanato ‘‘kāmānaṃ ādīnavo’’ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgahoti ^a^V1.0276^ea^ evamayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbā. ‘‘Tassa uppattiākāradassanattha’’nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu maggañāṇaṃ asaṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ, na saṅkhatadhammārammaṇanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^paṭivijjhanta^eb^nti asammohapaṭivedhavasena paṭivijjhantaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘kiccavasenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^299^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ettha ca ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhammo’’^eb^tiādi pāḷiyaṃ dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthi, tannivattanatthaṃ ‘‘pattadhammo’’ti vuttaṃ. Patti ca ñāṇasampattito aññampi vijjatīti tato visesadassanatthaṃ ‘‘viditadhammo’’ti vuttaṃ. Sā panesā viditadhammatā ekadesatopi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘pariyogāḷhadhammo’’ti ^a^P1.0407^ea^ vuttaṃ. Tenassa saccābhisambodhaṃyeva dīpeti. Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesena ^a^M1.0312^ea^ catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti, tenāha ^b^‘‘diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tiṇṇā vicikicchā^eb^ti sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā, aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā vitiṇṇā vicikicchā. ^b^Vigatā kathaṅkathā^eb^ti pavattiādīsu. ‘‘Evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho’’ti evaṃ pavattikā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṅkathā. ^b^Vesārajjappatto^eb^ti sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā, tappaṭipakkhesu ca sīlādiguṇesu suppatiṭṭhitattā vesārajjaṃ visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ patto adhigato. Sāyaṃ vesārajjappatti suppatiṭṭhitabhāvoti katvā āha ^b^‘‘satthusāsane’’^eb^ti. Attanā paccakkhato diṭṭhattā adhigatattā na paraṃ pacceti, na tassa paro paccetabbo atthīti ^b^aparappaccayo.^eb^ Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ avuttaṃ, taṃ parato āgamissati. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Ambaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^300^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sundarabhāvena ^a^V1.0277^ea^^a^M1.0313^ea^^a^P1.0408^ea^ sātisayāni aṅgāni etesaṃ atthīti aṅgā, rājakumārāti āha ^b^‘‘aṅgā nāma aṅgapāsādikatāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Idhāpi adhippetā,^eb^ na ambaṭṭhasutte eva. ^b^Āgantuṃ na dassantī^eb^ti āgamane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipanavasena āgantuṃ na dassanti, nānujānissantīti adhippāyo. Nīlāsokakaṇikārakoviḷārakundarājarukkhehi sammissatāya taṃ campakavanaṃ ^b^‘‘nīlādipañcavaṇṇakusumapaṭimaṇḍita’’^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na campakarukkhānaṃyeva nīlādipañcakusumatāyāti vadanti. ^b^‘‘Bhagavā kusumagandhasugandhe campakavane viharatī’’^eb^ti iminā na māpanakāle eva tasmiṃ nagare campakarukkhā ussannā, atha kho aparabhāge pīti dasseti. Māpanakāle hi campakānaṃ ussannatāya sā nagarī ‘‘campā’’ti nāmaṃ labhi. ^b^Issarattā^eb^ti adhipatibhāvato. Senā etassa atthīti seniko, seniko eva ^b^seniyo,^eb^ atthitā cettha bahubhāvavisiṭṭhāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mahatiyā senāya samannāgatattā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^301-2^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃhatā^eb^ti sannipatitā, ‘‘saṅghino’’ti vattabbe ^b^‘‘saṅghī’’^eb^ti puthutthe ekavacanaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ adhippetattā, tenāha ^b^‘‘etesa’’^eb^nti. Rājarājaññādīnaṃ bhaṇḍadharā purisā khatā, nesaṃ ^a^P1.0409^ea^ tāyanato ^b^khattā.^eb^ So hi yehi yattha pesito, tattha tesaṃ dosaṃ pariharanto yuttapattavasena pucchitamatthaṃ katheti, tenāha ^b^‘‘pucchitapañhe byākaraṇasamattho’’^eb^ti. Kulāpadesādinā mahatī mattā etassāti ^b^mahāmatto.^eb^

[03]^b^303^eb^^b^.^eb^ Visiṭṭhaṃ rajjaṃ virajjaṃ, virajjameva verajjaṃ yathā ‘‘vekataṃ vesaya’’nti, nānāvidhaṃ verajjaṃ ^b^nānāverajjaṃ,^eb^ tattha jātātiādinā sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Uttamabrāhmaṇo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0278^ea^ abhijanasampattiyā vittasampattiyā vijjāsampattiyā uggatataro, uḷāro vā brāhmaṇo. ^b^Asannipāto^eb^ti lābhamaccharena nippīḷitatāya asannipāto viya bhavissati.

[03]‘‘Aṅgeti ^a^M1.0314^ea^ gameti ñāpetīti ^b^aṅgaṃ,^eb^ hetūti āha ^b^‘‘imināpi kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Ubhato sujāto’’ti ettake vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujātatā viññāyeyya. Sujāta-saddo ca ‘‘sujāto cārudassano’’tiādīsu (theragā. 818) ārohasampattipariyāyoti jātivaseneva sujātataṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘mātito ca pitito cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Anorasaputtavasenāpi loke mātupitusamaññā dissati, idha panassa orasaputtavaseneva icchitāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘saṃsuddhagahaṇiko’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti dhāretīti ^b^gahaṇī,^eb^ gabbhāsayasaññito mātukucchippadeso. Yathābhuttassa ^a^P1.0410^ea^ āhārassa vipācanavasena gaṇhanato achaḍḍanato ^b^gahaṇī,^eb^ kammajatejodhātu.

[03]Pitā ca mātā ca pitaro, pitūnaṃ pitaro pitāmahā, tesaṃ yugo dvando ^b^pitāmahayugo,^eb^ tasmā, yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahadvandāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi pitāmahaggahaṇeneva mātāmahopi gahitoti. So aṭṭhakathāyaṃ visuṃ na uddhaṭo. Yuga-saddo cettha ekasesanayena daṭṭhabbo ‘‘yugo ca yugo ca yugā’’ti. Evañhi tattha tattha dvandaṃ gahitameva hoti, tenāha ^b^‘‘tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā’’^eb^ti. Purisaggahaṇañcettha ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañhi ‘‘mātito’’ti pāḷivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. ^b^Akkhitto^eb^ti appattakhepo. ^b^Anavakkhitto^eb^ti saddhathālipākādīsu na avakkhitto na chaḍḍito. ^b^Jātivādenā^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kena kāraṇenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca ^b^‘‘ubhato…pe… pitāmahayugā’’^eb^ti etena brāhmaṇassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhagahaṇikabhāvakittanato, ^b^‘‘akkhitto’’^eb^ti iminā kiriyāparādhābhāvo. Kiriyāparādhena hi sattā khepaṃ pāpuṇanti. ^b^‘‘Anupakkuṭṭho’’^eb^ti iminā ayuttasaṃsaggābhāvo. Ayuttasaṃsaggampi hi paṭicca sattā akkosaṃ labhanti.

[03]^b^Issaro^eb^ti ādhipateyyasaṃvattaniyakammabalena īsanasīlo, sā panassa issaratā vibhavasampattipaccayā pākaṭā jātāti aḍḍhatāpariyāyabhāveneva vadanto ^b^‘‘aḍḍhoti issaro’’^eb^ti āha. Mahantaṃ dhanaṃ assa bhūmigatañceva vehāsaṭṭhañcāti ^b^mahaddhano. Tassā^eb^ti tassa tassa ^a^M1.0315^ea^^a^P1.0411^ea^. ^b^Vadanti^eb^ ‘‘anvayato, byatirekato ca anupasaṅkamanakāraṇaṃ kittemā’’ti.

[03]^b^Adhikarūpo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0279^ea^ visiṭṭharūpo uttamasarīro. Dassanaṃ arahatīti ^b^dassanīyo,^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘dassanayoggo’’^eb^ti. Pasādaṃ āvahatīti ^b^pāsādiko,^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘cittappasādajananato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vaṇṇassā^eb^ti vaṇṇadhātuyā. ^b^Sarīra^eb^nti sannivesavisiṭṭhaṃ karacaraṇagīvāsīsādiavayavasamudāyaṃ, so ca saṇṭhānamukhena gayhatīti ^b^‘‘paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti…pe… sampattiyā cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sabbavaṇṇesu suvaṇṇavaṇṇova uttamoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘seṭṭhena suvaṇṇavaṇṇena samannāgato’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi buddhā, cakkavattino ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva honti. ^b^Brahmavacchasī^eb^ti uttamasarīrābho, suvaṇṇābho icceva attho. Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘mahābrahmuno sarīrasadiseneva sarīrena samannāgato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, na brahmujugattataṃ. ^b^Akhuddāvakāso dassanāyā^eb^ti ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā, avayavapāripūriyā ca dassanāya okāso na khuddako, tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbānevā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yamaniyamalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^sīlamassa atthīti sīlavā.^eb^ Taṃ panassa rattaññutāya ^b^vuddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ atthīti vuddhasīlī.^eb^ Tena ca sabbadā sammāyogato ^b^vuddhasīlena samannāgato. Sabbametaṃ pañcasīlamattameva sandhāya vadanti^eb^ tato paraṃ sīlassa tattha abhāvato, tesañca ajānanato.

[03]Ṭhānakaraṇasampattiyā, sikkhāsampattiyā ca katthacipi anūnatāya parimaṇḍalapadāni byañjanāni akkharāni etissāti ^b^parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā.^eb^ Atha vā pajjati attho ^a^P1.0412^ea^ etenāti padaṃ, nāmādi. Yathādhippetamatthaṃ byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ. Tesaṃ paripuṇṇatāya ^b^parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā.^eb^ Atthañāpane sādhanatāya vācāva karaṇanti ^b^vākkaraṇaṃ,^eb^ udāhāraghoso. ^b^Guṇaparipuṇṇabhāvena^eb^ tassa brāhmaṇassa, tena vā bhāsitabbātthassa. ^b^Pūre^eb^ puṇṇabhāve. ^b^Pūre^eb^ti ca purimasmiṃ atthe ādhāre bhummaṃ, dutiyasmiṃ visaye. ^b^‘‘Sukhumālattanenā’’^eb^ti iminā tassā vācāya mudusaṇhabhāvamāha. ^b^Apalibuddhāya^eb^ pittasemhādīhi. ^b^Sandiṭṭhaṃ^eb^ sabbaṃ dassetvā viya ekadesaṃ kathanaṃ. ^b^Vilambitaṃ^eb^ saṇikaṃ cirāyitvā kathanaṃ. ‘‘Sandiddhavilambitādī’’ti vā pāṭho. Tattha ^b^sandiddhaṃ^eb^ sandehajanakaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena dukkhalitānukaḍḍhitādiṃ ^a^M1.0316^ea^ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^‘‘Ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti iminā tassā vācāya atthapāripūriṃ vadanti.

[03]^b^‘‘Jiṇṇo’’^eb^tiādīni padāni suviññeyyāni, heṭṭhā vuttatthāni ca. Dutiyanaye pana ^b^jiṇṇo^eb^ti nāyaṃ jiṇṇatā vayomattena, atha kho kulaparivaṭṭena purāṇatāti āha ^b^‘‘jiṇṇoti porāṇo’’^eb^tiādi, tena tassa brāhmaṇassa kulavasena uditoditabhāvamāha. Jātivuddhiyā ‘‘vayoanuppatto’’ti vakkhamānattā, guṇavuddhiyā tato sātisayattā ca ^b^‘‘vuddhoti sīlācārādiguṇavuddhiyā yutto’’^eb^ti āha. Tathā jātimahallakatāya ^a^P1.0413^ea^ vakkhamānattā ^b^‘‘mahallako’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0280^ea^ padena vibhavamahattatā yojitā. ^b^Maggapaṭipanno^eb^ti brāhmaṇānaṃ paṭipattivīthiṃ upagato taṃ avokkamma caraṇato. ^b^Antimavaya^eb^nti pacchimavayaṃ.

[03]^b^304^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tādisehi mahānubhāvehi saddhiṃ yugaggāhavasenapi dahanaṃ na mādisānaṃ anucchavikaṃ, kuto pana ukkaṃsananti idaṃ brāhmaṇassa na yuttarūpanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘na kho pana metaṃ yutta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sadisā^eb^ti ekadesena sadisā. Na hi buddhānaṃ guṇehi sabbathā sadisā kecipi guṇā aññesu labbhanti. ^b^Itare^eb^ti attano guṇehi asadisaguṇe. ^b^Ida^eb^nti idaṃ atthajātaṃ. ^b^Gopadaka^eb^nti gāviyā pade ṭhitaudakaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṭṭhikulasatasahassa^eb^nti saṭṭhisahassādhikaṃ kulasatasahassaṃ ^b^kulapariyāyenā^eb^ti suddhodanamahārājassa kulānukkamena ^b^āgataṃ. Tesupī^eb^ti tesupi catūsu nidhīsu. ^b^Gahitagahita^eb^nti gahitaṃ gahitaṃ ṭhānaṃ pūratiyeva dhanena paṭipākatikameva hoti. ^b^Aparimāṇoyevā^eb^ti ‘‘ettako eso’’ti kenaci paricchindituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya aparicchinno eva.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti mañcake. ^b^Sīhaseyyaṃ kappesī^eb^ti yathā rāhu asurindo āyāmato, vitthārato ubbedhato ca bhagavato rūpakāyassa paricchedaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, tathā rūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharonto sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.

[03]Kilesehi ^a^M1.0317^ea^ ārakattā parisuddhaṭṭhena ^b^ariya^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘ariyaṃ uttamaṃ parisuddha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ,^eb^ na sukhavipākaṭṭhena. Katthaci ^a^P1.0414^ea^^b^caturāsītipāṇasahassāni,^eb^ katthaci ^b^aparimāṇāpi devamanussā^eb^ yasmā catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu asaṅkhyeyyā aparimeyyā devamanussā ^b^maggaphalāmataṃ^eb^ piviṃsu, koṭisatasahassādiparimāṇenapi bahū eva, ^b^tasmā^eb^ anuttarācārasikkhāpanavasena bhagavā ^b^bahūnaṃ ācariyo. Te^eb^ti kāmarāgato aññe bhagavato pahīnakilese. ^b^Keḷanā^eb^ti keḷāyanā dhanāyanā.

[03]^b^Apāpapurekkhāro^eb^ti apāpe pure karoti, na vā pāpaṃ purato karotītipi apāpapurekkhāroti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apāpe navalokuttaradhamme’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^apāpe^eb^ti pāpapaṭipakkhe, pāparahite ca. Brahmani seṭṭhe buddhe bhagavati bhavā tassa dhammadesanāvasena ariyāya ^a^V1.0281^ea^ jātiyā jātattā, brahmuno vā bhagavato hitā garukaraṇādinā, yathānusiṭṭhapaṭipattiyā ca, brahmaṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ ariyamaggaṃ jānātīti ^b^brahmaññā,^eb^ ariyasāvakasaṅkhātā pajā, tenāha ^b^‘‘sāriputtā’’^eb^tiādi. Pakatibrāhmaṇajātivasenāpi ‘‘brahmaññāya pajāyā’’ti padassa attho veditabboti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^ Tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā^eb^ti ettha rajjaṃ ^b^raṭṭhaṃ,^eb^ rājanti rājāno etenāti, tadekadesabhūtā padesā pana ^b^janapado,^eb^janā pajjanti ettha sukhajīvikaṃ pāpuṇantīti. Pucchāya vā dosaṃ sallakkhetvāti sambandho. ^b^Asamatthata^eb^nti attano asamatthataṃ. ^b^Bhagavā vissajjeti^eb^ tesaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ, ñāṇaparipākaṃ, cittācārañca ñatvāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^‘‘Ehi^eb^^a^P1.0415^ea^^b^svāgatavādī’’^eb^ti iminā sukhasambhāsapubbakaṃ piyavāditaṃ dasseti, ^b^‘‘sakhilo’’^eb^ti iminā saṇhavācataṃ, ^b^‘‘sammodako’’^eb^ti iminā paṭisandhārakusalataṃ, ^b^‘‘abhākuṭiko’’^eb^ti iminā sabbattheva vippasannamukhataṃ, ^b^‘‘uttānamukho’’^eb^ti iminā sukhālāpataṃ, ^b^‘‘pubbabhāsī’’^eb^ti iminā dhammānuggahassa okāsakaraṇato hitajjhāsayataṃ bhagavato vibhāveti.
[03]^b^Yattha kirā^eb^ti ^b^kira^eb^-saddo arucisūcanattho, tena bhagavatā adhivutthapadese na devatānubhāvena manussānaṃ anupaddavatā, atha kho buddhānubhāvenāti dasseti. Tenāha ‘‘apicā’’tiādi.

[03]^b^Anusāsitabbo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0318^ea^ vineyyajanasamūho gayhatīti nibbattitaṃ ariyasaṅghameva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sayaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, anantarassa vidhi paṭisedho vāti katvā. ^b^‘‘Tādisovā’’^eb^ti iminā ‘‘sayaṃ vā’’tiādinā vuttavikappo eva paccāmaṭṭhoti. ‘‘Purimapadasseva vā’’ti vikappantaraggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Bahūnaṃ titthakarāna^eb^nti pūraṇādīnaṃ anekesaṃ titthakarānaṃ, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Kāraṇenā^eb^ti appicchasantuṭṭhatādisamāropanalakkhaṇena kāraṇena. ^b^Āgantukā navakā^eb^ti abhinavā āgantukā abbhāgatā. ^b^Pariyāpuṇāmī^eb^ti paricchindituṃ jānāmi sakkomi, tenāha ^b^‘‘jānāmī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno’’^eb^ti abhūtaparikappanavacanametaṃ tathā bhāsamānassa abhāvato.

[03]^b^305^eb^^b^.^eb^ Alaṃ-saddo ^a^P1.0416^ea^ arahattopi hoti ‘‘alameva nibbinditu’’ntiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.124) viyāti ^a^V1.0282^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘alamevāti yuttamevā’’^eb^ti. Puṭena netvā asitabbato paribhuñjitabbato ^b^puṭosaṃ vuccati pātheyyaṃ. Puṭaṃsena^eb^ purisena.
[03]^b^307^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ubhatopakkhikā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena ubhayapakkhikā. ^b^Kerāṭikā^eb^ti saṭhā.
[03]^b^309^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vighāta^eb^nti cittadukkhaṃ.

[03]^b^311-3^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suja^eb^nti homadabbiṃ ^b^paggaṇhantesū^eb^ti juhanatthaṃ gaṇhanakesu, irubbijjesūti attho. ^b^Paṭhamo vā^eb^ti tattha sannipatitesu yajanakiriyāyaṃ sabbapadhāno vā. ^b^Dutiyo vā^eb^ti tadanantaro vā. ^b^‘‘Suja’’^eb^nti karaṇe etaṃ upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘sujāyā’’^eb^ti. Aggihuttapamukhatāya yaññassa yaññe diyyamānaṃ sujāmukhena dīyatīti āha ^b^‘‘sujāya diyyamāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Porāṇā^eb^ti aṭṭhakathācariyā. ^b^Visesato^eb^ti vijjācaraṇavisesato, na brāhmaṇehi icchitavijjācaraṇamattato. ^b^Uttamabrāhmaṇassā^eb^ti anuttaradakkhiṇeyyatāya ukkaṭṭhabrāhmaṇassa. ^b^Brāhmaṇasamaya^eb^nti brāhmaṇasiddhantaṃ. ^b^Mā bhindi^eb^ mā vināsesi.

[03]^b^316^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samasamo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0319^ea^ samoyeva hutvā samo. Hīnopamavasenapi samatā vuccatīti taṃ nivattento ^b^‘‘ṭhapetvā ekadesasamatta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Kulakoṭiparidīpana^eb^nti kulāadiparidīpanaṃ ^b^athāpi^eb^^a^P1.0417^ea^^b^siyā^eb^ti athāpi tumhākaṃ evaṃ parivitakko siyā. ^b^Brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ sādheti^eb^ vaṇṇo. ^b^Mantajātīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Sīlameva sādhessati^eb^ brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ. Kasmāti ce? Āha ^b^‘‘tasmiñhissā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sammohamattaṃ vaṇṇādayo^eb^ti vaṇṇamantajātiyo hi brāhmaṇabhāvassa aṅganti sammohamattametaṃ asamavekkhitābhimānabhāvato.

[03]^b^317^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kathito brāhmaṇena pañho^eb^ti ‘‘sīlavā ca hotī’’tiādinā dvinnameva aṅgānaṃ vasena ^a^V1.0283^ea^ yathāpucchito pañho yāthāvato vissajjito ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ yathāvissajjite atthe. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti soṇadaṇḍassa. ^b^Sīlaparisuddhā^eb^ti sīlasampattiyā sabbaso suddhā anupakkiliṭṭhā. ^b^Kuto dussīle paññā^eb^ asamāhitattā tassa. ^b^Jaḷe eḷamūge kuto sīla^eb^nti jaḷe eḷamūge duppaññe kuto sīlaṃ sīlavibhāgassa, sīlaparisodhanūpāyassa ca ajānanato. Pakaṭṭhaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ ñāṇaṃ paññāṇanti, pākatikaṃ ñāṇaṃ nivattetuṃ ‘‘paññāṇa’’nti vuttanti tayidaṃ pakārehi jānanato ^b^paññāvā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘paññāṇanti paññā yevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sīlenadhotā^eb^ti samādhipadaṭṭhānena sīlena sakalasaṃkilesamalavisuddhiyā dhotā visuddhā, tenāha ^b^‘‘kathaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^dhovatī^eb^ti sujjhati. ^b^Mahāsaṭṭhivassatthero viyā^eb^ti saṭṭhivassamahāthero viya. ^b^Vedanāpariggahamattampī^eb^ti ettha ^b^vedanāpariggaho^eb^ nāma yathāuppannaṃ vedanaṃ sabhāvarasato upadhāretvā ‘‘ayaṃ vedanā phassaṃ paṭicca, so phasso anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo’’ti lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā pavattitavipassanā. Evaṃ vipassantena ^a^P1.0418^ea^ ‘‘sukhena sakkā sā vedanā adhivāsetuṃ ‘‘vedanā eva vediyatī’’ti. ^b^Vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā^eb^ti yathāuppannaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ananuvattitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā vīthiṃ paṭipannāya vipassanāya taṃ vinodetvā. ^b^Saṃsumārapatitenā^eb^ti kumbhīlena viya bhūmiyaṃ ^a^M1.0320^ea^ urena nipajjanena. ^b^Paññāya sīlaṃ dhovitvā^eb^ti akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena sīlaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu paññāya suvisodhitaṃ katvā.

[03]^b^318^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Kasmā āhā’’^eb^ti uparidesanāya kāraṇaṃ pucchati. ^b^Lajjā^eb^ nāma ‘‘sīlassa jātiyā ca guṇadosapakāsanena samaṇena gotamena pucchitapañhaṃ vissajjesī’’ti parisāya paññātatā. ^b^Ettakaparamā^eb^ti ettakaukkaṃsakoṭikā pañca sīlāni, vedattayavibhāvanaṃ paññañca lakkhaṇādito niddhāretvā jānanaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ tattha vacīparamā mayanti dassetīti āha ^b^‘‘sīlapaññāṇanti vacanameva paramaṃ amhāka’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Ayaṃ pana viseso’’^eb^ti idaṃ niyyātanāpekkhaṃ sīlaniddese, tenāha ^b^‘‘sīlamicceva niyyātita’’^eb^nti. Sāmaññaphale pana ‘‘sāmaññaphala’’ micceva niyyātitaṃ, paññāniddese pana jhānapaññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanāpaññāvaseneva paññāniyyātanaṃ kataṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭhamajjhānādīnī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^321-2^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nattā^eb^ti puttaputto. Agāravaṃ nāma natthi, na cāyaṃ bhagavati agāravena ‘‘ahañceva ^a^V1.0284^ea^ kho panā’’tiādimāha, atha kho attalābhaparihānibhayena. Ayañhi yathā tathā attano mahājanassa sambhāvanaṃ uppādetvā kohaññena ^a^P1.0419^ea^ pare vimhāpetvā lābhuppādaṃ nijigisanto vicarati, tasmā tathā avoca, tenāha ^b^‘‘iminā kirā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Taṅkhaṇānurūpāyā^eb^ti yādisī tadā tassa ajjhāsayappavatti, tadanurūpāyāti attho.
