[03]^b^Na^eb^nti paṭhamavādiṃ. ^b^Nisedhetvā^eb^ti ‘‘na kho nāmetaṃ bho evaṃ bhavissatī’’ti evaṃ paṭikkhipitvā. ^b^Asaññikabhāva^eb^nti muñchāpattiyā kiriyamayasaññāvasena vigatasaññibhāvaṃ. Vakkhati hi ‘‘visaññī hutvā’’ti. Vikkhambhanavasena kilesānaṃ santāpanena ^b^attantapo. Ghoratapo^eb^ti dukkaratāya bhīmatapo. ^b^Parimāritindriyo^eb^ti nibbisevanabhāvāpādanena sabbaso milāpitacakkhādindriyo. ^b^Bhaggo^eb^ti bhañjitakusalajjhāsayo. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ saññā hi bho purisassa attā’’tiādiākārena saññānirodhamāha. Iminā nayena ito paresu dvīsu ṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā.

[03]^b^Āthabbaṇapayoga^eb^nti āthabbaṇavedavihitaṃ āthabbaṇikānaṃ visaññibhāvāpādanapayogaṃ. ^b^Āthabbaṇaṃ payojetvā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0477^ea^ āthabbaṇavede āgatāggijuhanapubbakaṃ mantajappanaṃ payojetvā sīsacchinnatādidassanena saññānirodhamāha. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti yassa sīsacchinnatādi dassitaṃ, tassa.

[03]^b^Yakkhadāsīna^eb^nti ^a^M1.0365^ea^ devadāsīnaṃ, yā ‘‘devatābhatiyotipi’’ vuccanti. ^b^Madanidda^eb^nti surāmadanimittakaṃ supanaṃ ^b^devatūpahāra^eb^nti naccanagāyanādinā devatānaṃ pūjaṃ. ^b^Surāpāti^eb^nti pātipuṇṇaṃ suraṃ. ^b^Divā^eb^ti atidivā ussūre.

[03]^b^Elamūgakathā viyā^eb^ti imesaṃ paṇḍitamānīnaṃ kathā andhabālakathāsadisī. ^b^Cattāro nirodhe^eb^ti aññamaññavidhure cattāro nirodhe ^b^ete paññapenti.^eb^ Na ca aññamaññaviruddhanānāsabhāvena tena bhavitabbaṃ, atha kho ekasabhāvena, tenāha ^b^‘‘iminā cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aññenevā^eb^ti imehi vuttākārato aññākāreneva ^b^bhavitabbaṃ. ‘‘Ayaṃ nirodho, ayaṃ nirodho’’^eb^ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ satthā attano desanāvilāsena anekākāravokāraṃ nirodhaṃ vibhāvessatīti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ ^b^aho nūnā^eb^ti ettha ^b^aho^eb^ti acchariye, ^b^nūnā^eb^ti anussaraṇe nipāto. Tasmā aho nūna bhagavā anaññasādhāraṇadesanattā nirodhampi aho acchariyaṃ katvā katheyya maññeti adhippāyo. ^b^‘‘Aho nūna sugato’’^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Acchariyavibhāvanato eva cettha dvikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ, acchariyatthopi cettha ^b^aho^eb^-saddo. So yasmā anussaraṇamukheneva tena gahito, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aho nūnāti anussaraṇatthe’’^eb^ti. Kālapuggalādivibhāgena bahubhedattā ^b^imesaṃ nirodhadhammāna^eb^nti bahuvacanaṃ, kusala-saddayogena sāmivacanaṃ bhummatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ciṇṇavasitāyā^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ ^a^V1.0324^ea^ vasībhāvassa ciṇṇattā. ^b^Sabhāvaṃ jānātī^eb^ti nirodhassa sabhāvaṃ yāthāvato jānāti.

[03]^b^412^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gharamajjheyeva^eb^^a^P1.0478^ea^^b^pakkhalitā^eb^ti gharato bahi gantukāmā purisā maggaṃ anotaritvā gharājirena samatale vivaṭaṅgaṇe eva pakkhalanaṃ pattā, evaṃ sampadamidanti attho. Asādhāraṇo ^b^hetu,^eb^ sādhāraṇo ^b^paccayo^eb^ti evamādi vibhāgena idha payojanaṃ natthi saññāya akāraṇabhāvapaṭikkhepattā codanāyāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāraṇasseva nāma’’^eb^nti.

[03]Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī’’ti vuttaṃ, tattha ‘‘sahetū sappaccayā saññā uppajjanti, uppannā pana nirujjhantiyeva, na tiṭṭhantī’’ti dassanatthaṃ ‘‘nirujjhantī’’ti vacanaṃ, na nirodhassa sahetusappaccayabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Uppādo hi sahetuko ^a^M1.0366^ea^, na nirodho. Yadi hi nirodhopi sahetuko siyā, tassa nirodhenāpi bhavitabbaṃ aṅkurādīnaṃ viya, na ca tassa nirodho atthi. Tasmā vuttanayeneva pāḷiyā attho veditabbo. Ayañca nayo khaṇanirodhavasena vutto. Yo pana yathāparicchinnakālavasena sabbasova anuppādanirodho, so ‘‘sahetuko’’ti veditabbo tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhatī’’ti. (Dī. ni. 1.412) tato eva ca idhāpi vuttaṃ ‘‘saññāya sahetukaṃ uppādanirodhaṃ dīpetu’’nti.

[03]^b^Sikkhā ekā^eb^ti ettha ^b^sikkhā^eb^ti karaṇe paccattavacanaṃ, eka-saddo aññapariyāyo ‘‘ittheke abhivadanti sato vā pana sattassā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.85 ādayo; ma. ni. 3.21) viya, na saṅkhyāvācīti āha ^b^‘‘sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjantī^eb^ti ^b^sikkhāya ekaccā saññā jāyantī’’^eb^ti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^413^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tassaṃ uparidesanāyaṃ. ^b^Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappavasena pariyāpannattā āgatā^eb^ti sabhāvato upakārato ca paññākkhandhe pariyāpannattā saṅgahitattā ^b^tatiyā^eb^ adhipaññāsikkhā sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappavasena ^a^P1.0479^ea^ āgatā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘yā cāvuso visākha sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.462) kāmañcettha vuttanayena ^a^V1.0325^ea^ tissopi sikkhā āgatā eva, tathāpi adhicittasikkhāya eva abhisaññānirodho dassito, itarā tassa sambhārabhāvena ānītā.

[03]^b^Pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo^eb^ti pañcakāmakoṭṭhāse ārabbha uppajjanakarāgo. ^b^Asamuppannakāmacāro^eb^ti vattamānuppannatāvasena asamuppanno yo koci kāmacāro yā kāci lobhuppatti. Purimo visayavasena niyamitattā kāmaguṇārammaṇova lobho daṭṭhabbo, itaro pana jhānanikantibhavarāgādippabhedo sabbopi lobhacāro kāmanaṭṭhena kāmesu pavattanato. Sabbepi hi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmāti. Ubhayesampi kāmasaññātināmatā sahacaraṇañāyenāti ‘‘kāmasaññā’’ti paduddhāraṃ katvā tadubhayaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ.

[03]^b^‘‘Tatthā’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M1.0367^ea^ asamuppannakāmacārato pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa visesadassanaṃ. Kāmaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikarāgopi asamuppanno eva maggena samugghāṭīyati, tasmiṃ pana samugghāṭitepi na sabbo rāgo samugghāṭaṃ gacchati, tasmā pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaggahaṇena na itarassa sabbassa rāgassa gahaṇaṃ hotīti ubhayasādhāraṇena pariyāyena ubhayaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ kāmasaññāggahaṇaṃ katanti tadubhayaṃ sarūpato visesato ca dassetvā sabbasaṅgāhikabhāvato ^b^‘‘asamuppannakāmacāro^eb^^a^P1.0480^ea^^b^pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Sadisattā^eb^ti kāmasaññādibhāvena samānattā, etena pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘purimā’’ti sadisakappanāvasena vuttanti dasseti. Anāgatā hi idha ‘‘nirujjhatī’’ti vuttā anuppādassa adhippetattā, tenāha ^b^‘‘anuppannāva nuppajjatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Nīvaraṇavivekato jātattā vivekajehi paṭhamajjhānapītisukhehi saha akkhātabbā, taṃkoṭṭhāsikā vāti ^b^vivekajaṃ pītisukhasaṅkhātā. ^eb^ Nānattasaññāpaṭighasaññāhi nipuṇatāya sukhumabhūtatāya ^b^sukhumasaññā bhūtā^eb^ sukhumabhāvena, paramatthabhāvena aviparītasabhāvā. Jhānaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ bhāvanāsiddhā saṇhasukhumatā nīvaraṇavikkhambhanavasena viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘kāmacchandādioḷārikaṅgappahānavasena sukhumā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhūtatāyā^eb^ti vijjamānatāya. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbavāresu.

[03]Samāpajjanādhiṭṭhānāni viya vuṭṭhānaṃ jhāne pariyāpannampi hoti yathā taṃ dhammānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇo dhammesu, na āvajjanapaccavekkhaṇānīti ^b^‘‘paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjanto adhiṭṭhahanto vuṭṭhahanto ^a^V1.0326^ea^ ca sikkhatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, na ‘‘āvajjanto paccavekkhanto’’ti. ^b^Ta^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānaṃ. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, tasmā paṭhamajjhānena hetubhūtenāti attho. Hetubhāvo cettha jhānassa yathāvuttasaññāya uppattiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo kāmasaññāya nirodhassa upanissayatāva, tañca kho suttantapariyāyena. Tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ ‘‘tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato’’ti. ^b^Etenupāyenā^eb^ti yvāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānatappaṭipakkhasaññāvasena ‘‘sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhatī’’ti ^a^M1.0368^ea^ ettha attho vutto, etena nayena. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbavāresu.

[03]^b^414^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā panettha samāpattivasena taṃtaṃsaññānaṃ ^a^P1.0481^ea^ uppādanirodhe vuccamāne aṅgavasena so vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Aṅgato sammasana’’^eb^nti anupadadhammavipassanāya lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Anupadadhammavipassanañhi karonto samāpattiṃ patvā aṅgato sammasanaṃ karoti, na ca saññā samāpattiyā kiñci aṅgaṃ hoti. Vuttañca ^b^‘‘idañca saññā saññāti evaṃ aṅgato sammasanaṃ uddhaṭa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Aṅgato^eb^ti vā avayavatoti attho, anupadadhammatoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Tadevā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatanameva.

[03]^b^Yato kho^eb^ti paccatte nissakkavacananti āha ^b^‘‘yo nāmā’’^eb^ti yathā ‘‘ādimhī’’ti etasmiṃ atthe ‘‘ādito’’ti vuccati itaravibhattitopi to-saddassa labbhanato. Sakasmiṃ attanā adhigate saññā sakasaññā, sā etassa atthīti ^b^sakasaññī,^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘attano paṭhamajjhānasaññāya saññavā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakasaññī^eb^ti cettha upari vuccamānanirodhapādakatāya sātisayāya jhānasaññāya atthibhāvajotako ^b^ī^eb^-kāro daṭṭhabbo, tenevāha ^b^‘‘anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusatī’’^eb^tiādi. Tasmā tattha tattha sakasaññitāggahaṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne sabbaso suciṇṇavasībhāvo dīpitoti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Lokiyāna^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, sāmiatthe eva vā. Yadaggena hi taṃ tesu seṭṭhaṃ, tadaggena tesampi seṭṭhanti. ‘‘Lokiyāna’’nti visesanaṃ lokuttarasamāpattīhi tassa aseṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^‘‘Kiccakārakasamāpattīna’’^eb^nti visesanaṃ akiccakārakasamāpattito tassa aseṭṭhabhāvato. Akiccakārakatā cassā paṭusaññākiccābhāvavacanato viññāyati. Yatheva hi tattha saññā, evaṃ phassādayo pīti. Yadaggena hi tattha saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā pakativipassakānaṃ sammasituṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpena ṭhitā, tadaggena heṭṭhimasamāpattidhammā viya paṭukiccakaraṇasamatthāpi na hontīti. Svāyamattho paramatthamañjusāyaṃ ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ āruppakathāyaṃ ^a^V1.0327^ea^ (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.286) savisesaṃ vutto, tasmā tattha vuttanayena ^a^M1.0369^ea^^a^P1.0482^ea^ veditabbo. Keci pana ‘‘yathā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā samāpattiyo uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ sādhenti, na evaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti kassacipi adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ sādheti, tasmā sā akiccakārikā, itarā kiccakārikā vuttā’’ti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ tassāpi vipassanācittaparidamanādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccasādhanato. Tasmā purimoyeva attho yutto.

[03]^b^Pakappetī^eb^ti saṃvidahati. Jhānaṃ samāpajjanto hi jhānasukhaṃ attani saṃvidahati nāma. ^b^Abhisaṅkharotī^eb^ti āyūhati, sampiṇḍetīti attho. Sampiṇḍanattho hi samudayaṭṭho. Yasmā nikantivasena cetanākiccassa matthakappatti, tasmā phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘nikantiṃ kurumāno abhisaṅkharoti nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Imā^eb^ idāni me labbhamānā ^b^ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā nirujjheyyuṃ^eb^ taṃsamatikkameneva uparijhānatthāya cetanābhisaṅkharaṇasambhavato. ^b^Aññā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāhi aññā. Tato thūlatarabhāvato ^b^oḷārikā.^eb^ Kā pana tāti āha ^b^‘‘bhavaṅgasaññā’’^eb^ti. Ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya eva hi uparijhānatthāya cetanābhisaṅkharaṇāni bhaveyyuṃ, vuṭṭhānañca bhavaṅgavasena hoti. Yāva ca upari jhānasamāpajjanaṃ, tāva antarantarā bhavaṅgappavattīti āha ^b^‘‘bhavaṅgasaññā uppajjeyyu’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Cetentovā^eb^ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjanto eva. ^b^Na cete^eb^ti tathā heṭṭhimajjhānesu viya vā pubbābhogābhāvato pubbābhogavasena hi jhānaṃ pakappento idha ‘‘cetetī’’ti vutto. Yasmā ‘‘ahametaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattemi upasampādemi samāpajjāmī’’ti evaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ tattha sālayasseva ^a^P1.0483^ea^ hoti, na anālayassa, tasmā ekaṃ cittakkhaṇikampi jhānaṃ pavattento tattha appahīnanikantikatāya ^b^abhisaṅkharonto evā^eb^ti attho. Yasmā panassa tathā heṭṭhimajjhānesu viya vā tattha pubbābhogo natthi, tasmā ^b^‘‘na abhisaṅkharotī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Imassa bhikkhuno’’^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa vivaraṇaṃ. ^b^‘‘Svāyamattho’’^eb^tiādinā tamevatthaṃ upamāya paṭipādeti.

[03]^b^Pacchābhāge^eb^ti ^a^M1.0370^ea^ pitugharassa pacchābhāge. ^b^Tato^eb^ puttagharato. ^b^Laddhagharamevā^eb^ti yato anena bhikkhā laddhā, tameva gharaṃ puttagehameva. ^b^Āsanasālā viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti^eb^ tato pitugharaputtagharaṭṭhāniyānaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananirodhasamāpattīnaṃ upagantabbato. ^b^Pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvā^eb^ti pavisitvā samatikkantampi pitugharaṃ na manasi katvā. Puttagharasseva ācikkhanaṃ viya ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjitabbampi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ na manasi katvā ^a^V1.0328^ea^ parato nirodhasamāpattiatthāya eva manasikāro. Evaṃ amanasikārasāmaññena, manasikārasāmaññena ca upamupameyyatā veditabbā ācikkhanenapi manasikārasseva jotitattā. Na hi manasikārena vinā ācikkhanaṃ sambhavati.

[03]^b^Tā jhānasaññā^eb^ti tā ekaṃ dve cittavāre pavattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññā. ^b^Nirujjhantī^eb^ti padeseneva nirujjhanti, pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena pana upari anuppādo. Yathā ca jhānasaññānaṃ, evaṃ itarasaññānaṃ pīti āha ^b^‘‘aññā ca oḷārikā bhavaṅgasaññā nuppajjantī’’^eb^ti, yathāparicchinnakālanti adhippāyo. ^b^So evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhū^eb^ti so evaṃ yathāvutte saññāgge ṭhito arahatte, anāgāmiphale vā patiṭṭhito bhikkhu ^a^P1.0484^ea^ dvīhi phalehi samannāgamo, tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhi, soḷasavidhā ñāṇacariyā, navavidhā samādhicariyāti imesaṃ vasena nirodhapaṭipādanapaṭipattiṃ paṭipanno. ^b^Phusatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^phusanaṃ^eb^ nāma vindanaṃ paṭiladdhīti āha ^b^‘‘vindati paṭilabhatī’’^eb^ti. Atthato pana yathāparicchinnakālaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ sabbaso appavatti eva.

[03]^b^Abhī^eb^ti upasaggamattaṃ niratthakaṃ, tasmā ‘‘saññā’’ icceva attho. Nirodhapadena anantarikaṃ katvā samāpattipade vattabbe tesaṃ dvinnaṃ antare sampajānapadaṃ ṭhapitanti āha ^b^‘‘nirodhapadena anantarikaṃ katvā vutta’’^eb^nti, tenāha ^b^‘‘anupaṭi…pe… attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatrāpī^eb^ti tasmimpi tathā padānupubbiṭhapanepi ayaṃ visesatthoti yojanā. ^b^Sampajānantassā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha tattha saṅkhārānaṃ sammasanavasena pajānantassa. ^b^Ante^eb^ti yathāvuttāya nirodhapaṭipattiyā pariyosāne. Dutiyavikappe ^b^sampajānantassā^eb^ti sampajānakārinoti attho, tena nirodhasamāpajjanakassa ^a^M1.0371^ea^ bhikkhuno ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihārikapaññāya saddhiṃ atthasādhikā paññā kiccato dassitā hoti, tenāha ^b^‘‘paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sabbākārenā^eb^ti ‘‘samāpattiyā sarūpaviseso, samāpajjanako, samāpajjanassa ṭhānaṃ, kāraṇaṃ, samāpajjanākāro’’ti evamādi sabbappakārena. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti visuddhimagge. (Visuddhī. 2.867) ^b^kathitatovā^eb^ti kathitaṭṭhānato eva ^b^gahetabbā,^eb^ na idha taṃ vadāma punaruttibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^Evaṃ kho aha^eb^nti ettha ākārattho ^b^evaṃ^eb^-saddo uggahitākāradassananti katvā. ^b^Evaṃ poṭṭhapādā^eb^ti ettha pana sampaṭicchanattho, tenāha ^b^‘‘sūggahitaṃ tayāti anujānanto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^415^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saññā ^a^V1.0329^ea^^a^P1.0485^ea^ aggā etthāti ^b^saññāggaṃ,^eb^ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhasu^eb^ samāpattīsupi ^b^saññāggaṃ atthi upalabbhatīti cintetvā^eb^. ‘‘Puthū’’ti pāḷiyaṃ liṅgavipallāsaṃ dassento āha ‘‘bahūnipī’’ti. ^b^‘‘Yathā’’^eb^ti iminā pakāraviseso karaṇappakāro gahito, na pakārasāmaññanti āha ^b^‘‘yena yena kasiṇenā’’^eb^ti, ^b^pathavīkasiṇena karaṇabhūtenā’’^eb^ti ca. Jhānaṃ tāva yutto karaṇabhāvo saññānirodhaphusanassa sādhakatamabhāvato, kathaṃ kasiṇānanti? Tesampi so yutto eva. Yadaggena hi jhānānaṃ nirodhaphusanassa sādhakataṃ abhāvo, tadaggena kasiṇānampi tadavinābhāvato. Anekakaraṇāpi kiriyā hotiyeva yathā ‘‘assena yānena dīpikāya gacchatī’’ti.

[03]^b^Ekavāra^eb^nti sakiṃ. ^b^Purimasaññānirodha^eb^nti kāmasaññādipurimasaññāya nirodhaṃ, na nirodhasamāpattisaññitaṃ saññānirodhaṃ. ^b^Ekaṃ saññāgga^eb^nti ekaṃ saññābhūtaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhanti attho heṭṭhimasaññāya ukkaṭṭhabhāvato. Saññā ca sā aggañcāti saññāggaṃ, na saññāsu agganti. ^b^Dve vāre^eb^ti dvikkhattuṃ. ^b^Sesakasiṇesū^eb^ti kasiṇānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ nirodhakathāya adhikatattā. Tato eva cettha jhānaggahaṇena kasiṇajjhānāni eva gahitānīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Paṭhamajjhānena karaṇabhūtenā’’^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ anāmasitvā vadati yathā ‘‘yena yena kasiṇenā’’ti ettha jhānaṃ anāmasitvā ^a^M1.0372^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Itī’’^eb^tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ saṅgahetvā nigamanavasena vadati. ^b^Sabbampī^eb^ti sabbaṃ ekavāraṃ samāpannajhānaṃ. ^b^Saṅgahetvā^eb^ti sañjānanalakkhaṇena taṃsabhāvāvisesato ekajjhaṃ saṅgahetvā. ^b^Aparāpara^eb^nti punappunaṃ.

[03]^b^416^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa puggalassa vasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni paṭhamanaye ^a^P1.0486^ea^. Dutiyanaye pana yasmā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggena ghaṭentassa maggañāṇaṃ uppajjati, tasmā vipassanāmaggavasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni. Yasmā pana paṭhamanayo lokiyattā oḷāriko, dutiyanayo missako tasmā tadubhayaṃ asambhāvetvā accantasukhumaṃ subhaṃ thiraṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva dassetuṃ maggaphalavasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni tatiyanaye. Tayopete nayā maggasodhanavasena dassitā.

[03]‘‘Ayaṃ panettha sāro’’ti vibhāvetuṃ tipiṭakamahāsivattheravādo ābhato. Nirodhaṃ pucchitvā tasmiṃ kathite tadanantaraṃ saññāñāṇuppattiṃ pucchanto atthato nirodhato vuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati nāma, nirodhato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ arahattaphaluppattiyā vā siyā anāgāmiphaluppattiyā vā, tattha saññā padhānā, tadanantarañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti tadubhayaṃ niddhārento thero ^b^‘‘kiṃ ime bhikkhū bhaṇantī’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^V1.0330^ea^. Tattha ^b^‘‘kiṃ ime bhikkhū bhaṇantī’’^eb^ti tadā dīghanikāyatantiṃ parivattante imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā yathāvuttena paṭipāṭiyā tayo naye kathente bhikkhū sandhāya vadati.

[03]Yassa yathā maggavīthiyaṃ maggaphalañāṇesu uppannesu niyamato maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇāni honti, evaṃ phalasamāpattiyaṃ phalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇanti āha ^b^‘‘pacchā paccavekkhaṇañāṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Idaṃ arahattaphala’’^eb^nti idaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa pavattiākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Phalasamādhisaññāpaccayā^eb^ti phalasamādhisahagatasaññāpaccayā. ^b^Kira^eb^-saddo anussaraṇattho. Yathādhigatadhammānussaraṇapakkhiyā hi paccavekkhaṇā. Samādhisīsena cettha sabbaṃ arahattaphalaṃ gahitaṃ sahacaraṇañāyena, tasmiṃ asati paccavekkhaṇāya asambhavo evāti āha ^b^‘‘idappaccayā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^417^eb^^b^.^eb^ Desanāya ^a^M1.0373^ea^ saṇhabhāvena sārambhamakkhissādimalavisodhanato ^a^P1.0487^ea^ sutamayañāṇaṃ nhāpitaṃ viya, sukhumabhāvena tanulepanavilittaṃ viya, tilakkhaṇabbhāhatatāya kuṇḍalādialaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ viya ca hoti, tadanupasevato ñāṇassa ca tathābhāvo taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa tathābhāvāpatti, nirodhakathāya nivesanañcassa sirisayanappavesanasadisanti āha ^b^‘‘saṇhasukhuma…pe… āropitopī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tassaṃ nirodhakathāyaṃ. ^b^Sukhaṃ avindanto^eb^ mandabuddhitāya alabhanto. Malavidūsitatāya ^b^gūthaṭṭhānasadisaṃ. Attano laddhiṃ^eb^ attadiṭṭhiṃ. ^b^Anumatiṃ gahetvā^eb^ti anuññaṃ gahetvā ‘‘ediso me attā’’ti anujānāpetvā, attano laddhiyaṃ patiṭṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^Kaṃ panā^eb^ti oḷāriko, manomayo, arūpīti tiṇṇaṃ attavādānaṃ vasena tividhesu katamanti attho. ^b^Pariharanto^eb^ti viddhaṃsanato pariharanto, nigūhantoti adhippāyo. Yasmā catusantatirūpappabandhaṃ ekattavasena gahetvā rūpībhāvato ‘‘oḷāriko attā’’ti pacceti attavādī, annapānopadhānatañcassa parikappetvā ‘‘sassato’’ti maññati, rūpībhāvato eva ca saññāya aññattaṃ ñāyāgatameva, yaṃ vedavādino ‘‘annamayo, pānamayo’’ti ca dvidhā voharanti, tasmā paribbājako taṃ sandhāyā ^b^‘‘oḷārikaṃ kho’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Tattha yadi attā rūpī, na saññī, saññāya arūpabhāvattā, rūpadhammānañca asañjānanasabhāvattā, rūpī ca samāno yadi tava matena nicco, saññā aparāparaṃ pavattanato tattha tattha bhijjatīti bhedasabbhāvato aniccā, evampi ‘‘aññā saññā, añño attā’’ti ^a^V1.0331^ea^ saññāya abhāvato acetanoti na kammassa kārako, phalassa ca na upabhuñjakoti āpannameva, tenāha ^b^‘‘oḷāriko ca hi te’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paccāgacchato^eb^ti paccāgacchantassa ^a^P1.0488^ea^, jānatoti attho. ‘‘Aññā ca saññā uppajjanti, aññā ca saññā nirujjhantī’’ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu uppādapubbako nirodho, na ca uppannaṃ anirujjhakaṃ nāma atthīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘catunnañca khandhāna’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^418-420^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Manomaya^eb^nti ^a^M1.0374^ea^ jhānamanaso vasena manomayaṃ. Yo hi bāhirapaccayanirapekkho, so manasāva nibbattoti manomayo. Rūpaloke nibbattasarīraṃ sandhāya vadati, yaṃ vedavādino ānandamayo, viññāṇamayoti ca dvidhā voharanti. ^b^Tatrāpī^eb^ti ‘‘manomayo attā’’ti imasmimpi pakkhe. ^b^Dose dinne^eb^ti ‘‘aññāva saññā bhavissatī’’tiādinā dose dinne. Idhāpi purimavāde vuttanayeneva dosadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yadi attā manomayo, sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī, ahīnindriyo ca bhaveyya, evaṃ sati ‘‘rūpaṃ attā siyā, na ca saññī’’ti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha – ‘‘manomayo ca hi te’’tiādi. Kasmā panāyaṃ paribbājako paṭhamaṃ oḷārikaṃ attānaṃ paṭijānitvā taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjetvā puna manomayaṃ attānaṃ paṭijānāti, tañca vissajjetvā arūpiṃ attānaṃ paṭijānātīti? Kāmañcettha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva, tathāpi ime titthiyā nāma anavaṭṭhitacittā thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇuko viya cañcalāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā nāma ummattako’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^saññāyā^eb^ti pakatisaññāya. ^b^Uppādanirodhaṃ icchati^eb^ aparāparaṃ pavattāya saññāya udayavayadassanato. Tathāpi ‘‘saññā saññā’’ti pavattasamaññaṃ ‘‘attā’’ti gahetvā tassa ca avicchedaṃ parikappento sassataṃ maññati, tenāha ^b^‘‘attānaṃ pana sassataṃ maññatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tathevā^eb^ti yathā ‘‘rūpī attā’’ti, ‘‘manomayo attā’’ti ca vādadvaye saññāya attato aññatā, tathā cassa acetanatādidosappasaṅgo dunnivāro ^a^P1.0489^ea^, tatheva imasmiṃ vāde doso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tathevassa dosaṃ dassento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Micchādassanenā^eb^ti attadiṭṭhisaṅkhātena micchābhinivesena. ^b^Abhibhūtattā^eb^ti anādikālabhāvitabhāvena ajjhotthaṭattā nivāritañāṇacārattā. ^b^Taṃ nānattaṃ ajānanto^eb^ti yena santatighanena, samūhaghanena ca vañcito bālo pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ dhammasamūhaṃ micchāgāhavasena ‘‘attā’’ti, ‘‘nicco’’ti ca abhinivissa voharati, taṃ ekattasaññitaṃ ghanaggahaṇaṃ vinibhujja yāthāvato jānanaṃ ghanavinibbhogo, sabbena sabbaṃ titthiyānaṃ so natthīti ayampi paribbājako tādisassa ñāṇassa paripākassa abhāvato vuccamānampi ^a^V1.0332^ea^ nāññāsi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavatā vuccamānampi taṃ nānattaṃ ajānanto’’^eb^ti. Saññā nāmāyaṃ nānārammaṇā nānākkhaṇe uppajjati, veti cāti ^b^saññāya^eb^^a^M1.0375^ea^^b^uppādanirodhaṃ passantopi saññāmayaṃ^eb^ saññābhūtaṃ ^b^attānaṃ^eb^ parikappetvā yathāvuttaghanavinibbhogābhāvato ^b^niccameva^eb^ katvā ^b^maññati^eb^ diṭṭhimaññanāya. Tathābhūtassa ca tassa saṇhasukhumaparamagambhīradhammatā na ñāyatevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dujjānaṃ kho’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Diṭṭhiādīsu ‘‘evameta’’nti dassanaṃ abhinivisanaṃ ^b^diṭṭhi. ^eb^ Tassā eva pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ ‘‘evameta’’nti nijjhānavasena khamanaṃ ^b^khanti^eb^. Tathā rocanaṃ ^b^ruci. ‘‘Aññathā’’^eb^tiādi tesaṃ diṭṭhiādīnaṃ vibhajitvā dassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^aññathā^eb^ti yathā ariyavinaye antadvayaṃ anupaggamma majjhimā paṭipadāvasena dassanaṃ hoti, tato aññathāyeva. ^b^Aññadevā^eb^ti yaṃ paramatthato vijjati khandhāyatanādi, tassa ca aniccatādi, tato aññadeva paramatthato avijjamānaṃ attānaṃ sassatādi ^b^te khamati ceva ruccati ca.^eb^ Āyuñjanaṃ anuyuñjanaṃ ^b^āyogo,^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘yuttapayuttatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭipattiyā^eb^ti paramattacintanādiparibbājakapaṭipattiyā ^a^P1.0490^ea^. ^b^Dujjānametaṃ^eb^ dhammataṃ tvaṃ ‘‘ayaṃ paramattho, ayaṃ sammutī’’ti imassa vibhāgassa dubbibhāgattā. ‘‘Yadi etaṃ dujjānaṃ, taṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu, imaṃ panatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchissāmī’’ti cintetvā yathā paṭipajji, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha paribbājako’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Añño vā saññato^eb^ti saññāsabhāvato añño sabhāvo vā attā hotūti attho. ^b^Assā^eb^ti attano.

[03]Lokīyati dissati ettha puññapāpaṃ, tabbipāko cāti ^b^loko,^eb^ attā. So hissa kārako, vedako cāti icchito. ^b^Diṭṭhigata^eb^nti ‘‘sassato attā ca loko cā’’tiādi (dī. ni. 1.31; udā. 55) nayappavattaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ. Na hesa diṭṭhābhiniveso diṭṭhadhammikādiatthanissito tadasaṃvattanato. Yo hi tadāvaho, so taṃnissitoti vattabbataṃ labheyya yathā taṃ puññañāṇasambhāro. Eteneva tassa na dhammanissitatāpi saṃvaṇṇitā daṭṭhabbā. Ādibrahmacariyassāti ādibrahmacariyaṃ, tadeva ^b^ādibrahmacariyakaṃ^eb^ yathā ‘‘vinayo eva venayiko’’ti, (pārā. aṭṭha. 21) tenāha ^b^‘‘sikkhattayasaṅkhātassā’’^eb^tiādi. Diṭṭhābhinivesassa saṃsāravaṭṭe nibbidāvirāganirodhupasamāsaṃvattanaṃ vaṭṭantogadhattā, tassa vaṭṭasambandhanato ca. Tathā abhiññāsambodhanibbānāsaṃvattanañca ^a^M1.0376^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Abhijānanāyā^eb^ti ñātapariññāvasena abhijānanatthāya. ^b^Sambujjhanatthāyā^eb^ti tīraṇapahānapariññāvasena sambodhanatthāyāti vadanti. ^b^Abhijānanāyā^eb^ti abhiññāpaññāvasena jānanāya, taṃ pana vaṭṭassa paccakkhakaraṇameva ^a^V1.0333^ea^^a^P1.0491^ea^ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘paccakkhakiriyāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sambujjhanatthāyā^eb^ti pariññābhisamayavasena paṭivedhāya.

[03]Kāmaṃ taṇhāpi dukkhasabhāvā, tassā pana samudayabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā ^b^‘‘taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pabhāvanato^eb^ uppādanato. Dukkhaṃ pabhāventīpi taṇhā avijjādipaccayantarasahitā eva pabhāveti, na kevalāti āha ^b^‘‘sappaccayā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhinnaṃ appavattī^eb^ti ubhinnaṃ appavattinimittaṃ, nappavattanti ettha dukkhasamudayā etasmiṃ vā adhigateti appavatti. Dukkhanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati, tadatthaṃ paṭipadā cāti ^b^dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadā. Maggapātubhāvo^eb^ti aggamaggasamuppādo. ^b^Phalasacchikiriyā^eb^ti asekkhaphalādhigamo. ^b^Ākāra^eb^nti taṃ gamanaliṅgaṃ.

[03]^b^421^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samantato niggaṇhanavasena todanaṃ vijjhanaṃ ^b^sannitodakaṃ, vācāyā^eb^ti ca paccatte karaṇavacananti āha ^b^‘‘vacanapatodenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sajjhabbharita^eb^nti samantato bhusaṃ aritaṃ ^b^akaṃsū^eb^ti satamattehi tuttakehi viya tiṃsasatamattā paribbājakā vācāpatodanehi tudiṃsu ^b^sabhāvato vijjamāna^eb^nti paramatthasabhāvato upalabbhamānaṃ, napakatiādi viya anupalabbhamānaṃ. ^b^Taccha^eb^nti saccaṃ. ^b^Tatha^eb^nti aviparītaṃ ^b^lokuttaradhammesū^eb^ti visaye bhummaṃ te dhamme visayaṃ katvā. ^b^Ṭhitasabhāva^eb^nti avaṭṭhitasabhāvaṃ, taduppādakanti attho. ^b^Lokuttaradhammaniyāmata^eb^nti lokuttaradhammasampāpananiyāmena niyataṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘buddhānañhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Edisā^eb^ti ‘‘dhammaṭṭhitata’’ntiādinā vuttappakārā.

[03]^b^422^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sukhumesu atthantaresū^eb^ti khandhāyatanādīsu sukhumañāṇagocaresu ^a^P1.0492^ea^ dhammesu. ^b^Kusalo^eb^ti pubbe buddhasāsane kataparicayatāya cheko ^b^ahosi. Gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya^eb^^b^kathitattā^eb^ sīlavantassa ^a^M1.0377^ea^ bhikkhuno tathā kathanena vibbhamane niyojitattā idāni sayampi sīlavā eva hutvā cha vāre (dha. pa. aṭṭha. 37; jā. aṭṭha. 1.1.69) vibbhami. Kammasarikkhakena hi phalena bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^Mahāsāvakassa kathite^eb^ti mahāsāvakassa mahākoṭṭhikattherassa apasādanakathitanimittaṃ. ^b^Patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto^eb^ti sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ laddhuṃ asakkonto.

[03]^b^423^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paññācakkhuno natthitāyā^eb^ti suvuttaduruttasamavisamadassanasamatthapaññācakkhuno abhāvena ^a^V1.0334^ea^. ^b^Cakkhumā^eb^ti ettha yādisena cakkhunā puriso ‘‘cakkhumā’’ti vutto, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘subhāsitā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekakoṭṭhāsā^eb^ti ekantikā, nibbānāvahabhāvena nicchitāti adhippāyo. ^b^Ṭhapitā^eb^ti vavatthāpitā. ^b^Na ekakoṭṭhāsā^eb^ na ekantikā, na nibbānāvahabhāvena nicchitā vaṭṭantogadhabhāvatoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^425^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Kasmā ārabhī’’ti kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ^b^‘‘aniyyānikabhāvadassanattha’’^eb^nti payojanaṃ vissajjitaṃ. Sati hi phalasiddhiyaṃ hetusiddhoyeva hotīti. ^b^Paññāpitaniṭṭhāyā^eb^ti paveditavimuttimaggassa, vaṭṭadukkhapariyosānaṃ gacchati etāyāti ‘‘niṭṭhā’’ti vimutti vuttā. Niṭṭhāmaggo hi idha uttarapadalopena ‘‘niṭṭhā’’ti vutto. Tassa hi aniyyānikatā, niyyānikatā ca vuccati, na niṭṭhāya. Niyyānaṃ vā niggamanaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, vaṭṭadukkhassa vupasamoti attho. Niyyānameva niyyānikaṃ, na niyyānikaṃ aniyyānikaṃ, so eva bhāvo aniyyānikabhāvo, tassa dassanatthanti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Eva’’^eb^nti ‘‘nibbānaṃ nibbāna’’nti vacanamattasāmaññaṃ gahetvā vadati, na pana paramatthato tesaṃ samaye nibbānapaññāpanassa labbhanato, tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sā ca na niyyānikā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Lokathūpikādivasenā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0493^ea^ ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘añño puriso, aññā pakatī’’ti pakatipurisantarāvabodho mokkho, buddhiādiguṇavinimuttassa attano sakattani avaṭṭhānaṃ mokkho, kāyapavattigatijātibandhānaṃ appamajjanavasena appavatto mokkho, yaññehi jutena parena purisena salokatā mokkho, samīpatā mokkho, sahayogo mokkhoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Yathāpaññattā^eb^ti paññattappakārā ^b^hutvā na niyyāti,^eb^ yenākārena ^a^M1.0378^ea^ ‘‘niṭṭhā pāpuṇīyatī’’ti tehi paveditā, tenākārena tassā appattabbato na niyyāti. ^b^Paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittā^eb^ti ‘‘nāyaṃ niṭṭhā paṭipadā vaṭṭassa anatikkamanato’’ti buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittā. ^b^Nivattatī^eb^ti paṭikkhepassa kāraṇavacanaṃ, tasmā tehi paññattā niṭṭhā paṭipadā na niyyāti, aññadatthu taṃsamaṅginaṃ puggalaṃ saṃsāre eva paribbhamāpentī nivattati.

[03]Padhānaṃ jānanaṃ nāma paccakkhato jānanaṃ tassa pamāṇajeṭṭhabhāvato, itarassa saṃsayānubaddhattāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘jānaṃ passa’’^eb^nti. Tenettha dassanena jānanaṃ viseseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tumhākaṃ ekantasukhe loke paccakkhato ñāṇadassanaṃ atthīti. ^b^Jāna^eb^nti vā tassa lokassa ^a^V1.0335^ea^ anumānavisayataṃ pucchati, ^b^passa^eb^nti paccakkhato gocarataṃ. Ayañhettha attho – api tumhākaṃ loko paccakkhato ñāto, udāhu anumānatoti.

[03]Yasmā loke paccakkhabhūto attho indriyagocarabhāvena pākaṭo, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘diṭṭhapubbānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Diṭṭhapubbānī^eb^ti diṭṭhavā, dassanabhūtena, tadanugatena ca ñāṇena gahitapubbānīti attho. Evañca katvā ^b^‘‘sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnī’’^eb^ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. ^b^‘‘Appāṭihīraka ta’’^eb^nti ^a^P1.0494^ea^ anunāsikalopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘appāṭihīrakaṃ ta’’^eb^nti ‘‘appāṭihīraṃ kata’’nti evamettha vaṇṇenti. Paṭipakkhaharaṇato paṭihāriyaṃ, tadeva pāṭihāriyaṃ, uttaravirahitaṃ vacanaṃ. Pāṭihāriyamevettha ‘‘pāṭihīraka’’nti vā vuttaṃ. Na pāṭihīrakaṃ appāṭihīrakaṃ parehi vuccamānauttarehi sauttarattā, tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭiharaṇavirahita’’^eb^nti. Sauttarañhi vacanaṃ tena uttarena paṭihārīyati ativiparivattīyati. Tato eva niyyānassa paṭiharaṇamaggassa abhāvato ^b^‘‘aniyyānika’’^eb^nti vattabbataṃ labhati.

[03]^b^426^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vilāso^eb^ līḷā. ^b^Ākappo^eb^ kesabandhavatthaggahaṇaṃ ādiākāraviseso, vesasaṃvidhānaṃ vā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena bhāvādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^‘‘Bhāvo’’^eb^ti ca cāturiyaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^428^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti ^b^attā,^eb^ attabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘attapaṭilābhoti attabhāvapaṭilābho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāmabhavaṃ dasseti^eb^ tassa itaradvayattabhāvato oḷārikattā. ^b^Rūpabhavaṃ dasseti^eb^^a^M1.0379^ea^ jhānamanena nibbattaṃ hutvā rūpībhāvena upalabbhanato. ^b^Saṃkilesikā dhammā nāma dvādasa akusalacittuppādā^eb^ tadabhāve kassaci saṃkilesassāpi asambhavato. ^b^Vodāniyā dhammā nāma samathavipassanā^eb^ tāsaṃ vasena sabbaso cittavodānassa sijjhanato.

[03]^b^429^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ asamucchede pana na kadācipi anavajjadhammānaṃ pāripūrī, vepullaṃ vā sambhavati, samucchede pana sati eva sambhavatīti ^b^maggapaññāphalapaññā^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ. Tā hi sakiṃ paripuṇṇā paripuṇṇā eva aparihānadhammattā. ^b^Taruṇapītī^eb^ti uppannamattā aladdhāsevanā dubbalā pīti. ^b^Balavatuṭṭhī^eb^ti punappunaṃ uppattiyā laddhāsevanā ^a^P1.0495^ea^ uparivisesādhigamassa paccayabhūtā thiratarā pīti. ^b^‘‘Yaṃ avocumhā’’^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho ^a^V1.0336^ea^ – yaṃ vohāraṃ ‘‘saṃkilesikavodāniyadhammānaṃ pahānābhivuddhiniṭṭhaṃ paññāya pāripūrivepullabhūtaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve aparappaccayena ñāṇena paccakkhato sampādetvā viharissatī’’ti kathayimha. ^b^Tattha^eb^ tasmiṃ vihāre ^b^tassa^eb^ mama ovādakarassa bhikkhuno ^b^evaṃ^eb^ vuttappakārena viharaṇanimittaṃ pamodappabhāvitā ^b^pīti ca bhavissati,^eb^ tassā ca paccayabhūtaṃ passaddhidvayaṃ sammadeva upaṭṭhitā ^b^sati ca^eb^ ukkaṃsagataṃ ñāṇañca tathābhūto ca so vihāro. Santapaṇītatāya atappako anaññasādhāraṇo sukhavihāroti vattabbataṃ arahatīti.

[03]Paṭhamajjhāne paṭiladdhamatte hīnabhāvato pīti dubbalā pāmojjapakkhikā, suvibhāvite pana tasmiṃ paguṇe sā paṇītā balavabhāvato paripuṇṇakiccā pītīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭhamajjhāne pāmojjādayo chapi dhammā labbhantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Sukho vihāro’’^eb^ti iminā samādhi gahito. Sukhaṃ gahitanti apare, tesaṃ matena santasukhatāya upekkhā catutthajjhāne ‘‘sukha’’nti icchitā, tenāha ^b^‘‘tathā catutthe’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pāmojjaṃ nivattatī^eb^ti dubbalapītisaṅkhātaṃ pāmojjaṃ chasu dhammesu nivattati hāyati. Vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena dutiyajjhāne sabbadā pīti balavatī eva hoti, na paṭhamajjhāne viya kadāci dubbalā. ^b^Suddhavipassanā pādakajjhānamevā^eb^ti upari maggaṃ akathetvā kevalaṃ vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ ^b^kathitaṃ. Catūhi maggehi saddhiṃ vipassanā kathitā^eb^ti vipassanāya ^a^M1.0380^ea^ pādakabhāvena jhānāni kathetvā tato paraṃ vipassanāpubbakā cattāropi maggā kathitāti attho. ^b^Catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti kathitā^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānikādikā phalasamāpattiyo akathetvā catutthajjhānikā eva phalasamāpatti ^a^P1.0496^ea^ kathitā. ^b^Pītivevacanameva katvā^eb^ti dvinnaṃ pītīnaṃ ekasmiṃ cittuppāde anuppajjanato pāmojjaṃ pītivevacanameva katvā. Pītisukhānaṃ apariccattattā, ^b^‘‘sukho ca vihāro’’^eb^ti sātisayassa sukhavihārassa gahitattā ca ^b^dutiyajjhānikaphalasamāpatti nāma kathitā.^eb^ Kāmaṃ paṭhamajjhānepi pītisukhāni labbhanti, tāni pana vitakkavicārakkhobhena na santapaṇītāni, santapaṇītāni ca idhādhippetāni.

[03]^b^432-437^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vibhāvanattho^eb^ti pakāsanattho sarūpato nirūpanattho, tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ so’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na^eb^nti oḷārikaṃ attapaṭilābhaṃ. ^b^Sappaṭiharaṇa^eb^nti parena coditavacanena saparihāraṃ sauttaraṃ. ^b^Tuccho^eb^ti musā abhūto. ^b^Svevā^eb^ti so eva attapaṭilābho. ^b^Tasmiṃ samaye hotī^eb^ti tasmiṃ paccuppannasamaye vijjamāno hoti. ^b^Attapaṭilābhotveva niyyātesi,^eb^ na naṃ sarūpato nīharitvā dassesi. ^b^Rūpādayo cettha dhammā^eb^ti rūpavedanādayo eva ettha loke sabhāvadhammā. ^b^Attapaṭilābho^eb^ti pana te rūpādike pañcakkhandhe upādāya paññatti, tenāha ^b^‘‘nāmamattameta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nāmapaṇṇattivasenā^eb^ti nāmabhūtapaññattimattatāvasena.

[03]^b^438^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evañca^eb^^a^V1.0337^ea^^b^pana vatvā^eb^ti ‘‘attapaṭilābhoti rūpādike upādāya paññattimatta’’nti imamatthaṃ ‘‘yasmiṃ citta samaye’’tiādinā vatvā. ^b^Paṭipucchitvā vinayanattha^eb^nti yathā pare puccheyyuṃ, tenākārena ^a^P1.0497^ea^ kālavibhāgato paṭipadāni pucchitvā tassa atthassa ñāpanavasena vinayanatthaṃ. ^b^Tasmiṃ samaye sacco ahosī^eb^ti tasmiṃ atītasamaye upādānassa vijjamānatāya saccabhūto vijjamāno viya vattabbo ahosi, na pana ^b^anāgato^eb^ idāni ^b^paccuppanno^eb^ vā ^b^attapaṭilābho^eb^ tadupādānassa tadā avijjamānattā. ^b^Ye te atītā dhammā^eb^ atītasamaye atītattapaṭilābhassa upādānabhūtā rūpādayo. ^b^Te etarahi natthi^eb^ niruddhattā. Tato eva ^b^ahesunti saṅkhyaṃ gatā. Tasmā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva samaye labbhanato. ^b^Sopi^eb^ tadupādāno ^a^M1.0381^ea^^b^me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃyeva^eb^ atīta^b^samaye sacco^eb^ bhūto vijjamāno viya ^b^ahosi. Anāgatapaccuppannāna^eb^nti anāgatānañceva paccuppannānañca rūpadhammānaṃ upādānabhūtānaṃ ^b^tadā^eb^ tasmiṃ atītasamaye ^b^abhāvā^eb^ tadupādāno ^b^anāgato paccuppanno^eb^ ca attapaṭilābho ^b^tasmiṃ^eb^ atīta^b^samaye mogho^eb^ tuccho musā natthīti attho. ^b^Nāmamattamevā^eb^ti samaññāmattameva. ^b^Attapaṭilābhaṃ paṭijānāti^eb^ paramatthato anupalabbhamānattā.

[03]^b^‘‘Eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā ye te anāgatā dhammā, te etarahi natthi, ‘‘bhavissantī’’ti pana saṅkhyaṃ gamissanti, tasmā sopi me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃyeva samaye sacco bhavissati. Atītapaccuppannānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ tadā abhāvā tasmiṃ samaye mogho atīto mogho paccuppanno. Ye ime paccuppannā dhammā, te etarahi atthi, tasmā yoyaṃ me attapaṭilābho, so idāni sacco. Atītānāgatānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ idāni abhāvā tasmiṃ samaye mogho atīto mogho anāgatoti evaṃ atthato nāmamattameva attapaṭilābhaṃ paṭijānātīti imamatthaṃ atidisati.

[03]^b^439-443^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃsanditu^eb^nti samānetuṃ. ^b^Yasmiṃ samaye khīraṃ hotī^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle bhūtupādāyasaññitaṃ ^a^P1.0498^ea^ upādānavisesaṃ upādāya khīrapaññatti hoti. ^b^Na tasmiṃ…pe… gacchati^eb^ khīrapaññattiupādānassa dadhiādipaññattiyā anupādānato. Paṭiniyatavatthukā hi ekā lokasamaññā, tenāha ^b^‘‘ye dhamme upādāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha saṅkhāyati etāyāti ^b^saṅkhā,^eb^ paññatti. Niddhāretvā vacanti vadanti etāyāti ^b^nirutti.^eb^ Namanti etenāti ^b^nāmaṃ.^eb^ Voharanti etenāti ^b^vohāro,^eb^ paññattiyeva. ^b^Esa nayo sabbatthā^eb^ti ‘‘yasmiṃ samaye’’tiādinā khīre vuttanayaṃ dadhiādīsu atidisati.

[03]^b^Samanujānanamattakānī^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ khīraṃ, idaṃ dadhī’’tiādinā tādise bhūtupādāyarūpavisese loke ^a^V1.0338^ea^ paramparābhataṃ paññattiṃ appaṭikkhipitvā samanujānanaṃ viya paccayavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ rūpādikhandhasamūhaṃ upādāya ‘‘oḷāriko attapaṭilābho’’ti ca ‘‘manomayo attapaṭilābho’’ti ca ‘‘arūpo ^a^M1.0382^ea^ attapaṭilābho’’ti ca tathā tathā samanujānanamattakāni, na ca tabbinimutto upādānato añño koci attho atthīti attho. ^b^Niruttimattakānī^eb^ti saddaniruttiyā gahaṇūpāyamattakāni. ‘‘Satto phassoti hi saddaggahaṇuttarakālaṃ tadanuviddhapaṇṇattiggahaṇamukheneva tadatthāvabodho. ^b^Vacanapathamattakānī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Vohāramattakānī^eb^ti tathā tathā vohāramattakāni. ^b^Nāmapaṇṇattimattakānī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ, taṃtaṃnāmapaññāpanamattakāni. ^b^Sabbameta^eb^nti ‘‘attapaṭilābho’’ti vā ‘‘satto’’ti vā ‘‘poso’’ti vā sabbametaṃ ^b^vohāramattakaṃ^eb^ paramatthato anupalabbhanato, tenāha ^b^‘‘yasmā paramatthato satto nāma natthī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yadi evaṃ kasmā taṃ buddhehipi vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘buddhānaṃ pana dve kathā’’^eb^tiādi. Sammutiyā vohārassa kathanaṃ ^b^sammutikathā. ^eb^ Paramatthassa sabhāvadhammassa kathanaṃ ^b^paramatthakathā.^eb^ Aniccādikathāpi paramatthasannissitakathā paramatthakathāti katvā ^b^paramatthakathā.^eb^ Paramatthadhammo hi ‘‘anicco, dukkho, anattā’’ti ca vuccati ^a^P1.0499^ea^, na sammutidhammo. Kasmā panevaṃ duvidhā buddhānaṃ kathāpavattīti tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘tattha yo’’^eb^tiādinā. Yasmā paramatthakathāya saccasampaṭivedho, ariyasaccakathā ca sikhāppattā desanā, tasmā vineyyapuggalavasena sammutikathaṃ kathentopi bhagavā paramatthakathaṃyeva kathetīti āha ^b^‘‘tassa bhagavā āditova…pe… kathetī’’^eb^ti, tenāha ^b^‘‘tathā’’^eb^tiādi, tenassa katthaci sammutikathāpubbikā paramatthakathā hoti puggalajjhāsayavasena, katthaci paramatthakathāpubbikā sammutikathā. Iti vineyyadamanakusalassa satthu vineyyajjhāsayavasena tathā tathā desanāpavattīti dasseti. Sabbattha pana bhagavā dhammataṃ avijahanto eva sammutiṃ anuvattati, sammutiṃ apariccajantoyeva dhammataṃ vibhāveti, na tattha abhinivesātidhāvanāni. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘janapadaniruttiṃ nābhiniviseyya, samaññaṃ nātidhāveyyā’’ti.

[03]Paṭhamaṃ sammutiṃ katvā kathanaṃ pana veneyyavasena yebhuyyena buddhānaṃ āciṇṇanti taṃ kāraṇena saddhiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘pakatiyā panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nanu ca sammuti nāma paramatthato avijjamānattā abhūtā, taṃ kathaṃ buddhā kathentīti āha ^b^‘‘sammutikathaṃ kathentāpī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Saccamevā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0383^ea^ tathameva. ^b^Sabhāvamevā^eb^ti sammutibhāvena taṃsabhāvameva, tenāha ^b^‘‘amusāvā’’^eb^ti. Paramatthassa pana saccādibhāve vattabbameva natthi.

[03]Imesaṃ ^a^V1.0339^ea^ pana sammutiparamatthānaṃ ko viseso? Yasmiṃ bhinne, buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge kate na taṃsaññā, so ghaṭapaṭādippabhedo sammuti, tabbipariyāyato paramattho. Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati. Evaṃ santepi vuttanayena sammutipi ^a^P1.0500^ea^ saccasabhāvā evāti āha ^b^‘‘duve saccāni akkhāsī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Idāni nesaṃ saccasabhāvaṃ kāraṇena dassento ^b^‘‘saṅketavacanaṃ sacca^eb^nti gāthamāha. Tattha ^b^saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ^eb^ visaṃvādanābhāvato. Tattha hetumāha ^b^‘‘lokasammutikāraṇa’’^eb^nti. Lokasiddhā hi sammuti saṅketavacanassa avisaṃvādanatāya kāraṇaṃ. Paramo uttamo attho ^b^paramattho,^eb^ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvo. Tassa ^b^vacanaṃ saccaṃ^eb^ yāthāvato avisaṃvādanavasena ca pavattanato. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘dhammānaṃ bhūtalakkhaṇa’’^eb^nti, sabhāvadhammānaṃ yo bhūto aviparīto sabhāvo, tassa lakkhaṇaṃ aṅganaṃ ñāpananti katvā.

[03]Yadi tathāgato paramatthasaccaṃ sammadeva abhisambujjhitvā ṭhitopi lokasamaññaṃ gahetvāva vadati, ko ettha lokiyamahājanehi visesoti āha. ^b^‘‘Yāhi tathāgato voharati aparāmāsa’’^eb^ntiādi. Lokiyamahājano appahīnaparāmāsattā ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’tiādinā parāmasanto voharati, tathāgato pana sabbaso pahīnaparāmāsattā aparāmasanto yasmā lokasamaññāhi vinā lokiyo attho loke kenaci duviññeyyo, tasmā tāhi taṃ voharati. Tathā voharanto eva ca attano desanāvilāsena veneyyasatte paramatthasacce patiṭṭhapeti. ^b^Desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā^eb^ti heṭṭhā pavattitakathāya vinivaṭṭetvā vivecetvā desanaṃ ‘‘aparāmāsa’’nti taṇhāmānaparāmāsappahānakittanena ^b^arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpesi^eb^. Yaṃ yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Poṭṭhapādasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^444^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Aciraparinibbute’’^eb^ti ^a^P1.0501^ea^^a^V1.0340^ea^^a^M1.0384^ea^ satthu parinibbutabhāvassa cirakālatāpaṭikkhepena āsannatā dassitā, kālaparicchedo na dassitoti taṃ paricchedato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘parinibbānato uddhaṃ māsamatte kāle’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^matta^eb^-ggahaṇena kālassa asampuṇṇataṃ joteti. Tudisaññito gāmo nivāso etassāti ^b^todeyyo.^eb^ Taṃ panesa yasmā soṇadaṇḍo viya campaṃ, kūṭadanto viya ca khāṇumataṃ ajjhāvasati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tassa adhipatittā’’^eb^ti issarabhāvatoti attho. ^b^Samāhāra^eb^nti sannicayaṃ. ^b^Paṇḍito gharamāvase^eb^ti yasmā appatarappatarepi vayamāne bhogā khiyanti, appatarappatarepi sañciyamāne vaḍḍhanti, tasmā viññujātiko kiñci vayaṃ akatvā āyameva uppādento gharāvāsaṃ anutiṭṭheyyāti lobhādesitaṃ paṭipattiṃ upadisati.

[03]^b^Adānameva sikkhāpetvā^eb^ lobhābhibhūtatāya ^b^tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho hutvā^eb^ nibbatti. Lobhavasikassa hi duggati pāṭikaṅkhā. ^b^Ativiya piyāyati^eb^ pubbaparicayena. ^b^Piṇḍāya pāvisi^eb^ subhaṃ māṇavaṃ anuggaṇhitukāmo. ^b^Niraye nibbattissasi^eb^ katokāsassa kammassa paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato.

[03]Brāhmaṇacārittassa bhāvitataṃ sandhāya, tathā pitaraṃ ukkaṃsento ca ^b^‘‘brahmaloke nibbatto’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Taṃ pavattiṃ pucchī^eb^ti sutametaṃ mayā ‘‘mayhaṃ pitā sunakho hutvā nibbatto’’ti tumhehi vuttaṃ, kimidaṃ saccanti pucchi. ^b^Tatheva^eb^^a^P1.0502^ea^^b^vatvā^eb^ti yathā pubbe sunakhassa vuttaṃ, tatheva vatvā. ^b^Avisaṃvādanattha^eb^nti saccāpanatthaṃ ‘‘todeyyabrāhmaṇo sunakho hutvā nibbatto’’ti attano vacanassa avisaṃvādanatthaṃ avisaṃvādabhāvassa dassanatthanti attho. ^b^Sabbaṃ dassesī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0341^ea^ buddhānubhāvena so sunakho taṃ sabbaṃ netvā dassesi, na jātissaratāya. Bhagavantaṃ disvā bhukkaraṇaṃ pana purimajātisiddhavāsanāvasena. ^b^Cuddasa pañhe pucchitvā^eb^ti ‘‘dissanti hi bho ^a^M1.0385^ea^ gotama manussā appāyukā, dissanti dīghāyukā. Dissanti bavhābādhā, dissanti appābādhā. Dissanti dubbaṇṇā, dissanti vaṇṇavanto. Dissanti appesakkhā, dissanti mahesakkhā. Dissanti appabhogā, dissanti mahābhogā. Dissanti nīcakulīnā, dissanti uccākulīnā. Dissanti duppaññā, dissanti paññāvanto’’ti (ma. ni. 3.289). Ime cuddasa pañhe pucchitvā, aṅgasubhatāya kiresa ^b^‘‘subho’’^eb^ti nāmaṃ labhi.

[03]^b^445^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Ekā ca me kaṅkhā atthī’’^eb^ti iminā upari pucchiyamānassa pañhassa pageva tena abhisaṅkhatabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Visabhāgavedanā^eb^ti dukkhavedanā. Sā hi kusalakammanibbatte attabhāve uppajjanakasukhavedanāpaṭipakkhabhāvato ‘‘visabhāgavedanā’’ti. Kāyaṃ gāḷhā hutvā bādhati pīḷetīti ‘‘ābādho’’ti ca vuccati. ^b^Ekadese uppajjitvā^eb^ti sarīrassa ekadese uṭṭhitāpi ^b^ayapaṭṭena ābandhitvā viya gaṇhāti^eb^ aparivattabhāvakaraṇato, etena balavarogo ābādho nāmāti dasseti. ^b^Kicchajīvitakaro^eb^ti asukhajīvitāvaho, etena dubbalo appamattako rogo ātaṅkoti dasseti. ^b^Uṭṭhāna^eb^nti sayananisajjādito uṭṭhahanaṃ, tena yathā tathā aparāparaṃ sarīrassa parivattanaṃ vadati. ^b^Garuka^eb^nti bhāriyaṃ kicchasiddhikaṃ ^a^P1.0503^ea^. ^b^Kāye balaṃ na hotī^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘gilānassevā’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Heṭṭhā catūhi padehi aphāsuvihārābhāvaṃ pucchitvā idāni phāsuvihārasabbhāvaṃ pucchati, tena saviseso phāsuvihāro pucchitoti daṭṭhabbo, asatipi atisayatthajotane sadde atisayatthassa labbhanato yathā ‘‘abhirūpāya deyyaṃ dātabba’’nti.

[03]^b^447^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kālañca samayañca upādāyā^eb^ti. Ettha ^b^kālo^eb^ nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttapattakālo. ^b^Samayo^eb^ nāma tasseva paccayasāmaggī, atthato tajjaṃ sarīrabalañceva tappaccayaparissayābhāvo ca. ^b^Upādānaṃ^eb^ nāma ñāṇena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kālañcā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pharissatī^eb^ti vaḍḍhissati.

[03]^b^448^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cetiyaraṭṭhe^eb^ti cetiraṭṭhe. Ya-kārena hi padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. Cetiraṭṭhato aññaṃ visuṃyevekaṃ raṭṭhanti ca vadanti. ^b^Maraṇapaṭisaṃyutta^eb^nti maraṇaṃ ^a^M1.0386^ea^ nāma tādisānaṃ roga vaseneva hotīti yena rogena taṃ jātaṃ, tassa sarūpapucchā, kāraṇapucchā, maraṇahetukacittasantāpapucchā, tassa ca santāpassa sabbalokasādhāraṇatā, tathā maraṇassa ca appatikāratāti evaṃ ādinā maraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ^a^V1.0342^ea^ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bho ānandā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na randhagavesī^eb^ māro viya, ^b^na vīmaṃsanādhippāyo^eb^ uttaramāṇavo viyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Yesu dhammesū^eb^ti vimokkhupāyesu niyyānadhammesu. ^b^Dharantī^eb^ti tiṭṭhanti, pavattantīti attho.

[03]^b^449^eb^^b^.^eb^ Atthappayuttatāya saddapayogassa saddappabandhalakkhaṇāni tīṇi piṭakāni tadatthabhūtehi sīlādīhi dhammakkhandhehi saṅgayhantīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tīṇi piṭakāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saṅkhittena kathita^eb^nti ‘‘tiṇṇaṃ khandhāna’’nti evaṃ gahaṇato sāmaññato cāti saṅkhepeneva kathitaṃ. ^b^‘‘Katamesaṃ tiṇṇa’’^eb^nti ^a^P1.0504^ea^ ayaṃ adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, na kathetukamyatā pucchāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vitthārato pucchissāmī ‘ti cintetvā ‘katamesaṃ tiṇṇa’nti āhā’’^eb^ti. Kathetukamyatābhāve panassa therassa vacanatā siyā.

[03]^b^450-453^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sīlakkhandhassā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, tena ‘‘ariyassa samādhikkhandhassa…pe… patiṭṭhāpesī’’ti ayaṃ ettako pāṭho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ tenāha ^b^‘‘tesu dassitesū’’^eb^ti, uddesavasenāti adhippāyo. ^b^Bhagavatā vuttanayenevā^eb^ti sāmaññaphaladesanādīsu bhagavatā desitanayeneva, tenassa suttassa satthubhāsitabhāvaṃ jinavacanabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Sāsane na sīlameva sāro^eb^ti ariyamaggasāre bhagavato sāsane yathā dassitaṃ sīlaṃ sāro eva na hoti sāravato mahato rukkhassa papaṭikaṭṭhāniyattā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā idha gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘kevalañhetaṃ patiṭṭhāmattakamevā’’^eb^ti. Jhānādiuttarimanussadhamme adhigantukāmassa adhiṭṭhānamattaṃ tattha appatiṭṭhitassa tesaṃ asambhavato. Atha vā ^b^na sīlameva sāro^eb^ti kāmañcettha sāsane ‘‘maggasīlaṃ, phalasīla’’nti idaṃ lokuttarasīlampi sārameva, tathāpi na sīlakkhandho eva sāro atha kho samādhikkhandhopi paññākkhandhopi ^a^M1.0387^ea^ sāro evāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Purimo eva sāro, tenāha ^b^‘‘ito uttarī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^454^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kasmā panettha thero samādhikkhandhaṃ puṭṭho indriyasaṃvarādike vissajjesi, nanu evaṃ sante aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ byākaronto ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ byākaronto viya hotīti īdisī codanā idha anokāsāti dassento ^b^‘‘kathañca māṇava bhikkhu…pe… samādhikkhandhaṃ dassetukāmo^eb^^a^V1.0343^ea^^b^ārabhī’’^eb^ti āha, tenettha indriyasaṃvarādayopi samādhiupakārataṃ upādāya samādhikkhandhapakkhikāni uddiṭṭhānīti dasseti ^b^rūpajjhānāneva āgatāni, na arūpajjhānāni^eb^ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānadesanānantaraṃ abhiññādesanāya avasaroti katvā. Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānapādikā hi saparibhaṇḍā chapi abhiññāyo. Lokiyā abhiññā ^a^P1.0505^ea^ pana sijjhamānā yasmā aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena vinā na ijjhanti, tasmā abhiññāsu desiyamānāsu arūpajjhānānipi desitāneva honti nānantariyabhāvato, tenāha ^b^‘‘ānetvā pana dīpetabbānī’’^eb^ti. Vuttanayena desitāneva katvā saṃvaṇṇakehi pakāsetabbānīti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī’’ti imināva arūpajjhānampi saṅgahitanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘catutthajjhānena hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Catutthajjhānañhi rūpavirāgabhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ ‘‘arūpajjhāna’’nti vuccatīti.

[03]^b^471-480^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na cittekaggatāmattakenevā^eb^ti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Lokiyassa samādhikkhandhassa adhippetattā ^b^‘‘na citte…pe… atthī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ariya-saddo cettha suddhapariyāyo, na lokuttarapariyāyo. Tathā heṭṭhāpi lokiyābhiññāpaṭisambhidāhi vināva arahatte adhigate nattheva uttariṃkaraṇīyanti sakkā vattuṃ yadatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati, tassa siddhattā. Idha pana lokiyābhiññāpi āgatā eva. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Subhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^481^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāvārikambavane^eb^ti ^a^M1.0388^ea^^a^V1.0344^ea^^a^P1.0506^ea^ pāvārikaseṭṭhino ambabahule upavane. Taṃ kira so seṭṭhī bhagavato anucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa ca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭimaṇḍapādīni sampādetvā pākāraparikkhittaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakasampannaṃ katvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa niyyātesi, purimavohārena pana ‘‘pāvārikambavana’’nti vuccati, tasmiṃ pāvārikambavane. ^b^Kevaṭṭoti idaṃ tassa nāmaṃ^eb^ kevaṭṭehi saṃrakkhitattā, tesaṃ vā santike saṃvaḍḍhitattāti keci. ‘‘Gahapatiputtassā’’ti ettha kāmaṃ tadā so gahapatiṭṭhāne ṭhito, pitu panassa acirakālaṃkatatāya purimasamaññāya ‘‘gahapatiputto’’ tveva voharīyati, tenāha ^b^‘‘gahapati mahāsālo’’^eb^ti. Mahāvibhavatāya mahāsāro, gahapatīti attho ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘mahāsālo sukhumālo aha’’ntiādīsu (a. ni. 3.39) viya. ^b^Saddhāsampanno^eb^ti pothujjanikāya saddhāya vasena saddhā samannāgato.

[03]^b^Samiddhā^eb^ti sammadeva iddhā, iddhiyā vibhavasampattiyā vepullappattāti attho. ‘‘Ehi tvaṃ bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṃ, anumāsaṃ, anusaṃvaccharaṃ vā manussānaṃ pasādāya iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karohī’’ti ekassa bhikkhuno āṇāpanaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne tassa ṭhapanaṃ nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ṭhānantare ṭhapetū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uttarimanussānaṃ^eb^^a^P1.0507^ea^^b^dhammato^eb^ti uttarimanussānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ adhigamadhammato. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ nissakkaṃ. Iddhipāṭihāriyañhi tato niddhāreti. ^b^Manussadhammato uttarī^eb^ti pakatimanussadhammato upari. ^b^Pajjalitapadīpo^eb^ti pajjalanto padīpo.
[03]^b^482^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na dhaṃsemī^eb^ti guṇasampattito na cāvemi, tenāha ^b^‘‘sīlabheda’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Vissāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā^eb^ bhagavati attano vissatthabhāvaṃ brūhetvā vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā.

[03]^b^483-4^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ādīnava^eb^nti ^a^V1.0345^ea^^a^M1.0389^ea^ dosaṃ. ^b^Gandhārī^eb^ti ^b^cūḷagandhārī,^eb^ mahāgandhārīti dve gandhārīvijjā. Tattha ^b^cūḷagandhārī^eb^ nāma tivassato oraṃ matānaṃ sattānaṃ upapannaṭṭhānajānanavijjā. ^b^Mahāgandhārī^eb^ tampi jānāti tato uttaripi iddhividhañāṇakappaṃ yebhuyyena iddhividhakiccaṃ sādheti. Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise desakāle mantaṃ parijappitvā bahudhāpi attānaṃ dasseti, hatthiādīnipi dasseti, dassanīyopi hoti, aggithambhampi karoti, jalathambhampi karoti, ākāsepi attānaṃ dasseti. Sabbaṃ indajālasadisaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭo^eb^ti dukkhito bādhito, tenāha ^b^‘‘pīḷito’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^485^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmaṃ ^b^‘‘cetasika’’^eb^nti padaṃ ye cetasi niyuttā cittena sampayuttā, tesaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ, sādhāraṇe pana gahite cittaviseso gahitova hoti, sāmaññajotanā ca visese avatiṭṭhatīti cetasikaggahaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘somanassadomanassaṃ adhippeta’’^eb^nti āha. Somanassaggahaṇena cettha tadekaṭṭhā rāgādayo, saddhādayo ca dassitā honti, domanassaggahaṇena dosādayo. Vitakkavicārā pana sarūpeneva dassitā. ^b^Evaṃ tava mano^eb^ti iminā ākārena tava mano pavattoti attho ^a^P1.0508^ea^. Kena pakārena pavattoti āha ^b^‘‘somanassito vā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Evaṃ tava mano’’^eb^ti idaṃ pana somanassitatādimattadassanaṃ, na pana yena yena somanassito vā domanassito vā, taṃ taṃ dassanaṃ. ^b^Dutiya^eb^nti ‘‘itthampi te mano’’ti idaṃ. ^b^Itipī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo nidassanattho ‘‘atthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 2.15; 3.90) viya, tenāha ^b^‘‘imañca imañca atthaṃ cintayamāna’’^eb^nti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo vuttatthasampiṇḍanattho. Parassa cintaṃ manati jānāti etenāti ^b^cintāmaṇi.^eb^ Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise desakāle mantaṃ parijappitvā yassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo, tassa diṭṭhasutādivisesasañjānanamukhena cittācāraṃ ^a^M1.0390^ea^ anuminanto kathetīti keci. Apare ‘‘vācaṃ niccharāpetvā tattha akkharasallakkhaṇavasenā’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^486^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pavattentā^eb^ti pavattanakā hutvā, pavattanavasenāti attho. ^b^‘‘Eva’’^eb^nti hi padaṃ yathānusiṭṭhāya ^a^V1.0346^ea^ anusāsaniyā vidhivasena, paṭisedhavasena ca pavattiākāraparāmasanaṃ, sā ca sammāvitakkānaṃ micchāvitakkānañca pavattiākāradassanavasena pavattati tattha ānisaṃsassa ādīnavassa ca vibhāvanatthaṃ. ^b^Aniccasaññameva^eb^ na niccasaññanti attho. Paṭiyogīnivattanatthañhi ^b^eva^eb^-kāraggahaṇaṃ. Idhāpi ^b^evaṃ^eb^ saddaggahaṇassa attho, payojanañca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^gahaṇepi eseva nayo. ^b^Pañcakāmaguṇikarāga^eb^nti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tadaññarāgassa, dosādīnañca pahānassa icchitattā, tappahānassa ca tadaññarāgādikhepanassa upāyabhāvato tathā vuttaṃ duṭṭhalohitavimocanassa ^a^P1.0509^ea^ pubbaduṭṭhamaṃsakhepanūpāyatā viya. ^b^Lokuttaradhammamevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato sāvajjadhammanivattanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassādhigamūpāyānisaṃsabhūtānaṃ tadaññesaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ nānantariyabhāvato. ^b^Iddhividhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyanti dasseti^eb^ iddhidassanena parasantāne pasādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhassa haraṇato. Iminā nayena sesapadadvayepi attho veditabbo. ^b^Satataṃ dhammadesanā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ desetabbadhammadesanā.

[03]^b^Iddhipāṭihāriyenā^eb^ti sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ, iddhipāṭihāriyena saddhinti attho. ^b^Ādesanāpāṭihāriyenā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Dhammasenāpatissa āciṇṇanti yojanā. ^b^‘‘Cittācāraṃ ñatvā’’^eb^ti iminā ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ dasseti. ^b^‘‘Dhammaṃ desesī’’^eb^ti iminā anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ ^b^‘‘buddhānaṃ satataṃ dhammadesanā’’^eb^ti anusāsanīpāṭihāriyassa tattha sātisayatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Saupārambhāni^eb^ patirūpena upārambhitabbato. ^b^Sadosāni^eb^ dosasamucchindanassa anupāyabhāvato. Sadosattā eva ^b^addhānaṃ na tiṭṭhanti^eb^ cirakālaṭṭhāyīni na honti. ^b^Addhānaṃ atiṭṭhanato na niyyantī^eb^ti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ. Aniyyānikatāya hi tāni anaddhaniyāni. ^b^Anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ anupārambhaṃ^eb^ visuddhippabhavato, visuddhinissayato ^a^M1.0391^ea^ ca. Tato eva ^b^niddosaṃ.^eb^ Na hi tattha pubbāparavirodhādidosasambhavo. Niddosattā eva ^b^addhānaṃ tiṭṭhati^eb^ paravādavātehi, kilesavātehi ca anupahantabbato. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yathāvuttakāraṇato, tena saupārambhādiṃ, anupārambhādiṃ cāti ubhayaṃ ubhayattha yathākkamaṃ gārayhapāsaṃsabhāvānaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati.

[03]^b^487^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aniyyānikabhāvadassanattha^eb^nti ^a^P1.0510^ea^ yasmā mahābhūtapariyesako bhikkhu purimesu dvīsu pāṭihāriyesu vasippatto kusalopi samāno mahābhūtānaṃ aparisesanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ nāvabujjhi ^a^V1.0347^ea^, tasmā tāni niyyānāvahatābhāvato aniyyānikānīti tesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tatiyaṃ pana takkarassa ekantato niyyānāvahanti tasseva ^b^niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ.^eb^

[03]Evametissā desanāya mukhyapayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni anusaṅgikampi dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Mahābhūte pariyesanto^eb^ti aparisesaṃ nirujjhanavasena mahābhūte gavesanto, tesaṃ anavasesanirodhaṃ vīmaṃsantoti attho. ^b^Vicaritvā^eb^ti dhammatāya codiyamāno vicaritvā. Dhammatāsiddhaṃ kiretaṃ, yadidaṃ tassa bhikkhuno tathā vicaraṇaṃ, yathā abhijātiyaṃ mahāpathavikampādi. ^b^Mahantabhāvappakāsanattha^eb^nti sadevake loke anaññasādhāraṇassa buddhānaṃ mahantabhāvassa mahānubhāvatāya dīpanatthaṃ. ^b^Idañca kāraṇa^eb^nti sabbesampi buddhānaṃ sāsane īdiso eko bhikkhu tadānubhāvappakāsano hotīti idampi kāraṇaṃ dassento.

[03]^b^Katthā^eb^ti nimitte bhummaṃ, tasmā ^b^katthā^eb^ti kismiṃ ṭhāne kāraṇabhūte. ^b^Kiṃ āgammā^eb^ti kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ adhigantvā, tenāha ^b^‘‘kiṃ pattassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Te^eb^ti mahābhūtā. ^b^Appavattivasenā^eb^ti anuppajjanavasena. ^b^Sabbākārenā^eb^ti vacanatthalakkhaṇādisamuṭṭhānakalāpacuṇṇanānattekattavinibbhogāvinibbhoga- sabhāgavisabhāgājjhattikabāhirasaṅgahapaccayasamannāhārapaccayavibhāgākārato, sasambhārasaṅkhepasasambhāravibhattisalakkhaṇasaṅkhepasalakkhaṇavibhattiākārato cāti sabbena ākārena.

[03]^b^488^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dibbanti ^a^M1.0392^ea^ ettha pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūtā hutvā vicaranti, kīḷanti, jotanti cāti devo, devaloko. Taṃ yanti upagacchanti etenāti ^b^devayāniyo. Vasaṃ vattento^eb^ti ^a^P1.0511^ea^ ettha ^b^vasavattanaṃ^eb^ nāma yathicchitaṭṭhānagamanaṃ. Cattāro mahārājāno etesaṃ issarāti ^b^cātumahārājikā^eb^ yā devatā maggaphalalābhino tā tamatthaṃ ekadesena jāneyyuṃ buddhavisayo panāyaṃ pañhoti cintetvā ‘‘na jānāmā’’ti āhaṃsu, tenāha ^b^‘‘buddhavisaye’’^eb^tiādi. Ajjhottharaṇaṃ nāmettha nippīḷananti āha ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ pucchatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhikkantatarā^eb^ti rūpasampattiyā ceva paññāpaṭibhānādiguṇehi ca amhe abhibhuyya paresaṃ kāmanīyatarā. ^b^Paṇītatarā^eb^ti uḷāratarā, tenāha ^b^‘‘uttamatarā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^491-3^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Devayāniyasadiso^eb^ iddhividhañāṇasseva adhippetattā. ^b^‘‘Devayāniyamaggoti vā ^a^V1.0348^ea^ …pe… sabbametaṃ iddhividhañāṇasseva nāma’’^eb^nti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca tattha tattha āgataruḷhivasena vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^494^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āgamanapubbabhāge nimitta^eb^nti brahmuno āgamanassa pubbabhāge uppajjananimittaṃ. ^b^Pāturahosī^eb^ti āvi bhavi. ^b^Pākaṭo ahosī^eb^ti pakāso ahosi.

[03]^b^497^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Padesenā^eb^ti ekadesena, upādinnakavasena, sattasantānapariyāpannenāti attho. ^b^Anupādinnakepī^eb^ti anindriyabaddhepi. ^b^Nippadesato^eb^ anavasesato. ^b^Pucchāmūḷhassā^eb^ti pucchituṃ ajānantassa. ^b^Pucchāya dosaṃ dassetvā^eb^ti tena katapucchāya pucchitākāre dosaṃ vibhāvetvā. Yasmā vissajjanaṃ nāma pucchānurūpaṃ pucchāsabhāgena vissajjetabbato, na ca tathāgatā virajjhitvā katapucchānurūpaṃ vissajjenti, atthasabhāgatāya ca vissajjanassa pucchakā tadatthaṃ anavabujjhantā sammuyhanti, tasmā pucchāya sikkhāpanaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘pucchaṃ sikkhāpetvā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^498^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Appatiṭṭhā^eb^ti appaccayā, sabbaso samucchinnakāraṇāti attho. ^b^Upādinnaṃ yevā^eb^ti indriyabaddhameva. Yasmā ekadisābhimukhaṃ santānavasena saṇṭhite rūpappabandhe dīghasamaññā taṃ upādāya tato appake rassasamaññā tadubhayañca visesato rūpaggahaṇamukhena ^a^P1.0512^ea^ gayhati, tasmā āha ^a^M1.0393^ea^^b^‘‘dīghañca rassañcāti saṇṭhānavasena upādārūpaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti. Appaparimāṇe rūpasaṅghāte aṇusamaññā, taṃ upādāya tato mahati thūlasamaññā. Idampi dvayaṃ visesato rūpaggahaṇamukhena gayhati, tenāha ^b^‘‘imināpī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pi^eb^-saddena cettha ‘‘saṇṭhānavasena upādārūpaṃ vutta’’nti etthāpi vaṇṇamattameva kathitanti imamatthaṃ samuccinatīti vadanti. ^b^Subha^eb^nti sundaraṃ, iṭṭhanti attho. ^b^Asubha^eb^nti asundaraṃ, aniṭṭhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ panevaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti. Dīghaṃ rassaṃ, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ, subhāsubhanti tīsu ṭhānesu upādārūpasseva gahaṇaṃ, bhūtarūpānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā. ^b^Nāma^eb^nti vedanādikkhandhacatukkaṃ tañhi ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato, nāmakaraṇato ca ‘‘nāma’’nti vuccati. Heṭṭhā ‘‘dīghaṃ rassa’’ntiādinā vuttameva idha ruppanaṭṭhena ‘‘rūpa’’nti gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘dīghādibhedaṃ rūpañcā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dīghādī^eb^ti ca ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena āpādīnañca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā vā dīghādisamaññā na rūpāyatanavatthukāva, atha kho bhūtarūpavatthukāpi. Tathā hi saṇṭhānaṃ phusanamukhenapi gayhati, tasmā dīgharassādiggahaṇena bhūtarūpampi gayhatevāti ‘‘dīghādibhedaṃ rūpa’’micceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Kiṃ āgammā^eb^ti kiṃ adhigantvā kissa ^a^V1.0349^ea^ adhigamahetu. ^b^‘‘Uparujjhatī’’^eb^ti idaṃ anuppādanirodhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na khaṇanirodhanti āha ^b^‘‘asesametaṃ nappavattatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^499^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Viññātabba^eb^nti visiṭṭhena ñātabbaṃ, ñāṇuttamena ariyamaggañāṇena paccakkhato jānitabbanti attho, tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbānassetaṃ nāma’’^eb^nti. Nidissatīti nidassanaṃ, cakkhuviññeyyaṃ. Na nidassanaṃ ^b^anidassanaṃ,^eb^ acakkhuviññeyyanti etamatthaṃ vadanti. Nidassanaṃ ^a^P1.0513^ea^ vā upamā, taṃ etassa natthīti ^b^anidassanaṃ.^eb^ Na hi nibbānassa niccassa ekassa accantasantapaṇītasabhāvassa sadisaṃ nidassanaṃ kutoci labbhatīti. Yaṃ ahutvā sambhoti, hutvā paṭiveti taṃ saṅkhataṃ udayavayantehi sāntaṃ, asaṅkhatassa pana nibbānassa niccassa te ubhopi antā na santi, tato eva navabhāvāpagamasaṅkhāto jarantopi tassa natthīti āha ^b^‘‘uppādanto…pe… ananta’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Titthassa nāma’’nti vatvā tattha nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘papanti etthāti papa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Ettha hi papanti pānatitthaṃ. ^b^Bha-kāro kato^eb^ niruttinayena. Visuddhaṭṭhena vā ^b^sabbatopabhaṃ,^eb^ kenaci anupakkiliṭṭhatāya samantato pabhassaranti attho ^a^M1.0394^ea^. Yena nibbānaṃ adhigataṃ, taṃ santatipariyāpannānaṃyeva idha anuppādanirodho adhippetoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘upādinnakadhammajātaṃ nirujjhati appavattaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ‘‘viññāṇassa nirodhenā’’ti yaṃ padaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ. ^b^‘‘Viññāṇa’’^eb^nti viññāṇaṃ uddharati vibhattabbattā ^b^etthetaṃ uparujjhatī^eb^ti etasmiṃ nibbāne etaṃ nāmarūpaṃ carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anuppādavasena nirujjhati anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā, tenāha ^b^‘‘vijjhātadīpasikhā viya apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ yātī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Carimakaviññāṇa’’nti hi arahato cuticittaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^‘‘Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassāpī’’^eb^tiādināpi saupādisesanibbānamukhena anupādisesanibbānameva vadati nāmarūpassa anavasesato uparujjhanassa adhippetattā, tenāha ^b^‘‘anuppādavasena uparujjhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sotāpattimaggañāṇenā^eb^ti kattari, karaṇe vā karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Nirodhenā^eb^ti pana hetumhi. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ nibbāne. Sesamettha yaṃ atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Kevaṭṭasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^501^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sālavatikāti^eb^^a^V1.0350^ea^^a^M1.0395^ea^^a^P1.0514^ea^ itthiliṅgavasena ^b^tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ.^eb^ Gāmaṇikābhāvenāti keci. Lohito nāma tassa kule pubbapuriso, tassa vasena ^b^lohiccoti tassa brāhmaṇassa^eb^ gottato āgataṃ ^b^nāmaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^502^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Diṭṭhigata’’nti laddhimattaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘na pana ucchedasassatānaṃ aññatara’’^eb^nti. Na hi ucchedasassatagāhavinimutto koci diṭṭhigāho atthi. ^b^‘‘Bhāsati yevā’’^eb^ti tassā laddhiyā loke pākaṭabhāvaṃ dasseti. Attato añño paroti yathā anusāsakato anusāsitabbo paro, evaṃ anusāsitabbatopi anusāsako paroti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paro parassāti paro yo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kiṃ^eb^-saddāpekkhāya cettha ^b^‘‘karissatī’’^eb^ti anāgatakālavacanaṃ, anāgatepi vā tena tassa kātabbaṃ natthīti dassanatthaṃ. ^b^Kusalaṃ dhamma^eb^nti anavajjadhammaṃ nikkilesadhammaṃ vimokkhadhammanti attho. ‘‘Paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathessāmī’’ti tehi attānaṃ parivārāpetvā vicaraṇaṃ kiṃ atthiyaṃ āsayabuddhassāpi anurodhena vinā taṃ na hotīti tasmā ^b^attanā paṭiladdhaṃ…pe… vihātabbanti vadati.^eb^ Tenāha ‘‘evaṃ sampadamidaṃ pāpakaṃ lobhadhammaṃ vadāmī’’ti.
[03]^b^504^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^So^eb^ti lohicco brāhmaṇo.

[03]^b^508^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kathāphāsukattha^eb^nti kathāsukhatthaṃ, sukhena kathaṃ kathetuñceva sotuñcāti attho. ^b^Appeva nāma siyā^eb^ti ettha pītivasena āmeḍitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ ‘‘buddhagajjita’’nti vuccati ^a^V1.0351^ea^. Bhagavā hi ^a^P1.0515^ea^ īdisesu ṭhānesu visesato pītisomanassajāto hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyo’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^509^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samudayasañjātī^eb^ti āyuppādo. Anupubbo kampī-saddo ākaṅkhanattho hotīti ^b^‘‘icchatīti attho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sātisayena vā ^a^M1.0396^ea^ hitena anukampako anuggaṇhanako ^b^hitānukampī. Sampajjatī^eb^ti āsevanalābhena nippajjati balavatī hoti, avaggahāti attho, tenāha ^b^‘‘niyatā hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Niraye nibbattati^eb^ micchādiṭṭhiko.

[03]^b^510-11^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dutiyaṃ upapatti^eb^nti ‘‘nanu rājā pasenadī kosalo’’tiādinā dutiyaṃ upapattiṃ sādhanayuttiṃ. Kāraṇañhi bhagavā upamāmukhena dasseti. ^b^Ye cime^eb^ti ye ca ime kulaputtā dibbā gabbhā paripācentīti yojanā. ^b^Asakkuṇantā^eb^ upanissayasampattiyā, ñāṇaparipākassa vā abhāvena. Ye pana ‘‘paripaccantī’’ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ ‘‘dibbe gabbhe’’ti vacanavipallāsena payojanaṃ natthi. Attho ca dutiyavikappe vuttanayena veditabbo. Ahitānukampitā ca taṃsamaṅgisattavasena. Divi bhavāti ^b^dibbā. ^eb^ Gabbhenti paripaccanavasena santānaṃ pabandhentīti ^b^gabbhā. ‘‘Channaṃ devalokāna’’^eb^nti nidassanavacanametaṃ. Brahmalokassāpi hi dibbagabbhabhāvo labbhateva dibbavihārahetukattā. Evañca katvā ‘‘bhāvanaṃ bhāvayamānā’’ti idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Bhavanti ettha yathāruci sukhasamappitāti bhavā, vimānāni. Devabhāvāvahattā ^b^dibbā.^eb^ Vuttanayeneva ^b^gabbhā. Dānādayo^eb^ devalokasaṃvattaniya^b^puññavisesā.^eb^^b^Dibbā bhavā^eb^ti devalokapariyāpannā upapattibhavā. Tadāvaho hi kammabhavo pubbe gahito.

[03]^b^513^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aniyamitenevā^eb^ti aniyameneva ‘‘tvaṃ evaṃdiṭṭhiko evaṃ sattānaṃ anatthassa kārako’’ti evaṃ anuddesikeneva ^a^P1.0516^ea^. ^b^Māna^eb^nti ‘‘ahametaṃ jānāmi, ahametaṃ passāmī’’ti evaṃ paṇḍitamānaṃ. ^b^Bhinditvā^eb^ti vidhametvā, jahāpetvāti attho. ^b^Tayo satthāre^eb^ti asampāditāttahito anovādakarasāvako, asampāditāttahito ovādakarasāvako, sampāditāttahito anovādakarasāvakoti ime tayo satthāre. Catuttho pana sammāsambuddho na codanāraho hotīti ‘‘tena pucchite eva kathessāmī’’ti codanārahe tayo satthāre paṭhamaṃ dassesi ^a^V1.0352^ea^, pacchā catutthaṃsatthāraṃ. Kāmañcettha catuttho satthā eko adutiyo anaññasādhāraṇo, tathāpi so yesaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ ^a^M1.0397^ea^ vasena ‘‘dhammamayo kāyo’’ti vuccati, tesaṃ samudāyabhūtopi te guṇāvayave satthuṭṭhāniye katvā dassento bhagavā ‘‘ayampi kho, lohicca, satthā’’ti abhāsi.

[03]^b^Aññā^eb^ti ya-kāralopena niddeso ‘‘sayaṃ abhiññā’’ti ādīsu (dī. ni. 1.28, 37, 52; ma. ni. 1.284; 2.341; a. ni. 2.5; 10.11; mahāva. 11; dha. pa. 353; kathā. 405) viya. ^b^Aññāyā^eb^ti ca tadatthiye sampadānavacananti āha ^b^‘‘ājānanatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Sāvakattaṃ paṭijānitvā ṭhitattā ekadesenassa sāsanaṃ karontīti āha ^b^‘‘nirantaraṃ tassa sāsanaṃ akatvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ukkamitvā vattantī^eb^ti yathicchitaṃ karontīti attho. ^b^Paṭikkamantiyā^eb^ti anabhiratiyā agāravena apagacchantiyā, tenāha ^b^‘‘anicchantiyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekāyā^eb^ti ekāya itthiyā. ^b^Eko iccheyyā^eb^ti eko puriso tāya anicchantiyā sampayogaṃ kāmeyya. Osakkanādimukhena ^a^P1.0517^ea^ itthipurisasambandhanidassanaṃ gehasitāpekkhāvasena tassa satthuno sāvakesu paṭipattīti dasseti. Ativiya virattabhāvato ^b^daṭṭhumpi anicchamānaṃ. Lobhenā^eb^ti parivāravasena uppajjanakalābhasakkāralobhena. ^b^Tattha sampādehī^eb^ti tasmiṃ paṭipattidhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ katvā sampādehi. ^b^Ujuṃ karohi^eb^ kāyavaṅkādivigamena.

[03]^b^515^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ codanaṃ arahatī^eb^ti evaṃ vuttanayena sāvakesu appossukkabhāvāpādane niyojanavasena codanaṃ arahati, na paṭhamo viya ‘‘evarūpo tava lobhadhammo’’tiādinā, na ca dutiyo viya ‘‘attānameva tāva tattha sampādehī’’tiādinā. Kasmā? Sampāditāttahitatāya tatiyassa.

[03]^b^516^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Na codanāraho’’ti ettha yasmā codanārahatā nāma satthuvippaṭipattiyā vā sāvakavippaṭipattiyā vā ubhayavippaṭipattiyā vā, tayidaṃ sabbampi imasmiṃ satthari natthi, tasmā na codanārahoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayañhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^517^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mayā^eb^^a^M1.0398^ea^^b^gahitāya diṭṭhiyā^eb^ti sabbaso anavajje sammāpaṭipanne paresaṃ sammadeva sammāpaṭipattiṃ dessente satthari abhūtadosāropanavasena micchāgahitāya nirayagāminiyā pāpadiṭṭhiyā ^a^V1.0353^ea^. ^b^Narakapapāta^eb^nti narakasaṅkhātaṃ mahāpapātaṃ. Papatanti tatthāti hi papāto. ^b^Saggamaggathale^eb^ti saggagāmimaggabhūte puññadhammathale. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Lohiccasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^518^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uttarenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0354^ea^^a^M1.0399^ea^^a^P1.0518^ea^ ettha ^b^ena^eb^-saddo disāvācīsaddato pañcamīantato adūrattho icchito, tasmā uttarena-saddena adūratthajotanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘adūre uttarapasse’’^eb^ti āha. Akkharacintakā pana ena-saddayoge avadhivācini pade upayogavacanaṃ icchanti. Attho pana sāmivaseneva icchitoti idha sāmivacanavaseneva vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^519^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kulacārittādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena mantajjhenābhirūpatādisampattiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Mantasajjhāyakaraṇattha^eb^nti āthabbaṇamantānaṃ sajjhāyakaraṇatthaṃ, tenāha ^b^‘‘aññesaṃ bahūnaṃ pavesanaṃ nivāretvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^520^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Jaṅghacāra’’^eb^nti caṅkamato ito cito ca caraṇamāha. So hi jaṅghāsu kilamathavinodanattho cāroti tathā vutto. Tenāha ‘‘anucaṅkamantānaṃ anuvicarantāna’’nti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti ubhosupi anucaṅkamanānuvicāraṇānaṃ labbhanato. Sahāyā hi te aññamañña sabhāgavuttikā. ‘‘Maggo’’ti icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ujukaṃ maggati upagacchati etenāti maggo, ujumaggo. Tadañño amaggo, tasmiṃ ^b^magge ca amagge ca. Paṭipada^eb^nti brahmalokagāmimaggassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ.

[03]Niyyātīti niyyānīyo, so eva ^b^‘‘niyyāniko’’^eb^ti vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘niyyāyanto’’^eb^ti. Yasmā niyyātapuggalavasenassa niyyānikabhāvo ^a^P1.0519^ea^, tasmā ‘‘niyyāyanto’’ti puggalassa yoniso paṭipajjanavasena niyyāyanto maggo ^b^‘‘niyyātī’’^eb^ti vutto. ^b^Karotī^eb^ti attano santāne uppādeti. Uppādentoyeva hi tattha ^b^paṭipajjati^eb^ nāma. Saha byeti vattatīti sahabyo, sahavattanako ^a^V1.0355^ea^. Tassa bhāvo ^b^sahabyatā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sahabhāvāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Sahabhāvoti ca salokatā, samīpatā vā veditabbā, tenāha ^b^‘‘ekaṭṭhāne pātubhāvāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakameva ācariyavāda^eb^nti attano ācariyena pokkharasātinā kathitameva ācariyavādaṃ. ^b^Thometvā paggaṇhitvā^eb^ ‘‘ayameva ujumaggo ayamañjasāyano’’ti pasaṃsitvā ukkaṃsitvā. ^b^Bhāradvājopi^eb^^a^M1.0400^ea^^b^sakamevā^eb^ti bhāradvājopi māṇavo attano ācariyena tārukkhena kathitameva ācariyavādaṃ thometvā paggaṇhitvā vicaratīti yojanā. ^b^Tena vutta^eb^nti tena yathā tathā vā abhiniviṭṭhabhāvena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ.

[03]^b^521-2^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aniyyānikā vā^eb^ti appāṭihāriyāva aññamaññassa vāde dosaṃ dassetvā aviparītatthadassanatthaṃ uttararahitā eva. Aññamaññassa vādassa ādito viruddhaggahaṇaṃ ^b^viggaho,^eb^ sveva vivadanavasena aparāparaṃ uppanno ^b^vivādo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘pubbuppattiko viggaho aparabhāge vivādo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Duvidhopi eso^eb^ viggaho, vivādoti dvidhā vuttopi virodho. ^b^Nānāācariyānaṃ vādato^eb^ti nānārucikānaṃ ācariyānaṃ vādabhāvato. ^b^Nānāvādo^eb^ nānāvidho vādoti katvā.

[03]^b^523^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekassāpī^eb^ti tumhesu dvīsu ekassāpi. ^b^Ekasmi^eb^nti sakavādaparavādesu ekasmimpi. ^b^Saṃsayo natthī^eb^ti ‘‘maggo nu kho, na maggo nu kho’’ti saṃsayo vicikicchā natthi. Añjasāyanabhāve pana saṃsayo. Tenāha ‘‘esa ^a^P1.0520^ea^ kirā’’tiādi. Bhagavā pana yadi sabbattha maggasaññino, ^b^evaṃ sati ‘‘kismiṃ vo viggaho’’ti pucchati^eb^.
[03]^b^524^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ujukaṃ maggati upagacchati etenāti maggo, ujumaggo. Tadañño amaggo’’ti vutto vāyamattho. ^b^Sabbe te^eb^ti sabbepi te nānāācariyehi vuttamaggā.

[03]Ye pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘addhariyā brāhmaṇā’’tiādinā vuttā. Addharo nāma yaññaviseso, tadupayogibhāvato ‘‘addhariyā’’ tveva vuccanti yajūni, tāni sajjhāyantīti ^b^addhariyā,^eb^ yajubbedino. Ye ca tittirīsinā kate mante sajjhāyanti, te^b^ tittiriyā,^eb^ yajubbedino eva. Yajubbedasākhā hesā, yadidaṃ tittiraṃ. Chando vuccati visesato sāmavedo, taṃ sarena kāyantīti ^b^chandokā,^eb^ sāmavedino. ^b^‘‘Chandogā’’^eb^tipi paṭhanti, so evattho. Bahavo irayo etthāti bavhāri, irubbedo. Taṃ adhīyantīti ^b^bavhārijjhā.^eb^

[03]‘‘Bahūnī’’ti ^a^M1.0401^ea^^a^V1.0356^ea^ etthāyaṃ upamāsaṃsandanā – yathā te nānāmaggā ekaṃsato tassa gāmassa vā nigamassa vā pavesāya honti, evaṃ brāhmaṇehi paññāpiyamānāpi nānāmaggā brahmalokūpagamanāya brahmunā sahabyatāya ekaṃseneva hontīti.

[03]^b^527-529^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Va-kāro āgamasandhimatta^eb^nti anatthako va-kāro, tena vaṇṇāgamena padantarasandhimattaṃ katanti attho. ^b^Andhapaveṇī^eb^ti andhapanti. ^b^‘‘Paññāsasaṭṭhi andhā’’^eb^ti idaṃ tassā andhapaveṇiyā mahato gacchagumbassa anuparigamanayogyatādassanaṃ. Evañhi te ‘‘suciraṃ velaṃ maggaṃ gacchāmā’’ti evaṃ saññino honti. ^b^Nāmakaṃyevā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0521^ea^ atthābhāvato nāmamattaṃyeva, taṃ pana bhāsitaṃ tehi sārasaññitampi nāmamattatāya asārabhāvato nihīnamevāti āha ^b^‘‘lāmakaṃyevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^530^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yato^eb^ti bhummatthe nissakkavacanaṃ, sāmaññajotanā ca visese avatiṭṭhatīti āha ^b^‘‘yasmiṃ kāle’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āyācantī^eb^ti patthenti. Uggamanaṃ lokassa bahukārabhāvato tathā thomanāti. Ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhi ‘‘brāhmaṇānaṃ āyācanāya candimasūriyā gantvā loke obhāsaṃ karontī’’ti.

[03]^b^532^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Idha pana kiṃ vattabba^eb^nti imasmiṃ pana appaccakkhabhūtassa brahmuno sahabyatāya maggadesane tevijjānaṃ kiṃ vattabbaṃ atthi, ye paccakkhabhūtānampi candimasūriyānaṃ sahabyatāya maggaṃ desetuṃ na sakkontīti adhippāyo. ^b^‘‘Yatthā’’^eb^ti ‘‘idha panā’’ti vuttamevatthaṃ paccāmasati.
[03]^b^542^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samabharitā^eb^ti sampuṇṇā. Tato eva ^b^kākapeyyā. Pārā^eb^ti paratīraṃ. ^b^Apāra^eb^nti orimatīraṃ. ^b^Ehī^eb^ti āgaccha.

[03]^b^544^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañcasīla…pe… veditabbā^eb^ yamaniyamādibrāhmaṇadhammānaṃ tadantogadhabhāvato. ^b^Tabbiparītā^eb^ti pañcasīlādiviparītā pañca verādayo. ‘‘Punapī’’ti vatvā ^b^‘‘aparampī’’^eb^ti vacanaṃ itarāyapi nadi upamāya saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ.

[03]^b^546^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāmayitabbaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0357^ea^ kāmanīyabhāvena. ^b^Bandhanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti teneva kāmetabbabhāvena sattānaṃ cittassa ābandhanabhāvena. Kāmañcāyaṃ ^b^guṇa^eb^-saddo ^a^M1.0402^ea^ atthantaresupi diṭṭhappayogo, tesaṃ panettha asambhavato pārisesañāyena bandhanaṭṭheyeva yuttoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anujānāmī’’^eb^tiādinā atthuddhāro āraddho, ^b^esevā^eb^ti bandhanaṭṭho eva. Na hi rūpādīnaṃ kāmetabbabhāve vuccamāne paṭalaṭṭho yujjati tathā kāmetabbatāya anadhippetattā. Rāsaṭṭhāanisaṃsaṭṭhesupi eseva ^a^P1.0522^ea^ nayo tathāpi kāmetabbatāya anadhippetattā. Pārisesato pana bandhanaṭṭho gahito. Yadaggena hi nesaṃ kāmetabbatā, tadaggena bandhanabhāvo cāti.
[03]Koṭṭhāsaṭṭhopi tesu yujjateva cakkhuviññeyyādikoṭṭhāsabhāvena nesaṃ kāmetabbato. Koṭṭhāse ca guṇa-saddo dissati ‘‘diguṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabba’’ntiādīsu, sampadāṭṭhopi –
[21]‘‘Asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni, saguṇena mahesino;
[22]Guṇena nāmamuddheyyaṃ, api nāmasahassato’’ti. (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1313; udā. aṭṭha. 53; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 76);
[07]Ādīsu sopi idha na yujjatīti anuddhaṭo.

[03]^b^Cakkhuviññeyyā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇena vijānitabbā, tena pana vijānanaṃ dassanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘passitabbā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Sotaviññāṇena sotabbā’’ti evamādi ^b^etenupāyenā^eb^ti atidisati. Gavesitampi ‘‘iṭṭha’’nti vuccati, taṃ idha nādhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtā^eb^ti sukhārammaṇabhūtā. ^b^Kāmanīyā^eb^ti kāmetabbā. Iṭṭhabhāvena manaṃ appāyantīti ^b^manāpā. Piyajātikā^eb^ti piyasabhāvā.

[03]^b^Gedhenā^eb^ti lobhena abhibhūtā hutvā pañcakāmaguṇe paribhuñjantīti yojanā. ^b^Mucchākāra^eb^nti mohanākāraṃ. ^b^Adhiosannā^eb^ti adhiggayha ajjhosāya avasannā, tenāha ^b^‘‘ogāḷhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pariniṭṭhānappattā^eb^ti gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanavasena pariniṭṭhānaṃ upagatā. ^b^Ādīnava^eb^nti kāmaparibhoge sampati, āyatiñca dosaṃ ^b^apassantā.^eb^ Ghāsacchādanādisambhoganimittasaṃkilesato nissaranti apagacchanti etenāti nissaraṇaṃ, yoniso paccavekkhitvā tesaṃ paribhogapaññā. Tadabhāvato ^b^anissaraṇapaññā^eb^ti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘idametthā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^548-9^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āvarantī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0403^ea^^a^V1.0358^ea^^a^P1.0523^ea^ kusalappavattiṃ āditova nivārenti. ^b^Nivārentī^eb^ti niravasesato vārayanti. ^b^Onandhantī^eb^ti ogāhantā viya chādenti. ^b^Pariyonandhantī^eb^ti sabbaso chādenti. ^b^Āvaraṇādīnaṃ vasenā^eb^ti āvaraṇādiatthānaṃ vasena. Te hi āsevanabalavatāya purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimā daḷhataratamādibhāvappattā vuttā.

[03]^b^550^eb^^b^.^eb^ Itthipariggahe sati purisassa pañcakāmaguṇapariggaho paripuṇṇo eva hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sapariggahoti itthipariggahena sapariggaho’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Itthipariggahena apariggaho’’^eb^ti ca idaṃ tevijjabrāhmaṇesu dissamānapariggahānaṃ duṭṭhullatamapariggahābhāvadassanaṃ. Evaṃbhūtānaṃ tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ kā brahmunā saṃsandanā, brahmā pana sabbena sabbaṃ apariggahoti. ^b^Veracittena avero,^eb^ kuto etassa verappayogoti adhippāyo. ^b^Cittagelaññasaṅkhātenā^eb^ti cittuppādagelaññasaññitena, tenassa sabbarūpakāyagelaññabhāvo vutto hoti. ^b^Byāpajjhenā^eb^ti dukkhena. ^b^Uddhaccakukkuccādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tadekaṭṭhā saṃkilesadhammā saṅgayhanti. Appaṭipattihetubhūtāya vicikicchāya sati na kadāci cittaṃ purisassa vase vattati, pahīnāya pana siyā vasavattananti āha ^b^‘‘vicikicchāya abhāvato cittaṃ vase vattetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cittagatikā^eb^ti cittavasikā, tenāha ^b^cittassa vase vattantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na tādiso^eb^ti brāhmaṇā viya cittavasiko na hoti, atha kho vasībhūtajjhānābhiññatāya cittaṃ attano vase vattetīti ^b^vasavattī.^eb^

[03]^b^552^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Brahmalokamagge^eb^ti brahmalokagāmimagge paṭipajjitabbe, paññapetabbe vā, taṃ paññapentāti adhippāyo. ^b^Upagantvā^eb^ti amaggameva ‘‘maggo’’ti micchāpaṭipajjanena upagantvā, paṭijānitvā vā. ^b^Paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā viyā^eb^ti matthake ekaṅgulaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṅgulaṃ vā sukkhatāya ‘‘samatala’’nti saññāya anekaporisaṃ mahāpaṅkaṃ ^a^P1.0524^ea^ otiṇṇā viya. ^b^Anuppavisantī^eb^ti apāyamaggaṃ brahmalokamaggasaññāya ogāhayanti. Tato eva ^b^saṃsīditvā visādaṃ pāpuṇanti. Eva^eb^nti ‘‘samatala’’ntiādinā vuttanayena. ^b^Saṃsīditvā^eb^ti nimmujjitvā. ^b^Sukkhataraṇaṃ maññe tarantī^eb^ti sukkhanaditaraṇaṃ taranti maññe. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā tevijjā amaggameva ‘‘maggo’’ti upagantvā saṃsīdanti, tasmā. ^b^Yathā^eb^^a^M1.0404^ea^^b^te^eb^ti yathā te ‘‘samatala’’nti saññāya paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā. ^b^Idheva cā^eb^ti imasmiñca attabhāve. ^b^Sukhaṃ vā sātaṃ vā na labhantī^eb^ti jhānasukhaṃ vā vipassanāsātaṃ vā na labhanti, kuto maggasukhaṃ vā nibbānasātaṃ vāti adhippāyo. ^b^Maggadīpaka^eb^nti maggadīpakābhimataṃ. ^b^‘‘Iriṇa’’^eb^nti araññāniyā idaṃ adhivacananti āha ^b^‘‘agāmakaṃ mahārañña’’^eb^nti ^a^V1.0359^ea^. Migaruruādīnampi ^b^anupabhogarukkhehi. Parivattitumpi na sakkā honti^eb^ mahākaṇṭakatāya. Ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ vināso ^b^ñātibyasanaṃ. ^eb^ Evaṃ ^b^bhogasīlabyasanāni^eb^ veditabbāni. Rogo eva byasati vibādhatīti ^b^rogabyasanaṃ.^eb^ Evaṃ ^b^diṭṭhibyasana^eb^mpi daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^554^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jātasaṃvaḍḍho^eb^ti jāto hutvā saṃvaḍḍhito. ^b^Na sabbaso paccakkhā honti^eb^ paricayābhāvato. ^b^Ciranikkhanto^eb^ti nikkhanto hutvā cirakālo. ^b^Dandhāyitatta^eb^nti vissajjane mandattaṃ saṇikavutti, taṃ pana saṃsayavasena cirāyanaṃ nāma ^a^P1.0525^ea^ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘kaṅkhāvasena cirāyitatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vitthāyitatta^eb^nti sārajjitattaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vitthāyitattaṃ nāma chambhitattanti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘thaddhabhāvaggahaṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^555^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^U^eb^-iti upasaggayoge ^b^lumpa^eb^-saddo uddharaṇattho hotīti ^b^‘‘ullumpatū’’^eb^ti padassa ^b^uddharatū^eb^ti atthamāha. Upasaggavasena hi dhātu-saddā atthavisesavuttino honti yathā ‘‘uddharatū’’ti.

[03]^b^556^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yassa atisayena balaṃ atthi, so ^b^‘‘balavā’’^eb^ti vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘balasampanno’’^eb^ti. Saṅkhaṃ dhamayatīti ^b^saṅkhadhamako,^eb^ taṃ dhamayitvā tato saddapavattako. ^b^Appanāva vaṭṭati^eb^ paṭipakkhato sammadeva cetaso vimuttibhāvato.

[03]^b^Pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ^eb^ pamāṇakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avikkhambhanato. Tathā hi taṃ brahmavihārapubbabhāgabhūtaṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odissakānodissakadisāpharaṇavasena vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkā. Vuttavipariyāyato pana ^b^appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpārūpāvacaraṃ,^eb^ tenāha ^b^‘‘tañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha arūpāvacare odissakānodissakavasena pharaṇaṃ na labbhati, tathā disāpharaṇaṃ.

[03]Keci ^a^M1.0405^ea^ pana taṃ āgamanavasena labbhatīti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ. Na hi brahmavihāranissando āruppaṃ, atha kho kasiṇanissando, tasmā yaṃ suvibhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ āruppaṃ, taṃ ^b^‘‘appamāṇakata’’^eb^nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ vā sātisayaṃ brahmavihārabhāvanāya abhisaṅkhatena santānena nibbattitaṃ, yañca brahmavihārasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāpannaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ, taṃ iminā ^a^V1.0360^ea^ pariyāyena pharaṇappamāṇavasena ^a^P1.0526^ea^^b^appamāṇakata^eb^nti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti apare. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakamme^eb^ti rūpāvacarakamme, arūpāvacarakamme ca sati. ^b^Na ohīyati na tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne taṃ abhibhavitvā paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ ohīyakaṃ hutvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāve na tiṭṭhati. ^b^Laggitu^eb^nti āvarituṃ nisedhetuṃ. ^b^Ṭhātu^eb^nti paṭibalo hutvā ṭhātuṃ. ^b^Pharitvā^eb^ti paṭippharitvā. ^b^Pariyādiyitvā^eb^ti tassa sāmatthiyaṃ khepetvā. Kammassa pariyādiyanaṃ nāma tassa vipākuppādanaṃ nisedhetvā attano vipākuppādananti āha ^b^‘‘tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evaṃ mettādivihārī^eb^ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ mettādīnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vasena mettādivihārī.
[03]^b^559^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aggaññasutte…pe… alatthu^eb^nti aggaññasutte āgatanayena upasampadañceva arahattañca alatthuṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Tevijjasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca terasasuttapaṭimaṇḍitassa sīlakkhandhavaggassa atthavaṇṇanāya
[06]Līnatthappakāsanāti.
